Honorée Fanonne Jeffers (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1967) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede abụ na onye na-ede akwụkwọ, na prọfesọ nke Bekee na Mahadum nke Oklahoma
O bipụtala nchịkọta abụ ise na akwụkwọ akụkọ

Nchịkọta ya nke afọ 2020 The Age of Phillis na-enyocha ndụ onye America na-ede uri Phillis Wheatley, dabere na ọtụtụ afọ nke nchọpụta nchekwa; edepụtara ya ogologo oge maka afọ 2020 National Book Award for Poetry, ọ bụkwa onye natara n'afọ 2021 nke Nzukọ ndị na-ese ihe na United States
O bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya, The Love Songs of WEB
Du Bois, n'afọ 2021
A mụrụ Jeffers na Kokomo, Indiana, ma zụlite ya na Durham, North Carolina, na Atlanta, Georgia

Ezinụlọ nne ya si Eatonton, Georgia; ezinụlọ nna ya, otu ọ si wee kọ, bụ 'black bourgeois and fair skinned' (nna ya, Lance Jeffers, bụkwa onye na-ede uri), ha enweghịkwa obi ụtọ mgbe ọ lụrụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ, nwanyị gbara ọchịchịrị
Jeffers dere banyere nzụlite ezinụlọ ya na Red Clay Suite (2007), ma kwuo n'ajụjụ ọnụ 'Naanị ezinụlọ m maara bụ ndị nne m, nne na nna nne m bụ ndị na-ekere òkè
Ya mere, ana m ede banyere ala ezinụlọ ya na ihe ala a pụtara nye m

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Talladega College n'afọ 1996, wee nweta MFA na Mahadum nke Alabama N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Callaloo n'afọ 2004, o chetara na ọ bụ naanị onye ojii na-ede abụ na mmemme edemede okike ya, ha abụọ guzoro n'ubu nke Black Arts Movement (BAM) ma pụọ na ya, dịka ọmụmaatụ na BAM enweghị nnabata nke nwoke idina nwoke
N'iji uri dị oke egwu o dere mgbe ọ nọ na Alabama tụnyere ọrụ ya mechara, o kwuru na ọ 'chọtara mkpa ọ dị ịnọchite anya ajụjụ ọnụ aghụghọ na mmetụta uche'
Ọ bụ prọfesọ zuru oke na Mahadum nke Oklahoma, ebe ọ na-akụzi edemede okike

O bipụtala na akwụkwọ edemede gụnyere Ploughshares, Georgetown Review, Callaloo, Iowa Review, Oxford American, Prairie Schooner, na ide abụ, ndị na-ede abụ / ndị editọ dịka Cornelius Eady, Toi Derricotte, na Jesmyn Ward edepụtala ọrụ ya

A maara ndụ Phillis Wheatley, onye America na-ede abụ na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ, site na eserese akụkọ ndụ nke Margaretta Matilda Odell, nwanyị ọcha, dere ihe dị ka afọ iri ise mgbe Wheatley nwụsịrị n'afọ 1784
Odell kwuru na ya na ezinụlọ Wheatley bụ ndị gbara Phillis Wheatley ohu (onye n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị ma lụọ John Peters gbanwere aha ya na Phillis Peters)

Ndị ọkà mmụta achọpụtawo otú akụkọ Odell si 'na-agụ dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ mmetụta uche', na-ehichapụ obi mgbawa nke ịtọrọ mmadụ na Middle Passage, ma kpochapụ eziokwu ahụ bụ na ezinụlọ Wheatley mere Phillis na ndị ọzọ ohu
Kama nke ahụ, ọ na-egosi Susanna Wheatley dị ka Onye Kraịst na-eme ihe ọma nke na-azọpụta Phillis, na John Peters dị ka nwoke ojii na-eyi egwu mmekọahụ nke na-arafu Phillis wee hapụzie ya ego

E nyere Jeffers ikike isonye na nzukọ nke Robert na Charlotte nke afọ 2009 site na American Antiquarian Society iji kwado nyocha na edemede nke The Age of Phillis, nke Wesleyan University Press bipụtara na 2020
Jeffers nọrọ afọ iri na ise na-arụ ọrụ n'akwụkwọ ahụ, wee sị 'Ọ dị m ka Ms
Phillis họọrọ m'
Odell bụ akụkọ a nabatara nke Jeffers na-agbazi n'akwụkwọ ya; ọ 'na-ejupụta oghere'

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Jeffers chọpụtara na Peters nwere ike ọ gaghị agbahapụ nwunye ya, nakwa na Odell nwere ike ịkọwa mmekọrịta ahụ n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi, nakwa na ọ nweghị ihe akaebe na Odell nwere njikọ n'ezie na ezinụlọ Wheatley

Isi ihe odide nke akwụkwọ Jeffers bụ nchịkọta uri nke na-agụgharị ma na-edegharị ndụ Wheatley, na-ejikọta akụkọ ifo na nchọpụta akụkọ ihe mere eme (ma ọ bụ 'critical fabulation', n'okwu Saidiya Hartman)

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a maara Wheatley na o dere mpịakọta nke abụọ nke uri, nke a na-ebipụtaghị; Jeffers hụrụ akwụkwọ ozi nke gosipụtara na Peters gbalịrị ibipụta mpịakọta ahụ, na-egosi na kama ịrata na ịhapụ, Wheatley na Peters nwere ike ịbụ na ha hụrụ n'anya 'Echere m na ọ bụ ihe ezi uche dị na ya iche na ọtụtụ, ọtụtụ ndị isi ojii hụrụ ọtụtụ, ọtụtụ ndị isi ojii ndị ọzọ n'anyaEchiche a bụ nsonaazụ ezi uche dị na ya nke ịnakwere mmadụ ojii anyị

Abụ Jeffers na-ejupụta oghere nke akụkọ ndụ Odell hapụrụ; ọ gụnyere akwụkwọ ozi ịhụnanya n'etiti Phillis na Peters, na-echegharị ndụ ya tupu a tọọrọ ya ma mee ya ohu, na-enye foto dị mgbagwoju anya banyere mmekọrịta ya na Wheatleys, ma na-enye nkọwa banyere nsogbu ndị ọzọ

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Jeffers na-enye akwụkwọ ozi mbụ nke akwụkwọ ozi na-esonyere Wheatley ama ama 'To His Excellency, George Washington', nke 'na-enye ngosipụta nke iwe ya na egos ọcha na-atọ ụtọ' mana ọ na-eti ihe site na ahịrịokwu ụfọdụ
E depụtara Afọ nke Phillis ogologo oge maka afọ 2020 National Book Award for Poetry A họpụtakwara akwụkwọ ahụ maka afọ 2021 NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Literary Work - Poetry, ma merie
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke Jeffers, The Love Songs of WEB
Du Bois, iji nweta otuto dị egwu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021
Oprah Winfrey kwupụtara na CBS This Morning na ọ bụ nhọrọ ọhụrụ ya maka Oprah's Book Club
Ọ bụ onye ikpeazụ maka 2021 Kirkus Prize na akụkọ ifo
Jeffers natara Harper Lee Award for Literary Distinction na 2018, ma tinye ya na Alabama Writers Hall of Fame na 2020
Ọrụ ya na Phillis Wheatley bụ nke American Antiquarian Society nabatara, nke mere ka ọ banye na nzukọ ha
Jeffers ghọrọ onye otu United States Artists, na puku dollar iri ise nkwụ ụgwọ
Carlton Davis Mays, Jr
(amụrụ n'April 8, 1981), nke a maara dị ka Honorable CNOTE, bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ hip hop na onye na-ede égwu
Mays malitere imepụta ihe mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ise na Benton Harbor Area nke Michigan, tupu ọ kwaga Atlanta na 2006
O nwèrè ihe karịrị 7,000 placements na albums ma eleghị ányà a maara ya nke ọma màkà ịmepụta 'New Level' site na rapper A$AP Ferg, yana egwu 'M'$' site na onye rapper A $AP Rocky
Mays emepụtawokwa ọtụtụ egwu màkà ndị omenkà dị iche iche dịka 2 Chainz, Migos, Ne-Yo, Flo Rida, Gucci Mane, Travis Scott, Yo Gotti, Future, Meek Mill, na Trippie Redd na ndị ọzọ
Nwoke na-asọpụrụ ma ọ bụ nwoke na-asọpụrụ bụ nwanyị a na-enye ọnọdụ nke nwoke n'emebighị ọnọdụ ndi nna ochie
Eze nwanyi Hatshepsut bụ nwanyị mbụ na-achị Ijipt oge ochie na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Fero zuru oke
Na-ichị n'Alaeze Ọhụrụ, Hatshepsut gosipụtara ma kwupụta onwe ya dị ka nwoke na-achị

N'ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke Hatshepsut, a na-egosputa ya na uwe isi ọdịnala Fero, kilt, na afụ ọnụ ụgha - ihe nnọchianya nke ọbụbụeze; a na-ebelata ara ya ma na-emesi ya ike, ubu ya dịkwa obosara ma dị nwoke
Hatshepsut rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ ụlọ na mkpọsa agha ma mee ka Ijipt banye n'oge udo na ọganihu

A maghị ihe Hatshepsut mere iji meziwanye ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị n'oge a, ọ bụ ezie na ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'Ijipt oge ochie nwere ike ikpebi ọrụ nke ha, lụọ onye ọ bụla ha chọrọ, nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta tupu alụmdi na nwunye nke kwadoro ha, gbaa di ha alụkwaghịm, nwee ala na ụlọ, banye na ndị ụkọchukwu, ma nwee ohere ịnweta njikwa ọmụmụ na ite ime

Ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'Ijipt n'oge a nwere ọkwa dị elu karịa ndị ibe ha na mba ndị ọzọ, na karịa ụmụ nwanyị Ijipt ga-adị na narị afọ ndị ọzọ mgbe Iso Ụzọ Kraịst bilitere na narị afọ nke anọ AD na mgbe e mesịrị Islam na narị afọ nke asaa AD
Olili ụmụ nwanyị na omenala La Tène na Western Europe n'etiti 450 BC na 380 BC na-egosi ọnọdụ dị elu nke ụfọdụ ụmụ nwanyị
Ihe ngosi nke ọnọdụ ndị isi na Central na Southern Germany n'oge a gụnyere ihe ike yiri ndị a hụrụ n'oge gara aga
Ili dị elu na oge Hallstatt gara aga (750 BC ruo 450 BC) gụnyere mgbaaka olu ọla edo, mma ọla nchara, arịa mmanya ọla nchara, na ụgbọ ala nwere ụkwụ anọ
Ebe ili ozu dị na Hochdorf, mpaghara Biberach, nke e gwupụtara n'afọ 1970, chọtara naanị ihe olili ozu ụmụ nwoke tupu na n'oge Hallstat
Otú ọ dị, na 480 BC, ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ili ụmụ nwoke a ma ama malitere ịda ma jiri ili ụmụ nwanyị a ma ama dochie ya na mberede
N'ihe dị ka n'otu oge ahụ, olili ozu ndị a dị elu gbanwere site n'ọtụtụ ụmụ nwoke gaa na ụmụ nwanyị
Agha mere ka ụmụ nwoke kwaga mba ọzọ, hapuzie ụmụ nwanyị ka ha na aru ọrụ ndị ụmụ nwoke na-arụkarị
Mgbanwe yiri nke ahụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ mere na mpaghara Celtic nke Europe
Dị ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị Celtic na oge Iron hiwere isi na ọrụ ugbo, ndị nwe ala na-achịkwa
Ndị na-achị achị bụkwa ndị isi ndị agha
Ka Agha na Medieval Scotland mụbara, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ụmụ nwanyị hụrụ onwe ha na ọrụ nke nwe ala na ike
Emume asọmpi, nnukwu ihe omume nke ụmụ nwanyị nwere ala ugbu a, gụnyere nnukwu mmanya na nri
Ịdị mma nke oriri ahụ na-egosiputa ọnọdụ onye ahu na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ngwá ọrụ, uwe, na usoro maka ịme oriri ndị a metụtakwara iwu na ụkpụrụ
A hụla mgbaaka olu ọla edo, nke na-anọchi anya ọnọdụ kachasị elu nke onye na-eme oriri na-aga nke ọma n'ili ụmụ nwanyị na-egosi na ụmụ nwanyị gara n'ihu na omume ndị umunwoke na-akwado
Ụmụ nwanyị na-ewere ọnọdụ ọchịchị na ọha mmadụ a bụ ndị umunwoke ndị ala mere ka o kwe omume, ọ bụghị enweghị

Dị ka Bettina Arnold si kwuo, onye edemede nke 'Honorary males' ma obu umunwanyi ihe? Okike, ọnọdụ, na ike na oge-Iron Europe, nyocha ihe mgbe ochie nke olili ozu na-egosi ụfọdụ ụmụ nwanyị bụ ụmụ nwoke a na-asọpụrụ ka e liri ha na akara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya yana akara ike ndị agha

Na 'Eze nwanyi Elizabeth I ya na oge nnogidesi Ike ndi nna ochie', Allison Heisch na-akọwa ụmụ nwoke na-asọpụrụ dị ka ụmụ nwanyị na-anakwere ụkpụrụ na omume nke ọha nwoke nke ha na-arụ ọrụ, ma na-etinye ha n'ime ha ma na-eso ha
Ọ na-ekwu na ụmụ nwoke na-asọpụrụ na-akwado kama imebi ọchịchị ndị nna ochie, ma na-ezo aka dị ka ihe atụ Queen Elizabeth I, onye ọchịchị ya enweghị mmetụta ọ bụla na ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na England
Ọ na-ekwukwa ihe atụ nke Gertrude Stein nọ ọdụ n'ụlọ nkwari akụ ya, na-ese siga ma na-akparịta ụka na ndị ikom
Ntinye aka nke Stein na-agbanwe emume mgbe nri abalị gasịrị nke ụmụ nwoke na-ese siga ma na-ekwu okwu n'etiti onwe ha, mana ọ naghị agbanwe ya kpamkpam
E mere ihe dị iche maka ya n'ihi na a na-ahụta ya dị ka onye dị iche na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ; Ernest Hemingway dere n'otu oge n'akwụkwọ ozi, 'Mụ na Gertrude Stein dị nnọọ ka ụmụnne'

Nwoke a na-asọpụrụ, Carolyn Heilbrun na-ede na 1988 'Na-abughi akwukwo akuko ndu nke umunwanyi nwere ihe ugwu England na Amerika', ga-ekewapụ onwe ya na ụmụ nwanyị na-ahụkarị iji nọgide na-enwe ọnọdụ ya
N'ụzọ dị otú a, ọ na-agbanwe otu ụdị njide (akụkụ ụlọ) maka nke ọzọ (ógbè nwoke)

N'iji ọchịchị ụmụ nwoke na mpaghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Zambia tụnyere nke dị na United States n'afọ 1998, Sara Hlupekile Longwe na-ede na ụmụ nwoke na-asọpụrụ na-abụkarị ndị eze nwanyị aṅụ bụ ndị 'a gụrụ akwụkwọ ikwere na ụmụ nwanyị enweelarị nha nhata - n'ihi na ha onwe ha eruola n'elu'; ọ na-akpọ nke a ọrịa Thatcher
Ụmụ nwanyị dị otú ahụ, ọ na-ekwu, achọghị inye ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ ike, kama ha na-echekwa ọnọdụ ha pụrụ iche n'etiti ụmụ nwoke
Margaret Atwood kọwara nsonaazụ nke nyocha akwụkwọ emere na 1972
Hope Ruhindi Mwesigye bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda
Ọ bụbu Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo, ụlọ ọrụ anụmanụ na ịkụ azụ site na 16 Febụwarị 2009 ruo 27 Mee 2011
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Gọọmentị Obodo, site na June 2006 ruo February 2011
Na ntuli aka nke 27 Mee 2011, e wepụrụ ya na kansụl ma jiri Tress Bucyanayandi dochie ya
A mụrụ ya na 28 Disemba 1956, na Kabale District
Ọ gara Kabale High School' maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya, na Trinity College Nabbingo maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level
Mwesigye gara n'ihu nweta nzere iwu (Bachelor of Law) na Honors, site na Mahadum Makerere
O nwekwara diplọma na Legal Practice, site na Law Development Center na Kampala
Na mgbakwunye, ọ nwetara nzere Master of Arts (MA) na Women and Gender Studies
Hope Mwesigye rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu dị elu na Ministri Ikpe nke Uganda ruo afọ asatọ tupu 1988
N'agbata afọ 1988 na afọ 1991, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmemme na Uganda Gender Resources Center, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị uru
N'agbata afọ 1991 na afọ 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enweghị uru
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmemme maka FIDA (Uganda), ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ na-enweghị uru nke Uganda na-ahụ maka ịkwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ puku abụọ na otu , ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a na-ahọpụta ma họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Kabale District
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na afọr puku abụọ na isii na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke National Resistance Movement
Ronah Ninsiima, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere onwe ya, onye bụ onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya ndị inyom Kabale, meriri ya na 2011
Na ntuli aka nke 27 Mee 2011, a chụpụrụ ya na kansụl
A na-akọ na ọ na-enwe mmasị na mmegharị obodo maka mmepe
Ọ lụrụ di ma bụrụ nne ụmụ anọ
Hope Nakazibwe Grania bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, na onye sayensị na-ahụ maka ụlọ nyocha
Ọ bụ nwanyị nọ ugbu a na nzuko omeiwu nke Mubende District
Hope lụrụ Andrew Abaasa
A mụrụ ya na 20 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1986, nwa Hindia Mpuuga na Norah Mbabazi nke Mubende District

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Tiger Army na Mubende District maka agụmakwụkwọ elementrị na afọ 1999, Kasenyi SS Mubende na maka agụmakọta ya nkịtị na Christ the King Mulinda maka agụmakmakwụkwọ ya dị elu

Hope nwere diplọma na sayensị ụlọ nyocha ahụike site na Makerere Paramedical School Mulago (2008), O nwekwara nzere bachelọ na sayensụ ụlọ nyocha ahụ ike site na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ nke Mbarara ebe ọ meriri ihe nrite dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma nke afọ 2012
O nwekwara nzere masta nke ahụike ọha na eze site na Mahadum Uganda Martyrs na asambodo na Biomedical scientific manuscript ederede site na ọnwa Machị California San Francisco USA
Hope jere ozi dị ka onye na-ahụ maka teknụzụ na ụlọ ọgwụ Mengo n'afọ 2008
N'agbata afọ 2009 na 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta ụlọ nyocha na Integrated Community Based Initiatives (ICOBI) na mpaghara Mubende na Kassanda
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta ụlọ nyocha ICOBI Kampala Central Division na 2013

Ọ sonyeere Uganda Virus Research Institute / Medical Research Council na London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine na afọ 2013, na-eduga; ngalaba hematology afọ 2013-2015, Biochemistry afọ 2015-2016, Molecular afọ 2017-2020 ma sonye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na afọ 2020

N'afọ 2020, Hope Nakazibwe Grania sonyere na Mubende District Women's Constituency na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement ebe ọ meriri Benna Namugwanya, onye bụbu Minista Steeti na-elekọta Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA)
Ọ nọchitere anya mpaghara ahụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda ruo taa
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu na Uganda Women Parliamentary Association, Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya ndị omeiwu nke NRM maka Mubende ka ukwuu
Evelyn Hope Squire Merrick (1878 ruo afọ 1936) bụ onye Britain na-ede egwu, onye na-akpọ piano, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke kwadoro ikike ụmụ nwanyị, iri akwụkwọ nri, Esperanto, na egwu ọhụrụ
Ọ megidere England itinye aka na Agha Ụwa Mbụ
O bipụtara ma rụọ ọrụ n'okpuru aha Hope Squire na Hope Merrick
A mụrụ Squire na Southport n'aka injinia na onye na-ede uri John Barret Squire na nwunye ya
Ọ lụrụ onye na-ede egwu Frank Merrick n'afọ 1911
Squire mụụrụ piano na Henry Gadsby, Tobias Matthay, na Ernst von Dohnanyi
Ọ kụziri piano ma mee ihe ngosi na London Steinway Hall na ebe ndị ọzọ
Ya na Merrick jikọrọ aka nye egwu egwu maka piano abụọ
Mgbe ụfọdụ, ha na-akpọ egwu ọhụrụ n'agwaghị ndị na-ege ntị aha onye dere ya
N'otu n'ime ihe ngosi ndị a n'afọ 1915, ha mere otu egwu abụọ nke Claude Debussy Tian La Mer

Hope Odidika Uzodimma (amụrụ n'abali 12 nke onwa Disemba 1958) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nke na-eje ozi dị ka Gọvanọ nke Imo Steeti N'ubochi 14 Jenụwarị 2020, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naijiria kwupụtara Uzodimma nke All Progressives Congress (APC) dika onye mmeri nke ntuli aka gọvanọ nke 2019 na Steeti Imo, na-emebi ntuli aka nke Gọvanọ nọ n'oge ahụ Emeka Ihedioha

Horace Pippin (ubochí irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1888 rụọ úbọchị isii n'ọnwa Julaị, 1946) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe n'onwe ya nke sere ọtụtụ isiokwu, gụnyere ihe nkiri ndị sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ọrụ ya na Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọdịdị ala, foto, na isiokwu Akwụkwọ Nsọ
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama na-ekwu màkà akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ịgba ohu na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na US

Ọ bụ ónyé Black mbụ na-ese ihe iji bụrụ isiokwu nke akwụkwọ edemede, Selden Rodman's Horace Pippin, A Negro Painter in America (1947), na New York Times toro ya dị ka 'ónyé na-ese Negro kachasị mkpa' na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke America
E liri ya na Chestnut Grove Annex Cemetery na West Goshen Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania
Ónyé na-ahụ màkà akụkọ ihe méré eme na steeti Pennsylvania na 327 Gay Street, West Chester, Pennsylvania na-akọwa ụlọ ya n'oge ọnwụ ya ma na-echeta ihe ndị ọ rụzuru
A mụrụ ya na West Chester, Pennsylvania, n'ubochí irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1888, nye Harriet Pippin; amaghị onye nna ya bụ
Ọ tolitere na Goshen, New York, mana ọ ga-alaghachi West Chester mgbè ọ toro
Na Goshen, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị na-akpa ókè ruo mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ise, mgbè ọ gàrà ọrụ iji kwado nne ya na-arịa ọrịa
Dị ka nwata nwoke, Horace zaghachiri na asọmpi mgbasa ozi nke ụlọ ọrụ na-enye ihe osise ma merie usoro mbụ ya nke pensụl na igbe mmiri
Dị ka onye na-eto eto, Pippin sere ịnyịnya na ndị na-agba ọsọ site na ụzọ ịgba ọsọ Goshen a ma ama
Tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ na Agha Ụwa Mbụ, Pippin rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ebugharị ụlọ nkwari akụ, onye na-etinye oche, na onye na-akpụ ígwè
Ọ bụ onye otu St
John's African Union Methodist Protestant Church
N'afọ 1920, Pippin lụrụ Jennie Fetherstone Wade Giles, onye di ya nwụrụ ugboro abụọ ma nwee nwa nwoke dị afọ isii
Pippin malitere nka n'afọ 1920, a kọrọ na ọ bụ iji dozie ogwe aka ya merụrụ ahụ, wee malite ise ihe na akwa a gbatịrị agbatị na 1930 na The Ending of the War Starting Home
O mechara kọwaa usoro okike ya 'Ihe osise ndị m serela na-abịakwute m n'uche m, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bàrà uru nye m mgbè foto, ana m ese ya'
O kwuru okwu n'ọtụtụ isiokwu, site na ọdịdị ala na ihe ndị nwụrụ anwụ ruo n'isiokwu Akwụkwọ Nsọ na nkwupụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ụfọdụ na-adabere na ahụmịhe onwe ya banyéré agha ma ọ bụ ndụ ezinụlọ mmalite nke narị afọ
Ọrụ Pippin gụnyere isiokwu dịgasị iche iche na usoro ide ihe
Ọ malitere n'afọ ndị 1920 site n'ịkpọ ihe osise ọkụ n'ime ogwe osisi nke na-abụkarị snow na-agbakwunye ihe osise n'otu ma ọ bụ abụọ iji mée kà ihe ndị dị na onyinyo ahụ pụta ìhè
Ihe osise mmanụ mbụ ya, The Ending of the War, Starting Home (1930), gosipụtara ihe omume nke ahụmahụ ya na Agha nke Sechault, ebe a gbagburu ya

(Ọ naghị egosi mmeri ndị Germany nyèrè n'aka n'ubochí irí na otu n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 1918, nke mere ka ọ na-agbake n'ụlọ ọgwụ French) O mekwara okpokoro ahụ ma jiri ihe agha a tụrụ n'aka chọọ ya mma, gụnyere okpu na ngwá agha ndị Germany na ndị France
O sere Agha Ụwa Mbụ ọtụtụ ugboro mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị n'afọ ndị 1930 na otu ugboro ọzọ na 1945
Pippin sere ọtụtụ ihe gbásárá okpukpe, ma ndị na-egosi akụkụ Akwụkwọ Nsọ na nkwupụta ọhụụ ndị ọzọ dị ka usoro Ugwu Nsọ ya
Ọ bụ nwoke ji okpukpe kpọrọ ihe, na-anọ nso na chọọchị n'oge ndụ ya niile site n'ịkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ Sọnde na ịbụ abụ n'òtù ukwe chọọchị ya

Pippin sere ihe dị ka ọrụ otu narị na iri anọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha dị na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka, gụnyere Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY; Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden, Washington, DC; Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts, Philadelphia, PA; Philadelphia Museum of Art; The Barnes Foundation, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania; Brandywine River Museum, Chadds Ford, Pennsylvania; Phillips Collection, Washington, DC; Baltimore Museum of Art
Baltimore, MD; na San Francisco Museum of Modern Art, CA
Pippin bụ ónyé Africa America mbụ na-ese ihe na-abụ isiokwu nke otu akwụkwọ, Selden Rodman's Horace Pippin A Negro Painter in America nke 1947
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ bụ isiokwu nke ihe ngosi atọ dị mkpà, ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na isiokwu ndị ọkà mmụta, akwụkwọ uri, na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ụmụaka

Hormone (site na akụkụ Grik ὁρμῶν, 'na-eme ka ọ na-agagharị') bụ klas nke mkpụrụ ndụ mgbaàmà na ọtụtụ mkpụrụ ndụ nke a na-eziga n'akụkụ ndị dị anya site na usoro dị mgbagwoju anya iji chịkwaa physiology na omume
A chọrọ hormone maka mmepe ziri ezi nke anụmanụ, osisi na fungus
N'ihi nkọwa sara mbara nke hormone (dị ka molekụl na-enye mgbaàmà nke na-arụ ọrụ ya n'ebe dị anya site na ebe mmepụta ya), enwere ike ịhazi ọtụtụ ụdị molekụl dị ka homonụl

N'etiti ihe ndị a pụrụ iwere dị ka homonụ, bụ eicosanoids (dịka prostaglandins na thromboxanes), steroid (dịka oestrogen na brassinosteroid), amino acid derivatives (dịka epinephrine na auxin), protein ma ọ bụ peptides (dịka insulin na CLE peptides), na gas (dịka ethylene na nitric oxide)
A na-eji hormone eme ihe iji kwurịta okwu n'etiti akụkụ ahụ na anụ ahụ

N'ime anụ ndị nwere azụ, homonụ na-ahụ maka ịchịkwa usoro dịgasị iche iche nke ahụike na omume omume dịka ịgbari nri, metabolism, iku ume, nghọta mmetụta, ụra, nsị, inye nwa ara, nrụgide, uto na mmepe, mmegharị, ọmụmụ, na njikwa ọnọdụ
N'ime osisi, homonụ na-agbanwe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ niile nke mmepe, site na ntolite ruo na ịka nká
Mmiri ogwu ahu na-emetụta mkpụrụ ndụ ndị dị anya site na ijikọta na protein ndị na-anabata ihe na mkpụrụ ndụ a na-achọ, na-akpata mgbanwe na ọrụ mkpụrụ ndụ
Mgbe hormone na-ejikọta na onye na-anabata ya, ọ na-eme ka ụzọ mgbaàmà nke na-emekarị ka transcription nke mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa rụọ ọrụ, na-akpata mmụba nke protein ndị a na-achọ
Hormones nwekwara ike ịrụ ọrụ na ụzọ ndị na-abụghị nke genomic nke na-ejikọta na mmetụta nke genomic
Mmiri homonụ na-agbaze (dị ka peptide na amines) na-arụkarị ọrụ n'elu mkpụrụ ndụ ndị a na-achọ site na ndị ozi nke abụọ
Hormone ndị na-agbaze abụba, (dị ka steroid) na-agafe n'ime plasma membranes nke mkpụrụ ndụ ndị a na-achọ (ma cytoplasmic ma nuclear) iji rụọ ọrụ n'ime nucleus ha

Brassinosteroids, ụdị polyhydroxysteroids, bụ klas nke isii nke homonụ osisi ma nwee ike ịba uru dị ka ọgwụ na-alụso ọrịa kansa ọgụ maka akpụ na-emeghachi omume endocrine iji kpatara apoptosis ma belata uto osisi
N'agbanyeghị na ha na-agbaze abụba, ha ka na-ejikọta na onye na-anabata ha n'elu mkpụrụ ndụ
Na vertibrate, akpa endocrine ha mara anya nke oma banyere any aru nke hormones nzuzo na ime
Hormone secretion occurs in response to specific biochemical signals and is often subject to negative feedback regulation
For instance, high blood sugar (serum glucose concentration) promotes insulin synthesis
Insulin then acts to reduce glucose levels and maintain homeostasis, leading to reduced insulin levels
Upon secretion, water-soluble hormones are readily transported through the circulatory system
Lipid-soluble hormones must bond to carrier plasma glycoproteins (eg, thyroxine-binding globulin (TBG)) to form ligand-protein complexes
Some hormones, such as insulin and growth hormones, can be released into the bloodstream already fully active
Other hormones, called prohormones, must be activated in certain cells through a series of steps that are usually tightly controlled
The endocrine system secretes hormones directly into the bloodstream, typically via fenestrated capillaries, whereas the exocrine system secretes its hormones indirectly using ducts
Hormones with paracrine function diffuse through the interstitial spaces to nearby target tissue
Osisi enweghị akụkụ pụrụ iche maka mmepụta nke homonụ, ọ bụ ezie na enwere nkesa nke mmepụta homonụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-emepụta hormone auxin karịsịa na isi akwụkwọ ndị na-eto eto na n'ime osisi apical meristem
Enweghị gland ndị pụrụ iche pụtara na isi ebe mmepụta hormone nwere ike ịgbanwe n'oge ndụ nke osisi, ebe mmepụta na-adabere na afọ na gburugburu ebe obibi nke osisi ahụ
Ihe mgbaàmà hormone na-agụnye usoro ndị a
A na-ahụ mkpụrụ ndụ na-emepụta hormone na gland endocrine, dị ka gland thyroid, ovaries, na testicles
A na-eji exocytosis na ụzọ ndị ọzọ nke mbugharị membrane eme ihe iji wepụta homonụ mgbe a na-egosi gland endocrine
Ihe nlereanya nke hierarchical bụ mmelite nke usoro mgbaàmà homonụ

Ndị na-anata mkpụrụ ndụ nke otu mgbaàmà homonụ nwere ike ịbụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ụdị mkpụrụ ndụ na-ebi n'ime ọnụ ọgụgụ dị iche iche nke anụ ahụ, dịka ọ dị maka insulin, nke na-akpata mmetụta dịgasị iche iche nke usoro ahụike
Ụdị anụ ahụ dị iche iche nwekwara ike imeghachi omume n'ụzọ dị iche na otu mgbaàmà homonụ
[citation needed]
Arnold Adolph Berthold bụ onye Germany na-ahụ maka ahụike na anụmanụ, onye, na 1849, nwere ajụjụ banyere ọrụ nke testicles
Ọ chọpụtara na ụmụ oke ndị a na-akpụ akpụ na ha enweghị otu omume mmekọahụ dị ka ụmụ oke na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla
O kpebiri ịme nnwale na ụmụ oke nwoke iji nyochaa ihe omume a
O mere ka otu ìgwè ọkụkọ na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla, ma hụ na ha nwere wattles na combs (akụkụ mmekọahụ nke abụọ), oke oke, na omume mmekọahụ na ime ihe ike
O nwekwara otu ìgwè nke e wepụrụ testicles ha, ma chọpụta na akụkụ ahụ ha nke abụọ na-ebelata n'ibu, nwere oke na-adịghị ike, enweghị mmasị mmekọahụ n'ebe ụmụ nwanyị nọ, ọ bụghịkwa ndị na-eme ihe ike
Ọ ghọtara na akụkụ ahụ a dị mkpa maka omume ndị a, mana ọ maghị otú e si eme ya
Iji nwalee nke a, o wepụrụ otu testi ma tinye ya n'ime oghere afọ
Anụ ndị ahụ rụrụ ọrụ ma nwee ahụike dị mma
O nwere ike ịhụ na ebe akpịrị dị adịghị mkpa
Mgbe ahụ, ọ chọrọ ịhụ ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ ihe nketa nke metụtara na testicles nke nyere ọrụ ndị a
O si n'anụ ọkụkọ ọzọ tinye otu testil n'ime anụ ọkụkọ na otu testil wepụrụ, ma hụ na ha nwere omume dị mma na ahụike

Berthold kpebiri na ebe ma ọ bụ ihe ndị metụtara mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa nke testicles adịghị mkpa n'ihe gbasara akụkụ ahụ na omume mmekọahụ, mana na ụfọdụ kemịkal dị na testicles a na-ewepụta na-akpata ihe omume a
E mechara chọpụta na ihe a bụ hormone testosterone
Ọ bụ ezie na a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Theory of Evolution, Charles Darwin nwekwara mmasị dị ukwuu na osisi
N'ime afọ 1870, ya na nwa ya nwoke Francis mụrụ mmegharị nke osisi na-aga n'ihu n'ìhè
Ha nwere ike igosi na a na-ahụ ìhè n'isi nke ogwe osisi (coleoptile), ebe nkwonkwo na-eme n'okpuru ogwe osisi ahụ
Ha tụrụ aro na 'ihe a na-ebufe' na-agwa ntụziaka nke ìhè site na ọnụ ruo n'ogwe
Echiche nke 'ihe a na-ebufe' bụ nke ndị ọkà mmụta ihe ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị ndụ na osisi jụrụ na mbụ, mana ọrụ ha mechara duga na nchọpụta nke hormone mbụ nke osisi

N'afọ 1920, onye ọkà mmụta sayensị Dutch bụ Frits Warmolt Went na onye ọkà mmụta ihe ọmụma Russia bụ Nikolai Cholodny (na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ha) gosipụtara n'ụzọ doro anya na nchịkọta asymmetric nke hormone na-eto eto bụ ihe kpatara mgbagwoju anya a
N'afọ 1933, Kögl, Haagen-Smit na Erxleben mechara wepụta hormone a ma nye ya aha 'auxin'
Onye dokinta mba British George Oliver na physiologist Edward Albert Schafer, onye profesor na mahadum college mba London, kwekoritara na ihe ahu adrenal apitutara
Ha buru uzo biputa nchoputa abuo na mkpesa na 1894, mbiputa zuru oke soro ya na afo 1895
Na agbenyeghi na mgbe ufodu
Achoputara na afo q902 site na aka Bayliss na Starling
Oliver na Schafer bucha mmiputa adrenal nke bu adrenaline
a full publication followed in 1895

Though frequently falsely attributed to secretin, found in 1902 by Bayliss and Starling, Oliver and Schäfer's adrenal extract containing adrenaline, the substance causing the physiological changes, was the first hormone to be discovered
The term hormone would later be coined by Starling
William Bayliss na Ernest Starling, onye na-ahụ maka ahụike na onye na-amụ banyere ihe ndị dị ndụ, chọrọ ịhụ ma usoro akwara nwere mmetụta na usoro mgbari nri
Ha maara na pancreas na-etinye aka na mmepụta nke mmiri na-agbari nri mgbe nri si n'afọ gaa na eriri afọ, nke ha kwenyere na ọ bụ n'ihi usoro akwara
Ha bepụrụ akwara na pancreas n'ụdị anụmanụ wee chọpụta na ọ bụghị akwara na-achịkwa nsị sitere na pancreas
E kpebiri na ihe na-apụta site na eriri afọ gaa n'ọbara na-akpali pancreas ka ọ wepụta mmiri na-agbari nri
A kpọrọ nke a secretin hormone
Mmetụta hormone na-adabere na ebe a tọhapụrụ ha, ebe enwere ike ịhapụ ha n'ụzọ dị iche iche
Ọ bụghị homonụ niile ka a na-ewepụta site na mkpụrụ ndụ ma banye n'ọbara ruo mgbe ọ na-ejikọta na onye na-anabata ihe na ebumnuche
Ụdị mgbaàmà hormone ndị bụ
Hortavie Mpondo (a mụrụ na 27 June 1992) bụ onye Cameroon na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya, na onye na-eme ọchị
A mụrụ Mpongo na Limbe, Cameroon n'afọ 1992
Ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na College Sonara
N'afọ 2010, Mpongo kwagara Douala iji mụọ biochemistry na Mahadum Douala Nne na nna ya akwadoghị nhọrọ ọrụ ya na ime ihe nkiri, na-ekwere na ndị na-ese ihe bụ ndị na-amaghị akwụkwọ
Mpondo malitere ọrụ ya dịka ihe nlereanya, ọ bụkwa ihu maka akara BoldMakeUp
O guzobekwara maka BGFIBank Group na Cameroon
Ruo oge ụfọdụ, ụlọ ọrụ Niki Heat Model Management nọchitere anya ya

N'afọ 2017, ọ nọchitere anya akara Deidoboy n'oge Deidoboay Fashion Day na Alfred Saker College na mpaghara Deïdo na Douala n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn Cameroon President Tchop Tchop
N'afọ 2017, ọ tụgharịrị uche ya na ime ihe nkiri
N'afọ ahụ, Mpongo pụtara dịka Amanda, nwanne nwanyị Cynthia Elizabeth na Le Coeur d'Adzaï, nke Stéphane Jung na Sergio Marcello duziri
O gosipụtara Samira, nwa nwanyị nke okenye nke onye isi mmegbu, na ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke Therry Kamdem bụ Elles n'afọ 2018
N'afọ 2019, ọ mere Morelia na ihe nkiri Dante Fox dị mkpirikpi The Solo Girl O kwuru na nke a bụ ọrụ kachasị sie ike n'ọrụ ya, ọ malitekwara ịkwagharị maka ya
Mpondo bụ onye isi na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Coup de foudre à Yaoundé, nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri kpuru ìsì bụ Mason Ewing duziri
Na mgbakwunye na ime ihe nkiri na ime ihe ngosi, Mpondo na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese ihe osise
Ọ na-akwado òtù Me Too

Isabella Katharina Alix Hortense Anda-Bührle nke a maara dị ka HortenseAnda-Bührre (née Bührle; May 18, 1926 - May 16, 2014) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Switzerland a mụrụ na Germany, onye na-anakọta ihe osise na onye ọrụ ebere
Ọ bụ ada Emil Georg Bührle, onye bụ onye nwe Oerlikon-Bührle na onye nlekọta ogologo oge na onye nlekọta nke Foundation EG Bührle
A mụrụ Bührle na Zürich, Switzerland na nne na nna German Emil Georg Bührle Na nwunye ya Wilhelmine Charlotte (née Schalk)

Ọ nwetara ikike ịbụ nwa amaala Switzerland naanị na 1937 site na nnabata nke nne na nna ya Nna ya na mbụ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na mgbe e mesịrị ọtụtụ ndị nwe igwe ihe metụtara Oerlikon Nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ ya bụ Dieter Bührle

Nne ya si n'ezinụlọ ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke Magdeburg, nke ga-emecha kwado ọtụtụ n'ime nnweta nke nchegbu ahụỌ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ezumike nke onwe nke Switzerland, Hochalpins Institut Ftan, na Ftan, Grisons yana St
Georges School na Clarens

N'afọ 1956, mgbe nna ya nwụrụ, o ketara oke òkè na nchegbu Oerlikon-Bührle N'ikpeazụ, ọ nwere ọtụtụ ndị otu bọọdụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Oerlikon, Bally yana IHAG Holding na IHAG Privatbank nwere ma na-achịkwa ya Ọ bụkwa onye nwe oke na onye na-emepụta noodle Italy Barilla
Ọ bụkwa onye nwe ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Storchen Zürich na Castello del Sole na Ascona, Switzerland
Anda-Bührle guzobere Géza Anda Foundation n'afọ 1978 iji cheta di ya Géza Anda ma bụrụ onyeisi oche ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
N'ịkwalite ndị na-eto eto na-akpọ piano, o mere Concours Géza Anda kwa afọ
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke ketara ihe osise nke nna ya nwụrụ anwụ, nke mere ka e guzobe Foundation E
Bührle na Zürich, n'ụlọ ezinụlọ mbụ
Kemgbe Ọktọba 9, 2021, a na-egosipụta ụfọdụ ihe osise na nku ọhụrụ agbakwunyere na Kunsthaus Zürich
Anda-Bührle bụkwa onye otu ndị nlekọta nke Kunsthistorisches Institut Florenz na Florence, Ịtali, Ittingen Charterhouse na Goethe-Stiftung für Kunst und Wissenschaft na Zürich
N'afọ 1964, Bührle lụrụ onye na-akpọ piano na Hungary bụ Géza Anda
Ha nwere otu nwa nwoke
Anda-Bührle nwụrụ na Mee 16, 2014, mgbe ọ gbara afọ 87
Hortense Béwouda (amụrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba ọsọ nke bụ ọkachamara na mita 400
Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 5104 sekọnd, nke o nwetara na onwa nke isii, na afọ 2004 na Algiers
Ọ na-ejide ihe ndekọ mba ugbu a na 4 x 400 mita relay na 3 2708 nkeji, ya na ndị otu Mireille Nguimgo, Carole Kaboud Mebam na Delphine Atangana nwetara n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2003 na Paris
Hospitallọ ọgwụ reddington bụ ụlọ ọgwụ nkeonwe na Lagos, Nigeria
Reddington malitere ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ahụike na 2001 site na nguzobe Cardiac Center, na Victoria Island nke jikọtara ya na ụlọ ọgwụ Cromwell na London
E hiwere ụlọ ọgwụ Lagos na 2006
Ọ nwere akụrụngwa ọzọ na Ikeja
Reddington sụrụ ụzọ sụọ ụzọ Digital Cardiac Catherization na Angiography suite nke mbụ Nigeria, ọpụrụiche na nlekọta obi
Ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ na-enye ọrụ ndị a
akwara dialysis
ọmụmụ na gynaecology
ọgwụgwọ ụmụaka
ịwa ahụ (endoscopy na nlekọta ụbọchị)
ophthalmology
ENT (Ntị, imi na akpịrị) ịwa ahụ
redio
Gastroenterology (ọrịa digestive)
isi mgbaka
Ọkà mmụta Hossein Sadri bụ onye Iran na Azerbaijan, na onye ọkà mmụta Turkey, onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye na-emepụta obodo na onye na-eme ihe iji ịhụ maka ikike ihe ruuru mmadụ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye nkuzi dị elu na School of Art & Design na Mahadum Coventry

N'agbata afọ 2010 na 2021, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ zuru oke nke ihe owuwu na ime obodo na Mahadum Girne American ebe o nwere ọkwa onye isi nke Faculty of Architecture, Design & Fine Arts n'agbata oge 2012-2016

O nwekwara ọkwa nkuzi na nyocha na Islamic Azad University of Tabriz na IRAN (2003-2005), National Academy of Sciences na AZERBAIJAN (2006), The American University in Canterbury - UK (2011), na The City University of New York na USA (2018)

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ngalaba nke Architecture, Philosophy, na Environmental Sciences and Policy na Islamic Azad University of Tabriz na IRAN (1997-2005), Gazi University (2006-2010), Hacettepe University (2007), na Yildiz Technical University (2007) na TURKEY, na Central European University na HUNGARY (2007 & 2008)
Akwụkwọ edemede nzere PhD
ya nke akpọrọ Architecture and Human Rights bụ ọmụmụ nke ikike mmadụ

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere AUMME (Architecture and Urbanism in the Mediterranean and the Middle East), netwọk agụmakwụkwọ na ọkachamara mpaghara na ngalaba nke ihe owuwu na oche nke nzukọ nke abụọ ya na 2014

Dị ka onye isi oche nke CAUMME-Contemporary Architecture and Urbanism nke abụọ na Mediterranean na Middle-East International Conference, ọ meghere mkparịta ụka banyere njedebe nke oge ọkachamara na ihe owuwu site na iwebata okwu ahụ bụ Post-Professionalism
O sokwa wee dezie Cities without Capitalism, okwu mbido nke Peter Marcuse dere nke Routledge bipụtara n'afọ 2022
Dị ka onye na-alụ ọgụ ịhụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ ọ bụ onye otu Amnesty International

Ọzọ kwa, kemgbe afọ 2006 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nhazi Ankara, onye nhazi mba nke ime ihe Ngwa ngwa na Turkey, onye nhazi nke Counter Terror na ikpe ziri ezi, onye nhazi Istanbul, onye mmekọrịta EU nke Amnesty International Turkey, onye otu International Relations Group na onye nhazi mba maka agụmakwụkwọ ikike ihe ruuru mmadụ na Turkey
Hostyle Gospel bụ otu ndị Kraịst hip hop nke si Champaign, Illinois
Ndị otu ya gụnyere Demetrius Morton (King Soloman), Raynard Glass (Proverb), na Fontaine Pizza (Big Job)
A maara Hostyle Gospel nke ọma màkà ụdị rap nke Ndị Kraịst
A makwaara otu ahụ màkà ịmepụta ụda nke ha a na-akpọ egwu agha Ndị Kraịst, nke a pụkwara ịkpọ egwu agha Ndị Christian ma ọ bụ ụda Gospel Hostyle
E guzobere Hostyle Gospel na 2003 site na otu etiti Illinois nkè a maara dị ka Elite MOC
Na mbụ, ọ nwèrè naanị ndị otu abụọ Raynard Glass na Demetrius Morton
Otú ọ dị, Fontaine Pizza sonyeere òtù ahụ na 2005
O nwekwara ọtụtụ ndị otu ndị ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ na mmepụta egwu, imewe eserese, na njikwa weebụsaịtị
N'April 19, 2016 Hostyle Gospel sonyeere Christian Rapper John Givez wee wepụta otu akpọrọ Skittles & Iced Tea nke kwuru banyere ikpe Trayvon Martin / George Zimmerman
Abụ ahụ kwuru banyéré mkpa nnwere onwe, nnwere onwe (Freedom, Justice) na ikike mmadụ maka ndị America
Ndị otu ahụ sonyekwara onye na-eme ihe nkírí hip hop bụ Gemstones wee wepụta otu egwu akpọrọ 'Clap' nke malitere na June 8, 2016
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016, Hostyle Gospel wepụtara abọm nke anọ ha akpọrọ Hostyle Takeover na nnukwu nyocha
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara Gemstones, John Givez, Fred Lynch na mmepụta site na Tone Jonez
Dị ka edemede 2018 nke Jesus Wired si kwuo, Gemstones abụghị nhọrọ mbụ ịnọ na egwu ha nke 2016 'Clap'
Ndị otu ahụ kpughere na MC Jin bụ nhọrọ mbụ ha maka abụ ahụ
Otú ọ dị, MC Jin nwèrè ọrụ ndị ọzọ ya mèrè ha kpebiri iso Gemstones gaa

Hot Sun Foundation bụ ọgbakọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ dabere na Nairobi, Kenya na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị na-eto eto si n'ime ime obodo na obodo ndị ọzọ dịpụrụ adịpụ na East Africa iji zụọ ma kpughee ikike ha na ikike ha na ọkwa mba ụwa
The Hot Sun Foundation na-akụziri ndị na-eto eto n'akụkụ niile nke ịse ihe nkiri, gụnyere edemede edemede, ọrụ igwefoto, ụda, mmepụta ihe, nhazi ego, mmepụta, nduzi, nhazi, na ịzụ ahịa
Ọhụụ Hot Sun Foundation bụ ịgbanwe ọha mmadụ site na nka na mgbasa ozi
Ebumnuche Hot Sun Foundation bụ ịchọpụta na ịzụlite nkà ndị na-eto eto ịkọ akụkọ ha na ihe nkiri
Mmemme na-agba ọsọ ugbu a Hot Sun Foundation nwere mmemme izizi atọ

Ọrụ gara aga na nke ugbu a Na 2007, Hot Sun Foundation jikọrọ aka na Bay Cat nke San Francisco Bay Mpaghara iji mepụta mgbanwe vidiyo nke mbụ a maara dị ka 'Oku na Nzaghachi' n'etiti ndị ntorobịa Kibera na ndị ntorobịa nke Mpaghara Bay
Na 2008, Hot Sun Foundation nwere ọtụtụ ogbako na ndị ntorobịa Kibera, yana ihe ngosi ihe nkiri mepere emepe na Kibera na mmekorita ya na FilmAid International
Ọ jikọrọ aka na ịse ihe nkiri ihe nkiri ahụ bụ Togetherness Supreme, nke gbara na Kibera ma na-elekwasị anya na isiokwu nke esemokwu agbụrụ na ohere nke ime n'otu, na Eprel 2009
Houari Benchenet (amụrụ na Oran na Mee 25, 1961), bụ onye na-agụ egwu raï nke Algeria
Nwa afọ El Hamri, na Oran
Ọ bụ nwa nke nnukwu ezinụlọ nke na-enweghị ihe onwunwe ọzọ karịa abụ ahụ
Ọ bụ n'afọ 1975 mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ iri na ụma, ka ọ malitere ịbụ abụ ya na onye na-akụ ịgba derbuka n'ụdị nke Blaoui Houari na Ahmed Saber metụtara
O dekọrọ egwu mbụ ya na 1977, ya na Abdelkader Cassidy nke akpọrọ Dalali
Ihe ịga nke ọma ahụ dị ịrịba ama na n'oge a, e nwere ndị na-agụ egwú ọhụrụ nke Rai na square
Ọ rịgooro ngwa ngwa na ndị na-agụ egwú kachasị mma maara otú e si ege ntị ma nwee ekele maka tenors nke egwu Oran dị ka Wahby Ahmed, Blaoui Houari, Ahmed Saber ma ọ bụ Benzerga

Benchenet bụ akụkụ nke ọgbọ nke abụọ nke rai nke oge a nke dochiri Bellemou Messaoud, Belkacem Bouteldja na ndị ọzọ na Khaled, cheb Sahraoui na cheb El Hindi, cheb Hamid bụ ndi rai ọgbara ọhụụ, ha webatara synth ma mebie tabools nke gbara gburugburu 1985 Rai Oran wetara onye omenkà n'ụlọ Algeria niile site na telivishọn
Abụ ya wuru ma kpụọ ederede, dezie ihe na-enweghị isi na mberede, nke chọrọ nlebara anya
Houari Manar (Arabic; 18 Disemba 1981 〜 7 Jenụwarị 2019) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwú raï nke a ma ama n'ala nna ya yana mba ndị gbara ya gburugburu Maghreb na mba Mediterenian, na France
A mụrụ Houari Manar na Houari El Madani na Oran n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne nwoke na ụmụnne nwanyị iri na abụọ
Nne ya bụ onye na-agụ egwú meddahate a ma ama; onye na-eme egwú ọdịnala na ememme na agbamakwụkwọ
Abụọ n'ime ụmụnne ya, Cheb Massaro na Cheb Larbi, bụkwa ndị na-agụ egwụ raï
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Marseille, France, mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ndị na-agụ egwú dịka Celine Dion, Mariah Carey, na Francis Cabrel kpaliri ya
N'afọ pụkụ abụọ na atọ 2003, Manar laghachiri Algeria iji malite ọrụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwụ raï; ụdị egwu ọdịnala Algeria nke malitere na 1920
O dekọrọ egwu abụọ na-aga nke ọma, 'Cha dani bent nass' na 'Kima ndirlek ma terdhach' na akara Edition Saint Crépain
N'afọ 2006, o dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya Aâchkek mon traitement na Cheb Kader
Abọm ahụ bụ ngwakọta nke raï na egwu pop nke oge a
Manar ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'ọtụtụ Mediterenian ma kpatara esemokwu n'oge ọrụ ya
? N'afọ 2014, n'oge ọnwa nsọ nke ndị Alakụba nke Ramadan, e sere ya foto ka ọ na-esusu nwoke ọzọ ọnụ n'ebe egwu dị na Algiers ebe ọ na-eme ihe, na-ewe ndị okpukpe iwe
Onye na-ahazi egwu ahụ ga-arịọ ndị iwe were mgbaghara ma kagbuo arụmọrụ Manar
Ọrụ Manar nọgidere na-ata ahụhụ site na mmeghachi omume megide àgwà ya na-egbuke egbuke na ndina ụdị onwe na-ekpuchi ekpuchi
N'afọ 2017, ọ ga-eme ihe omume nke National Office of Culture and Information haziri iji mee emume ncheta afọ iri isii na atọ nke mmalite nke Agha Nnwere Onwe Algeria
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ akụkọ banyere òkè ya, arụmụka ọhụrụ na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta zutere arụmọrụ ya na-abịanụ ma mesịa wepụ ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
E mechara machibido ya iwu ime ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn nke steeti na nke onwe ya na Algeria

Ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ n'ime abụ ya zoro aka n'ụzọ siri ike na nwoke idina nwoke, Manar apụtaghị n'ihu ọha dị ka nwoke idina nwanyị (ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-agọnahụ ya) ma gbachitere onwe ya pụọ n'aka ndị nkatọ, na-agwa Monde na 2015, 'My raï bụ ezigbo raï
Ihe niile m na-abụ abụ m na-agụ n'ihu ezinụlọ, ụmụaka na ndị agadi
Abụ m otu n'ime ndị na-abụ abụ maka okwu rụrụ arụ
Abụ m onye na-ese ihe a na-akwanyere ùgwù'
Na 7 Jenụwarị 2019, Manar nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi n'ụlọ ọgwụ onwe onye dị na Hydra mgbe ọ na-aga liposuction
Ọ dị afọ iri atọ na asaa
The House of Plantagenet [NB 1] ( /p l æ n t æ dʒ ə n ɪ t / ) bụ obí eze nke sitere n'ala ndị Anjou na Francị

Ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere-eme nke oge a na-akpọ Plantagenet, iji mata ụlọ eze anọ dị iche iche ndị Angevins, ndị agụnyere na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke Anjou ; isi ndi otu nke Plantagenets na-eso ọnwụ Anjou; na alaka abụọ nke Plantagenets, ụlọ nke Lancaster na York
Ezinụlọ a jidere ocheeze England site na 1154, na nnabata nke Henry II na njedebe nke ọgba aghara Anarchy, ruo 1485, mgbe Richard III nwụrụ n'ọgụ
Ụlọ Dragọn bụ usoro ihe nkiri ihe nkiri fantasy America
Martin na Ryan Condal mepụtara maka HBO
Usoro abụọ a dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ A Song of Ice na Fire nke Martin
Condal na Miguel Sapochnik bụ ndị na-eme ihe ngosi

Dabere na akụkụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Fire & Blood, usoro a ka edobere ihe dị ka afọ 200 tupu ihe omume Game of Thrones, afọ 172 tupu a mụọ Daenerys Targaryen, onye sitere na ụlọ eze ama ama, yana afọ 100 ka e jikọrọ Alaeze asaa ahụ
site na mmeri Targaryen
Ọ na-egosi mmalite nke njedebe nke Ụlọ Targaryen, ihe omume ndị na-eduga ma na-ekpuchi agha obodo Targaryen nke nnọchi anya, nke a maara dị ka 'Dance of the Dragons'￼
Ụlọ nke Dragon natara iwu na-aga n'ihu n'usoro n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, na ịtụgharị na-amalite na Julaị 2020 na isi foto na-amalite n'ọnwarị 2021 na United Kingdom
Usoro a malitere na August 21, 2022, na oge mbụ nwere ihe omume iri
Ụbọchị ise mgbe emesịrị ya, e megharịrị usoro ahụ maka oge nke abụọ
Sapochnik hapụrụ dị ka onye na-egosi ihe nkiri mgbe oge mbụ gasịrị, na-ahapụ Condal ka ọ bụrụ naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka oge nke abụọ
House on the Rock bụ Chọọchị Ndị Kraịst a ma ama nke nwere ọtụtụ agbụrụ nke nwere isi na Lagos, Naịjirịa

Paul Adefarasin guzobere House on the Rock na afọ 1994, A mara ya nke ọma maka egwu egwu ya kwa afọ, The Experience (World's Largest Gospel Concert), nke gosipụtara ma ndị na-agụ egwú gospel nke obodo na nke mba ụwa
Mgbe Adefarasin laghachiri Naijiria na afọ 1994, o kpebiri ịmalite ụka Ndị Kraịst (House On The Rock) site n'ụlọ nne ya na Lagos
Otu ozi a agbasaala na ihe karịrị alaka 50 n'ụwa niile, karịsịa na Naijiria, yana ọtụtụ mpaghara na South Africa, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ireland, na United Kingdom
Katidral Rock (nke a makwaara dị ka Ụlọ Nsọ Millennium) dị na Ikate-Elegushi, Lekki, Lagos ma nwee isi ụlọ ọrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke House On The Rock na The Rock Foundation

Ihe owuwu nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere na afọ 2003, ma ugbu a na-etinye ihe owuwu maka ọrụ okpukpe na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, gụnyere ofufe, agụmakwụkwọ, nlekọta ahụike, mmepe obodo, ọzụzụ mgbanwe, ntụrụndụ na imezigharị mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze
E hotara Paul Adefarasin na-ekwu na echiche dị n'azụ katidral ahụ bụ inye 'otu ebe maka Ndị Kraịst na-achọ ihe na ngwongwo nke ụdị ọ bụla'
Ntinye iwu nke The Rock Cathedral mere na 20 Eprel, na afọ 2013, na ndị ama ama na-abịa, gụnyere Goodluck Jonathan na Tony Blair
The Rock Foundation bụ òtù ọrụ ebere na-enweghị uru nke na-enye nlekọta ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ, mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na ihe enyemaka maka ndị nọ ná mkpa
Ntọala ahụ na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na Naijiria na mpaghara West Africa
Paul Adefarasin na-eje ozi dị ka onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke ntọala ahụ
Project Spread bụ mmemme inye ikike na njedebe afọ site na Rock Foundation nke na-ahụ nkesa nri, ọgwụ na ihe ndị ọzọ nye ndị bi na obodo ndị nọ ná mkpa
N'ọnwa Disemba, na afọ 2017, Paul Adefarasin duuru otu ndị otu ihe dị ka mmadụ 20,000 gaa Lagos Island, Ikate-Elegushi, Ebute-Meta na obodo Bariga na Lagos iji malite atụmatụ afọ ahụ
Adefarasin kwuru n'oge Lagos Island nke Project Spread na o kpebiri ịmalite atụmatụ ahụ site na Lagos Island n'ihi na a mụrụ ya n'ime obodo ahụ
Ahụmahụ ahụ bụ egwu egwu n'efu kwa afọ nke a na-eme na Lagos na-agụnye ndị egwu gospel dị iche iche a ma ama si Naịjirịa na gburugburu ụwa na-aga
Ihe omume ahụ malitere na afọ 2006 ma Paul Adefarasin na-akwado ya kwa afọ na Tafawa Balewa Square na Lagos Island
Ndị na-agụ egwú Gospel dị ka Travis Greene, Kirk Franklin, CeCe Winans, Donnie McClurkin, Don Moen, Frank Edwards (onye na-agụ egwu Gospel), Nathaniel Bassey, na Chioma Jesus bụ ndị isi egwu ahụ
How Voters Feel bụ akwụkwọ nke afọ 2013 nke Stephen Coleman, Prọfesọ nke nkwukọrịta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum nke Leeds
Akwụkwọ a bụ gbasara usoro ọmụmụ nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, na ọkachasị omume ya kacha amata nke bụ ịtụ vootu
Akwụkwọ a na-eleba anya na nghọta pụrụ iche banyere otú ọ dị ịbụ nwa amaala onye kwuo uche ya
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-ele anya na nghọta pụrụ iche banyere otú o si eche na ọ bụ nwa amaala ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Akwụkwọ ahụ dabeere na nyocha miri emi nke gụnyere ajụjụ ọnụ 60 na ndị na-eme ntụli aka na na Ndị na'abụghị ndị-atụ vootu
How To Eat to Live bụ usoro akwụkwọ abụọ nke onye isi Nation of Islam, Elijah Muhammad bipụtara n'afọ ndi 1960, nke dị n'akwụkwọ ederede (ISBN 978- 1884855160)
Akwụkwọ ndị ahụ na-ekpuchi nkà ihe ọmụma ya banyere iri nri na-edozi ahụ na usoro oriri nke Black Muslim
Howard Waring French (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọctoba 14, afọ 1957) bụ onye nta akụkọ Amerịka, onye edemede, na onye na-ese foto, yana prọfesọ kemgbe afọ 2008 na Columbia University Graduate School of Journalism
Tupu ọ banyeghachi na agụmakwụkwọ, ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ na mba ọzọ ogologo oge na onye edemede dị elu na The New York Times
Akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ya bụ Born in Blackness Afrịka, ndị Afrịka, and the Making of the Modern World, 1471 to the Second World War (Liveright, October 2021)
French bụ onye nkuzi mahadum na Ivory Coast na afọ ndị 1980s tupu ọ bụrụ onye nta akụkọ
Ọ kọọrọ ọtụtụ ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Western na Central Africa

French akọwakwala banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na China, ebe ọ kpuchiri uto nke ọha mmadụ, mmegide gọọmentị nke ndị na-emegide ngagharị iwe Dongzhou nke afọ 2005, na ala ọma jijiji Sichuan nke afọ 2008, n'etiti isiokwu ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ maka The New York Times lekwasịrị anya na China ebe ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Shanghai nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, site n'afọ 2003 ruo afọ 2008
French bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ New York Times maka Caribbean na Central Amerịka site na afọ 1990 ruo afọ 1994; ọ kpuchiri Haiti, Cuba, Nicaragua, El Salvador, na ọtụtụ mba ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ojii mbụ na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ

Site n'afọ 1994 ruo afọ 1998, French kpuchiri West na Central Afrịka maka Times, na-akọ akụkọ banyere agha na Liberia, Sierra Leone na Central Afrịka, na-elebara anya na ọdịda nke onye ọchịchị aka ike nke Zaire Mobutu Sese Seko
Site n'afọ 1998 ruo afọ 2003, French bụ Tokyo Bureau Chief maka Times, na-ekpuchi Japan na Korea
Na mgbakwunye na Bekee ya, French na-asụ Mandarin, French, Spanish, na Japanese
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Tokyo maka Times n'afọ 1999, mgbe otu afọ gachara na-amụ Japanese na Mahadum Hawaii na Manoa
O dere ọtụtụ ugboro maka The New York Review of Books ma nyekwa aka na The Atlantic na 'The Guardian Longreads' na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Na mgbakwunye na ikpuchi China dị ka Shanghai Bureau Chief maka Times, French rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akụkọ kwa izu na ihe omume mpaghara maka International Herald Tribune
French bụ onye dere 'Born in Blackness Africa, Africans, and the Making of the Modern World, 1471 to the Second World War ' (Norton/Liveright, 2021), akwụkwọ ya nke ise

Akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ aha 2017, 'Everything Under the Heavens How China's Past Helps Shape its Push for Global Power', French bụkwa onye dere China's Second Continent How a Million Migrants are Building a New Empire in Africa, nke Knopf bipụtara n'afọ 2014, na A Continent for the Taking The Tragedy and Hope of Africa (Knopf, 2004)

French bụkwa onye na-ese foto na mba ụwa, onye ọrụ ya ọtụtụ afọ a na-akpọ 'Disappearing Shanghai', na-ese onyinyo mpaghara ochie nke Shanghai na-ebelata ngwa ngwa, gosipụtara na Eshia, Europe na United States
E bipụtara akwụkwọ nwere ọrụ a, Disappearing Shanghai Photographs and Poems of an Intimate Way of Life, n'afọ 2012, na mmekorita ya na onye edemede na onye na-ede uri Qiu Xiaolong

French bụ onye otu bọọdụ nke Columbia Journalism Review na onye isi oche nke IRIN n'oge na-adịbeghị anya (ebe a gbanwere aha ya dị ka The New Humanitarian), ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na-abụghị maka uru nke na-elekwasị anya na ngalaba ọrụ ebere, nke dị na Geneva, Switzerland
Ọ na-ede kọlụm kwa izu na ihe omume mba ụwa maka World Politics Review
Mmekọrịta
Nsọpụrụ

Ou Hongyi (IPA ə̄u xwúŋìː), nke a makwaara site na aha Bekee ya Howey Ou, bụ onye China na-akwado maka ọdịmma gburugburu ebe obibi nke na-ahazi ọgbaghara ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ihu igwe na Guilin na ndịda China, na-akpọ maka ndị ọzọ iji belata gas na-ekpo ọkụ site na China na ya na mgbanwe ihu igwe
Mgbalị Ou malitere mgbe o mere ka ndị mụrụ ya, ndị nkuzi mahadum abụọ, kwenye ịnakwere ọtụtụ nhọrọ ndụ iji belata akara carbon ha

Na ngwụcha Mee 2019, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, o mere ngagharị iwe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ihu igwe site n'iweli ọkọlọtọ e mere n'ụlọ ruo ọtụtụ ụbọchị n'ihu Ụlọ Nzukọ Obodo dị na Guilin iji kpọọ maka ime ihe siri ike ozugbo na mgbanwe ihu igwe
Greta Thunberg kwuru na ọ bụ 'ezi dike', mgbe ahụ ndị ọchịchị kwuru na ọ ga-akwụsị n'ihi enweghị ikike
E mechiri akaụntụ WeChat ya
Na Septemba 2019, ọ haziri mkpọsa 'Plant for survival'
O ji ego o ji akpa ya zụta osisi ma kụọ ha gburugburu Guilin
A naghị ekwe ka ọ laghachi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụrụhaala na ọ na-etinye aka na mmegide ihu igwe
N'afọ 2019, otu ndị ntorobịa na-eme ngagharị iwe Earth Uprising họpụtara ya ka ọ gaa 2019 UN Climate Action Summit na New York
N'afọ 2020, China kpebisiri ike ị nweta ikuku na-enweghị ikuku site na 2060, mana ọ gara n'ihu na-ewu ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik na-eji coal eme ihe
Ou na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi Zhao Jiaxin na-akparịta ụka
Mgbe e jidere ya na ndị ọzọ atọ na-eme ngagharị iwe mgbe ha mere ngagharị iwe n'ihu Shanghai Exhibition Centre na Septemba 2020, Greta Thunberg kpọrọ ya 'onye nwere obi ike'
Ou na ndị mụrụ ya aghọwo ndị na-eri akwụkwọ nri

Na Lausanne, Switzerland, Ou malitere ọgba ọsọ agụụ na Palud Square na 19 Eprel 2021, iji mee mkpesa gbasara ụlọ mkpọrọ ụbọchị ịrị isii ya na nha Swiss francs otu puku na narị abụọ maka ime mkpesa megide mgbasawanye nke mmebi nke ebe a na-egwupụta limestone na Mormont hill site na ụlọ ọrụ simenti Switzerland-French LafargeHolcim
Nkè á bụ ndepụta nkè okwu eji eme ìhè ná Bekee South Africa mà á naghị ahụkarị yá n'asụsụ ndị ọzọ nkè asụsụ Bekee
Màkà okwu Bekee á na-ahụkarị ná mba ụwa nkè sitere ná South Africa, lee Ndepụta okwu Bekee nke sitere ná Afrikaans
Ọkpụkpụ úkwù
Á tụfuru sịga / sịga butt-end
Ọzọkwa áhà ọzọ màkà asịrị nkè á na-emekarị mà ọ bụghị nkè á pụrụ ịdabere ná yá
Hozo bụ asụsụ Afroasiatic nke a na asụkarị na Kondala woreda nke Mirab Welega Zone (Western Oromia) site n'aka ndị a maara dị ka 'Mao'
E nwere obere ìgwè ndị na-asụ asụsụ Hozo na Mana Sibu woreda
Mao na-aghọta okwu Hozo na-ezo aka n'otu ezinụlọ
Ndị na-ekwu okwu Hozo na-ahọrọ ịkpọ onwe ha Amo
A na-akpọ Hozo na Seze Begi Mao mgbe ụfọdụ
Ihe dị ka mmadụ puku atọ na-asụ Hozo na Etiopia
Hozo bụkwa ezinụlọ dị na mpaghara Begi
A makwaara asụsụ Hozo dị ka Begi-Mao na Mao nke Begi
Nchịkọta ya bụ Afro-Asiatic, Omotic, na Mao
Okwu Mao bụ Omotic ma ọ pụtara Ōman; ndị mmadụ, na-apụta dị ka [ma ɪ] na Seze na dị ka [mɔ I] na Hozo
A na-ejikarị Mao eme ihe dị ka okwu agbụrụ
E nwere ụdị njirimara Mao n'ofe ọdịiche asụsụ na Etiopia
Ọ bụ ezie na a nabatara ya taa na Omotic bụ otu n'ime alaka ndị isi nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic, a ka na-atụle ọnọdụ asụsụ anọ Hozo, Seze, Ganza na Northern Mao
Asụsụ Mao bụ ndị a na-edeghị ede n'ime Omotic, na Omotic n'onwe ya bụ ndị a naghị edere edere edekọ n'ime ndị Afroasiatic
Asụsụ Omotic Mao Seze na Hozo mejupụtara mpaghara dị mkpirikpi na Oromia Regional State nke ndị na-asụ Oromo gbara gburugburu n'akụkụ atọ
O yiri ka e nwere ụfọdụ nghọtahie n'etiti ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị nakwa n'etiti Ndị na-ekwu okwu n'ebe a ga-esi kewaa Seze na Hozo dị ka asụsụ abụọ dị iche iche ma ọ bụ dị ka olumba nke otu asụsụ
A na-ekwu na Seze na Hozo abụghị asụsụ abụọ dị iche iche; naanị asụsụ abụọ dịgasị iche iche site n'obodo ruo n'obodo
Ebe a na-asụkarị Hozo yiri ka ọ gbasara, ma enwere naanị obodo ole na ole ebe a na-akọ Hozo dị ka naanị asụsụ Omotic Mao
Ndị Hozo na-ahọrọ ụdị ebe obibi na-adịgide adịgide maka ezinụlọ ha na ìgwè atụrụ ha
Asụsụ Omotic gụnyere Anfillo, Ari, Bambassi, Kara, Kefa, Gana, Dime, Nayi, Sheko, Hozo, Yemsa, na Welaytta
Hozo bụ asụsụ Omotic
Asụsụ Omotic bụ otu asụsụ ndị Etiopia nke nwere ihe karịrị asụsụ iri abụọ na ise dị iche iche
Asụsụ Omotic mepụtara na mpaghara southwestern region dị nso n'osimiri Omo, nke nyere otu ahụ aha ya
Agbụrụ dị iche iche na Etiopia na-asụ asụsụ dị iche iche a na-akpọ Omotic
N'ịbụ nke a na-ekwu okwu n'ụzọ dị ukwuu, a na-edekarị asụsụ Omotic
Mgbe edere ha, a na-eji ma ọ bụ Geoez (Ethiopic) ma ọ bụ mkpụrụedemede Latin, mana ọ nweghị ntụgharị ntụgharị site na Ethiopic gaa na Latin
Gez bụ asụsụ oge ochie nke Etiopia, nke e bu ụzọ webata dị ka asụsụ edere ede n'oge alaeze Aksumite mbụ n'etiti narị afọ mbụ na nke asaa BCE
Ihe odide ndị mbụ a maara nke Gez bụ nke narị afọ nke ise BCE
Edere ya n'ahịrị dị larịị site n'aka ekpe gaa n'aka nri, e kere ya dabere na mkpụrụedemede Sabean / Minean ma Chọọchị Ọtọdọks nke Etiopia ka na-eji ya eme ihe na narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu
A na-ekewa asụsụ ndị Etiopia n'ime nnukwu ìgwè anọ Semitic, Cushitic, Omotic, na Nilo-Saharan
Asụsụ Omotic bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu okwu ma nwee ọtụtụ njirimara nkọwa ọtụtụ okwu bụ monosyllabic, asụsụ ahụ nwekwara ụdaume iri ise dị mkpụmkpụ na ise dị ogologo
Ndị ọkà mmụta na-eme atụmatụ na e nwere n'etiti asụsụ Omotic iri abụọ na ise na iri anọ, mana amụghị ìgwè ahụ nke ọma
Arụmụka na-aga n'ihu n'etiti ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ dị banyere itinye asụsụ Omotic na phylum Afro-Asiatic
Ndị ọkachamara enweghị ike ikwekọrịta ma a ga-akpọ usoro ahụ Afro-Asiatic, Nilo-Saharan, ma ọ bụ ihe pụrụ iche
Ruo n'afọ 1960, a na-ewere asụsụ Omotic dị ka mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ-Cushitic

Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, mgbalị malitere idekọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Etiopia; Otú ọ dị, a na-elebara mpaghara ugwu anya nke ukwuu, nke nwere ọtụtụ obodo Ndị Kraịst, njikọ na Igbe Ọgbụgba ndụ, na ụlọ ụka ndị a tụrụ na nkume
E lekwasịrị anya na ndagwurugwu Omo nke ndịda na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ
Mgbe ahụ, nnupụisi nke ndị ọchịchị n'afọ 1974 kwụsịrị ọtụtụ nyocha na njem, na-ahapụ nnukwu oghere nke ihe ọmụma banyere ndị na ekwu okwu Omotic na akụkọ ihe mere eme ha
A naghị amụ asụsụ Omotic nke ọma
Hsissen (December 8, 1929 September 29, 1958) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu
A mụrụ Hsissen na 15 rue Monthabor na Casbah nke Algiers n'ezinụlọ dị ala, sitere na Maâtkas (Tizi Ouzou Province)
Site na nwata, o nwere mmasị na ụdị chanson na ọrụ nke onye na-ede egwu El Hadj M'Hamed El Anka
Ọ na-akwanyekwara ọrụ Khelifa Belkacem ùgwù ma nwee mmasị na ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ, o guzobere otu ndị egwú
Hsissen jikọtara ịhụnanya ya maka egwu na ime ihe ike na Movement for the Triumph of Democratic Liberties na National Liberation Front
Hsissen nwụrụ na Tunis na Septemba 29, 1958, mgbe ogologo oge nke ọrịa akpa ume gasịrị
E liri ozu ya n'ala nna ya na Septemba 29, 2012, na ncheta afọ irí ise na anọ nke ọnwụ ya
Nke a dakọtara na ncheta afọ iri ise nke nnwere onwe Algeria
E liri ya na El Kettar Cemetery

Hubert Horace Crawford (1910-1985) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nké sí Tuscaloosa, Alabama
O nwéré ọtụtụ nkà nka
Ọ na-akpọ violin
Ọ bụkwa ónyé na-arụ ọrụ osisi ma na-emepụta óchè
O mekwara ma wuo ụgbọ mmiri nke ya, a kwekwaara na ọ bụ ónyé Africa America mbụ na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na Buffalo
Ọ bụkwa ónyé otu Michigan Avenue Baptist Church na Michigan Avenue YMCA
A mụrụ Crawford n'ubochí irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, 1910, na Tuscaloosa, Alabama
N'afọ 1917, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Buffalo, New York
Ọ nọrọ ụbọchị ya na Buffalo ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Albright Art School
Ọ tolitere n'oge Harlem Renaissance, nké nwéré mmetụta n'ọrụ ya mgbè e mesịrị na ndụ
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Crawford gara klas ise ihe n'ụtụtụ Satọdee na Albright Art Gallery
Ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ otu afọ na Albright Art School, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1932
N'ikpeazụ, ọ lụrụ nwanyị áhà yá bụ Vera Jane Patterson
Crawford bụ ónyé na-ese ihe ma mee ọtụtụ mgbidi n'oge ndụ ya niile
N'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ biri ndụ site na Harlem Renaissance, a họọrọ ya ime mural màkà ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ jazz a ma ama na Buffalo, nke a na-akpọ Moonglow
Ọ bụ ụlọ oriri na nkwari abalị nke e mèrè màkà ndị Africa America
O sere ihe osise n'ime na n'èzí Moonglow
N'afọ 1939, ndị agha US goro Crawford ka ọ see ihe osise iji cheta Agha Ụwa Mbụ na Officers Club Building nke Fort Niagara State Park
Ihe osise ahụ dị mita irí abụọ na asatọ n'ogologo ma dị mita irí abụọ n'ịdị elu
Ihe osise ahụ na-asọpụrụ Agha Cantigny, agha mbụ nke naanị ndị America duziri ma lụọ ọgụ
N'afọ 1940, e goro Hubert ka o mepụta ihe osise maka American Negro Exposition na Chicago
Ihe osise ahụ bụ iji sọpụrụ ncheta afọ iri asaa na ise nke nkwupụta nnwere onwe
Crawford rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ụdị nka dị íchè iche
O mepụtara ihe osise na eserese
Ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ na Mahadum Buffalo
N'afọ 1940, ndụ Crawford gbanwere nke kachasị njọ
Ọ nọ n'elu ụlọ ya mgbè o si na windo nke okpukpu nke atọ daa
Ọ tara nnukwu ihe mgbu site na ọdịda ahụ, ọ hapụrụ ya nwèrè nkwarụ màkà ndụ ya fọdụrụnụ
Ọ bìrì na Buffalo Psychiatric Center
Ọ gara n'ihu na-emepụta ọrụ mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, mana echetaghị ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ dịka ha dịbu
N'afọ 1977, a kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọrụ ndị okenye dị na Hamburg, New York
Na Jenụwarị úbọchị irí nà otu, 1985, Crawford nwụrụ n'ụlọ ndị agadi na Utica, New York
Mgbe ọnwụ Crawford gasịrị, o yiri ka echefuola ọrụ ya
N'otu édémédé dị na The Buffalo News, Robert Emerson, onye isi nchịkwa nke Old Fort Niagara kwuru 'A maara ya nké ọma na 1930s mana echefuola ya taa'
Ngalaba Nchekwa Ihe Nkà nke SUNY Buffalo State weghachiri ihe osise ya na Klọb Ndị Ọfịsa
Emerson na-atụ ányá ime ka aha Crawford márá nke ọma ọzọ, ọ na-eme atụmatụ igosi ihe osise ya nke Agha Contigny n'ime ụlọ dị n'akụkụ na Fort Niagara na ihe ndị ọzọ iji cheta Agha Ụwa
Hubert du Plessis (7 June 1922 – 12 March 2011) bụ onye South Africa na-edekọ egwu, onye na-eti egwu, na prọfesọ nke nka ọrụ egwu ya eweela ọtụtụ afọ
Tinyere Arnold van Wyk na Stefans Grové, du Plessis bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ede egwu South Africa nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ
A mụrụ Hubert du Plessis n'ezinụlọ Afrikaner n'ugbo a na-akpọ Groenrivier na Malmesbury na Western Cape n'abalị asaa N'ọnwa Jun afọ 1922
Onye nyere egwu ndụ ya site na nwata, ọ malitere ide egwu nke ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa
N'afọ 1940, ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Stellenbosch, wee bụrụ nwa akwụkwọ mbụ na mahadum ahụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Music
N'afọ 1943, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge n' ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi South African na Cape Town, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ natara ọkwa na ngalaba egwu na Mahadum Rhodes, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi

Site na 1951 ruo 1954, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Royal Academy of Music na London, mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ nabatara ọkwa nkuzi na Mahadum Stellenbosch, ma ghọọ onye nkuzi dị elu nke ngalaba egwu n'ebughi oge
N'afọ 1963, South African Academy of Science and Art (nke a na-akpọkarị Die Akademie) kwanyeere ya ugwu maka onyinye egwu ya
Ihe ndị Du Plessis dere dịgasị iche nke gụnyere ma ndị ukwe na ngwá egwu
A maara ya maka onyinye ya na egwu ụlọ nke South Africa na egwu egwu
Na mbụ na-emegide echiche ahụ, du Plessis gụnyere egwu ọdịnala Afrikaans na ụfọdụ n'ime egwu ya
N'afọ ndị 1960, o dere ụfọdụ ọrụ mba, nke gọọmentị National Party kwadoro, nke o tinyere nkwadosike
O kwuru na egwu mba ya bụ 'ịmara nke ọma' banyere ihe nketa Afrikaner ya, ya mere ọ naghị emegide ka eji egwu ya eme ihe maka ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

N'agbanyeghị iwu siri ike megide ndina ụdị onwe na Apartheid South Africa, gọọmentị chekwaara du Plessis ihere ọha na eze na nsogbu iwu, ma o biri ndụ n'emeghị ihere dị ka nwoke na-ekwu okwu n'ezoghị ọnụ na ya bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke
Ọ pụtara n'ihu ndị omeiwu South Africa iji mee mgbasa ozi megide ịkwụsi ike nke iwu ndị na-emegide ndina ụdị onwe na ngwụcha afọ 1960
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na Stellenbosch n'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Machị afọ 2011 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asatọ
Huda Lutfi bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme si Cairo, Ijipt
Ọrụ Lutfi gụnyere eserese, collages, na ntinye nke na-egosipụta ụdị dị iche iche gụnyere pharaonic, Coptic, Western, Islamic, na mba ụwa nke oge a
A mụrụ Lutfi na Cairo n'afọ 1948
O nwetara PhD
na Islamic Culture and History na Mahadum McGill
Lutfi sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ nke Ngalaba Arab na Islamic Civilization na Mahadum America dị na Cairo
Huda Sultan ma ọ bụ Hoda Sultan aha ọmụmụ Bahiga Abd El Aal (15 August 1925 - 5 June 2006) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dika nne na ihe nkiri na telivishọn ndị Ijipt
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a na-enye onyinye maka ọrụ ya, ọkachasị na egwu na ihe nkiri ojii na ọcha ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke abụọ
Sultan rụrụ ọtụtụ narị ihe nkiri n'ime afọ irí ịse na isii ọ rụrụ ọrụ
A mụrụ Huda Sultan na 15 Ọgọstụ 1925 n'ime ime obodo Ijipt nke Tanta n'ezinụlọ dị ala
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụnne ise; otu n'ime nwanne ya nwoke bụ onye omenkà a ma ama bụ Mohamed Fawzi
A mụrụ ya dị ka Bahiga Abd El-Aal, mana o mechara nabata aha ọhụrụ ya, Huda Sultan, mgbe ọtụtụ aro sitere n'aka ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri Egypt a ma ama na aha ọmụmụ ya dị ka nke ime obodo
Sultan lụrụ di ugboro ise di mbụ ya, Mohamed Naguib, bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị Ijipt a ma ama nke na-ekwenyeghị na ọnọdụ nwunye ya ma gbaa ya alụkwaghịm n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ihe nkiri mbụ ya gasịrị

Di ya nke abụọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Egypt, di ya nke atọ bụ Fowad Al-Atrash (nwanne nwoke nke onye na-agụ egwu Farid al-Atrish), ọ gbara ya alụkwaghịm iji lụọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Farid Shawki
Ọ lụrụ onye nduzi Hassan Abdel Salam
Sultan nwere otu nwa nwanyị ya na di mbụ ya, Mohamed Naguib, nke a na-akpọ Maha, na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ n'aka di ya nke abụọ Shawki, otu n'ime ha, Nahed, onye bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Nwa nwa ya nwanyị bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nahed El Sebai

N'afọ 1950, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri mbụ ya 'Set El Hosn' (Egyptian Arabic ست الحسن, 'Nwanyị mara mma'); n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ijipt Farid Shawki na di na nwunye ahụ guzobere otu na-aga nke ọma ma rụkọọ ọrụ ọnụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri

Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya ndị a ma ama bụ ihe ; 'El Fetewa' (Egyptian Arabic الفتوة, 'The Bully'), Ezz El-Dine Zulficarī 'Emraʹa Fel Tareeq' (Arabic إمرأة في 2013), 'Nesaa Moharramat' (Ebyptian Arabic) na Salah Zulfikar, ːThalath Nry (Egypt Zulfikara na Nzahanzar)
'Shaye' Fe Sadry' (Arabic, 'Ihe dị m') na Rushdy Abaza
Ọzọkwa 'El Ekhtyar' nke Youssef Chahine (Egyptian Arabic الإختيار, 'The Choice') na Soad Hosny, na 'El Wada'a Ya Banobart' (Egyptan Arabic الوداع يا بونبارت, 'Adieu Bonaparte')
N'afọ 2006, ọ nwụrụ, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na otu, mgbe ọ lụchara ọgụ ọrịa kansa akpa ume, na Dar Al Fouad na 6th Ọktoba, Egypt

Hugh Brock (1914–1985) bụ onye mba Britain na-eme udo ogologo ndụ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ Peace News onye na-akwalite omume na-adịghị mma na onye nchoputa nke Direct Action Committee, onye isi ndu nke Committee of 100
A mụrụ Hugh Brock n'ụbọchị 15 Mee n'afọ 1914 ma zụọ ya dị ka onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na London School of Printing
Ọ bụ onye jụrụ n'ihi akọ na uche n'Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ

Na Mee n'afọ 1940, n'ihu iwu nchebe ọhụrụ na ihe achọrọ na ndị omeiwu maka mmachibido iwu nke Peace News, onye na-ebi akwụkwọ ya jụrụ ịga n'ihu na-ebipụta ya na, n'otu oge ahụ, Òtù Wholesale Newsagent Association, nke na-ahụ maka ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ nke mgbasa ozi, jụrụ ikesa ya ọzọ

Na-arụkọ ọrụ na onye nchịkọta akụkọ, Humphrey Moore, Brock na nwanne ya nwoke, Ashley, (A H Brock) weere ọrụ maka mbipụta ya, na-eleghara egwu ọ bụla nwere ike ịdị n'okpuru iwu anya, yana ndị otu udo gafee Britain, mepụtara usoro nkesa afọ ofufo dị irè
Brock nọrọ ọnwa isii n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'afọ 1941, n'oge ahụ nwunye ya Eileen mụrụ nwa ha nwoke Jeremy
Ha nwekwara nwa nwanyị, Carolyn, nke amụrụ na 1944
Brock ghọrọ osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Peace News na 1946 wee bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na 1955
Ọ gbanwere uche nke Peace News gaa n'ịgba mbọ maka iwepụ ngwá agha nuklia, ime ihe ike na-abụghị ime ihe ike yana mmegharị maka nnwere onwe ọchịchị
N'afọ 1955, ọ họpụtara onye America agụmakwụkwọ Gene Sharp na Peace News iji kpuchie Civil Rights Movement
N'oge ahụ, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị nke Peace Pledge Union (PPU) mana njikọ a mebiri n'afọ 1961
Ọ hapụrụ Peace News n'afọ 1964
N'agbata afọ 1946 na afọ 1952, Peace News bipụtara ihe karịrị isiokwu 160 a raara nye mkparịta ụka banyere mkpa Gandhi nwere na West
N'ime afọ ndị 1950 Hugh Brock keere òkè dị mkpa na uto nke ngagharị iwe na-enweghị ime ihe ike na Britain
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1949, PPU guzobere Nonviolence Commission iji mụọ nguzogide na-enweghị ime ihe ike na echiche Gandhi
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1951, ụfọdụ ndị otu guzobere 'Operation Gandhi' iji hazie ihe omume na-enweghị ime ihe ike nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Gandhi
Otu n'ime ebumnuche ha bụ iwepụ ndị agha US na Britain na ịkwụsị mmepụta nke ngwá agha atọm nke Britain
Brock bụ odeakwụkwọ nke otu a
Ọrụ ya malitere site n'ịnọdụ ala n'èzí Ụlọ Ọrụ Agha na Jenụwarị 11, 1952
Mmadụ iri na otu na-eme ngagharị iwe n'ihu ụlọ ọrụ agha, ebe ha bu ụzọ gwa ndị uwe ojii
Ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe emegideghị njide ma kweta na ikpe mara ha maka ebubo a na-ebo ha, na-agbaso ụkpụrụ nke enweghị ime ihe ike
E nwere ngagharị iwe ndị ọzọ na Aldermaston, Mildenhall, Porton Down na Atomic Energy Research Establishment na Harwell
Ngagharị iwe ahụ gara Aldermaston n'afọ 1952 gụnyere naanị mmadụ 35 ma meghee ụzọ maka Aldermaston Marches buru ibu nke malitere n'afọ 1958
N'afọ 1957, Hugh Brock bụ otu n'ime kọmitii haziri ngagharị iwe megide nnwale Britain nke bọmbụ H na Christmas Island na Pacific
Kọmitii ahụ mechara ghọọ Kọmitii Ọrụ N'ụzọ N'ụzọ Na-aga n'ihu, nke haziri 1958 Aldermaston March
Site n'ịmepụta n'afọ 1960 nke Kọmitii nke 100, nke haziri nnupụisi obodo megide ngwá agha nuklia n'ọ̀tụ̀tụ̀ buru ibu, Kọmitii Direct Action jikọtara n'ime nzukọ ọhụrụ ahụ
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Peace News Brock nọgidere na-etinye aka na mkpọsa udo ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1985
O nwere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, nke nwunye ya Eileen nyere Mahadum Bradford
E guzobere Ọ́bá Akwụkwọ Ncheta Hugh Brock na Kitwe na Zambia na ncheta ya

Hugh Exton (ụbọchị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1864 Western Cape rụọ afọ 1955) bụ onye South Africa na-ese foto nke onwe ya nke a maara n'ihe banyere ịmepụta ihe karịrị glass slide puku iri abụọ na atọ n'oge ọrụ ya site n'afọ 1892 ruo 1945, ma chekwaa ya na Hugh Exton Photographic Museum, nke bụbu ụlọ ụka Dutch Reformed nke e wuru na Pietersburg n'ime afọ1890s

Ọ bụ nwa dọkịta, anthropologist, geologist na onye nchịkọta, Hugh Exton (afọ 1833 rụọ afọ 1903) FGS, onye bụ onye isi oche nke South African Geological Society site na ntọala ya n'afọ 1895, na Jacomina Hendrina van der Poel
Exton si n'ebe ugwu Cape Town n'afọ 1886, na-eleta Marabastad Goldfields dị nso na Pietersburg, mesịa biri n'obodo ahụ n'afọ 1899

O sere foto dịgasị iche iche nke ihe omume akụkọ ihe mere eme, gụnyere Agha Anglo-Boer, na-edekọ ndị nkịtị na ndị ama ama na uwe nke oge ahụ, ihe owuwu nke oge ahụ، yana foto nke ụlọ ọrụ na azụmahịa mpaghara
O debere ihe edeturu nke ọma n'akwụkwọ nhọpụta, na-edekọ nkọwa nke foto ọ bụla o sere
E mepụtara ihe osise Exton nke ụmụ agbọghọ dandies na uwe atọ, di na nwunye na-ahụ n'anya na ndị ọrụ ugbo siri ike na ụlọ ọrụ ya n'ihe dị ka mmalite nke narị afọ nke iri abuo
Nchịkọta ihe oyiyi ya na-achọpụta afọ irí isé mbụ nke Pietersburg
Otu foto album nke nwere ihe osise ndị Exton sere ma dee ihe ncheta nke Northern Transvaalão ka Pietersburg Zionist Society nyere Chaim Weizmann n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1932
Hugh Michael Jackman AC (amụrụ na 12 Ọktoba 1968) bụ onye Australia na-eme ihe nkiri

Malite na ihe nkiri na telivishọn, ọ nwetara ọrụ ọganihu ya dị ka Logan / Wolverine na usoro ihe nkiri X-Men (2000-2017), ọrụ nke mere ka o nweta Guinness World Record maka 'ọrụ kachasị ogologo dị ka onye Marvel na-eme ihe nkiri', ruo mgbe e gafere ndekọ ya na 2021

Ọ bụ onye natara otuto dị iche iche, ha gụnyere ndia; The nrite nke ndi Golden Globe, the nrite nke Primetime Emmy , I've nrite ndị Grammy na ihe nrite Tony abụọ, na mgbakwunye na nhọpụta maka ihe nrite nke agumkwukwo na ihe nrite nke ihe nkiri agumkwukwo nke ndi mba British
A họpụtara Jackman ka ọ bụrụ onye ibe nke Order of Australia na 2019

Jackman emeela ihe nkiri dị iche iche, gụnyere ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Kate & Leopold (2001), ihe nkiri egwu Van Helsing (2004), ihe nkiri nke ugwu(2006), oge ịhụnanya Australia (2008), egwu Les Misérables (2012), egwu nga(2013), egwu nke onye ukwuu na ihe ngosi (2017), ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke onye n'ihu (2018), na ihe nkiri mpụ agumkwukwo ojoo(2019)

Maka ọrụ ya dị ka Jean Valjean na Les Misérables, a họpụtara Jackman maka ihe nrite nke agumkwukwo maka ezigbo onye na eme ihe nkiri ma merie ihe nrite nke ndi Golden Globe maka ezigbo onye na eme ihe nkiri, na maka onye ukwuu na ihe nkiri soundtrack, ọ natara Grammy Award maka Best Compilation Soundtrack
O nyekwara ọrụ olu na ihe nkiri animated Flushed Away, Happy Feet (ha abụọ 2006), na Rise of the Guardians (2012)
A makwaara Jackman maka ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Oklahoma! na 1998 na Carousel na 2002
Na Broadway, Jackman meriri 2004 Tony Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na egwu maka ọrụ ya na nwoko si na Oz
Site na 2021 ruo 2022 ọ pụtara dị ka onye aghụghọ Harold Hill na mweghachi Broadway nke egwu onye egwuhe, na-enweta nhọpụta ọzọ nke ihe nrita Tony
Onye na-anabata ihe nrita nke Tony ugboro anọ, ọ meriri ihe nrita Emmy maka ịnabata emume 2005
Ọ kwadokwara 81st ihe nrita nke uloakwukwo na 2009
A mụrụ Jackman na Sydney, New South Wales, nke Grace McNeil (née Greenwood) na Christopher John Jackman, onye na-ahụ maka ego na Cambridge
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Bekee ma bịa Australia na 1967 dị ka akụkụ nke atụmatụ mbata 'Ten Pound Poms'
Ya mere, na mgbakwunye na nwa amaala Australia ya, Jackman nwere nwa amaala Britain n'ihi na a mụrụ ya na nne na nna a mụrụ na UK
Otu n'ime nna nna ya, Nicholas Isidor Bellas, bụ onye Gris, sitere na Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman (nke dị na Gris ugbu a)
Nne na nna ya bụ Ndị Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, ebe onye na-ezisa ozi ọma bụ Billy Graham tọghatara ha mgbe ha lụsịrị
Jackman nwere ụmụnne anọ tọrọ ya ma bụrụkwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ nne na nna ya a mụrụ na Australia
O nwekwara nwanne nwanyị ọ tọrọ, site na alụmdi na nwunye nne ya
Nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, Jackman nọgidekwara na Australia na nna ya na ụmụnne ya nwoke abụọ, ebe nne ya na ụmụ nwanyị Jackman abụọ laghachiri England
Dị ka nwatakịrị, Jackman nwere mmasị n'èzí, na-etinye oge dị ukwuu n'ụsọ osimiri na njem ezumike na ezumike ụlọ akwụkwọ n'Australia niile
Ọ chọrọ ịhụ ụwa, na-asị, 'M na-anọkarị n'abalị na-ele atlas
Ekpebiri m na achọrọ m ịbụ onye isi nri n'ụgbọelu
N'ihi na anọ m n'ụgbọelu ma e nwere nri n'ụba, echere m na e nwere onye isi nri
Echere m na nke ahụ ga-abụ ezigbo ọrụ'

Jackman gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ulo akwukwo oha nke Pymble ma mesịa gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Knox Grammar School nke ụmụ nwoke niile dị na Upper North Shore nke Sydney, ebe ọ pụtara na mmepụta ya nke My Fair Lady na 1985 wee ghọọ onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ na 1986
Ọ nọrọ otu afọ na 1987 na-arụ ọrụ na Uppingham School na England dị ka onye nkuzi Physical Education
Mgbe ọ laghachiri, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Teknụzụ, Sydney, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1991 na BA na nkwukọrịta
N'afọ ikpeazụ ya na mahadum, ọ gara ihe nkiri iji mepụta ihe ndị ọzọ
Klas ahụ mere Václav Havel's The Memorandum na Jackman dị ka onye ndu
O mechara kwuo, 'N'izu ahụ, enwere m mmetụta dị n'ụlọ na ndị ahụ karịa ka m mere n'ime afọ atọ niile [na mahadum]'
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị asa mbodo BA ya, Jackman gụsịrị otu afọ 'The Journey' na Actors' Centre na Sydney
Banyere ịmụ ime ihe nkiri oge niile, o kwuru, sị, 'Ọ bụghị ruo mgbe m dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ ka m chere na ihe ntụrụndụ m bụ ihe m nwere ike iji nweta ihe m ga-eri
Dị ka nwata nwoke, enwere m mmasị na ihe nkiri
Mana echiche n'ụlọ akwụkwọ m bụ na ihe nkiri na egwu ga-emechi nwoke ahụ
Ọ bụghị ihe mmadụ mere maka ndụ
Enweela m nke ahụ
Achọpụtara m obi ike iguzo ọtọ ma kwuo, 'Achọrọ m ime ya'

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị 'The Journey', a gwara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri soap opera a ma ama bụ Neighbours mana ọ jụrụ ya ịga Western Australian Academy of Performing Arts nke Mahadum Edith Cowan na Perth, Western Australia, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1994

Jackman kwuru si na ya bu onye huru ime ihe nkiri na anya mana mgbe m bidoro akwukwo na uloakwukwo ndi na eme ihe nkiri, aburum dunce na klass anyio naghira abia na uzomonye obula no na me ofuma, mana agakwa na ihu, ihe nile na agara ha were wereEchem na odi nmaEchem na obu ohere oma iputa maka onye na eme ihe nkiri, oga adi nma ibanye dika onye omimi uche
Nwoko ekwesirim igbali ikem inweta ihea'
N'abalị nke ngụsị akwụkwọ ikpeazụ ya na uloakwukwo Jackman natara oku ekwentị na-enye ya ọrụ na Correlli 'Enweghị m ọrụ ruo sekọnd iri na atọ'
Correlli, nke onye Australia na-eme ihe nkiri Denise Roberts chepụtara, bụ usoro ihe nkiri 10 na ABC, ọrụ ọkachamara mbụ Jackman, na ebe ọ zutere nwunye ya n'ọdịnihu Deborra-Lee Furness
Jackman kwuru na 'Izute nwunye m bụ ihe kachasị ukwuu ị ga-esi na ya pụta'
Ihe ngosi ahụ were naanị otu oge
Mgbe Correlli Jackman gara n'elu ikpo okwu na Melbourne
N'afọ 1996, Jackman mere Gaston na mmepụta Walt Disney nke Beauty and the Beast, na Joe Gillis na Sunset Boulevard
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ egwu na Melbourne, ọ pụtara na 1998 Midsumma festival cabaret production Summa Cabaret
Ọ kwadokwara Melbourne's Carols by Candlelight na Sydney's Carol in the Domain
Ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ Jackman gụnyere Erskineville Kings na Paperback Hero (1999), ọrụ telivishọn ya gụnyere Law of the Land, Halifax fp, Blue Heelers, na Banjo Paterson's The Man from Snowy River
Jackman ghọrọ onye a ma ama na mpụga Australia na 1998, mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Curly na mmepụta ihe nkiri nke Royal National Theatre nke Oklahoma!, na West End nke London
Ọrụ ahụ mere ka a họpụta ya na Olivier Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Musical
Jackman kwuru, 'M chere na ọ gaghị adị mma karịa nke a
N'otu ọkwa na mmepụta ga-abụ otu n'ime ihe ndị dị mkpa nke ọrụ m
' O mekwara ihe nkiri na 1999 nke otu egwu egwu ahụ, nke egosila n'ọtụtụ mba
Jackman nwere ọrụ ọganihu ya na-egwu Wolverine na Bryan Singer's X-Men (2000) - ihe nkiri dike nke dabeere na ndị otu Marvel Comics nke otu aha ahụ

Patrick Stewart, James Marsden, Famke Janssen na Ian McKellen na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ, na-akọ akụkọ banyere otu ìgwè mutants, ndị ike ha karịrị nke mmadụ na-eme ka ndị mmadụ ghara ịtụkwasị ha obi, mana ndị na-alụ ọgụ iji chebe ụmụ mmadụ pụọ na ndị ọjọọ
E dere ọrụ ahụ na mbụ maka Russell Crowe onye tụụrụ Jackman aro maka akụkụ ahụ
Jackman na-ekwu na nwunye ya dụrụ ya ọdụ ka ọ ghara iwere ọrụ ahụ, ebe ọ hụrụ ya 'ihe nzuzu'
Na mbụ, ọ mụrụ anụ ọhịa wolf iji zụlite àgwà ya, ebe ọ chere na Wolverine na-ezo aka na anụ ọhịa wolves
X-Men nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ ịkụ nzọ, na-enweta US $ 296 nde
Ọrụ ahụ mere ka o nweta Saturn Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma
Wolverine siri ike maka Jackman igosi n'ihi na o nwere ahịrị ole na ole, mana mmetụta dị ukwuu iji gosipụta na ha
Iji kwadebe, ọ kiriri Clint Eastwood na ihe nkiri Dirty na Mel Gibson na Mad Max 2
'E nwere ụmụ nwoke nwere obere mkparịta ụka, dị ka Wolverine nwere, mana ị maara ma nwee mmetụta niile
Anaghị m edepụtaghachi, mana achọrọ m ịhụ otú ụmụ nwoke a si nweta ya
Jackman kwenyesiri ike na ọ ga-eme ihe nkiri nke ya maka ihe nkiri ahụ
'Anyị rụrụ ọrụ nke ukwuu n'ụdị mmegharị nke Wolverine, amụọkwara ụfọdụ nkà ọgụ
Anọ m ọtụtụ ọgụ Mike Tyson, ọkachasị ọgụ mbụ ya
E nwere ihe gbasara ụdị ya, iwe anụmanụ, nke yiri ka ọ dị mma maka Wolverine
M nọgidere na-agwa ndị edemede, 'Ekwela m ogologo oge, ọgụ a haziri ahazi maka ya
Emegbula ọgụ mara mma
' Jackman ga-amụta na ọ na-eyi mbọ Wolverine
O kwuru, sị, 'Kwa ụbọchị n'ime ụlọ m, m na-eji mbọ ndị ahụ na-agagharị, iji mara ha
Enwere m akara n'otu ụkwụ, oghere n'ihu m
Abụ m onye na-amaghị nke a na-akọ
Enwere m obi ụtọ na agwaghị m nke ahụ mgbe m nyochara
Jackman, na 190 (6 in) guzo 30 cm n'ogologo karịa Wolverine, onye a na-ekwu na akwụkwọ egwuregwu mbụ ahụ dị 5 feet 3 inches (160 m)

N'ihi ya, a na-amanye ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ugboro ugboro ka ha gbaa Jackman n'akụkụ ndị a na-adịghị ahụkebe ma ọ bụ naanị site n'úkwù ruo n'ụ́ iji mee ka ọ dị mkpụmkpụ karịa ka ọ dị n'ezie, ndị otu ya na-eyi akpụkpọ ụkwụ ikpo okwu
A chọkwara ka Jackman gbakwunye nnukwu uru maka ọrụ ahụ, na nkwadebe maka ihe nkiri nke anọ na usoro ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ karịa 136 kilogram (300 lb)
Jackman weghachiri ọrụ ya na 2003's X2, 2006's X-Men The Last Stand, na 2009 prequel X-Men Origins Wolverine, ebe Troye Sivan mere James Howlett nke obere
Ọ pụtakwara dị ka Wolverine na 2011's X-Men First Class

Ọ laghachiri maka ọrụ Wolverine ọzọ na 2013's The Wolverine, ihe na-esote onwe ya na-ewere ọnọdụ mgbe ihe omume nke X-Men The Last Stand gasịrị, no weghachite agwa ahụ na 2014 na-esochi X-Men, Days of Future Past na obere oge na 2016 na-eso ya X-Men
N'afọ 2015, Jackman kwupụtara na ihe na-esote The Wolverine na 2017, Logan, bụ oge ikpeazụ ọ ga-arụ ọrụ ahụ
O mere ka o nweta Guinness World Record nke 'ọrụ kachasị ogologo dị ka dike Marvel na-eme ihe nkiri'
Jackman gosipụtara dị ka Leopold na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke afọ 2001 Kate & Leopold, ọrụ nke ọ natara nhọpụta Golden Globe kacha mma
Jackman na-eme ka onye isi obodo Victorian English nke na-eme njem oge na Manhattan nke narị afọ nke 21, ebe ọ zutere Kate (Meg Ryan), onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 2001, Jackman sokwa John Travolta na Halle Berry mee ihe nkiri Swordfish
Nke a bụ oge nke abụọ Jackman na Berry rụkọrọ ọrụ, ha abụọ arụkọwokwa ọrụ ugboro atọ ọzọ na ihe nkiri X-Men
Ọ kwadoro otu ihe omume nke Saturday Night Live na 2001
Hugh Anthony Quarshie (a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Ghana a mụrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain
Quarshie rụrụ ọrụ nke Ric ruo afọ iri na itoolu ma bụrụ onye kachasị ogologo oge na Holby City, ruo mgbe ọ kwadoro ọpụpụ ya na Ọktoba 2020
Onye ahụ hapụrụ na Episode 1034 (Episode 26) nke Usoro 22, nke gosipụtara na 10 Nọvemba 2020
Onye otu obodo Euro-Africa nke Ghana, Quarshie bụ onye Ghana, Bekee na Dutch
A mụrụ ya na Accra, Ghana, nye Emma Wilhelmina (née Phillips; 1917–2004) na Richard Quarshie (1913–2006)
Nne ya bụ onye isi; ndị ikwu ya na-eje ozi ugbu a dịka ndị isi nke obodo Ghana nke Abii
Hugh na ezinụlọ ya kwagara United Kingdom mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bryanston School na Dorset na Dean Close School na Cheltenham, Gloucestershire (n'oge ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ Othello na Tuckwell Theatre), tupu ọ gụọ PPE na Christ Church, Oxford
Quarshie atụlewo ịghọ onye nta akụkọ tupu ọ malite ime ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye otu Royal Shakespeare Company, ma pụta n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na mmemme telivishọn, gụnyere usoro Behaving Badly na Judi Dench
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịrụ ọrụ Sunda Kastagir na Highlander, Captain Panaka na Star Wars Episode I - The Phantom Menace, na Ric Griffin na usoro telivishọn Holby City
Ọ gara ihe omume Star Wars fan 'Star Wars Celebration' n'afọ 1999
O gosipụtara Lieutenant Obutu na Wing Commander
