Oba Idewu Ojulari (nwụrụ n'ihe dị ka afọ 1835) chịrị dị ka Oba nke Lagos site n'afọ 1829 ruo ihe dị ka 1834/5
Nna ya bụ Oba Osinlokun na ụmụnne ya bụ Kosoko (onye bụ Oba site n'afọ 1845 ruo 1851) na Opo Olu, nwanyị bara ọgaranya ma nwee ike
Idewu Ojulari ghọrọ Oba mgbe nna ya Osilokun nwụsịrị n'afọ 1829
Otú ọ dị, ọchịchị Idewu Ojulari enweghị mmasị na ya ma na iwu nke Oba nke Benin, onye ndị Lagos rịọrọ arịrịọ, Idewu Oyulari gburu onwe ya
N'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama, Lagos anọwo n'okpuru ọchịchị Benin ruo mgbe ọchịchị Oba Kosoko bụ onye ndị agha Britain wepụrụ n'ocheeze n'afọ 1851
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Oba Akitoye na onye nọchiri ya, Oba Dosunmu, jụrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ ụtụ kwa afọ na Benin
Dị ka ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Kristin Mann si kwuo, enweghị mmasị Idewu Ojulari nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi ndakpọ akụ na ụba na ahia ohu na-esote afọ ndị bara ọgaranya nke ọchịchị Osinlokun
A kọrọ na ndị isi ya gwara onye Oba nke Benin iwe ha n'ebe Idewu nọ, onye zitere ya okpokoro isi, mma agha, na ozi na 'ndị Lagos agaghịzi anabata ya dị ka Eze ha'
Idewu Ojulari, na-amata okpokoro isi ahụ dị ka ọkpụkpọ òkù ịṅụ nsí na mma agha a kpọrọ oku ịlụ ọgụ, o gburu onwe ya
Idi Amin Dada (m1925 – 16 Ọgọọst 2003) bu ru ọtú oghu ishi áká íke na ishi obodo Uganda shi afọr 1971 rúrú 1979
Amin gàrà nséré ọtú agha ndi Britain, King's African Rifles (Égbẹ Afrikạ Eze), na 1946, ya mechá jírí ochíchì nke Odogwu na Ozízí Ọtú agha Uganda
O wèrè ochíchí na ogwu ndi ọtú agha nke Önwa mbu na afọr 1971, kúfù Milton Obote
Ochíchí Amin nwekàrà ihe öjö mere ndi madu, na ochíchí nsọ, mmegbu ọtú madu, ogbúgbú nke adighị na íwú, ma ha síkwá, ma ha sikwaghị
Ogbúgbú kara madu otụ puku nári
Queen Idia bụ nne Esigie , Oba nke Benin bụ onye chịrị na 1504 ruo 1550
O keere òkè dị oke mkpa na nbili na ịchị nwa ya nwoke
A kọwara ya dịka onye agha ukwu bụ onye lụrụ ọgụ n'egbughị oge na n'oge ọchịchị nwa ya dị ka Oba ( eze ) nke ndị Edo
Mgbe Oba Ozolua nwụrụ, o hapụrụ ụmụ nwoke abụọ dị ike ịgbagha onye ga-abụ Oba
Nwa ya nwoke bụ Esigie na-achịkwa Benin City mgbe nwa nwoke ọzọ, bụ Arhuaran, nọ n'obodo Udo dị ezigbo mkpa dị ihe dị ka kilomita 30 (20 pụọ
Idia chịkọtara ndị agha gburugburu Esigie, bụ ndị meriri Arhuaran, Oba Esigie wee bụrụ eze nke iri na isii
N'ikpeazụ, ndị agbata obi Igala zigara ndị agha n'ofe Osimiri Benue iji kpochapụ ógbè ndịda Benin
Esigie meriri Igala, weghachite idi na otu na ike agha nke ala eze ahu
Nne ya Idia nwetara ọtụtụ otito maka mmeri ndị a dị ka ndụmọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, tinyere ike ya dị iche iche na nkà mmụta ọgwụ, e weere dị ka ihe dị mkpa nke ihe ịga nke Esigie n'ọgbọ agha ahụ
Idia bu Iyoba mbu ( Queen nne ) nke Benin mgbe Esigie nyere ya aha na Eguae-Iyoba (Obí nke Eze nwaanyi)
Idia Aisien bụ onye nlere na onye na-egosi TV na Naijiria
Aisien bụ onye agbụrụ Naịjirịa na nke Kamerun, amụrụ na Julaị 4, 1991, na Legọs ka onye isi ndọrọndọrọ, Dr
Joe Aisien
Nna ya bụ onye na-ere mmanya, Dr
Joe Aisien, na nne ya bụ jeweler , Emmanuella Aisien
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, Aisien gara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu nke Atlantic Hall, na Legọs
Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara United Steeti, ebe o nwetara BA na oru nta akuko na Mahadum America na Washington, DC, na MS na mmekọrịta ọha na eze ụwa na nkwukọrịta ụlọ ọrụ ụwa niile na Mahadum New York

Aisien n'arụ ọrụ na Fox 5 News, na AARP Foundation, Discovery Communications, Foreign Policy Initiative, United Nations na Atlas Mara O mele ihe nlere maka ọtụtụ ika dika BMW , vogue, LAN Airlines, Black Opal, Nivea, Alice + Olivia, J Brand, Cashhimi, Samantha Pleet, Jovani, Evelyn Lambert, Nikki Angelique, An Alili na Sway Hair Ltd

Idia Renaissance bụ otu nzukọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke dị na Edo Steeti, Naịjirịa
Òtù ahụ na-ahazi ọrụ gbasara ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, gụnyere ịnabata ndị na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa mmadụ
Onye tọrọ ntọala Idia Renaissance bụ Oriakụ Ekimwona Eki Igbinedion, nwunye Chief Lucky Igbinedion, onye bụbu gọvanọ Edo Steeti
N'afọ 2021, Idia Renaissance sonyere Kọmishọna Ukwu nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu maka Ndị Gbara Ọsọ Ndụ (UNHCR) iji mee ka a mara banyere ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na mmegbu ụmụ nwanyị ụmụ nwanyị
E hiwere Idia Renaissance na July 1, 1999 na Benin City, isi obodo Edo State, Nigeria, dị ka ihe mgbochi iji dozie ịzụ ahịa mmadụ maka mmegbu mmekọahụ
Òtù ahụ na òtù / ụlọ ọrụ ndị a na-emekọ ihe iji mezuo ebumnuche ya
Idiat Aderemi Amusu (amụrụ ụbọchị ọnwa iri na otu dị na iri abụọ na asaa na afọ nari iri itoolu iri ise na abụọ na obodo Kano) bụ onye injinia Naijiria
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-arụ ọrụ ugbo na Naijiria na nwanyị mbụ so na kansụl nke Council for the Regulation of Engineering in Nigeria (COREN)
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Association of Professional Women Engineers of Nigeria (APWEN) n'afọ nari iri itoolu iri asatọ na atọ
Ọ gara St Theresa College, Ibadan na Baptist High School, Iwo ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Naijiria Nsukka wee nweta BSc na injinia ugbo na afọ nari iri itoolu iri asaa na asaa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas nke abụọ nke Upper Division wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nke injinia ọrụ ugbo na Naịjirịa
O mechara nweta Postgraduate Diploma na Masters na Food Science and Technology
Ọ bụ onye otu Nigerian Society of Engineers, Fellow nke Nigerian Institution of Agriculture Engineers na Fellow nke Naịjirịa Institute of Food Science and Technology
Idiat Shobande, mgbe ụfọdụ edere dị ka Idiat Sobande bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme na ihe nkiri asụsụ Yoruba
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu, ọ natara Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye na-arụ ọrụ kachasị mma na ntuli aka maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi na nkiri Yoruba, Aramotu
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ si Ogun State
Idiat sonyeere Nollywood, ụlọ ọrụ Yoruba na 1995
N'afọ 2011, Idiat kpughere Vanguard, na ọrụ ya na Aramotu dị ka nwanyị bara ọgaranya kpaliri ya ịkwalite nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na Naịjirịa
Idiat apụtala na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Yoruba, gụnyere Iyawo Saara, Abode Mecca, Omo Iya Ajo na Aramotu
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri, Idiat rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na Aramotu
Aha nna Idiata bụ aha Nijiria
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Hamid Cheriet (25 Ọktoba 1945 2 Mee 2020), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Idir, bụ onye Algeria Kabyle na-agụ egwu na onye na-agụ egwú
A na-akpọ ya 'Eze nke egwu Amazigh', a na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị dị mkpa n'oge a na omenala, akụkọ ihe mere eme, na ọgụ Algeria na Amazigh
Ya na ndị egwu dị ka Ferhat Mehenni na Lounis Aït Menguellet, Idir nyere aka mee ka egwu ọdịnala Raï bụrụ ihe a ma ama
Na mbido, o nwere ọzụzụ ịbụ onye na-amụ banyere ala, mmasị ya maka egwu malitere mgbe a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụọ abụ na redio steeti dị ka onye na-anọchi anya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ọrụ agha iwu ya, ọ kwagara France na 1975 wee malite ọrụ ya na egwu
Idir wepụrụ onwe ya n'afọ ndị 1980 tupu ọ laghachi n'afọ 1993
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado ọdịbendị Kabyle na Berber
A mụrụ Idir na Aït Lahcene, Aït Yenni, Tizi Ouzou Province (akụkụ nke French Algeria n'oge ahụ), na 25 Ọktoba 1945
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mbụ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-amụ banyere ala ma rụọ ọrụ na mmanụ na gas
N'afọ 1973, a gwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nọchiri Nouara na Redio Algeria
Ọ bụrụ abụ 'A Vava Inouva', abụ nke gụnyere 'ọdịnala ọnụ dị ukwuu' nke ọdịbendị Berber ya
Ọ bụ ezie na abụ ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama, ma na Algeria ma na mba ofesi, Idir amụtaghị banyere nke a ruo mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ agha ya
N'afọ 1975, ọ hapụrụ France iji malite ịrụ ọrụ maka abọm izizi ya, nke akpọrọkwa A Vava Inouva
A sụgharịrị egwu aha ahụ n'asụsụ asaa wee bụrụ nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma
Idir ga-ekwu mgbe e mesịrị otú 'abụ ahụ họọrọ [ya]'
Mgbe ọ weputara abọm Ay Arrac Nneɣ, ọ kwụsịtụrụ ide egwu n'ime afọ ndị 1980
Idir laghachiri na ụlọ ọrụ egwu na 1993 mgbe ọ wepụtara abọm Les Chasseurs de Lumières ('The Light Hunters')
A maara ya dị ka onye na-akwado ọdịbendị Kabyle na Berber
N'afọ 1995, ya na onye Berber ibe ya bụ Lounès Matoub, onye e gburu afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, rụkọrọ ọrụ
Abọm ya nke afọ 1999, Identités, gosipụtara ya na Manu Chao, Dan Ar Braz, Maxime Le Forestier, Gnawa Diffusion, Zebda, Gilles Servat, Geoffrey Oryema, na Berber National Orchestra na-abụ abụ
Ọ bụ n'ikpeazụ ihe ịga nke ọma zuru ebe niile
Ntọhapụ Idir nke abọm La France des Couleurs ('France of Colors') dakọtara na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke France na 2007, nke Idir kwadoro ọdịbendị dị iche iche na mbata
O weputara abọm ikpeazụ ya, Ici et Ailleurs ('Here and Elsewhere') n'afọ 2017
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ laghachiri n'obodo ya bụ Algeria mgbe ọ gachara afọ iri atọ na asatọ, kemgbe 1980
O mere egwu n'ebe ahụ iji kwado ngagharị iwe ndị Algeria nke mechara mee ka onye isi ala Abdelaziz Bouteflika gbaa arụkwaghịm
Idir nwụrụ na 2 Mee 2020 na Paris mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa
Ọ nọ na-arịa ọrịa fibrosis nke akpa ume ma nọrọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ụbọchị abụọ tupu ọnwụ ya
A mara ọkwa akụkọ banyere ọnwụ ya na mbụ na ibe Facebook ya, nke o doro anya na ọ bụ ụmụ ya bipụtara
Ozi ọmịiko nke Abdelmadjid Tebboune, Onye isi ala Algeria, nyere site na Twitter toro Idir dị ka 'ihe ngosi nke nka Algeria' ma kwuo na mba ahụ 'etufuola otu n'ime ihe ncheta ya'
Idir sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi egwu na-akwado ihe dị iche iche

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, na 22 June 1995, ihe karịrị mmadụ pụkụ isii gara egwu maka udo, nnwere onwe, na nnwere onwe nke ya na enyi ya, onye na-agụ egwu Khaled, ndị malitere njikọ 'La France, la Vie' ('France na Ndụ')
Idir sonyekwara n'egwuregwu ahụ iji cheta Lounès Matoub, onye na-agụ egwu Kabyle nke e gburu na 1998
N'afọ 2001, Idir gbachitere njirimara mba ya ọzọ na 'Le Zénith' na Paris na '21st Berber Spring', emume omenala Berber
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ ahụ, ọ haziri ihe ngosi egwu pụrụ iche iji kwado ndị bi na Kabylie, n'oge ọgba aghara na-emegide gọọmentị na-ewere ọnọdụ na mpaghara ndị Berber
Ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama na ọtụtụ puku ndị na-akwado French sonyeere Idir bụ ndị gara 'Le Zénith' iji kwado ndị bi na Kabylie
Ido bụ Ógbè Gọọmentị Obodo dị ná Oyo Steeti, Naịjirịa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo a na-akpọ Ido
O nwere mpaghara nke narị iteghete na iri asatọ na isii km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 103,261 na ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006
Gọọmentị Obodo Ido so n'ime ise dị na mpaghara Ibadan tupu a kagbuo ya n'afọ 1956
Gọọmentị ime obodo anọ ndị ọzọ dị n'oge ahụ bụ Mapo, Akinyele, Ona-ara na Olode-Olojumon
N'oge ahụ, Mapo bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Gọọmentị Obodo niile, nke a na-akpọ Ibadan City Council (ICC)
N'ihe gbasara iwu nchịkwa steeti nke iwebata gọọmentị na mmepe na ọkwa dị ala, na nzaghachi maka agụụ na ọchịchọ nke ndị mmadụ, Gọọmentị Obodo Ido mechara pụta na Mee, 1989
Gọọmentị Obodo, nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Ido, sitere na Gọọmenti Obodo Akinyele
A na-akpọ mpaghara ahụ Akinleye West Local Government (1981-1983) n'oge nke abụọ Republic tupu ya na Akinyele Local Government jikọta ọzọ site na ọchịchị Buhari / Idiagbon na 1984
Gọọmentị Obodo nwere mpaghara nke 986km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 103,261 dabere na 2006 National Population Census
A na-achịkwa kansụl ahụ n'okpuru usoro onye nchịkwa ụgbọ mmiri site na Mee ruo Julaị 1989 na usoro Kọmitii Nlekọta nhazi usoro na Julaị 1989

Site n'ịmepụta òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị abụọ, Social Democratic Party (SDP) na National Republican Convention (NRC), e nyefere nchịkwa nke Gọọmentị Obodo Ido n'aka ndị isi a họpụtara site na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Gọọmentị Obodo Ido na-ekpuchi mpaghara Apata, Ijokodo, Omi-Adio, Akufo na Apete
Ọ na-ekerịta ókèala ya na Oluyole, Ibarapa East, Akinyele, Ibadan South-West na Ibadan North-West Local Governments na Oyo State na Odeda Local Government na Ogun State
Kansụl ahụ nwere ngalaba isii n'oge gara aga, nke a mụbara ruo iri maka ịdị mfe nke ikike

N'etiti obodo ndị dị n'ime mpaghara gọọmentị bụ Ijokodo, Ido, Omi-Adio, Apata, Apete, Akufo na Bakatari yana ihe dị ka obodo 612 nke gụnyere Ogunweide, Dada, Olowooyinfela, Apo, Oderemi, Odetola, Erinwusi, Tade, Alagbaa, Iku-senla na ndị ọzọ
N'ihi nnukwu ala na-eme nri, nke dabara adaba maka ọrụ ugbo, ọrụ ndị mmadụ bụ ọrụ ugbo
E nwere nnukwu hekta nke ahịhịa nke dabara adaba maka ịzụ anụmanụ, nnukwu ọhịa na osimiri
Ndị mmadụ nọ n'ógbè ahụ na-akụ ụdị ihe ọkụkụ dị iche iche dị ka koko, kola nut, mmanụ nkwụ, osisi na ihe ọkụkụ nri dị ka ọka na osikapa
Ebe ahụ dịkwa mma maka mkpụrụ osisi dịgasị iche iche a na-eri eri
N'ezie, Gọọmentị Obodo Ido nwere ike ije ozi dị ka nkata nri dị iche iche nke steeti ma ọ bụrụ na ejiri ya mee ihe nke ọma
Mpaghara ahụ enwetala nnukwu ego site na usoro mmepụta ihe na ọnụnọ nke ụlọ ọrụ dịka Nigerian Wire na Cable Ltd, Nigerian Mining Corporation na NNPC n'etiti ndị ọzọ

Mpaghara Gọọmentị Obodo a nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị iri asaa na ise, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị iri atọ na atọ- nke nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nta di iri na asatọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sek sekọndrị dị elu dị iri na ise
Ido Drent (amụrụ na 27 Jenụwarị 1987) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a mụrụ na South Africa, ọ na-arụ ọrụ ma na-ebi na Auckland, New Zealand
A maara ya nke ọma nye ndị na-ege ntị na telivishọn dị ka Daniel Potts na ihe nkiri ncha ogologo oge Shortland Street
A mụrụ Drent na Pretoria ma zụlite ya ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ na Potchefstroom, South Africa
Na Jenụwarị 1996 Drent na ezinụlọ ya kwagara New Zealand
Ọ na-echeta na ọ na-ele Shortland Street na nke mbụ ya ma na-enwe mgbagwoju anya site na ụda olu
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ bụ onye na-egwu tenis na Hamilton ma na-egwuri egwu n'akụkụ onye egwuregwu a ma ama bụ Todd Breeze
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Drent gụrụ azụmahịa na mahadum ma rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepe ihe onwunwe
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ nwa oge na mgbasa ozi telivishọn, Drent ' jidere nje na-eme ihe nkiri'
Drent ghọrọ ihe nlereanya, ọ bịanyere aka na 11 Modeling Agency ma ghọọ onye na-eme ihe n'oge na-adịghị anya
Ọ malitere ịga ọmụmụ ihe Meisner Acting ma na 2008, o sonyere na nnyochaa maka ọrụ na-abịanụ na ihe nkiri a kpọrọ Shortland Street
Ọrụ ahụ bụ mgbanwe nke onye gara aga Daniel Potts, nwa ọjọọ na-abụghị nwa nke onye isi Sarah Potts
A kpọrọ Drent azụ mgbe mbụ ọ nwesịrị nnwale, ma, mgbe ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Sarah, Amanda Billing, rụchara ọrụ ahụ
O mere nke mbụ ya na ihe ngosi ahụ na Machị 2009 ma were ọnọdụ obi na-akụda ngwa ngwa
Maka ọrụ ya na Shortland Street, a họpụtara Drent ma nye ya ọtụtụ onyinye, nke gụnyere na 2010 New Zealand TV Guide Best on the Box maka 'Rising Star'
O nwetakwara ihe nrite nke abụọ maka 'Hottest Male Actor' na Throng Shortland Street Fan Awards 2010, na-emeri nna nna Benjamin Mitchell
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara Drent maka onyinye Girlfriend Faves Forever maka 'Celeb Male 2011' maka ọrụ ya na Shortland Street na 'Favorite TV star' na ihe nrite What Now
N'afọ 2012, Drent hapụrụ ọrụ ya na Shortland Street iji chụsoo ohere ọrụ na Australia
O kwuru, sị, 'Nye m, igbasawanye onwe m dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ ihe dị m mkpa maka ịga n'ihu, ọbụlagodi na ọ pụtara ịhapụ obere nchebe ma tinye onwe m n'ihe ize ndụ dị ukwuu'
Mgbe ọ kwagara Australia, Drent nwetara ọrụ na oge nke anọ nke ihe ngosi telivishọn Offspring, na-eme nke mbụ ya na Mee 2013
Onye na-arụkọ ọrụ ya bụ Matthew Le Nevez toro Drent, 'O nwere ume dị mma, nke na-eme ka obi dị jụụ
Ọ bụ nnukwu onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Drent nwetakwara ọrụ nke onye na-akụ egwu INXS Jon Farriss na miniseries na-egosi òtù ahụ, INXS Never Tear Us Apart
Drent na-etinye aka na mmega ahụ nke ukwuu ma hụ kọfị n'anya
O nwere okwukwe siri ike nke Ndị Kraịst na mkpebi ịnọgide na-alụbeghị di ruo mgbe ọ lụrụ di
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, Drent kwupụtara na ya na onye na-eme ihe ntecha bụ Mandy Hodges kwere nkwa ọlụlụ site na ibe Facebook ya
Mgbe ha yisiri ọyị ọnwa asaa, ha abụọ lụrụ na Disemba 2011 n'ememe nke ndị ezinụlọ, ndị enyi, na ndị otu ya gara
Ha nwere nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị
Drent abụwo onye nnọchi anya maka 40Hour Famine na 2010, 2011 na 2012, ebe o nyeere ụmụaka nọ ná mkpa aka na East Timor
O sonyere na ọsọ nke gụnyere ịgba ọsọ kilomita ịrị abụọ n'ụbọchị maka otu izu iji nweta ego maka Ronald McDonald House Charities
Otú ọ dị, a manyere Drent ịhapụ n'ihi na ọ na-arịa ọrịa nke ukwuu ma na-atụ egwu na ọ nwere ike ịnwe meningitis
Drent bụkwa onye na-akwado mgbochi ise siga na New Zealand
Idon (Idong), ma ọ bụ Ajiya, bụ asụsụ nke Plateau steeti nke Naijiria
Àtụ Infobox settlement
Idongo bụ obodo dị na Bamingui-Bangoran Prefecture n'ebe ugwu nke Central nke African Republic
Àtụ Bamingui-Bangoran
Idonije bụ aha nna Naijiria
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Idowu Philips (amụrụ na 16 October 1942), amaara dị ka Iya Rainbow, bụ ọye Nigerian aka ochie nke actress
A mụrụ Idowu Philips na 16 Oktoba 1942 na Ijebu Ode, obodo dị na Ogun State, na ndịda ayawụ Nigeria
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Africa Methodist na Anglican Modern School maka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị
Aha eji mara ya na ịhe nkiri ọ na eme bu 'Iya Rainbow' sitere na 'Osumare' (nke pụtara 'egwurugwu' na Bekee Bekee), bu aha otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke Sir Hubert Ogunde, onye nwụrụ n'afọ 1990
Idowu Philips rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka ahụike na ụlọ ọgwụ nke Nigeria ọtụtụ afọ ma na-eme ihe nkiri na oge ụfọdụ
Idowu bidoro ịrụ soso ọrụ ịhe nkiri mgbe di ya nwụsịrị - Augustine Ayanfemi Phillips (onye ya na ochie nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nigeria bụ Sir Herbert Ogunde rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ
O gosiputala otutu ihe nkiri ya na ịhe nkiki Nigeria nke di ka Apaadi, Eru, na Aje ni iya mi na ndi ozo)
Idowu nwere umu ise
Nkwado
Idowu Philips bụ onye nnọchi anya ama ama maka Airtel, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta okwu
Idowu Philip bụkwa onye nnọchi anya ụnọ ọrụ ndị na arụ ụlọ bu Yotomi , bu atụmatụ nke ochie ihe nkiri Alade Aromire bidoro

Idris Abdul Karim (onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri abụọ na itoolu n'ime ọnwa Nọvemba afọ1976) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlu Malaysia, na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dịka onye scout maka Johor Darul Takzim na Malaysia Super League
Johor - onye na-agbachite ndị ọnọ n'etiti n'egwu ball ya na Johor na-egwuri egwu oge atọ tupu ọ kwaga Pahang FA
O mechara laghachi n’obodo ya wee sonyere otu egwuregwu Johor FC
O mechara sonyere Negeri Sembilan FA wee bụrụ onye ama ama maka otu Hoben Jang Hoben kemgbe ahụ

O tinyere ezi mgbalị maka mmekorita ya na onye ọnọ n'etiti bu Rizal Sukiman na afọ amara ha tinyekwa mgbalị mmekọrịta nke ya na Johor FA wee nwekwazie ezi mmekorita ya na onye bụburu onye otu ya, Rezal Zambery Yahya na onye isi egwuregwu ala ha Muhammad Shukor Adan, onye laghachiri na Negeri Sembilan FA
Idris nọchitekwara anya Malaysia na 1995 ruo 2000
Ọ gbara egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Arsenal na 1999
Alkali nwetara postgraduate diplọma na ọmụmụ diplọmatic site na Mahadum Westminster

O nwetara masta degree abụọ site na National Defense University, Master nke Science na atụmatụ nchekwa nke mba site na National War College na Master nke Arts n'ọmụmụ atụmatụ nchekwa nke sitere na College nke International Security Affairs
Na mbido ọrụ agha ya, ezigara Alkali na Infantry Corps mgbe e mesịrị ebuyariagha buga ya na Intelligence Corps
Oso na ndi 34th Regular Course
Na 28 Juun 1986, e nyere ya regular combatant commission n'ọkwa second lieutenant nke mere okenye n'otu ọkwa site na 4 Julaị 1983
Alkali bụbụ onye nke Nigeria Army Armour Corps were bia bụrụ Major General n'afọ 2014

Ọ rụọla ọrụ dị ka ọchịagha nke ụlọ akwụkwọ agha ndị agha Naịjirịa, ọchịagha nke isi ụlọ ọrụ Armor Corps, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nchekwa ndị isi agha na onye isi nchịkwa, isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha nke di na Abuja
Alkali lara ezumike nka na ndị agha Naịjirịa na 7 Ọgọst 2018 ka ọ rụchara ọrụ afọ iri atọ na ise
Idrissa Akuna 'Idris' Elba OBE (/ˈɪdrɪs/; a mụrụ ya na 6 Septemba 1972) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye egwu
A họpụtala ya ugboro anọ maka Golden Globe Award for Best Actor - Miniseries or Television Film, o merie otu, a họpụtala ya ugboro ise maka Primetime Emmy Award
Elba pụtara na Ridley Scott's American Gangster (2007) na Prometheus (2012)

Elba gosipụtara Heimdall na ihe nkiri Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) Thor (2011) na usoro ya Thor The Dark World (2013) na Thor Ragnarok (2017), yana Avengers Age of Ultron (2015) na Avengers Infinity War (2018)
O sonyekwara na Pacific Rim (2013), Beasts of No Nation (2015), nke o nwetara Golden Globe na BAFTA nominations maka Best Supporting Actor, na Molly's Game (2017)
N'afọ 2016, o kwupụtara Chief Bogo na Zootopia, Shere Khan na ihe nkiri / CGI nke The Jungle Book, Fluke na Finding Dory, ma rụọ ọrụ Krall na Star Trek Beyond
O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya n'afọ 2018 site na mgbanwe nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Yardie nke Victor Headley dere n'afọ 1992

N'afọ 2021, o gosipụtara Bloodsport na The Suicide Squad, nke e debere na DC Extended Universe (DCEU), ebe n'afọ 2022, o kwupụtara Knuckles the Echidna na ihe nkiri Sonic the Hedgehog 2 (2022), ọ ga-abụkwa isi akụkọ nke akpọrọ onwe ya dịka onye Paramount + n'afọ 2023
E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, Elba na-arụ ọrụ dịka DJ n'okpuru moniker DJ Big Driis ma ọ bụ Idris na dịka onye egwu R&B
N'afọ 2016, a kpọrọ ya na ndepụta Time 100 nke ndị kachasị nwee mmetụta n'ụwa

Ka ọ na-erule ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, ihe nkiri ya enwetawo ihe karịrị ijeri $ 98 na ụlọ ọrụ igbe zuru ụwa ọnụ, gụnyere ihe karịrị ijeri $ 36 na North America, ebe ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri iri abụọ kachasị elu
A mụrụ Idrissa Akuna Elba na 6 Septemba 1972 na London Borough of Hackney, nke Winston Elba, nwoke Sierra Leone Creole nke na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Ford Dagenham, na Eve, nwanyị Ghana
Nne na nna Elba lụrụ di na nwunye na Sierra Leone ma mesịa kwaga London
A zụlitere Elba na Hackney na East Ham, ma mee ka aha mbụ ya bụrụ 'Idris' n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Canning Town, ebe mbụ ọ malitere itinye aka na ime ihe nkiri
O kwuru na The Stage nyere ya nnukwu ezumike mbụ ya, ebe ọ hụrụ mgbasa ozi maka egwuregwu na ya; ọ nyochara ma zute onye ọrụ mbụ ya mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 1986, ọ malitere inyere nwanne nna ya aka na azụmahịa DJ agbamakwụkwọ ya; n'ime otu afọ, ya na ụfọdụ ndị enyi ya malitere ụlọ ọrụ DJ nke ya
Elba gara Barking na Dagenham College obere oge, n'ikpeazụ ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'afọ 1988 wee nweta ebe na National Youth Music Theatre mgbe onyinye £ 1,500 Prince's Trust
Iji kwado onwe ya n'etiti ọrụ na mmalite ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na-enweghị isi gụnyere itinye taya, ịkpọ oku oyi, na ọrụ abalị na Ford Dagenham
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na klọb abalị n'okpuru aha DJ 'Big Driis' n'oge ọ na-eto eto, mana ọ malitere nyocha maka ọrụ telivishọn na mmalite afọ iri abụọ ya
N'afọ 1995, ọ nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya dị mkpa na usoro a na-akpọ Bramwell, ihe nkiri ahụike nke e mere n'afọ ndi 1890s England
O mere onye isi na ihe omume nke Oge 1, onye ohi Africa aha ya bụ Charlie Carter, onye nwunye ya nwụrụ n'ihi ịmụ nwa ma chọpụta otu esi akwado nwa ya nwanyị a mụrụ ọhụrụ
Ọrụ mbụ a kpọrọ aha ya rutere na mbụ n'afọ1995, mgbe a họpụtara ya dịka gigolo na 'Sex' nke Absolutely Fabulous
Ọtụtụ ọrụ nkwado na telivishọn Britain sochiri, gụnyere usoro dịka The Bill na The Ruth Rendell Mysteries
Ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Family Affairs wee gaa n'ihu ịpụta na telivishọn Ultraviolet na mgbe e mesịrị na Dangerfield O kpebiri ịkwaga New York City n'oge na-adịghị anya
Ọ laghachiri England mgbe ụfọdụ maka ọrụ telivishọn, dịka akụkụ na otu n'ime Inspector Lynley Mysteries
N'afọ 2001, Elba gbara Achilles na mmepụta ihe nkiri nke Troilus na Cressida na New York City
N'afọ 1997, ọ pụtara na ihe omume abụọ mbụ nke usoro 2 “Blood, Sweat and Tears” na Silent Witness
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, a mara ọkwa na Elba bụ Charlie na usoro ihe nkiri Netflix, Turn Up Charlie Ọ malitere na 15 Machị 2019 ma kagbuo ya mgbe otu oge gasịrị
O mekwara ma mee ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke ọkara akụkọ ihe mere eme In the Long Run

N'afọ 2007, Elba bịanyere aka dịka onye ndu nke ihe nkiri Daddy's Little Girls, na-egwu Monty, onye na-arụ ọrụ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ nke hụrụ onye ọka iwu n'anya na-enyere ya aka inweta ikike nke ụmụ ya, ma chọpụta mmekọrịta ahụ na olileanya nchekwa ya na-eyi egwu site na nlọghachi nke nwunye ya mbụ
Ọ pụtara na 28 Weeks Later (2007) na This Christmas (2007), nke wetara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nde $ 50 na ụlọ ọrụ igbe n'afọ 2007

N'afọ 2008, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri egwu Prom Night na Guy Ritchie London gangster film RocknRolla N'afọ 2009, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri egwu The Unborn na Obsessed, ihe nkiri na-akpali akpali nke mere ka ọ soro Beyonce
Nke ikpeazụ bụ ihe ịga nke ọma n'ọfịs, na-ewere $ 29 nde na ngwụsị izu mmalite ya
Elba alụọla nwanyị ugboro atọ nke mbụ ya na Hanne 'Kim' Nørgaard (site n'afọ 1999 ruo 2003) wee lụọ Sonya Nicole Hamlin (maka ọnwa anọ n'afọ 2006)
O nwere ụmụ abụọ nwa nwanyị na Nørgaard na nwa nwoke na enyi nwanyị mbụ Naiyana Garth
Elba malitere mmekọrịta ya na onye nlereanya Somali-Canadian Sabrina Dhowre na mbido afọ 2017
Di na nwunye a gbara akwụkwọ na 10 Febụwarị 2018, n'oge nyocha nke ihe nkiri ya Yardie na sinima East London
Ha lụrụ na 26 Eprel afọ 2019 na Marrakesh
N'afọ 2013, a kpọrọ Elba Essence's annual Sexiest Man of the Year na, n'afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ya People magazine's Sexiest Man Alive N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2014, e nyere Elba onyinye MOBO Inspiration Award
A họpụtara Elba ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Order of the British Empire (OBE) n'afọ 2016 New Year Honours maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2017, Elba meriri aha nwoke maka onyinye 'Rear of the Year' na Britain
[isi iyi dị

Na Septemba afọ 2018, ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ iri ise a kpọrọ aha maka 'ime ka London dị egwu' ma na-enye aka ịmepụta ọnọdụ ọdịbendị London bụ ndị gosipụtara na Time Out iji mee ncheta afọ iri ise nke magazin ahụ
Na mbipụta afọ 2020 na 2021 nke Powerlist, edepụtara Elba na Top 100 nke ndị kachasị nwee mmetụta na UK nke agbụrụ Africa / African-Caribbean

Idrissa Doumbia (amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1998) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke Ivorian nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-echebe etiti maka klọb Belgian Zulte Waregem, na mgbazinye site na klọb Portuguese Sporting CP
Doumbia mere Anderlecht mbụ ya na 30 Julaị 2016 na egwuregwu mbụ nke Jupiler Pro League 2016 na oge 17 megide Royal Excel Mouscron
Na 2017 Belgian Super Cup o mere nke mbụ ya maka Zulte Waregem, megide nne na nna ya, Anderlecht
Na 29 June 2018, ọ bịanyere aka na klọb Russian Premier League FC Akhmat Grozny
Na 15 Jenụwarị 2019, ọ kwagara Portugal, na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta na Sporting ruo 2024 na nkwekọ ntọhapụ € 60 nde
N'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ sochirinụ, a gbazinyere ya SD Huesca nke La Liga, maka otu afọ
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2021, ọ laghachiri na Zulte Waregem maka ịgbazinye maka oge 2021 na 22
Doumbia mere nke mbụ ya maka Ivory Coast U20 na mmeri enyi na enyi 3 na Qatar U20s na 21 Machị 2016
Doumbia malitere maka Ivory Coast U23s na egwuregwu abụọ nke 2019 Africa U-23 Cup of Nations na Machị 2019

Idrissa Halidou (amụrụ ya na 3 Julaị 1982) bụ onye Nijeria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba AS GNN ugbu a
Idrissa Laouali ( bu onye amụrụ na ọnwa Septemba 11, 1979 na Niger ) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Niger
Aha njirimara ya bụ Pele
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na Burkinabe club Rail Club du Kadiogo na AS-FNIS si Niger
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na AS-FNIS na asọmpi klọb Afrịka n'afọ 2003

Idrissa Ouédraogo (a mụrụ n'abalị 21 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1954, ọ nwụọ na'abalị 18 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Burkinabé
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha esemokwu dị n'etiti ime obodo na ndụ obodo na ọdịnala na ọgbara ọhụrụ n'obodo ya bụ Burkina Faso na ebe ndị ọzọ n'Africa

A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri ya bụ Tilaï, nke meriri Grand Prix na 1990 Cannes Film Festival na Samba Traoré (1993), nke a họpụtara maka onyinye Silver Bear na 43rd Berlin International Film Festival
A mụrụ Idrissa Ouédraogo na Banfora, Upper Volta (nke bụzi Burkina Faso), n'afọ 1954
Ọ tolitere n'obodo Ouahigouya na mpaghara ugwu nke ala nna ya, n'afọ 1976 e nyere ya nzere Bachelor of Arts

Iji hụ na ndụ ka mma, ndị ọrụ ugbo ya zigara ya Ouagadougou maka agụmakwụkwọ ọzọ, ebe ọ gara African Institute for Cinema Studies (Institut Africain d'Etudes Cinématographiques) iji mezue ọmụmụ ya n'afọ 1981 na masters
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Kiev na USSR, ọ kwagara Paris, ebe ọ gụsịrị karatu na Institut des hautes études cinématographiques (IDHEC) n'afọ 1985 na DEA site na Sorbonne
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na IAFEC n'afọ 1981, Ouédraogo guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke ya, 'The Future of Films', nke ghọrọ 'Les Films de la Plaine'
N'afọ 1981, tupu ọ kwaga Kiev, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Burkina Faso Directorate of Cinema Production (Direction de la Production Cinématographique du Burkina Faso), ebe ọ duziri ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi
N'ime mkpirikpi mbụ ya, Pourquoi (1981), nwoke na-arọ nrọ igbu nwunye ya, mana ọ maghị ma ọ bụ nrọ ma ọ bụ eziokwu
Ouédraogo sochiri nke a na ihe nkiri ọzọ dị mkpirikpi, Poko (1981), nke meriri ihe nrite ihe nkiri dị mkpirimpi na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou (FESPACO) nke afọ ahụ
Poko na-eso nwa agbọghọ dị ime nke nwụrụ mgbe ọ na-erughị ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe a na-ebu ya n'ụgbọ ala
Nke a sochiri obere Les Écuelles ('The Platters'; 1983), Les Funérailles du Larle Naba, ('Larle Naba's Funeral'; 1984), Ouagadougou, Ouaga deux roues ('Ouagadougou
Ouaga Two Wheels'; 1985) na Issa le tisserand ('Issa the Weaver'; 1985)
Nke ikpeazụ ya bụ Tenga (1985), nke na-enyocha onye obodo nke mgbe ọ kwagara n'obodo ahụ, laghachiri n'obodo ya
N'ime mkpirikpi ndị a, Ouédraogo na-enyocha isiokwu na usoro ihe nkiri nke ọ ga-alaghachi na ihe nkiri ya n'ọdịnihu

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2015, Ouédraogo kwupụtara obere oge tupu emeghe mmemme ihe nkiri na telivishọn nke iri abụọ na anọ nke Ouagadougou (FESPACO) ọchịchọ ya iduzi 'ihe nkiri dị mkpa' na mba ọzọ na-achị kọntinent Afrịka, ọgụ na-emegide ọchịchị na ndị isi nke mmegharị ahụ
N'oge mkparịta ụka ya na Le Monde n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2015, Ouédraogo kwusiri ike ihe o kwenyere na ọ bụ nsogbu atọ na-eche ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Burkina Faso ihu
Otu n'ime nsogbu ndị ahụ bụ enweghị ihe ọmụma zuru oke na ọkachamara mgbe ọ na-abịa na ihe nkiri
Enweghị ego na enweghị ahịa mpaghara siri ike bụ nsogbu abụọ ọzọ ọ kwuru
N'ime afọ ole na ole ikpeazụ ya, ndị ikwu Ouédraogo kwuru na ọ nwere nkụda mmụọ na ihe nkiri sinima Africa nke oge a n'ihi ihe o weere dịka ụkọ nkà na usoro mmepụta
N'ihe dịka elekere 5 30 nke ụtụtụ

GMT n'abalị 18 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, Ouédraogo nwụrụ na ụlọ ọgwụ Bois dị na Ouagadougou mgbe ọ dị afọ 64 n'ihi 'ọrịa' a na-akọwaghị akọwa, dịka nkwupụta UNCB (Union nationale des cinéastes du Burkina) si kwuo
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, onye isi ala Burkinabé Roch Marc Christian Kaboré kwuru na mba ya 'efuola onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwere nnukwu nkà'
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, e liri ya na ili ozu Gounghin
N'ụzọ ọ na-aga ebe ahụ, ngagharị olili ozu kwụsịrị site na Monument of African Filmmakers na Place des Cinéastes, nso Ụlọ Nzukọ Obodo Ouagadougou, ebe onye isi obodo ahụ na-echeta ya
Ndị njem ahụ kwụsịrị n'ihu ọnụ ụzọ ámá FESPACO
Ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndị okpukpe na ndị na-ese ihe nọ na ngagharị ahụ, ebe e nyere ya olili ozu ndị agha
Shehu Mustapha Idrissa Timta (1942 - May 30, 2014) bụ onye isi ọdịnala Naịjirịa nke jere ozi dịka Emir nke Gwoza nke atọ site n'ọnwa Ọktọba afo 1981 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa Mee afo 2014
Egburu ya na mwakpo ndị Boko Haram na- eyi ọha egwu n'abali iri atọ ọnwa Mee , afo 2014
A mụrụ ya n'afo 1942, nwa nke Emir nke Gwoza nke abụọ, Idrisa Timta
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị Muslim, Gwoza, ruo afo 1948 ma gaa Senior Primary School na Bama, Nigeria, site na afo 1952 ruo afo 1960
Ọ gaziri ụlọ akwụkwọ Provincial Secondary School (nke bụzi Government College Maiduguri ugbu a) site na afo 1960 ruo 1964
Ọ kụziri ihe nwa obere oge wee debanye aha ya maka igụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello dị na Zaria, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara iwu Sharia
Timta malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nyocha nke ụlọ ikpe mpaghara maka usoro ikpe ikpe nke North-Eastern State n'oge gara aga
E buliri ya na Okwa ibụzi Onye isi ndị nyocha ụlọ ikpe mpaghara, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo mgbe ọ ghọrọ emir na afo 1981
A họpụtara ya ịbụ Emir nke Gwoza nke atọ, otu okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Steeti Borno ka ọdi ugbu a, n’ime ọnwa Ọktọba afo 1981
E buliri Timta n'ọkwa ibụ emir nọ na ogo nke abụọ na nhazi ọkwá n,afo 1987
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afo 2014, Gọvanọ nke Borno Steeti Kashim Shettima gara n'ihu ibuli Timta elu na ọkwa onye ọchịchị ọdịnala mbụ na nhazi ọkwa
N'abali iri na atọ nke ọnwa Eprel, afo 2014, Timta katọrọ otu Boko Haram na- eyi ọha egwu, nke na-enye nsogbu na mpaghara Gwoza n'ebe ndị ọzọ fọdụrụ na Borno State
Ọ katọrọ nnupụisi nke otu ahụ, ime ihe ike na mmetụta ọjọọ nkea nwere ne-ebe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na akụ na ụba Gwoza
N'okwu ahụ, Timta kwuru, 'ndị anyị ahụla ọgụ ka ukwuu na ogbugbu ọtụtụ ndị mmadu nke ndị nnupụisi ahụ n'ime ọnwa anọ gara aga
Mwakpo a emebiela ndụ mmadụ na nke akụ na ụba na mpaghara ahụ dum
Ọ bụ ihe nwute ikwu na ndị nnupụisi ahụ egbochiela ndị m ịga ahịa, bụ ndị na-egbu mmadụ mgbe n'otu ọ masịrị ha
Timta rịọrọ gọọmentị Naịjirịa ka ha gbochie mwakpo ndị Boko Haram ọzọ
N'abali iri atọ nke ọnwa Mee, 2014, Timta na ndị isi ọdịnala abụọ ọzọ na-aga Gombe, Nigeria, maka olili nke Emir nke Gombe Shehu Abubakar, onye nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa n'abali iri abụọ n'asaa nke ọnwa Mee

Ndị na-eyi ọha egwu Boko Haram wakporo ụgbọ ala na ndị nche ndị so Timta n'ọgba agha mere na elekere itoolu nke ụtụtụ n'okporo ụzọ Gombi-Garkida-Biu dị nso na Biu, Nigeria Egburu Timta na mwakpo ahụ, ya na onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ya na ndị uwe ojii abụọ, bụ ndị kpuchitere ndị isi ọdịnala ndị ọzọ n'oge nruchi ahụ
Ndị eze ọdịnala abụọ ndị ọzọ so Timta na-aga olili ahụ n'ụgbọ ala ha - Emir nke Askira Abdullahi Ibn Muhammadu Askirama na Emir nke Uba Ali Ibn Ismaila Mamza II - gbanahụrụ mwakpo ahụ
Nwoke a, onye gbara afọ iri asaa na abụọ, hapụrụ nne ya gbara Narị afo, ụmụ nwanyị anọ, na ụmụ iri abụọ na asatọ
Gwoza Emirate Council dị na Steeti Borno họpụtara onye nọchiri ya, Muhammad Timta, dị ka onye Emir nke anọ nke Gwoza n'ọnwa Juun afo 2014, ka izu ụka abụọ gacahra emere mwakpo ahụ
E nyere ya akwụkwọ ozi nhọpụta sitere n'aka gọọmentị Steeti Borno n'abali iri na atọ nke ọnwa Juun, afo 2014
Ahịa Idumota bụ ahịa dị na Lagos Island, ógbè dịpụrụ adịpụ na mpaghara gọmentị ime obodo nke Lagos State
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị kasị ochie na nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ otu n'ime ahịa kachasị ukwuu na West Africa na ọtụtụ puku ụlọ ahịa mkpọchi na-ebi n'ụlọ dị iche iche n'ahịa ahụ
Ahịa ahụ tinyere ahịa mba Alaba bụ isi ebe nkesa maka vidiyo na egwu ụlọ na Lagos State, yana otu n'ime ndị kasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa
Ahịa Idumota na-ewu ewu nke na a na-ede nnukwu ahịa na 7am
Ahịa ahụ nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ elu na ụfọdụ na-atụle ihe dị ka okpukpu 5 ma ọ bụ karịa
N'afọ 2010, Gọmentị Steeti Lagos kwatuo ụfọdụ ihe owuwu iwu na-akwadoghị iji melite njem ụgbọala na nke mmadụ n'ime na gburugburu ahịa
N'ụbọchị izu, ndị na-azụ ahịa, ndị ahịa na ndị njem bọs jupụtara na mpaghara Idumota
Site na àkwà mmiri Carter, na-arịgo n'ime Lagos Island, ndị njem nwere ike ịhụ agbata obi tupu ha arịba n'ebe ikpeazụ ha na-aga
Idumota bụbu ebe a na-echeta ndị agha, nke a na-akpọ Soja Idumota, nke e wuru dị ka ihe ncheta maka ndị agha Naijiria na-arụ ọrụ na West Afrịka Frontier Force
Ihe oyiyi masquerade Eyo na ụlọ elu elekere bụkwa ihe ncheta ụfọdụ na Idumota
Idy Hegnauer (12 Septemba 1909 19 Nọvemba 2006) bụ onye nọọsụ na onye na-ahụ maka udo na Switzerland, onye rụrụ ọrụ maka Service Civil International
Amụrụ Hegnauer na Obfelden, Switzerland
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Jakob Häberling, onye rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọkwá nkà, na Marie
Hegnauer bụ onye Quaker
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2006 na Affoltern am Albis, Switzerland
N'oge Agha Obodo Spain, Hegnauer debanyere aha na Service Civil International (SCI), ma rụọ ọrụ na Valencia
Na Spain, ọ zutere di ya n'ọdịnihu, Ralph Hegnauer, onye sokwa na SCI
Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, Hegnauer rụrụ ọrụ na Kọmitii Ọrụ Ndị Enyi America n'oge esemokwu Israel na Palestine
O nyeere ndị obodo nta dị na Tur'an, Israel aka, na-enye ha enyemaka ahụike
N'afọ 1960, o mere ihe ngosi banyere ndị Algeria gbara ọsọ ndụ na Tunisia, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mba ahụ n'oge Agha Algeria
Hegnauer nyere aka ịnakọta 900,000Fr
maka SCI
Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, Hegnauer rụkwara ọrụ na Gris, India, Austria na Yugoslavia
Site n'afọ 1980 ruo afọ 1984, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ụmụaka dị na Affoltern am Albis, Switzerland
Ifako-Ijaiye bụ obodo na mpaghara gọọmentị dị na Lagos, Naịjirịa
O nwere ala nke 43 square kilomita (17 sq mi) ma nwee ndị bi na narị anọ na iri abụọ na asaa na narị asatọ na iri asaa na asatọ na 2006
Onye isi oche ugbu a bụ Prince Usman Akanbi Hamzat
Ọchịchị Obodo Ifako-Ijaiye na gọọmentị ime obodo emebere ya na otu narị na iri asatọ na atọ ọchịchị ime obodo ndi ọzọ na Ọktoba 1, 1996 site n'aka General Sani Abacha, onye isi ndị agha n'oge ahụ
E wepụtara ya na Gọọmentị Obodo Agege, nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Ifako
Nchịkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ nke afọ 1991 chọpụtara na ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi ebe ahụ bụ ndị Yoruba
Gọọmentị Obodo Ifako-Ijaiye bụ obodo dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ókè ebe ọ na-ejikọ ókèala ya na Ogun State
Obodo ndị bụ isi bụ Ogba-Ijaiye, Ifako, Oke-Ira, Iju-Ishaga, Obawole, Iju - Ogundimu, Fagba, Agege Pen Cinema na ndị ọzọ
