Ifako International Schools bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ e hiwere na afọ 1974 na Ifako-Ijaiye Ifako, Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ na-enye usoro agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara, praịmarị na sekọndrị
N'afọ 1975, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas mbụ nke otu ụmụ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1978, Gọọmentị steeti Lagos kwadoro ụlọ akwụkwọ mba ụwa nke Ifako ka ha na-eme mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị

Site na afọ 1982 ruo na afọ 1983, iwu gọmentị steeti Lagos gbochiri ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ isonye na ule asambodo School Leaving, ọ bụ ezie na site na afọ 1984 gaa n'ihu, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ anọwo na-ekere òkè na ule ahụ
Ifo bụ obodo dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria
Ọ dị nso Lagos
O nwere ọdụ njikọ na netwọk ụgbọ okporo ígwè mba
A mụrụ Senator Ifeanyi Godwin Araraume na 16 Disemba, 1958 na Late Mr
Marcus Araraume and Mrs
Adaezi Grace Araraume (Nee Anyiam) na Isiebu, Umuduru na Isiala Mbano Local Government Area nke Imo State, Nigeria
Ọ malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na Saint Christopher Primary School, Umuluwe, Ajirija na Isiala Mbano, Imo State
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ debara aha ya na Sapele Technical College, nke dị ugbu a na Delta State, Nigeria
O mechara gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndirị Dick Tiger Memorial, Amaigbo na Nwangele Local Government Area nke Imo State, Nigeria ebe o mechara agụmakwụkwọ sekọndiri ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndirị ya, ọ gara Mahadum Liberty dị na Lynchburg, Virginia, United States of America ebe o nwetara nzere Bachelor of Science (BSC) na Business Administration
O mechara nweta nzere masters nke sayensị (MSC) na International Relations na Mahadum Benin, Naịjirịa
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị agụmakwụkwọ dị mma, Senator Araraume banyere na azụmaahịa onwe ya wee ghọọ onye isi na ngalaba ahụ
Ọ bụ onye were ndị ọrụ n'ọrụ nwere mmasị na Real Estate, Insurance, Retail Trade na Construction
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Exclusive Stores Limited, Climax Insurance Brokers Ltd, Harmony Properties Limited na onye nduzi otu oge, Inland Bank Plc (nke bụzi akụkụ nke FCMB) n'etiti ndị ọzọ

Ọ bụ onye isi oche steeti nke All Peoples Party (APP); mgbe e mesịrị (ANPP) na Imo Steeti site na 1998 意 1999 Onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba steeti, Nzukọ Liberal na steeti Imo ochie site na 1988 na 1989, Onye otu, Kọmitii Ego Mba nke Nzukọ Republican National (NRC) site na 1990 na 1993, Onye isi oche, NRC Onye isi ala maka Kwara na Delta States
A họpụtara ya na Senate na 1999 ma họpụta ya ọzọ na 2003
Mgbe ọ nọ na Senate, ọ bụ Onye isi oche, Kọmitii Senate na Ike na Steel na osote Onye isi oche، Kọmitii Senator na Ọdịbendị na Njem
Ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke kọmitii Senate na Niger Delta Development Commission (NDDC) na onye isi oche, Kọmitii Na-ege ntị ọha maka mpaghara South-West na mmezi Iwu 1999

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Southern Senators Forum na onye otu National Assembly Joint Constitution Review Committee (JCRC); onye otu, kọmitii Senate na Petroleum Resources, Works, Finance na Appropriation
Senator Araraume bụkwa onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Senate na ụgwọ obodo na nke mba ọzọ
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị ọkachamara na-esonụ
Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari GCFR họpụtara ya dị ka Kọmishọna Mba na Board of Nigerian Communications Commission na-anọchite anya mpaghara South East na 2016 ruo taa

Nwoke nwere ọtụtụ akụkụ, Senator Araraume bụ Onye Nlekọta Ndụ nke Catholic Men's Organization, Okigwe Diocese na Imo State na Knight of Saint John International, Award of Exemplary Catholic Man of Honour; site na Catholic Men Organisation, Our Lady Queen of Nigeria, PRO Cathedral Abuja
Onyinye nke Onye Na-ewu Chọọchị; site na Church of Nigeria Anglican Communion, Okigwe Diocese
Ọ bụ onye otu Ikoyi Club, Lagos, Benin Country Club, IBB Golf Club na Owerri Sports Club
Ezigbo nwoke nwere ụmụ, ọ lụrụ Barr
Lolo Gladys Araraume
Ọ bụ onye otu All Progressive Congress (APC) ugbu a

O nwekwara mmetụta dị ịrịba ama na egwuregwu na ọrụ mmekọrịta ndị ọzọ site na ndị otu Ikoyi Club Lagos, Benin Country Club, na IBB Golf Club, Patron Orlu Country Club na Onye isi oche Araraume Destiny Foundation
E nyela ya ihe nrite ndị a na nso nso a Fellow, Institute of sales Management of Nigeria (FNISM) Fellow Institute of Corporate Administration (FICA) wdg
Ọ bụ onye natara Justice of Peace na onye omeiwu kachasị mma site na South-East (2003-2007) site na Encomium Magazine
Ifeanyichukwu Stephanie Chiejine (17 May 1983 - 21 August 2019) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ
Oge ikpeazụ ọ gbara bọọlụ bụ na otu klọb SSVSM-Kairat Almaty na Kazakhstani Championship
Ọ gbabuuru FC Indiana bọọlụ na USA- W-League, KMF Kuopio na PK-35 Vantaa na Finland na Zvezda Perm na Rọshịa
Ọ bụbu onye okenye n'egwuregwu mba ụwa, so gbaa bọọlụ 'World Cup' nke afọ 1999, 2003 na 2007, nakwa Summer Olympics nke afọ 2000 na 2008
Ka ọ na-erute afọ 2007, o nyela goolu iri na ise n'ime egwuregwu iri isii na otu nye Naịjirịa
Ọ nwụrụ na abali iri abuó na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 2019 ka ọ rịachara obere ọrịa

Ifeanyi onye amakwara dịka Ifeanyi Chijindu (a mụrụ 19 October 1978 ) bụ onye Naijiria - onye edemede / onye edemede , onye ọchụnta ego , onye ọrụ egwu , onye na- eme ihe nkiri na onye na- ede akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Ifeanyi na Nigeria ma bụrụ ọgbọ mbụ nke Naijiria-America
Ifeanyi ji otutu oge ya nweta na-ebi n'obodo di iche iche n'ime Southern Kingdom California

Na nwata, Ifeanyi gosiri ezi mmasị n'agụmagụ mgbe e bipụtara uri nke mbụ ya n'afọ asatọ, dechaa novella nke nwere ihu akwụkwọ 90 n'afọ 15, Ifeanyi rere obere akụkọ ya nke mbụ ma nweta onye nke abụọ na asọmpi nke ndi Superior Communications and Publications kwadoro
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 17, Ifeanyi gụrụ uri ya ebe niile akụrụ ya ụgwọ
N'ime oge a, Ifeanyi mekwara ka mmasị ya dịkwuo ukwuu n'inwe ihe ma merie akụkụ nke Maya Angelou na egwuregwu a na-akpọ Women In Love
A Girl Girl's Life

the Song that Never Ends, a na-akpọ nchikọta uri, e bipụtara na 2004 na-adabere na ahụmahụ Chijindu banyere ịhụnanya, ịkpọasị, ezinụlọ, ime mmụọ, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, mmekọahụ, onye ọ bụla na agbụrụ n'oge ya na nwata, n'oge ọ na-eto eto
Cal Poly Pomona nyere ya Onyinye Akara nke Ọma maka mmata maka ihe ederede ya nakwa maka ịbụ onye nke kacha nta na mahadum ka o nweta onyinye a

N'afọ 2005, Black Diaspora Magazine bipụtara 'Healing from Within,' Ihe Ederede Ifeanyi's banyere Djehuty Maat - Ra , onye na-eme DHERBS na onye a ma ama dika herbalist -agụnye ndị ama dị ka onye R & B onye na-abụ Brandy na omee Blair Underwood dịka akụkụ nke ndị ahịa ya

Ifeanyi dere maka The Poly Post akwụkwọ akụkọ si 2005-2007 ebe ọ egosipụta ya ụdị ederede di iche ya n'omenala nakwa ndi nka ka dika onye na-ese ihe nke mba Salvador Carlos Flores na nchepụta maka ihe nkiri fim dị ka [/https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/Pirates_of_the_Caribbean _At_World's_End Pirates of the Caribbean At World's End] , [/https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/The_Reaping The Reaping] na The Return

N'afọ 2007, akwụkwọ akụkọ Ifeanyi na ndị nchịkọta akụkọ na-elekọta ya kwere ka ọ nweta onyinye site n'aka Society of Professional Journalists maka 'Best Editorial' maka otu ihe gbasara otú ụlọ ọrụ agbụrụ na-eme ka ndị mmadụ na-eme ka ndị mmadụ ghara iche na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

Tinyekwara, odide, ise ihe, nakwa ime ihe nkiri otito ya nakwa n'oge ịghọ okenye ya, Ifeanyi rụrụ ọrụ dị ka a ejechi akwụkwọ [/https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/Make_up_artist make up artist] maka ịchọ actresses na ụdị tupu ya ekee [/https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/Goddess Goddess] [/https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/Cosmetics Cosmetics] , [/https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/Fashion_accessory Accessories] & [/https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/Toiletries Toiletries] -amara dị ka Goddess CAT [/https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/Goddess Goddess] [/https //enwikipediaorg/wiki/Cosmetics Cosmetics], ihe online shop nke na-egosipụta ihe eji achọ mma nke nwere ọgwụ tinyere nlezianya nke ahụ

Goddess CAT ghọrọ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ole na ole ndị mbụ malitere imepụta ihe eji achọ mma nwere ihe ahụ ike maka ndị inyom na-acha ọcha n'ihu agbụrụ na ahịhịa ndụ wee bụrụ ndị a ma ama n' ụlọ ndị na-eme ka ịchọ mma

Goddess CAT, ndụmọdụ nke Ifeanyi gbasara ichọ mma na nsogbu metụtara ọrụ ndị inyom n'echiche ịchọ mma ya di iche iche na-apụta n' akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche, na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ, magazin ndị inyom na mma na blọọgụ dị ka Glamour
Ifeanyi Chudy Momah bụ onye ọka iwu na ọchụnta ego Naijiria nke keere ozi ugbu a n'Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya ma na-nọchite anya mpaghara gọọmenti etiti Ihiala, Anambara Steeti
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ụlọ na Ụlọikpe isi obodo gọọmenti etiti ma bụrụkwa onye otu Peoples Democratic Party
A mụrụ ya na General Hospital Okija n'ezinụlọ Chief Mike Momah
Ifeanyi ekwuola na n'etiti ụmụnne ya ọ bụ naanị ya ka a mụrụ ebe ahụ
Dị ka o si kwuo, Nna ya Chief Mike Momah pụru njem n'obodo ahụ mgbe nne ya kpebiri ibia obia n'Ihiala, obodo nna ya mgbe ọ malitere ịmụ nwa na mberede ma mesịa muọ ya ebe ahụ

Ifeanyi nwere ndụ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Festac Town, Lagos State, Na-aga Radius Nursery and Primary School, emesia, o gara Loral International School ka dị na Festac tupu omesịa gụchaa agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Chrisland College otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị ọnụ ahịa na Naijiria

Ifeanyi gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum Lagos, mgbe ọ gụchara ya e zigara ka o jee ozi n'ụlọ ọrụ National Youth Service Corps ebe a zigaharịrị ya Katsina, steeti dị n'akụkụ ugwu nke Naịjirịa ma nọrọ afọ ije ozi ahụ na Malumfashi obere obodo dị nso na Daura
Mgbe afọ ije ozi gasịrị, ọ gara Mahadum Aberdeen , Scotland, ebe o mere usoro mmụta gbasara iwu na Iwu ikike ikpe mba ụwa
O mechara laghachi Naịjirịa wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu nke Naijiria na Bwari, Abuja ebe a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa n'ụlọikpe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ iwu na Rickey Tarfa & Co Chembas afọ atọ ma emesịa, ọ gara Arthur Obi-Okafor (SAN) & Co Chembas na Asaba
N'afọ 2013, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na mmemme enyemaka (Sure-P) dị ka onye inyeaka ntụzi ihe gbasara iwu na osote odeakwụkwọ nke SURE-P Nze Akachukwu Nwankpo
Site na nke a, o nwere ike inyere ndị mmadụ aka karịsịa ụmụ okorobịa ọchịchị ime obodo Ihiala ka ha nweta mgbazinye ego gọọmentị etiti nyere yana ohere ọrụ mmemme ahụ gosipụtara
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ chụbarụ ọrụ na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị iji ọzọọ maka Ụlọ Nzukọ nke ntuli aka steeti n'afọ 2011 nke ọ na-zọtaghi
O zokwara ọzọ n'afọ 2015 n'oge a maka Ụlọ ndị nnọchiteanya mana ọ meriyi ọzọ, emerighi nke o tara uta nye ntuli aka mmegide na ime ihe ike
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ejere Gọvanọ Willie Obiano ozi dị ka Onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche kachasị elu ebe ọgbasara ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị tupu ọ banye ọzọ na ntuli aka nke afọ 2019 ebe o meriri

Dị ka onye a họpụtara na Ụlọ ndị nnọchiteanya gọọmenti etiti, pati ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya bu APGA nwere ihe dị ka ndị otu Iri n'ime mmadụ nari ato na iri isii ahụ mere ha obere mana nke a egbochighị ime ka anụ olu ya ma nwee mmetụta zuru oke n'ụlọ
O gosipụtara nkwado niile maka ọkà okwu ugbe ahu Femi Gbajabiamila mgbe ntuli aka maka oche ọkà okwu ọnụ
O kwuru banyere mkpa ọ dị igbochi ndị ohi na Zamfara, steeti ugwu nke Naịjirịa

Ọ naghị akwado iwu mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na-ese okwu ma kwuo na ndị ntorobịa ga-eji usoro netwọkụ ọha mmadụ mee ihe n'ụzọ ziri ezi, gbakwunye na e nwere ụkpụrụ dị adịlarị ma ọ bụ naanị ịkpata mmeghachi omume nke Iwu

Ọ rịọkwara ka e mee nchọpụta nke ego nde dọla nari atọ iri iteghete na isiiiri na atọ a na-emefu n'ụlọ nrụpụta atọ dị iche iche n'ime afọ anọ ebe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka na-arụsi ike n'okpuru pasent isii nke ikike ha
Ifeanyi Emmanuel Igboke nke a makwaara dị ka Emmanuel Igboke (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1998), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma na emepụtakwa ihe nkiri Naijiria ma biri Canada
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri akpọrọ 'Crosses', nke mere ka o nweta ihe nrite ome ihe nkiri kacha nma na Toronto International Nollywood Film Festival (TINFF)
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị iri nke ọnwa October steeti Enugu mana, o tolitere na Achara layout
Emmanuel bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ asaa, ọ gara Konigin Des Friedens College na Enugu steeti ma gụọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu na Mahadum York, Canada
N'afọ 2022, Emmanuel Igboke meriri na ụdị ome ihe nkiri kacha nma na ihe nkiri ya akpọrọ 'Crosses' nke Akeem Ogunmilade duziri
N'afọ 2022, a kpọrọ Igboke aha n'etiti ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị elu na mba uwa niile na-eme ka Naịjirịa nwee obi ụtọ site na Ụbọchị a
Ifeanyi Emmanuel Ojeli (amuru 10 October 1998) bu onye egwuregwu Naijiria
Ọ gbara ọsọ na mmemme 4 × 400 mita relay agwakọtara na asọmpi Olimpik Summer 2020

Ifeanyi Anthony Menkiti (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ nke afọ 1940 ruo abalị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Juun afọ 2019) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede abụ, ọkà ihe ọmụma, na prọfesọ, tinyere onye nwe ọbá Akwụkwọ Grolier Poetry na Cambridge, Massachusetts
A mụrụ Menkiti na Onitsha, Naịjirịa n'afọ 1940
N'afọ 1961, ọ bịarutere na United States iji gụọ akwụkwọ na Pomona College, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1964
N'ịgbaso ọmụmụ postgraduate na Mahadum Columbia na Mahadụ New York, Menkiti nwetara PhD na nkà ihe ọmụma na Harvard n'afọ 1974
Akwụkwọ edemede ya bụ 'nnyocha nke ibu ọrụ otu'
Site n'afọ 1974 ọ kụziri nkà ihe ọmụma na Wellesley College na US na-elekwasị anya na onye na nkà ihe ọmụma nke Afrịka
Menkiti gbalịrị imesi ọdịdị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ike, nke gosipụtara n'echiche 'Abụ m, n'ihi na anyị bụ'
N'ime nke a, ọ gbalịrị iwulite n'echiche ọdịnala ndị Afrịka banyere ịbụ onye nke mmadụ
Dị ka Menkiti si kwuo, 'obodo ndị a na-ahụ n'Afrika ọdịnala na-anabata eziokwu a na ịbụ onye bụ ụdị ihe a ga-enweta'
Dabere n'echiche a nke mmadụ ịbụ onye, ọnọdụ nke mmadụ ịbụ onye nwere ihe omume ọma ma ọ bụghị ihe mmadụ nwere na-akpaghị aka kama ọ ga-arụ ọrụ site n'omume ziri ezi
N'ịgbakwunye na ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya, Menkiti bụ onye na-ede abụ
N'ikwu okwu banyere mmekọrịta dị n'etiti nkà ihe ọmụma na abụ, o kwuru na 'abụ na-akọwa maka nzube nke ndụ, ihe ọ pụtara, dị ka nkà ihe ọmụma'
Menkiti bipụtara nchịkọta abụ atọ
Ifeanyi Chukwuma Odii (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1975) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, onye ọrụ ebere na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Orient Global Group
yana onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke People’s Democratic Party maka Ebonyi Steeti na ntuli aka gọvanọ nke afọ 2023
Odii bụ nwa afọ Isu na mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Onicha (LGA) nke steeti Ebonyi, Naijiria
Odii gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Isu-achara na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Isu, ha abụọ di na steeti Ebonyi maka agụmakwụkwọ ya
Odii gụrụ Business Administration na National Open University of Nigeria na-enweta nzere Bachelọ nke Sayensị (BSc)
Enyere ya Dọkịta nke Sayensị Degree na Strategic Business Management & Corporate Governance site na European American University na Republic of Panama
Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ site na Chief Executive program na Lagos Business School
Ọ bụ onye otu Lagos State University Governing board ekwupụtara n'afọ 2021 site n'aka Gọvanọ Lagos State, Babajide Sanwo-Olu Ọ nọkwa na bọọdụ nke Nnamdi Azikwe University Business School

A họpụtara Odii n'afọ 2023 ka ọ bụrụ onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke People’s Democratic Party (Nigeria) na ntụli aka o jiri narị atọ na iri anọ na itoolu merie onye iro ya kacha nso, Chris Usulor, onye nwetara votu itoolu
Odii haziri Ebele na Anyichuks Foundation nke ya na nwunye ya na-elekọta
Ntọala ahụ arụgoro ihe karịrị ụlọ otu narị na iri atọ maka ndị ogbenye, ụlọ ụka isii na okporo ụzọ 22 km (14 ) na Magodo, Lagos
N'oge ọrịa COVID-19, ntọala ahụ nyekwara otu narị nde na iri ise naira na Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa, Gọọmentị steeti Lagos na Gọọmenti steeti Ebonyi yana ikesa ihe nrite nye ndị mmadụ
O nyekwara ụmụ akwụkwọ na steeti Ebonyi agụmakwụkwọ n'efu
A mụrụ Okowa na Owa-Alero na Ika North-East Local Government Area nke Steeti Delta
Ọ gara Edo College, nke dị na Benin City (n'agbata afọ 1970–1976), wee gawa Mahadum nke Ibadan ebe ọ gụrụ maka inye ọgwụ na ịwa ahụ, Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 1981 na ogo MBBS
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị National Corps Service Corps, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ụlọ ọrụ na elekọta njikwa nke ụlọ ọgwụ ndị dị na Steeti Bendel dị ka onye ọrụ ahụike
Ọ banyere ọrụ onwe onye dị ka Director, na Victory Medical Center, Igbanke na afọ 1986
Okowa ghọrọ onye ode akwụkwọ nke mpaghara Gọọmentị Ika ma mechaa bụrụ onye isi oche nke Ika North-East Local Government Council (na agbata afọ 1991–1993)
Ọ bụ onye nhakọta Delta North nke Grassroots Democratic Movement (GDM)
Ọ banyere PDP na afọ 1998, ma nye aka na mkpọsa Gọvanọ James Ibori na afọ 1998/1999

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye Kọmishọna na gọọmentị Steeti Delta maka Ọrụ Ugbo na Ihe ana enweta n'ala (site n'ọnwa Julai afọ 1999 - rue ọnwa Eprel afọ 2001), nke mmepe ihe gbasara mmiri (n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2001 - rue ọnwa May afọ 2003) na nke ahu ike (n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2003 rue ọnwa Oktoba afọ 2006)

Okowa gbara arụkwaghịm ịzọ ọkwa ntuli aka nke ọkwa Onye nnochite anya otu pati PDP na ọkwa ọchichi gọvanọ Delta Steeti nke afọ 2007, mana o riteghị ọkwa Onye nnochite anya otu ahu maka gọvanọ na ntuli aka emere
N’ọnwa Juunu afọ 2007, a họpụtara Ifeanyi ka ọ bụrụ Ode akwụkwọ nke Gọọmentị Steeti Delta

A họpụtara Ifeanyi ka ọ bụrụ onye ndoro ndoro na anọchite anya mpaghara ọdida anyanwu nke Delta na ụlọ nzukọ Senate na ntuli aka nke otu pati PDP emere n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2011, ọ nwetere vootu nari itolu iri anọ na abụọ, mana a gbara mmeri a ụkwụ site n'aka ndị isi pati ndị chọro Marian Amaka Alli dịka onye ndoro ndoro ga anochite anya ha
A họputara ya ọzọ na ntuli aka emeghariri ebe o nwetara vootu otu puku nari anọ iri anọ na isii, megide vootu otu nari na asatọ aturu maka Dọkịnta Marian Alli

Na ntuli aka nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011 maka oche onye nnọchite anya mpaghara ọdida anyanwu Delta na ụlọ nzụkọ Senate, Ifeanyi nwetara vootu puku iri itolu na asatọ otu nari na iri anọ, karịa onye nke abụọ bụ, Prince Ned Munir Nwoko nke Democratic People's Party, onye nke nwetara vootu puku iri isii na asaa nari itolu na iri asatọ na ise
E kwuru na esemokwu ka dị banyere ntuli aka ahụ emere na ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013
N'ikpeazụ, Ifeanyi nwetara akara ntuli aka maka ọkwa gọvanọ na afọ 2015 n'okpuru pati PDP ọ nwetere vootu Nari anọ na isii n'abali asatọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014
O meriri ntuli aka nke oche ọchichi govanọ Steeti Delta na afọ 2015 n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2015 site na i nweta vootu dị nari puku asaa iri abụọ na anọ na nari isii na iri asatọ
E duru ya n'iyi ọrụ dika Gọvanọ n'abali iri abụọ na itolu nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2015 kemgbe ahụ ọ malitela ọrụ dị egwu

Na nhoputa ndi ochichi govanọ nke emere n'abali itolu nke ọnwa March, afọ 2019, Okowa, onye bụ onye otu ndi Peoples Democratic Party, nwetara vootu Nari puku itolu iri abụọ na ise na nari abụọ iri asaa na anọ iji merie onye ya na ya doro, bụ onye ndoro ndoro ochichi All-Progressive Congress, Great Ogboru, onye nwetara vootu Nari puku abụọ iri na ise na nari itolu iri atọ na asatọ
N'ụbọchị 16 nke ọnwa Juun, 2022 bụ Atiku Abubakar bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala nke Peoples Democratic Party ka ọ bụrụ onye ga-eso ya na ntuliaka 2023

Patrick Ifeanyi Ubah // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na ụbọchị atọ Septemba 1971), bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọchọọnta ego na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Senator na-anọchite anya Anambra South Senatorial District na Senate Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Capital Oil (CCO), nke o guzobere na 2001
A mụrụ Ifeanyi dị ka nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ asaa nke Maazị na Oriakụ Alphonsus Ubah na Otolo, di na otu n'ime ụzọ anọ nke Nnewi na Anambra State, Nigeria
N'ihi enweghị ike nke ndị mụrụ ya igbo mkpa agụmakwụkwọ na onwunwe nke ụmụ ha, Ifeanyi hapụrụ Premiere academy, Lugbe, Abuja iji mụta ịzụ ahịa mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ gara ọtụtụ ọmụmụ azụmahịa na mpaghara na mba ụwa na nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe na nzukọ ọmụmụ na idu ndú na njikwa azụmahịa

Ifeanyi ghọrọ onye na-ebupụ taya na akụkụ ndị ọzọ karịsịa na West Africa gụnyere Ghana, Sierra Leone, Liberia na DR Congo tupu ọ gbasaa azụmahịa ya na mba ụfọdụ na Europe gụnyere Belgium na United Kingdom
N'afọ 2001, o guzobere Capital Oil and Gas Limited

Ọ bụ onye guzobere The Authority Newspaper, akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa ụbọchị nke Naijiria ma bụrụkwa onye nwe Ifeanyi Ubah FC, klọb bọọlụ na Nigeria Premier League, mgbe ọ zụrụ ya dị ka Gabros International Football Club
N'afọ 2014, Ifeanyi Ubah meriri na ntuli aka gọvanọ Anambra n'afọ 2014 n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke Labour Party
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2019, a mara Ifeanyi Ubah dị ka onye mmeri nke ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke Anambra South n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke Young Progressive Party (YPP)
Ifeanyi Ubah lụrụ Uchenna Ubah, onye nchịkwa azụmahịa gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello na Naịjirịa, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ ise
Ọ na-ejikwa ntọala nke akpọrọ aha ya; Ifeanyi Ubah Foundation

Na ọnwa Septemba 2022, mgbe Ifeanyi Ubah nọ na-aga Nnewi, ndị na-agba égbè wakporo ya na Enugwu-Ukwu na Anambra Steeti - a gbagbara ụgbọ njem ya égbè; ọ dịkarịa ala mmadụ ise, gụnyere ndị uwe ojii abụọ, nwụrụ
Ubah lanarịrị n'ihi na ụgbọala ọ nọ na ya na-egbochi mgbọ

Lawrence Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi // (na-ege ntị) CON (nke a maara nke ọma dị ka 'Gburugburu') (amụrụ na 20 Machị n'afo 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nke a họpụtara dị ka Gọvanọ nke Enugu Steeti n'ọnwa Eprel n'afo 2015, a ṅụrụ iyi na 29 Mee n'afo 2015
Ọ bụ Onye otu ụlọ nnọchiteanya nke Federal Republic of Nigeria ruo afọ iri na abụọ
Ọ bụ onye so na People's Democratic Party (PDP) onye nọchitere anya Igboeze North / Udenu Federal Constinuency nke Enugu State
A họpụtara Ugwuanyi ka ọ bụrụ Gọvanọ nke Enugu Steeti n'okpuru PDP
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka gọvanọ nke Enugu Steeti maka oge nke ọchịchị abụọ na Mee 29, 2019
A mụrụ Ugwuanyị n'ọnwa Maachị afọ 1964 ma bụrụkwa onye obodo Ọba dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Udenu dị n'Enugwu North Zone n'Enugwu steeti
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Theresa's College, Nsukka
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Masters na Business Administration na University of Nigeria, Nsukka
Ugwuanyi a bụ woro General Manager nke Premier Insurance Brokers Limited Enugu ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke Rotary Club nke Emene n'Enugwu Steeti
A họpụtara Ugwuanyi na mbụ ka ọ bụrụ Onye nnọchiteanya nke Naịjirịa n'afọ 2003 ma bụrụkwa onyeisi oche, Kọmitii Ụlọ na-ahụ maka njem ụgbọ mmiri
Ugwuanyi bụ onye isi oche nke kọmitii ụlọ na Marine Transport
Ugwuanyi nwetakwara ọkwa osote onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ụlọ na-ahụ maka ezumike nká ebe o nyere aka mee ka Iwu Mgbanwe ezumike nkwe nke afọ 2004
Mgbe ntuli aka nke pati ya na 8 Disemba 2014 n'Enugwu, Ugwuanyi meriri tiketi gọvanọ nke PDP, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ PDP na steeti maka ntuli aka Nhoputa ndi ochichi nke 2015
Otú ọ dị, onye ọzọ na-achọ ịbụ gọvanọ nke PDP, Senator Ayogu Eze, enweghị obi ụtọ na omume nke primaries
Eze gara n'ụlọ ikpe iji gbaghaa ikike nke Ugwuanyi dị ka onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ PDP maka ntuli aka Gọvanọ Steeti Enugu
Ọ bụ Justice Evoh Stephen Chukwu, onye ọka ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Abuja, jụrụ arịrịọ Eze, onye kpebiri na nhọpụta Ugwuanyi na ntuli aka gọvanọ bụ nke ziri ezi na nke iwu kwadoro
Ugwuanyi onye a ṅụrụ iyi na Mee 29, n'afo 2015, dịka Gọvanọ amalitela usoro ụfọdụ iji melite ma gbanwee Enugwu Steeti
Otu n'ime atụmatụ ndị ahụ bụ njem ya na-adịbeghị anya na Ireland maka nzukọ itinye ego nke Metro Eireann Dublin haziri

Ọ bụkwa onye natara Metro Eireann International Outstanding Leadership Award 2016 maka ihe nlereanya ya dị ka onye omeiwu, ọkachasị dị ka Onye isi oche nke Marine Transport, n'oge ya na ụlọ ndị omeiwu nke Federal Republic of Nigeria
Na Machị 9, n'afo 2019, a họpụtara Uguwuanyi ọzọ dị ka Gọvanọ nke Enugu Steeti na ntuli aka gọvanọ Naijiria nke 2019
O nwetara vootu 449,935 nke dị elu karịa onye na-emegide ya, Senator Ayogu Eze onye nwetara vootu 10,423
Ọ bụ ezie na Gọvanọ Ugwanyi zutere ọtụtụ ihe mgbochi na mmalite nke ọchịchị ya, ọ gosipụtara ike idu ndú ya na-agbaso ụzọ ọ na-esi na-achịkwa steeti ahụ
N'etiti mmeghachi omume mmetụta uche karịsịa site na Enugwu North, gọvanọ ahụ anọgidewo na-enwe ọganihu nke Enugwu
Dị ka ndị gọvanọ gara aga kemgbe 1999 lekwasịrị anya na mmepe obodo mepere emepe, Ugwanyi tụgharịrị uche ya na mmepe ime obodo
N'ime oge mbụ ya, ọ rụchara Udenu Ring Road nke bụ ọnyà ọnwụ maka ọtụtụ ndị Ezimo na Imilike-Ani
Mmecha nke ụzọ a emegheela obodo ndị a na ụwa ndị ọzọ maka azụmahịa na azụmahịa ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-etinye aka na ọrụ nnukwu ego oru ngo mgbe ụfọdụ steeti enweghị ike ịkwụ ụgwọ ndị ọrụ
[nhotu aka choro]
Onye dike a na-amaghị aha ya nke akụrụngwa, gara n'ihu na mmezu ya siri ike nke ọrụ nketa- ọrụ ndị na-emetụta ndị mmadụ kpọmkwem

Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ndị a gụnyere mmezu nke njikọ ọdọ mri Nike ː Harmony Estate Road ː Amorji Nike ː Adoration Pilgrimage Center, Phase II na III, na Enugu East LGA, nke ga-ejikọ Abakpa na Emene ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka ụzọ dị oke mkpa nke ga-eme ka okporo ụzọ ghara ịgafe na Abakpa T-junction; asphalting nke 22443 km (13945 mi) uzo na-ejikọta obodo -- jikota ra Isi-Uzo na Udenu LGA, okpuru Rural Access na mobility Project (RAMP II); ndozigharị ọtụtụ okporo ụzọ dị n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum dị na Nsukka na ọrụ njikwa ide mmiri na-arụ ọrụ na Achi Street, Independence Layout, Enugu
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2022, Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari nyere ya nsọpụrụ mba Naijiria nke Commander Of The Order Of The Niger (CON)
Àtụ EnuguStateGovernors

James Ifeanyichukwu Nwobodo (amụrụ na 9 Mee 1940) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria bụ gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti (site n'afọ 1979 ruo n'afọ 1983) n'oge Republic nke Abụọ nke Naijiria ma bụrụ Senator maka Enugu East Senatorial District na Enugu Steeti (site n'afọ 1999 ruo n'afọ 2003)
N'afọ 2003, ọ gbara ọsọ na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na ntuli aka onye isi ala Naijiria
A mụrụ Jim Ifeanyichukwu Nwobodo na 9 Mee 1940 na Agyaragu, Lafia, Nassarawa State
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya n'afọ 1956 na Government School, Awka na ihe bụzi Anambra State, wee gaa St
Peter's College, Zaria (site n'afọ 1956 ruo n'afọ 1959)
Ọ gara na Nigerian College of Arts, Science and Technology, nke mbụ na Enugu na Ibadan, wee gaa na University College Ibadan (site n'afọ 1961 ruo n'afọ 1964), nweta BA na Bekee
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Jim Nwobodo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na King's College, Lagos (site n'afọ 1964 ruo n'afọ 1966)
Mgbe ahụ, ọ nwetara ọrụ na ngalaba ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Shell nke Naịjirịa (site n'afọ 1966 ruo n'afọ 1970)
Mgbe Agha Obodo Naijiria kwụsịrị n'afọ 1970, o guzobere Link Group International, nke toro mepee alaka na Lagos, Kano, Benin City, Aba, Calabar na Enugu
Ọ bụkwa Onye isi oche nke Jimson International Al Cargo Agencies, Satellite Press Limited, na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Nwodobo bụkwa onyeisi oche nke klọb bọọlụ Naijiria Enugu Rangers n'oge ihe ịga nke ọma ha n'afọ ndị 1970 na ruo mmalite afọ ndị 1980
Nwobodo lụrụ Patricia (Pat), ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ ga anọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Jim na Pat Jr
Jim Nwobodo sonyeere ndị Naịjirịa Peoples Party (NPP) ma n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1978, a họpụtara ya dịka onyeisi oche NPP maka steeti Anambra ochie
O sonyere na ntuli aka 1979 ma n'abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 1979 a ṅụrụ ya iyi n'ọkwa dị ka Gọvanọ mbụ nke Anambra Steeti

Dịka gọvanọ, Nwobodo guzobere ụlọ nkwari akụ Nike Lake, telivishọn Steeti Anambra, Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ nke Steeti Anambra, Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe (NAU), Ụlọ nkwari akụ Ikenga, ámá egwuregwu Nnamdi Azikiwe, Eha Amufu College of Education, Nsugbe College of Education na ụlọ ọrụ Nkalagu Cement n'etiti ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ gbara ọsọ maka nhọpụta ọzọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1983, mana Christian Onoh nke National Party of Nigeria (NPN) meriri ya
Ntuli aka ahụ juru ebe niile site na iyi egwu, ime ihe ike na ime ntuliaka
Mgbe ndị agha nọ n'okpuru General Muhammadu Buhariweghaara ọchịchị na Disemba 1983, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ruo oge ụfọdụ
Mgbe Sani Abacha batara n'ọchịchị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka iwu
Na 1995, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ntorobịa na egwuregwu
Ka mba ahụ na-aga n'ihu ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ọ bụ onye otu Social Democratic Party (SDP), United Nigeria Congress Party (UNCP) na mgbe e mesịrị Grassroots Democratic Movement (GDM)
Ọ bụ onye ntọala nke People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Naịjirịa, nke a maara dị ka Super Eagles, meriri iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 1994 na Tunisia
E kwere ndị otu ahụ nkwa nke ọ bụla n'ụlọ ihi ụra 3 dị ka onyinye
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1995, Jim Nwobodo dere ndị otu ahụ na e duziri mịnịstrị na-ahụ maka ọrụ & ụlọ ka ha hapụ ụlọ ndị ahụ ozugbo
Na July 2009, e mere ka ụlọ dị na Lagos na Abuja
N'april 1999, a họpụtara Jim Nwobodo ka ọ bụrụ Senator maka mpaghara Enugu East nke Federal Republic of Nigeria n'elu ikpo okwu PDP, na-arụ ọrụ na May 1999
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Senate na Internal Affairs

N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2002, enwere nsogbu mgbe ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti Enugwu kewara n'ime òtù abụọ, otu n'ime ha chọrọ ịchụpụ Abel Chukwu, onye mbụ na-ekwuchitere Ụlọ ahụ, bụ onye e kweere na ọ bụ onye na-eguzosi ike n'ihe nke Gọvanọ Chimaroke Nnamani
Nwobodo kwagara arịrịọ na Federal House of Representatives kwesịrị iwere ihe omume nke House
N'oge ntuli aka gọvanọ nke 1998/1999 na Enugu Steeti, Nwobodo kwadoro Dr
Chimaroke Nnamani, onye a họpụtara
Otú ọ dị, ndị ikom abụọ ahụ mechara kwụsị ịbụ enyi
Nwobodo keere òkè dị mkpa na mgbalị na-enweghị isi iji kwụsị nhọpụta Nnamani na 2003
Ka ọ na-erule njedebe nke oge Sineti ya, ọ gafere nwa oge na United Nigeria People's Party (UNPP), na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala na ntuli aka 2003
Onye otu ya dịka osote onye isi ala bụ Mohammed Goni, onye bụbu gọvanọ nke Borno Steeti
N'afọ 2008, Nwobodo duziri kọmitii na South East iji dozie esemokwu ndị otu na PDP na mpaghara ahụ

Na June 2009, ụlọ ọrụ Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC) na Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) weghachitere akwụkwọ ikike nke Savannah Bank, nke Jim Nwobodo nwere nnukwu òkè na ya, na-agbaso mkpebi ikpe ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị nke Febụwarị ọnwa n'afọ 2009 na Abuja
Afa Igbo bụ Ifeoma nwere ike izo aka na
Ifeoma Iphie Aggrey-Fynn (8 June n’afọ 1980 - 2 June n’afọ 2015), nke a maara dị ka Iphie, bụ onye mgbasa ozi Ghana na Naijiria, onye edemede na onye na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha
Ọrụ Aggrey-Fynn na mgbasa ozi malitere dị ka onye na-egosi TV na 2003
Mgbe ọ banyere na Silverbird Communications n'afọ 2009, e bufere ya ịrụ ọrụ na Rhythm 957 FM na Silverbird Television na Awka
N'ebe ahụ, ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi redio na TV gụnyere Rhythm & Soul, Gospel Vibes na E-Merge tupu ọ kwaga Rhythm 937 FM Port Harcourt
Ifeoma Yvonne Ajunwa bu onye (amụrụ 26 Ọktoba 1980) bụ onye odee akwukwo na Naijiria na onye prọfesọ nke iwu na Mahadum North Carolina Scool of law na United States
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ntọala nke Mmemme Mkpebi Nchoputa AI (AI-DR) na Iwu UNC
Ọ bụ bu onye enyemaka Prọfesọ nke iwu ọrụ na ọrụ na Mahadum Cornell site na 2017-2020, na-enweta ọrụ ebe ahụ na 2020
Ọ bụbu onye mmekọ ngalaba na Berkman Klein Center na Harvard Law School kemgbe 2017
Ajunwa nwetara BA na Mahadum California, Davis na 2003, JD ya na Mahadum San Francisco School of Law na 2007, na MPhil na PhD na Sociology na Mahadum Columbia na 2012 na 2017, n'otu n'otu
Ajunwa bụ onye Ọkammụta McNair dị ka nwa akwụkwọ ohuru na mahadum, natara AAUW nhọrọ Profeson mgbakọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu, ma bụrụ Paul F
Lazersfeld Fellow dị ka nwa akwụkwọ PhD
Josh Whitford nyere ndụmọdụ maka mmụta PhD Ajunwa
Ajunwa bụ onye ode akwụkwọ mara mma na onye prọfesọ na-ahụ maka iwu na Mahadum North Carolina School of Law ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi ntọala nke Mmemme Mkpebi Nchoputa AI (AI-DR)
Tupu nke ahụ, Ajunwa bụ prọfesọ na Cornell University School of Industrial and Labor Relations na onye otu ngalaba na Cornell Law School
Ọ bụ onye otu ngalaba na Berkman Klein Center for Internet & Society na Harvard University, ebe ọ bụbu onye otu sitere na 2016-2017 na onye nkuzi na Harvard Law School ,
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Microsoft Research Nyocha NYC Intern na 2015
Mmasị nyocha nke Ajunwa dị na njikọ nke iwu na teknụzụ na-nlekwasi anya na njikwa ụkpụrụ omume nke teknụzụ ebe ọrụ, agbụrụ na teknụzụ, ọchịchị ụlọ ọrụ, na nha anya ahụike na nzuzo
Nchọcha ya lekwasịrị anya n'ụdị dị iche iche na nsonye n'ahịa ọrụ na ebe ọrụ
Ọ ga-ebipụta akwụkwọ - 'The Quantified Worker' - na Press ụlọ akwụkwọ ụkwụ Cambridge
Mahadum Cornell nyere Ajunwa ikike na Mee 22, 2020
Na Febụwarị 5, 2020, Ajunwa gbara akaebe na Kọmitii Ndị Nnọchiteanya US na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ na ọrụ na- ege ntị na 'Ọdịnihu nke Ọrụ Chebe ikike obodo nke ndị ọrụ na Digital Age'
Ọ tụlere ọgụgụ isi na-eme ka mmadụ nwee ike ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'ịkwa ọrụ wee kwado maka iwu na-echekwa nzuzo data nkeonwe na mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa n'ebe ọrụ
Na Mee 6, 2018, Ajunwa bụ onye na- ekwu okwu TEDx na Mahadum Cornell ebe o gosipụtara okwu gbasara esemokwu nke ụkpụrụ omume na teknụzụ na ebe ọrụ ọgbara ọhụrụ
Na Cornell, Ajunwa jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche na ọtụtụ bọọdụ ndụmọdụ, gụnyere maka Institute for Africa Development na Cornell Prison Education Programme (CPEP)
Na nso nso a, Ajunwa nwetara Fulbright ka ọ mụọ gbasara iwu gbasara mmalite teknụzụ na Naijiria
Ihe nrite na nkwanye ugwu Ajunwa gụnyere
Edemede mmụta Ajunwa gụnyere
Maka nyocha iwu
Maka nyocha ndị ọgbọ na mbipụta ndị ọzọ
Edemede mgbasa ozi ọha nke Ajunwa gụnyere
Ifeoma Nnenna Dieke (amụrụ na 25 Febụwarị 1981) bụ onye na-agbachitere bọọlụ bọọlụ na Scotland nke a mụrụ na America, na-egwuri egwu ugbu a maka Apollon Ladies FC
nke Cypriot First Division
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka ọtụtụ klọb ndị ọkachamara na Sweden na United Steeti
N'agbata afọ 2004 na afo 2017, ọ meriri ugboro ato maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Scotland
A mụrụ Dieke na Amherst, Massachusetts, nne na nna Naijiria, ọ kwagara Cumbernauld na Scotland mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ
Dieke na onye Scot ibe ya Kim Little bụ naanị ndị egwuregwu na-abụghị ndị Bekee ahọpụtara na ndị otu Great Britain maka 2012 London Olympics
Na Jenụwarị ago 2018, Dieke hapụrụ Vittsjö mgbe oge isii gasịrị
N'ịchọ ihe ịma aka ọhụrụ, ọ sonyeere klọb Damallsvenkan nke a na-akwalite ọhụrụ IFK Kalmar
Ọganihu ahụ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na Kalmar na-agagharị n'okpuru tebụl league, a chụpụrụ Dieke n'òtù ahụ ma hapụ ya n'oge ezumike n'etiti oge
A kọrọ na obi adịghị ya ụtọ na Kalmar enweghị ike iwusi ndị otu egwuregwu ha ike
Ọ laghachiri Apollon na Septemba 2018
Dieke ruru eru ịnọchite anya Scotland, United States ma ọ bụ Nigeria na mba ụwa
O mere nke mbụ ya na Scotland na Jenụwarị na afo 2004 megide Gris ma nweta akara nke iri ise ya megide Northern Ireland na afo Mee 2009
A na-akpọkarị Dieke 'Ife' (ma ọ bụ 'Iffy')
Ọ nwere ike ịsụ asụsụ Igbo
Ifeoma Iheanacho (onye amụrụ na Jenụwarị 2, 1988) bụ onye na-agba mgba si n'ala Nigeria
Ngozi Ifeoma Malo bụ ọkàiwu nọ na Nigeria nwetara mmeri nke Eisenhower Fellowship na 2015
Ọ bụ onye ibe Desmond Tutu, African Leadership fellow nakwa Crans Montana New Leaders fellow
N'afọ 2015, o jere ozi dịka onyeisi ndị ọrụ n' ọkachamara na-ahụ maka nkà na ụzụ banyere usoro ọkụ, ụkpụrụ na mmekọrịta na Prọfesọ
Chinedu Nebo, onye bụbu Minista nke na-ahụ maka ọkụ n'ala Naijiria
Ọ bụ ugbu a onyeisi oche nke Clean Tech Hub and Energy Innovation Centre, Abuja
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor na Mahadum nke Ibadan na 2000 wee nwee ọkwá atọ dị elu Iwu si na Mahadum Harvard , Mkpebi Nkwekọrịta na Teknụzụ, na Mahadum Massachusetts
Ifeoma rụrụ n' Ashoka , ọfịs nke West Africa
Ọ rụrụ dị ka onye na-arụkọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụike ọha na eze nke Boston nakwa dịka onye prọfesọ na-akụzi ihe na Mahadum Massachusetts Boston
Mgbe ọ nọ na Boston, ọ na-eje ozi dịka onye ndụmọdụ n' ụlọ ọrụ Global Biotechnology nke a na-akpọ Genzyme Corporation
Na Naijiria, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi ọgụgụ isi n' ụlọ ọrụ George Goli and Okagbue, emesị a bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa na Njikọ Nlekọta na Njikọ Nkwekọrịta

Emesiri họpụta Ifeoma ka ọ bụrụ onye inyeaka pụrụ iche nye Minista nke Ego na Nigeria nakwa tupu ya agaa dịka onye ndụmọdụ ọkachamara siri ike nke Prọfesọ Chinedu Nebo, onye bụbu Minista nke ọkụ na Naijiria
O jere ọrụ dika onyeisi ndụmọdụ na Onyeisi oche nke Iwu Nigerian Electricity Regulaory Commission
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya dika otu n'ime ndi Naijiria nwetara Desmond Tutu Fellowship Program
A họọrọ Ifeoma dịka onye ibe nke Eisenhower Multi National Program na US n'afọ 2015
Ọ bụkwa onye ibe nke African Leadership Forum na Crans Montana New Leaders
Ifeoma Mbanugo (amụrụ na 3 Machị 1952) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
O sonyere na marathon ụmụ nwanyị na 1984 Summer Olympics

Ifeoma Jane Nwobodo (amụrụ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 23, n'afọ1966), bụ onye bụbu Chief of Staff nke Gọọmentị Enugu Steeti, na South East nke Federal Republic of Nigeria, na onye na-achọ maka Enugu East Senatorial District
A mụrụ Ifeoma Jane Nwobodo na Umuahia, isi obodo Abia Steeti nke Naijiria, nye ńnà ya bụ Prọfesọ JO Uzo na nne ya, ha abụọ si n'ógbè Gọọmentị Obodo Udi nke Enugu Steeti

Nwobodo malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Mahadum Primary School, Nsukka, Enugu State, n'afọ 1971, na-agwụcha agụmakwụkwọ elementrị ya n'afọ 1977 na Zik Avenue Primary School (nke e mechara kpọwa TTC Primary School)

Agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya malitere na Federal Government Girls College, Gboko, Benue State, na 1977, wee mechie ya weta kwa asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West African o nwetara na Queen of the Rosary College, Nsukka n'afọ 1983
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Nwobodo nwetara nnabata na Mahadum Naịjirịa iji mụọ Banking na Finance na Enugu campus nke Mahadum áhụ̀ Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science na 1987
Ọ bụ ugbu a Fellow nke Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN), na onye mmekọ nke Chartered Institute of Taxation (CIT)
Ifeoma Nwobodo lụrụ Justice Afam Nwobodo nke ụlọ ikpe-Judiciary dị na Enugu Steeti
Di ya si na West Local Government Area nke Enugu Steeti
Ha nwere ụmụ anọ

Nwobodo malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye a na-azụ̀ na ọrụ ụlọ àkù na Continental Merchant Bank Lagos (1987 ruo 1988) n'okpuru National Youth Corps Service ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụ na nkwekọrịta nkwụnye ego
N'afọ 1989, ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka Corporate Strategic Planning and Control Manager na Cash Data Services Limited (ụlọ ọrụ kaadị akwụmụgwọ na ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ego dị na Lagos), ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo n'afọ 1992
N'ọrụ a na nzukọ a, Nwobodo bụ onye na-ahụ maka mmefu ego, nkwenye na njikwa ime ụlọ
Ọrụ ya mekwara ka nyocha na mmepe dị ike, yana nkwalite ihu ụlọ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Nwobodo nabatara ọkwa nke Chief Accountant na Melagro Exports Limited n'ime ngalaba ọrụ ugbo na ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa mbupụ
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ndị otu Finance & Accounting, ma lekwasị anya n'ịmepụta usoro ọhụrụ na ọrụ iji kwalite uto nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 1998, Nwobodo ghọrọ Chief Accounting & Finance Officer na Manaksia Industries Nigeria Limited, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na Lagos nke nwere ngalaba mbupụ
Mgbe ọ nọ na Manaksia, ọ na-etinye aka na mmepe nke usoro ego na ndekọ ego dị irè
N'ime afọ abụọ ahụ, o webatara usoro ndekọ ego kọmputa, ma guzobe ma nyochaa usoro nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

N'ọrụ a, o nyekwara ntụziaka atụmatụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na mpaghara nke ndị ọrụ na njikwa akụ na ụba dị na ahụ ndị n'arụ́ ọrụ, atụmatụ ụtụ isi na nchịkwa, yana ego iji duzie njikwa na mkpebi ọnụahịa ngwaahịa
Nwobodo wee were nhọpụta na ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa na-ele ọbịa na njem nleta, Protea Group, ka ọ bụrụ Chief Finance Officer (CFO) nke Protea Hotel Nike Lake Resort n'afọ 2001
Nwobodo ghọrọ Onye isi ndị ọrụ Gọvanọ nke Enugu Steeti n'afọ 2007
Onye na-akwado inye ụmụ nwanyị ike, Nwobodo jiri ọfịs ya kwado ihe ụmụ nwanyị na-eme, ma site na agụmakwụkwọ ma ọrụ akụnaụba
N'ọrụ a, ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ndị otu mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndị ọkachamara na nzukọ, nzukọ na ogbako
Ifeoma Nwoye (onye amụrụ na mbọchi nke mbu na ọnwa nke ise, Mee na afọ 1993) bụ onye obodo Nigeria na'gba mgba
Nwoye zọrọ asọmpi n'egwuregwu Commonwealth nke afọ 2014 ebe o ritere ọla nchara na ihe mmemme freestyle 55kg
Ifeoma Okoye (ma eleghị anya amụrụ na afọ nari iri itoolu iri atọ na asaa) bụ onye edemede Naijiria
Ndị na-akwado ya akpọwo ya 'onye edemede nwanyị kachasị mkpa si Naịjirịa mgbe Flora Nwapa na Buchi Emecheta gasịrị,' dị ka Oyekan Owomoyela si kwuo
A mụrụ ya na Anambra Steeti na Mpaghara owụwa anyanwu nke Naijiria
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na St
Monica's College na Ogbunike iji nweta asambodo nkuzi na afọ nari iri itoolu iri ise na itoolu
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Nigeria na Nsukka iji nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na Bekee na 1977
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ gụnyere Behind the Clouds, akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụaka na akụkọ mkpirikpi, dị ka The Village Boy na Eme Goes to School
Ọ bụ ezie na a maara Okoye maka akụkọ dị mkpirikpi nke ụmụ ya, o dekwara akwụkwọ ụfọdụ maka ndị okenye, dị ka Behind the Clouds
Behind the Clouds bụ maka di na nwunye na-enweghị ụmụ, na otu ụta si ada n'ahụ nwanyị kama nwoke

Okoye natara ihe nrite maka ma Behind the Cloud na The Village Boy site na Naịjirịa National Council of Art and Culture na 1983, yana inweta ihe nrite akụkọ ifo kachasị mma nke afọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Men Without Ears, na afọ nari iri itoolu iri asatọ na anọ
N'afọ nari iri itoolu iri asatọ na ise, ọ natara onyinye ọzọ maka Daily Bread mgbe Eze gasịrị na Ife National Book Fair
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri mpaghara Afrịka maka asọmpi akụkọ mkpirikpi nke Commonwealth na afọ nari iri itoolu iri itoolu na itoolu

Ifeoma Chukwufumnay Onumonu (amuru na 25 Febrụwarị 1994) bu onye ama ama na Naijiria nke na- agba NJ/NY Gotham FC na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị 'National Women's Soccer League' (NWSL) na maka otu ndi umunwanyi Naijiria
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka ￼￼ ndị òtù 'Reign FC, Portland Thorns FC na Boston Breakers'
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na Mahadum California Berkeley na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Los Osos High School
Amụrụ ya na United States, kemgbe 2021, Onumonu na-anọchite anya Naijiria
Ke Mgbe ọ gbasịrị egwu na kọleji na Mahadum California, ndị Boston Breakers depụtara Onumonu na 8th n'ozuzu oke na 2017 NWSL College Draft
Ọ pụtara na egwuregwu 18 maka Boston n'oge rookie ya
Mgbe Boston Breakers gbachara tupu oge 2018, Portland Thorns họpụtara Onumonu na Dispersal Draft 2018
Agbaghara ya na Mee 8, 2019 ka ọ gbachara egwuregwu asatọ
Na 14 Mee 2019, Onumonu bịanyere aka na Reign FC dịka onye ọkpụkpọ nnọchi anya otu mba
Ka emechara ihe ngosi nke ọma, ọ nwetara ntụpọ ngụkọ na June 28
Na ọnwa Jenụwarị bu ubochi 17, 2020, e rere Onumonu na Sky Blue FC
Onumonu nọchitere anya United States na otu mba ụmụ nwanyị ndị nọ na ogogo afụ 23
Na June 2021 ọ natara oku izizi ya na otu mba ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria

Ifeoma Onyefụlụ (amụrụ ya n’afọ 1959) bụ onye odee akwụkwọ ụmụaka nke Naịjirịa, onye odee akwụkwọ na ndị na-ese foto A maara ya nke ọma maka akwụkwọ eserese ya nke na-egosipụta foto banyere ndụ ime obodo n'Afrịka
A mụrụ Onyefụlụ na Ọnịcha, Anambra, Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye so na agbụrụ Igbo nke Nigeria
O bi na UK
O tokwara na Naịjirịa
Ọ lụrụ di were kwaga na Britain na 1982
Ọ debanyere aha na ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ foto na Earls Court nke Britain
Ọ mechara hapụ usoro nlekọta azụmaahịa ọ na-agbaso, n'ihi ọ nwetara ọrụ foto na Britain
Ọ malitere site na ịselụ ndị ụlọ akwụkwọ akụkọ foto
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese foto na Caribbean Times site na 1986-87
Na 1991 ọ bidoro ịde ihe
Ọ nwere ụmụ abụọ nke na-emetụta ihe ndị ọ na-ede
Mmekọrịta ya na ụmụ ya na oge agụmakwụkwọ ha mere ka ọ na-ede ihe gbasara ihe ụmụaka nke ọma
Na nchịkọta ihe ụmụaka na-amasị ya nke ọma
A họrọ akwụkwọ mbụ ya bl 'A is for Africa' dịka ọkachamma akwụkwọ mmụta ụmụaka
Ọ tụọla ugo mmeri ugboro abụọ nke gụnyere; The Children's Africana Book Award, maka akwụkwọ ya nke a 'Here Comes The Bride' na 2004 ya na kwa akwụkwọ ya ọzọ bụ 'Ikenna Goes to Nigeria' na 2008
Ifeoma Ozoma (amuru ya n'afọ 1991 ma obu 1992) bu onye okachamara iwu oha na eze America na onye na-akwado ulo oru teknụzụ
Mgbe afọ abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na iwu ọha na eze na Pinterest, Ozoma gbara arụkwaghịm ma kwuo banyere mmeso ọjọọ na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ o boro ebubo na o nwetara na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
O mechara malite ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ a na-akpọ Earthseed, ma rụọ ọrụ ịkwado maka iwu nchekwa nchekwa na nchekwa ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ
Ozoma tolitere na Anchorage, Alaska na Raleigh, North Carolina
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Naijiria kwabatara
Ozoma gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Choate Rosemary Hall, ụlọ akwụkwọ nkwado kọleji nkeonwe na Connecticut
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Yale n'afọ 2015
Ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, Ozoma sonyeere Google n'ụlọ ọrụ Washington, DC n'afọ 2015, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na amụma ọha ma bụrụkwa njikọ gọọmentị
Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na Facebook na Silicon Valley, na-arụ ọrụ na mmekọrịta mba ụwa
Ozoma sonyeere Pinterest 'atụmatụ ọha ọhụrụ hibere na otu mmetụta n'afọ 2018
Mgbe ọ nọ na Pinterest, ọ haziri mkpebi ya a na-eto nke ukwuu ịkwụsị ịkwalite ubi ndị ohu ohu dị ka ebe agbamakwụkwọ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na isiokwu gụnyere ozi ụgha gbasara ahụike, ma nyere Pinterest aka mejuputa amụma machibido ọdịnaya mgbochi ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa n'elu ikpo okwu ya
Mgbe ọ nọ na Pinterest, ọ nọrọ otu afọ na-akwado maka ịrị elu ụgwọ, nke o kwuru na ọ ga-eweta ụgwọ ọrụ ya kwekọrọ na nke ndị ọrụ ibe nwere ahụmahụ na ibu ọrụ yiri nke ahụ
N'ikpeazụ, ọ goro onye ọka iwu ka ọ nyere ya aka na mkparịta ụka gbasara aha ya na ụgwọ ọrụ ya

Mgbe Ozoma tụrụ aro ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ tinye ịdọ aka ná ntị ọdịnaya na posts site n'aka Ben Shapiro, onye na-akọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-agbanwe agbanwe bụ onye ọ kọwara dị ka 'onye na- acha ọcha ọcha ', onye ọrụ ibe ya na ndị otu aka nri jikọrọ aka dox Ozoma site na ibipụta ekwentị nke ya
nọmba, aha, na foto na webụsaịtị extremist
Ozoma bidoro ịnata egwu ọnwụ
Pinterest emeghị ka Ozoma wepụ ozi ahụ, ma ọ bụ taa onye ọrụ na-ahụ maka ya ahụhụ

N'ịbụ onye nwere nkụda mmụọ na ihe ọ kọwara dị ka nzaghachi 'adịghị ize ndụ ezughị oke' maka ihe omume doxing, yana n'ịkwado enweghị mkpụrụ maka ịrị elu, nkatọ onye njikwa na nyocha arụmọrụ nke asụsụ ọ jiri mee ihe na amụma ebe agbamakwụkwọ bụ ahịhịa ikpeazụ nye ya
N'ọnwa Mee 2020, Ozoma gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya wee tinye akwụkwọ n'aka California Department of Fair Employment and Housing (DFEH)
O mechara nweta nkwekọrịta na Pinterest

Ozoma malitere n'ihu ọha na-ekwurịta ahụmahụ ya na June, na-emebi nkwekọrịta na-adịghị ekpughe, mgbe Pinterest kwuputara ihe ọ kwenyere na ọ bụ nkwado efu nke ndụ ndị ojii n'ihi ngagharị iwe George Floyd na nkwado Black Lives Matter gburugburu obodo ahụ

Ya na onye ọrụ ibe Aerica Shimizu Banks, onye gbakwara arụkwaghịm ma tinye akwụkwọ mkpesa na DFEH, o kwuru n'ihu ọha na a kwụrụ ya ụgwọ na-ezighị ezi na Pinterest, na chere mmegwara mgbe ọ na-akpọ mgbanwe
Ụmụ nwanyị abụọ a katọrọ gburugburu ebe obibi dị ka iro na ịkpa ókè n'ebe ụmụ nwanyị ojii nọ
N'August, ndị ọrụ Pinterest mere ngagharị iwe iji gosi mmeso ọjọọ ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ụmụ nwanyị, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị nwere agba
Ozoma na ụlọ akụ ọ bụla nwetara ụgwọ ọrụ n'ihe na-erughị otu afọ mgbe ha kwụsịrị
Ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Françoise Brougher, onye bụbu onye isi ọrụ Pinterest, nyere $225 ndezi ndezi na ikpe ịkpa oke okike megide ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ndị ọzọ na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ, gụnyere Timnit Gebru, katọrọ Pinterest maka ihe ha hụrụ dị ka ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na otú ụlọ ọrụ ahụ si mesoo Ozoma na Banks, na otú ha si mesoo Brougher, bụ onye ọcha
Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ The Guardian si kwuo, Ozoma na Banks 'etinyela ntọala' maka ndị ọzọ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, gụnyere Brougher, ikwu okwu banyere ịkpa ókè
Ozoma kọwara nbibi ahụ dịka 'ịkụ aka n'ihu'
Na Nọvemba n'afọ 2021, Pinterest doziri akwụkwọ ikpe ndị nwe oke nke Sistemụ ezumike nka nke Rhode Island gbara akwụkwọ na ebubo ndị isi nyere aka omenala ịkpa oke na-egbu egbu
Okwu ikpe a gbadoro ụkwụ na ebubo Ozoma na Banks mere
Mkpebi ahụ kwụrụ $50 nde n'ime iche iche, nha anya, na nsonye mbọ na ụlọ ọrụ
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị arụkwaghịm na Pinterest, Ozoma hibere Earthseed, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ndụmọdụ lekwasịrị anya na nha anya na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ
Ozoma kwadoro [lower-alpha 1] California's Silenced No More Act, iwu na-echebe ndị ọrụ na-ekwu maka mkpagbu na ịkpa ókè ọ bụrụgodị na ha ebinyela aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta anaghị ekpughe
Ọ bụ Ozoma na Senator Connie Leyva dere akwụkwọ iwu a, ma ndị omeiwu steeti California gafere ya
Gọvanọ Gavin Newsom bịanyere aka na ya n'iwu na Ọktoba 2021, wee malite na Jenụwarị 1, 2022

N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ 2021, Ozoma kpaliri Chelsey Glasson, onye bụbu onye ọrụ Google nke gbara akwụkwọ maka ịkpa oke ime ime, wee soro Cher Scarlett rụọ ọrụ, onye bụbu onye injinia sọftụwia Apple na onye na-akwado ọrụ bụ onye bụbu onye ndu otu #AppleToo
iji weta ụgwọ ọrụ yiri nke ahụ na steeti Washington, nke akwadoro na iwu na Maachị 2022
Na Septemba 2021, Ozoma, otu na-akwado ndị na-eketa òkè na-abụghị uru Open MIC, na ụlọ ọrụ itinye ego na-emetụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze Whistle Capital na Nia Impact Capital gbara akwụkwọ na Apple
Ndị otu ahụ rịọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka ha mee nyocha ihe ize ndụ n'ihe gbasara okwu adịghị ekpughere ndị ọrụ nwetara mmekpa ahụ ma ọ bụ ịkpa ókè

Atụmatụ a bịara na-eso obere ndụmọdụ sitere n'aka Ozoma na Nia, iji gbasie ike tinye nkwupụta na nkwekọrịta ọrụ na-ekwu na egbochighị ndị ọrụ 'ịkparịta ụka ma ọ bụ ikpughe ozi gbasara omume iwu na-akwadoghị n'ebe ọrụ, dị ka mmekpa ahụ ma ọ bụ ịkpa ókè'
Apple jụrụ, na-ekwu na nke a egosipụtalarị na amụma omume azụmahịa ya

Na Ọktọba 18, 2021, Apple gbara akwụkwọ nzaghachi enweghị ihe ọ bụla na atụmatụ onye nwekọrịta ya na US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), na-ekwu na Apple anaghị eji ụdị nkebiokwu nzuzo nke Nia na-ezo aka

Na Nọvemba 22, 2021, Nia gbara akwụkwọ nzaghachi na Apple na SEC, na-ekwupụta na ha enwetala ozi na nzuzo, na Apple achọla iji ahịrịokwu nzuzo na ọnọdụ nke ịkpa oke, iyi egwu, na ebubo mmebi ọrụ n'ebe ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Scarlett mechara gosi na ya enyela Nia ozi ahụ
Na Disemba 21st, 2021, SEC kpebiri megide ntinye akwụkwọ Apple, mmeri maka ndị na-eme ihe ike
Ndị na-eketa òkè kwadoro atụmatụ nke nyocha ahụ na Maachị 4, 2022
Na mmekorita ya na otu dị ka Omidyar Network, The Signals Network, na Lioness, Ozoma wepụtara The Tech Worker Handbook na Ọktoba 2021
Ọ bụ webụsaịtị nwere akụrụngwa n'efu maka ndị na-arụ ọrụ teknụzụ na-achọ ime mkpebi nke ọma gbasara ma ha ga-ekwu okwu n'okwu ndị na-amasị ọha
Akwụkwọ ntuziaka a na-eduzi ndị ọrụ site n'ihe ha nwere ike izute na usoro iwu, otu esi agakwuru mgbasa ozi, yana ozi gbasara otu esi agagharị nchegbu anụ ahụ na nchekwa
Nke a gụnyere akụkọ ifo na ntụnye sitere na teknụzụ ndị ọzọ na-ekwu okwu
Agụnyere Ozoma na The Root's 2021 'The Root 100', ndepụta kwa afọ nke ndị Africa America kacha nwee mmetụta n'akụkụ dị iche iche
Ozoma bi na Santa Fe, New Mexico
Ifesinachi Comedy Nwanyanwu (amuru na abali abuo n’ime abali iri-isii n’onwa mbu n’ulo 1975) bu onye ihe nlere anya nke ala anyi n’ile anya, onye n’egwu-egwu, onye ukwe na onye oru gbasara gburugburu
Ọ bụ Curator nke lọ 33 na Abuja na Onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke ENACOF
Amuru ya na abali abuo n’ime abali iri- isii n’ime onwa nke June 1975 n’Enugu State, Nigeria
Ifesinachi toro na Nsukka
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agụghị akwụkwọ na-amụ Crop Production tere aka na Mahadum nke Ugbo na Markurdi, Benue State
Ifesinachi kwagara Lagos ma lekwasị anya na ụgbọelu na-ebu ihe
Ọ dabere na Abuja ebe ọ bịara na puku abuo wee chọpụta ozugbo, oke mkpa ọ ga-eme n'ọhịa nka na isi obodo Nigeria

Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na Executive Director nke Environmental Art Collective Foundation (ENACOF), na onye na-elekọta “One Environment” ikpo okwu nke mere nke ọma ịhazi mbipụta 2 nke One Environment Hybrid 2016 na 2017 - okpokoro gburugburu, nzukọ ọmụmụ na ebe a na-amụ ihe
maka ndị ọkachamara na ụmụaka lekwasịrị anya n'okwu metụtara gburugburu ebe obibi na ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị ka nhicha, ebe obibi maka ụmụaka ma ọ bụ ịkọ ọrụ osisi
Ọ bụ onye nkwado na onye na-elekọta ụlọ ngosi ihe nzuzo House 33, tinyere onye edemede Beasts Of No Nation, Uzodinma Iweala
Onye natara onyinye nturu ugo nke Nigeria, ma ugbu a onye nlekọta nke Ụlọ iri atọ na atọ , ihe na-agbaze ihe maka ndị na-ese ihe na ndị omenaala na Abuja, Isi Obodo nke Nigeria
Ọ bụkwa Onye mebere Librarian na British Council na- akwado Maker Library Network
Ifi Amadiume (onye a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 23 n’onwa Eprel nke afọ 1947) bu onye na-ede abụ ụrịantụrọpọlọjisti,onye odee nke Naijiria
O sonyeere Ngalaba Okpukpe nke Dartmouth College,na New Hampshire,dị n'Amerịka, n'afọ 1993
A mụrụ ya na Kaduna nye nne na nna bụ ndị Igbo, Ife Amadiume gụrụ akwụkwọ na Naịjirịa tupu ọ kwaga Briten n'afọ 1971
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na School of Oriental and African Studies, Mahadum nke Lọndọn, na-enweta nzere bacjelọ (1978) na dọktọreti (1983) na sochal antụrọpọlọji na n'otu n'otu
Ọ bụ onye otu na-eme nchọpụta otu afọ na Mahadum nke Nigeria,dị n'Enugu, ma kụziekwa nkuzi na UK, Kanada, Amerịka na Senegal
Ọrụ ya na Afrịka mere ka e nwee ederede aha abụọ gbasara Igbo African Matriarchal Foundation (1987), na Male Daughters, Female Husband (Zed Press, 1987) ritere ihe nrite

A na-ele nke a anya dị ka ihe gbawara ala n'ihi n'eziokwu, n'ihe karịrị afọ iri tupu nkwupụta nke echiche queer, ọ rụrụ ụka na nwoke na nwanyị, dị ka ewuru na okwu nwanyị nke Western, adịghị adị n'Afrịka tupu ndị ọchịchị ndị ọcha amalite inye nghọta dị egwu banyere ọdịiche dị n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị
Akwụkwọ ya nke echiche ederede, Reinventing Africa, pụtara n'afọ 1998
E wepụtara ihe ndị sitere n'ọrụ ya na akụkọ ọdịnala (1992)
Dịka onye na-ede uri, ọ sonyere na Festac '77, Second World Black na African Festival of Arts and Culture, nchịkọta afọ 1985 ya, Passion Waves, ka a họpụtara maka Nrite Commonwealth Poetry
O ritere ihe nrite Flora Nwapa Society Award maka akwụkwọ abụ ụrị nke afọ 2006,bụ Circles of Love

Ọ nọ na kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke Center for Democracy and Development, otu nzukọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-achọ ịkwalite ụkpụrụ nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, udo na ikike ụmụ mmadụ n'Afrịka, ọkachasị na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka

A na-akwanyere Amadiume ugwu maka ọrụ ịsụ ụzọ ya n'okwu gbasara nwanyị 'ọrụ ya nyere nnukwu onyinye n'ụzọ ọhụrụ iche echiche gbasara mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị, ajụjụ gbasara ike, na ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na akụkọ na omenaala'
Kosiladị, ọ dọtara nkatọ maka 'echiche ya na nwanyị na-enye udo na ịhụnanya'

81667; 320000O nwere mpaghara nke km² narị ise na iri abụọ na otu nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ narị puku isii na iri itoolu na asatọ na narị asato na iri atọ na asaa nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ịsị n'isi n'afọ 2006 'Adebami-Tella'

Ifo na Lagos dị nso site na ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè nke a rụchara n'afọ 1899, nke dị kilomita iri asaa na asaa ( mi iri anọ na asatọ)
Okporo ụzọ jikọtara ya na Lagos tinyere Abeokuta, Ilaro, Shagamu, Itori, na Ketou
Asụsụ bụ isi asụsụ Ifo bụ asụsụ Egba

Obodo ukwu ndị dị nso gụnyere Igbusi, Ilepa, Oniale, Pakoto, Kajola, Seriki, Coker, Ibogun, Matogun, Lambe, Alagbole, Ajuwon na Akute, ha niile mejupụtara mpaghara mmepe nke ha na ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala ha (ndị Oba na ndị Baale)
Mpaghara ndị a jikọrọ ọnụ mejupụta Ifo Division
Ngalaba Ifo nwere nnukwu ụlọ ogbe ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta
Obodo Ifo n'onwe ya bụ ebe e nwere ngalaba nke ọtụtụ ụlọ akụ Naijiria
Ifo bụ ahịa na-eto ngwa ngwa nke obodo Ogun, n'ihi ntunye nke mmụba nke ndị mmadụ si n'obodo ndị gbara Ifo gburugburu bụ ndi nwere mmasị site na ịdị nso obodo ahụ na Ogun
Ndị bi na Ifo gụnyere ndị na-ekpe ọtụtụ okpukpe, gụnyere Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, Islam, na ofufe ọdịnala
N'ime Ifo dị ka nnukwu obodo, e nwere ihe karịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ọha na eze ise na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị iri
E nwekwara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọra akara, ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị, na ụlọ akwụkwọ ogo dị elu abụọ abụọ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ mpaghara gụnyere

Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara maka mmeri AMAA maka Best Young and Promising Actor na ihe nkiri O-Town
A mụrụ Ennada na Abia State, Naijirịa mana a zụlitere ya na Lagos
Ọ gụrụ sayensị kọmputa na Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo ebe ọ nwetara BSc ya

Ifufe ọdịda anyanwụ bụ ifufe nké na-esi n'ébé ọdịda anyanwụ ma na-efe n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ
N'ọdịnala ndị Europe, a na-ewère ya dị ka nke kachasị mfe na nke kachasị mmá n'ime ifufe ndị na-aga n'ihu

N'akụkọ ifo ndị Gris, Zephyrus bụ ónyé na-anọchite ányá ifufe ọdịda anyanwụ na ónyé na-eweta ógè opupu ihe ubi na ikuku ógè okpomọkụ; ónyé Rom ya bụ Favonius (ya mèrè adjective favonian, nke metụtara ifufe ọdịd anyanwụ)
N'akụkọ ifo ndị Ijipt, Ḥutchai bụ chi nke ifufe ọdịda anyanwụ
E gosipụtara ya dị ka nwoke nwéré isi agwọ

Geoffrey Chaucer dere banyéré 'swete breth' nke Zephyrus, a pụkwara ịkpọ ikuku dị nro, nke dị nro dị ka zephyr, dịka na Cymbeline (IV, ii) nké William Shakespeare 'Ha dị ka ndị dị nro / Dị ka zephyrs na-afụ n'okpuru violet, / Ọ bụghị ịkwagharị isi ya dị ụtọ
N'ọdịnala ndị Iroquois, Panther na-eweta 'ikuku ọdịda anyanwụ', nkè na-adịghị mmá ma dị egwu
Enwere ike ịmara ifufe ọdịda anyanwụ dị ka zephyr
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Italic, Ponente bụ ifufe ọdịda anyanwụ na onyinyo nke ógè opupu ihe ubi na mbido ógè okpomọkụ; ifufe ya na-adịkarị jụụ ma na-ekpo ọkụ ma dị nro; yiri ya na Rom bụ Favonius

Ifufe anabatic, site na Greek anabatos, ókwú nkè anabainein nke pụtara 'ịga n'elu', bụ ifufe na-ekpo ọkụ nké na-ebugharị ugwu ma ọ bụ akụkụ ugwu, nké na-eme ka okpomọkụ nké ndagwurugwu ahụ site na insolation
A makwaara ya dị ka mmiri na-asọ n'elu ugwu
Ifufe ndị a na-emekarị n'ehihie n'oge ihu igwe dị jụụ
Anyanwụ ga-eme ka ugwu ma ọ bụ ugwu dị elu na-ekpo ọkụ nké na-eme ka ikuku dị n'elu ya dị ọkụ
Mmiri dị n'ebe dị elu n'elu ndagwurugwu ma ọ bụ ala dị larịị anaghị ekpo ọkụ nkè ukwuu n'ihi ébé dị anya site n'ala n'okpuru ya
Enwèrè ike ime ka mmetụta ahụ dịkwuo mma ma ọ bụrụ na ugwu kpuchiri ala dị n'okpuru ma si otú a nweta obere okpomọkụ
Mmiri dị n'elu ugwu ahụ dị ọkụ ugbu a karịa ikuku dị n'otu elu gbụrụ-gbúrụ ya ma ga-arịgo site na convection
Nke a na-emepụta mpaghara nrụgide dị ala nke ikuku dị na ala nke ndagwurugwu na-aga, na-akpata ifufe
Ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị màkà ikuku na-esi n'elu ugwu bụrụ ibu na-arịgo n'ebe dị elu ébé ọ na-ajụ oyi adiabatically rụọ n'okpuru ebe igirigi ya ma mepụta igwe ojii cumulus
Ndị a nwèrè ike ime ka mmiri ozuzo ma ọ bụ ọbụna égbè eluigwe
Ifufe Anabatic bàrà uru karịsịa màkà ndị na-anya ụgbọelu na-efe efe nwèrè ike iji ha mee ka elu ụgbọelu ahụ dịkwuo elu
Ifufe Anabatic nwèrè ike imerụ ọsọ kachasị elu nke ndị na-agba ịnyịnya ígwè

N'aka nke ọzọ, ifufe katabatic bụ ifufe na-agbadata, nkè a na-emepụta ugboro ugboro n'abalị site na mmetụta dị íchè, ikuku dị nso n'ala na-efunahụ ya okpomọkụ ngwá ngwá karịa ikuku na ịdị elu yiri nkè ahụ n'elu ala dị ala
A na-emepụta ifufe monsoon n'otu ákà ahụ, mana na mpaghara kọntinent na ógè okirikiri
A skipping tornado bụ usoro tornado (ma ọ bụ usoro tornados) nke nwéré ụzọ mmebi na-aga n'ihu
E nwèrè ọtụtụ ihe nwéré ike ibute ihe omume a
N'akụkọ ihe méré eme, ịwụli elu na-ezo aka na nkwụsịtụ n'ụzọ mmebi nke ihe a na-ewere dị ka otu ụzọ dị ogologo
Site na nchọpụta nke cyclic tornadogenesis na ụfọdụ supercell égbè eluigwe, a mụtara na tornadoes na-esote na-emepụta na mesocyclones ọhụrụ na usoro nke tornadoes a na-akpọ ezinụlọ tornado

Karịsịa mgbè ajọ ifufe na-amalite, enwèrè ike inwe obere oghere na mmebi n'ihi na mgbasa ahụ na-akwụsịtụ n'elu ma ọ bụ na-adịghị ike iji kpatara mmebi ọbụlagodi na nné na nnà mesocyclone (na ikekwe mgbasa tornadic n'elu) na-aga n'ihu na nke a bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị, mànà ọ bụghị mgbè niile, a na-ewere ya dị ka otu ajọ ifufe
N'ọnọdụ ndị a, ọ bụ naanị ajọ ifufe na-esite na mesocyclones ọhụrụ (ya bụ, usoro tornadogenesis ọhụrụ na igwe ojii mgbidi ọhụrụ) ka a na-agụ dị ka ajọ ifufe dị iche
Tupu a mata na tornadoes nwèrè ike ịbụ multivortex, ihe omume nke subvortices mekwara mgbagwoju anya ma n'ogé tornado na màkà nyocha ụzọ mmebi

Ụdị ụfọdụ nke tornadoes, ọzọ karịsịa na usoro nke mmepụta tupu ha emebie ikuku ha, nwèrè ike ịbụ tornadoes multivortex na subvortices gbasasịrị na ikuku na-emebi n'ime oghere dị n'ime nnukwu mgbasa, nke nwéré ike inye ọdịdị nke ịwụli elu
Ifufe ugwu, ifufe oghéré ma ọ bụ oghéré na-agafe bụ ifufe dị n'ógbè na-efe site na oghéré dị n'etiti ugwu
Ifufe oghéré bụ ifufe dị ala ma nwee ike ijikọta ya na ifufe siri ike nke ọkpọ iri abụọ ruo iri anọ na mgbe ụfọdụ na-agafe ọkpọ iri ise
Ifufe na-adịkarị ike na nso nke ụzọ ọpụpụ
Ihe atụ na-agụnye ifufe na-efe n'elu mmiri na-agafe Strait of Gibraltar nke a na-akpọ Levanter otu n'ime ifufe kachasị ike na mpaghara a

Ifufe yiri nké a na-eme na oghere ndị ọzọ dị n'ugwu, dị ka tehuantepecer na jochwinde, na ogologo ọwa, dị ka Strait of Juan de Fuca n'etiti Ugwu Olympic nkè Washington na Vancouver Island, British Columbia, Hinlopen Strait dị nso na Spitsbergen
Na Columbia River Gorge na ókèala Washington na Oregon, oké ikuku dị elu emeela ka etinye ugbo ikuku, na nnukwu ikuku na-efe n'osimiri Columbia
Ihe atụ ọzọ bụ ifufe Koshava na Serbia nké na-efe n'akụkụ Osimiri Danube
Ugwu ndịda Carpathian na Ugwu Balkan na-ebugharị mmiri na-abanye n'ime ọdọ mmiri Danube na Romania na ụgbọ elu na-apụ na Iron Gates a maara dị ka ifufe Koshava
Isi njirimara nké ifufe Koshava bụ ọsọ ifufe ya dị elu, ntụziaka ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ, nnọgidesi ike, na ụfụfụ
N'ozuzu, ifufe na-efe n'okporo ụzọ na-emetụta ihu igwe mpaghara (n'ebe ndịda France), yana ahịhịa
Ha bụkwa ndị na-ebute ọkụ ọkụ na mpaghara ndị ahụ metụtara
Mmiri na-esi na ya apụta nwere ike iru ihe karịrị otu narị kilomita kwa elekere ma kpatara mmebi ihe onwunwe
Ifunanya Debbie 'Ify' Ibekwe (amuru na 5 Oktoba afọ 1989) bu nwaafọ Naijiria amuru ya na amerịka na aturu ndi Virtus Eirene Ragusa na Naijiria D'Tigresss basketball
A họpụtara Ibekwe na agba nke abụọ nke WNBA Draft 2011 (nke iri abụọ na anọ) site na Seattle Storm
Iga Idunganran bụ ebe obibi nke Oba nke Lagos, nke dị na Lagos Island
Ọ bụkwa ihe na-adọrọ mmasị ndị njem nleharianya
Malite na narị afọ nke iri na ise, ailandi Lagos bụ nke onye mbụ bi n'àgwàetiti ahụ bụ Chief Aromire nwe, onye bụ onye isi Ile-Ife, onye jiri ya mee ihe dị ka ebe ịkụ azụ na ugbo ose
E wuru obí eze oge ochie ahụ na afọ 1670 maka Oba Gabaro (1669-1760)
Ndị Portuguese mechara rụzigharịa ya, na ihe ndị e ji mezie ya, ọkachasị tiles nke esibPortugal weta
Ọ bụ Praịm Minista Naịjirịa, Sir Abubakar Tafawa Balewa, rụchara akụkụ nke oge a ma nyefe ya ịba ọrụ na ọnwa mbụ nke Ọktoba afọ 1960

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, eze Adeniji Adele nke abụọ na Adeyinka Oyekan nke abụọ mepụtara ya, ọ gara n'ihu na afọ 2007 na 2008 site n'aka eze nke ugbu a, Akiolu, na njikọ aka nke gọọmentị Steeti Lagos na mesuom Naịjirịa
Iga Idunganran nọrọ ọnọdụ dị ka ebe nchịkwa, ahịa agwaetiti ahụ na ebe ememme Eyo
IGA, nke sitere n'asụsụ Oyo / Ife Yoruba GAA nke pụtara ụlọ eze ma ọbu Obi eze akpọrọ Royal Home ma ọ bụ Palace na bekee, IDUN pụtara ala, ebe ma ọ bụ ụda nke ebe IGANRAN bụ okwu Yoruba maka ose
Iga Idunganran ya mere na-asụgharị 'obí eze e wuru n'ugbo ose', ebe Aromire jiri ala ahụ mepụta n'oge gara aga dị ka ugbo ya
A na-eli ndị eze niile nke Lagos tupu Oba Akitoye na Obodo Benin
Eze Akitoye bụ Eze mbụ nke Lagos ka e liri n'ime obí eze nke oge a
A na-eli ndị eze niile sochirinụ ma e wezụga Sanusi Olusi na Kosoko na Iga Idunganran
E nwere ọtụtụ ebe ofufe arusi nke ndi orisha n'obí eze
Ndị a gụnyere
Enwere ike ịchọta Esu (nke a na-akpọ Éshu) n'ọnụ ụzọ mbata nke obí eze
Esi Benin wee weta Èsù
A makwaara ya n'ọtụtụ aha ndị ọzọ, nke a ma ama bụ ekwensu
Oba na ndị isi ya kpere ekpere n'ụlọ ofufe agwụ a iji gbochie ihe ize ndụ na Lagos (ma mesịa na Naịjirịa n'ozuzu) n'oge gara aga
Ha na-ekpegakwa ekpere n'ebe ahụ tupu ha ahapụ obí eze maka ọrụ nzuzo ma ọ bụ nke gọọmentị iji gbochie ihe ọjọọ
Ọzọkwa, tupu eze apụọ, O kwesịrị iga ụlọ ofufe a iji nata ụsa otú njem ya ga-esi bụrụ
Ajụjụ ndị dị ka otu njem ahụ ga-adị mma ma ọ dị mma Oba ịmalite njem dị otú ahụ be ihe ana aga-ajụkarị
Ogun bụ chi nke ígwè
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị n'ime obí eze n'onwe ya, e nwere obere ụlọ e wuru maka ịbanye ozugbo n'ogige ahụ
Nnukwu ụlọ nsọ ahụ dị na mpụga mgbidi dị ugbu a nke obí eze, ọ bụ ezie na ọ ka nọ n'okpuru ikike ya
O nwere onye ụkọchukwu nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ ya kwa ụbọchị

A na-eme emume na ekpere pụrụ iche kwa ụbọchị iri na isii n'obí eze, ọ na-abụkarị Araba nke Lagos n'ime ya, Chief Ajanaku, ọ bụ ezie na Oba na-eji ndị ụkọchukwu ọdịnala ndị ọzọ na ndị ụkọchị nwanyị eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ dabere na ihe kacha mkpa na oge, na ike ime mmụọ nke ndị dị otú ahụ

Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị dị mkpa maka ime emume ndị a bụ aki ilu, oji, Ọsọ Ojii, mmanụ nkwụ, mmanya ọkụ ma ọ bụ ihe ọ bụla dị mfe, ọkụkọ, nduru, ewu ma ọ bụ ebule na ihe ọ bụla ọzọ Ifa oracle nwere ike inye iwu, na-owuwe ndụ mmadụ
Mgbe ngagharị iwe END SARS nke afọ 2020 gasịrị, e zuuru Iga Idungaran na Oba nke Lagos, Rilwan Akiolu boro ndị ohi ebubo na ha na-zuoro nde dola abụọ na puku naira iri na asaa na obí ya
Igáláà bụ asụsụ Yoruboid, nke ndị agbụrụ Igala nke Naijiria na-asụ
N'afọ 1989, e mere atụmatụ na mmadụ 800,000 kwuru okwu Igala, ọkachasị na Kogi Steeti, ọ bụ ezi ya na atụmatụ dị ugbu a na-etinye ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asụ Igala n'elu nde abụọ
Asụsụ ndị a gụnyere Idah, Imane, Ankpa, Dekina, Ogugu, Ibaji, na Ife
Ndị Idoma na ndị Bassa na-eji Igala eme ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Asụsụ Igala, yana omenala na ọdịnala Igala, emetụtala asụsụ na ọdịbendị ndị ọzọ gburugburu njikọ nke osimiri Niger na Benue
IGANDO bụ obodo dị na mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo Alimosho nke Lagos Steeti na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjịrịa
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2016, ndị a na-enyo enyo na ha bụ ndị agha Niger Delta wakporo obodo ahụ, gbuo ọtụtụ mmadụ ma bibie ihe onwunwe
Alimosho General Hospital dị n'ebe ahụ
The igba bụ tom-tom nke nwere elu na-akụ ihe nke otu dayameta dị nso dị ka bongo
Ofu igba nwere ike ịdị obere ka sentimita asaa, ma ọ bụ ogologo dị ka ụkwụ atọ
N'ọdịnala, a na-eji aka na-akụ igba mkpụkpọ dị omimi karị, ebe a na-eji osisi gbagọrọ agbagọ agba nke dị mkpụmkpụ
N'ime mkpokọta, ụgba ndị a na-ebutekarị ụzọ, ndị na-akụ ọkpọ na-ekwukwa okwu
Site n'ịkụnye n'ọgbatị nke na-adaba gburugburu akpụkpọ ahụ, onye ọkpụkpọ na-eme ka akpụkpọ anụ ahụ sie ike (nke a na-emekarị site na antelope ) iji nweta ụda na ụda achọrọ

Abyss Box bụ arịa nwéré lita 16 (35 gal; 42 ) nkè mmiri na nrụgide dị elu nke iri na asatọ megapascals iji mepụta gburugburu ebe obibi dị n'okpuru mmiri nkè anụmanụ bathyal na-ebi na ihe dị ka otu puku mita na narị asatọ (5,900 ) n'okpuru elu
A na-egosi ya na Oceanopolis aquarium na Brest, France
Ọ bụ ónyé nchọpụta French bụ Bruce Shillito si Mahadum Pierre na Marie Curie dị na Paris mepụtara ya
Ngwá ọrụ niile na-ejigide nrụgide dị oke n'ime Abyss Box dị kilogram narị isii (1,300 )
Ngwaọrụ ahụ na-eme ka ihe ndị bi n'ime ala dị ndụ ka e wee nwee ike ịmụ ha, ọkachasị maka mgbanwe ha na okpomọkụ okpomọkụ nke oké osimiri

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Abyss Box nwèrè naanị ụdị anụmanụ ndị dị omimi n'oké osimiri gụnyere oke mmiri miri emi, Bythograea thermydron na prawn dị omimi, Pandalus borealis, nke bụ ụfọdụ n'ime ụdị ndị siri ike nwéré ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé ndị dara ada
Igbere bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria

Nkà mmụta ihe ochie nke Igbo-Ukwu kpughere ihe ndị e ji ọla kọpa dị na narị afọ nke itoolu AD bụ ndị Isiah Anozie chọtara na mbụ n'afọ 1939 ka ọ na-egwu olulu mmiri n'ogige ya dị n'Igbo-Ukwu, obodo Igbo dị na steeti Anambra, Nigeria

N'ihi nchọpụta ndị a, e gwupụtara ebe ihe ochie atọ na 1959 na 1964 site na Charles Thurstan Shaw bụ nke kpughere ihe karịrị 700 ihe dị elu nke ọla kọpa, bronze na ígwè, yana ihe dị ka iko 165000, carnelian na nkume beads, ite, textiles
na ọdụm
Ha bụ ihe ọla kọpa kacha ochie mara na West Africa ma arụpụtara ya ọtụtụ narị afọ tupu ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-emepụta ọla dị ka nke Ife na Benin pụta
Bronze ndị ahụ gụnyere ọtụtụ arịa emume, pendants, okpueze, epekele obi, ihe ịchọ mma mkpara, mma agha, na aka ijiji

Peter Garlake atụnyere bronze ukwu Igbo 'na ọla kacha mma nke rococo Europe ma ọ bụ nke Carl Faberge,' na William Buller Fagg na-ekwu na e kere ha na 'rococo dị ịtụnanya fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ Faberge ụdị omume ọma' Frank Willett na-ekwu na igbo ukwu bronze na-egosi ọkọlọtọ nke yiri nke Benvenuto Cellini guzobere narị afọ ise ka e mesịrị na Europe
Denis Williams kpọrọ ha 'mgbawa mara mma na-enweghị ihe mbụ ma ọ bụ okwu
Otú ihe ha hụrụ bụ ite mmịrị a dosara na eriri e kere eke na usoro Hugh Honor na John Fleming kọwara dika
A omume ọma nke cire Perdue (waxii furu efu) nkanye

Ya mara imewe na nụchara anụcha nkowa Peter Garlake compares the Igbo-Ukwu bronzes 'to the finest jewelry of rococo Europe or of Carl Faberge,' and William Buller Fagg states they were created with 'a strange rococo almost Faberge type virtuosity' Frank Willett says that the Igbo-Ukwu bronzes portray a standard that is comparable to that established by Benvenuto Cellini five hundred years later in Europe

Denis Williams calls them 'an exquisite explosion without antecedent or issue' One of the objects found, a water pot set in a mesh of simulated rope is described by Hugh Honour and John Fleming as Àtụ BlockquoteỌkachamara nka dị elu na enweghị ihe atụ ama ama nke bronze Igbo-Ukwu mere ka a na-eche na mbụ n'obodo agụmakwụkwọ na ọ ga-abụrịrị na e mebere ha ka ndị Europe kpakọrịtachara na ndị njem ụgbọ mmiri
Agbanyeghị nyocha na nyocha isotope egosila na isi mmalite ọla ndị ahụ sitere na mpaghara yana mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị redio ekwenyela na narị afọ nke 9, ogologo oge tupu mmekọrịta mbụ na Europe

Ihe ndị Igbo-Ukwu mere kagburu echiche ndị mgbe ochie na-eche na ọrụ nka na nka mara mma nwere ike ịmalite naanị na mpaghara Europe, ma ọ bụ na a pụghị imepụta ha n'ime obodo na- enweghị isi ma ọ bụ na-eme ihe n'otu n'otu
dika nke ndi Igbo
Achọtala ụfọdụ n'ime ugegbe na bead carnelian na-emepụta na Old Cairo na ogbako nke Fustat wee gosi na usoro ahia ogologo oge sitere na Igbo Ukwu ruo n'oge Byzantine Egypt dị
Egwupụtala ebe ihe mgbe ochie nwere igwe na-esi agbaze n'afọ 2000 BC na Lejja na 750 BC na Opi, ma na mpaghara Nsukka dị ihe dịka 100 Kilomita ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Igbo-Ukwu
Nnyocha e mere na-esote bụ iji gosi na ọ mehiere
Afọ iri abụọ ka e mesịrị, na 1959 na ọzọ na 1964 Thurstan Shaw na ndị otu ya gwupụtara saịtị atọ n'akụkụ ihe mbụ chọtara maka ngalaba oge ochie nke Naijiria na emesịa maka Mahadum Ibadan
Ihe ndị mgbe ochie e gwupụtara n’ala gosiri ọtụtụ narị arịa ọla kọpa na ọla ọla nakwa mma agha ígwè, isi ube ígwè, agụba ígwè na ihe ndị ọzọ e depụtara na narị afọ iri gara aga
N'ụzọ doro anya, ndị na-arụ ọrụ ígwè n'oge ochie Igbo-Ukwu amachaghị maka usoro a na-ejikarị eme waya, ịgbanye waya ma ọ bụ ịwa mmiri nke na-egosi mmepe onwe ya na ikewapụ omenala ọrụ ha ogologo oge
Ya mere, ọ na-agbagwoju anya na ha nwere ike ịmepụta ihe ndị nwere nkọwa dị mma nke na ha na-egosi, dịka ọmụmaatụ ụmụ ahụhụ ndị dị ka ha dara n'elu
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe ndị a yiri ka a kpụrụ akpụ ma ọ bụ resịrị ya na ihe ndị ahụ, a tụbara ha n'otu akụkụ

The Grove Encyclopedia of Materials and Techniques in Art na -akọwa ha dị ka 'otu n'ime bronze ndị a rụpụtara nke ọma na nke a rụpụtara nke ọma' Ọ bụ ezie na a na-eji usoro nkedo wax furu efu mepụta ọla, ma eleghị anya, a na-eji latex eme ihe n'Igbo-Ukwu kama iji beeswax kọwaa otú ndị na-ese ihe si nwee ike ịmepụta nkọwa dị mma na nke dị n'elu

Ụfọdụ usoro ndị a na-eji oge ochie na-eji ya eme ihe amabeghị ka e jiri ya mee ihe n'èzí Igbo-Ukwu dị ka imepụta ihe mgbagwoju anya na nkebi nke akụkụ dị iche iche emesịa na-ejikọta ọnụ site na brazing ma ọ bụ site na nkedo njikọ njikọ iji sonyere ha

Otú ọ dị mgbagwoju anya nke ụfọdụ ihe ndị Igbo-Ukwu ebutela nnukwu esemokwu n'etiti ndị ọkachamara n'ịgba ígwè dị iche iche na arụmụka gbasara usoro mmepụta ihe n'ezie nke bụ ihe akaebe maka ọrụ dị egwu nke tolitere ma dị mgbagwoju anya nke ndị omenkà oge ochie
Ngwakọta nke ọla ndị a na-eji na-emepụta bronze bụ ihe pụrụ iche, nke nwere ọlaọcha dị elu na-enweghị atụ ma dị iche na alloys eji na Europe, Mediterranean ma ọ bụ ebe ọla ọla ndị ọzọ nke Africa
Ebe sitere na ọla ndị e ji amịpụta ọla kọpa dị ka ogbunigwe ochie dị n’Abakiliki dị ihe dị ka otu narị kilomita site n’Igbo-Ukwu

Igbo-Ukwu (Bekee Great Igbo) bụ obodo dị na steeti Anambra nke dị na ndịda etiti obodo Naijiria
Obodo ahụ nwere akụkụ atọ bụ Obiuno, Ngo, na Ihite (agglomeration nke 4 quarters) nwere ọtụtụ obodo n'ime nkeji iri na isii na ngalaba nchịkwa iri atọ na isii (36)
Amichi, Isuofia, Ikenga na ụfọdụ obodo ndị ọzọ

Igbo-Ukwu bụ ebe ama ama maka ebe nchọcha ihe mgbe ochie atọ, ebe ngwungwu achọpụtala ihe ọla kọpa sitere n'omenala ọla na-arụ ọrụ ọla kọpa nke malitere na narị afọ nke itoolu AD, narị afọ tupu ọla ndị ọzọ ama ama na mpaghara ahụ
Nke mbụ, nke a na-akpọ Igbo Isaiah, bụ nke Isaiah Anozie, onye obodo nta, chọpụtara na 1938, onye chọtara ọrụ ọla nchara mgbe ọ na-egwu n'akụkụ ụlọ ya
Ihe nchara ise sitere na nchọpụta mbụ dị ugbu a na nchịkọta British Museum
Ha na-agụnye obere mkpara, isi ebule, nnukwu manilla, arịa dị mgbagwoju anya na obere ihe dị n'ụdị isi obodo nwere akara scarification (ichi) n'ihu
Ogwugwu ihe mgbe ochie nke Thurstan Shaw mere n'afọ 1959 n'ihi arịrịọ gọọmenti Naijiria mere ka a chọta ebe abụọ ọzọ bụ Igbo Richard na Igbo Jona, bụ ndị nwere ogbe ochie
E mechakwara gwupụtakwara ihe ndị a
Ihe ndị e ji emepụta ihe na-agụnye ọla, ceramik, ozu e ji ihe e ji emepụta ihe chọọ mma, na ọtụtụ ihe ọla kọpa, ọla kọpa, na ígwè dị iche iche
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị a nwere ihe ndị na-egosi na usoro ịzụ ahịa dị anya na-erute Ijipt
Radiocarbon dating debere saịtị ndị ahụ na 850 AD, nke ga-eme ka ọdịbendị Igbo-Ukwu bụrụ ihe atụ mbụ a maara nke ọla nchara na mpaghara ahụ
Ndị omenkà ahụ na-arụ ọrụ ọtụtụ narị afọ tupu ndị mere ọla nchara Ife a ma ama
Ebe ndị e gwupụtara ihe n'ala na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria nwere njikọ na Nri-Igbo
Ebe atọ ahụ gụnyere Igbo Isaiah (ụlọ nsọ), Igbo Richard (ebe olili ozu), na Igbo Jonah (ebe zoro ezo)

Ihe ndị a chọtara na saịtị ndị a egosiwo na site na narị afọ nke 9 AD, ndị Igbo-Ukwu guzobere usoro okpukpe dị mgbagwoju anya na akụ na ụba dabere na ọrụ ugbo na azụmahịa na ndị Afrịka ndị ọzọ ruo na ndagwurugwu Naịl
Alice Apley dere banyere ọrụ ahụ
'Ndị bi na Igbo-Ukwu nwere nkà na-arụ ọrụ ígwè nke na-aga n'ihu na mmalite narị afọ nke itoolu
E gwupụtara ebe atọ, na-ekpughe ọtụtụ narị arịa ememe na regalia castings nke ọla nchara ma ọ bụ ọla nchara na-eduga nke so n'ime ọla nchara kachasị mma na nke a rụzuru
Ndị Igbo-Ukwu (nke a maara na mbụ dị ka Igbo-Nkwo), ndị nna nna nke ndị Igbo nke oge a, bụ ndị mbụ na-akpụ ọla kọpa na alloys ya na West Africa, na-arụ ọrụ ígwè site na ịpị, ịgbagọ, ịtụgharị, na ịkpụ
O yikarịrị ka ha so n'etiti ndị mbụ nke ndị West Africa iji usoro nchara furu efu mee ihe na mmepụta nke ihe ọkpụkpụ ọla nchara

N'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya, ihe akaebe na-egosi na ọrụ ha na-arụ ọrụ na ígwè dị obere na ndị Igbo na-arụpụta ihe amaghị usoro ndị dị ka ibuli elu, solderingartifact nke igbo ukwuriveting, na imepụta wired, ọ bụ ezie na a na-eji usoro ndị a eme ihe n'ebe ndị ọzọ na kọntinent ahụ

Igbo Landing (Nwutù ndi Ìgbò ǹke ha nà è dezikwa kà Ibo Landing, Ebo Landing, mà ọ̀ bụ̀ Ebos Landing) bụ ebe ị̀ta nà okwu dị nà òkòlò Dunbar nà àgwà St
Simon, ọnụmara Glynn, Giọjia nà Njikọ̀taọ̀hà
Ọ bụ̀ ebe oke nkwụrụụ̀dọ̀ ndị Ìgbò ha gbàrà ohù kwụ̀rụ̀ nà afọ̀ 1803, ǹke okwu ya bụ̀ nà ndị Ìgbò â ha gbàrà ohù nazọ̀rọ̀ okeụgbọ ohù ǹke buru ha ga àlà Njikọ̀taọ̀hà
Ndi Ìgbò â nụpụ̀rụ̀ isi, jụ nà ndị butere ha g'ịgbara ha ohù nke ha gị bụ̀ ọnụ rụ ọrụ nà àbọ
Ịhẹ òmùme â bàrà urù kà akụkọ pụzịrị kà mmara àtụ̀ ọma ǹke ndị ndị Eluàlà-Àlàn'àba jị̀kwà à kọta akụkọ ifo mà ị de ị̀tà ndere ǹke dị ha mkpà
Nà ọnwaìse afọ̀ 1803, ndị nkère ǹkè nchị Njikọ̀taọ̀hà gbàzìrì ego tụdàrà ndi Eluàlà ǹkè ha nànwụ̀rụ̀, juru ụgbọ ohù, ǹkè ndị sala okenlapụ̀, nà Savannah nà ihì ị mare ha nà ahia ohù ǹkè ama ǹso
Soro nà ndịǹfega ụgbọ ahụ̀ bụ̀ ọ̀tụtụ ndị ìgbò h'e jìdèrè, ǹkè mbà sị ịhe bụrụ Naijiria taà
Ndị n'e so àbọ nà ndị n'a gbaraohù mà ndị Ìgbò kà ndị njideònwesi ike na ndị jụpụ̀rụ̀ mgbaraohù njionye na ike
Ndị Ìgbò â zuru 75 bụ̀ ndị ọ̀gwarame ǹke John Couper nà Thomas Spalding kwụ̀rụ̀ $100 nà isi ha otù otù ịzụ ha màkà ị rụ nà mmara aka ike nà àbọ ha dị na àgwà St
Simon
