Irene Browne (na abalị iri abụo na anọ na ọnwa asaá na afo 1896 - 24 Julaị 1965) bụ ihe nkiri Bekee na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwú pụtara na egwuregwu na egwu gụnyere Mba, Mba, Nanette
Mgbe e mesịrị na ọrụ ya, ọ bịara na-akpakọrịta karịsịa na ọrụ nke Noël Coward ma mee ihe na fim
A mụrụ Irene Browne na London, England
Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na afọ 1910 dị ka onye ịgba egwu na ụlọ ọrụ HB Irving wee hichaa n'oge na-adịghị anya n'ọrụ dị egwu, pụtara na ihe nkiri J
Comyns Carr nke Dr Jekyll na Mr Hyde n'afọ sochiri ya azu
Ruo afọ atọ, ọ mere ihe n'Australia ( The Times mejọrọ ya maka Australian na afọ1915)
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Lọndọn, Browne gbara egwu, na aha aha My Lady Frayle na Courtice Pounds na 1916
Ọ pụtara na revue n'akụkụ Beatrice Lillie na 1922, ebe Basil Dean hụrụ ya ma tinye ya na mgbawe nke Arthur Wing Pinero 's The Gay Lord Quex na Theater Royal, Drury Lane na George Grossmith Jr
nke 'o were nnukwu ụlọ were'
Na 1925, ọ pụtara na mbụ London mmepụta nke No, Mba, Nanette ('Nwagboho Irene Browne glitters kasị dị ize ndụ')
N'oge na-adịghị, ọ gara njem afọ abụọ na America
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Britain, Browne gbara egwu na Noël Coward 's Cavalcade (1931) na Drury Lane yana na mmegharị ihe nkiri Hollywood afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị

Ọ gara n'ihu na-ejikọta ya na Coward, na-eke ọrụ na egwu egwu ya na mkparịta ụka mkparịta ụka (1934), After the Ball (1954) na The Girl Who came to Supper (1963), wee pụta na Blithe Spirit na Relative Values n'oge ogologo West End na-agba ọsọ
Browne mekwara na NC Hunter's ogologo na-agba ọsọ Waters of the Moon (na-arụ ọrụ nke Edith Evans kere), na-arụkọ ọrụ na Sybil Thorndike
Ọ pụtakwara na egwuregwu nke Ivor Novello, Dodie Smith, William Wycherley na St
John Hankin
Browne rụkwara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Hollywood
Browne nwụrụ na London maka ọrịa kansa na 1965 mgbe ọ dị afọ 69

Charnley bu ụzọ mee akara ya na ngalaba ndị azụmaahịa Afrịka site n'Ị bụ onye bụ ọnọnetiti na-ekwuchita okwu maka National Union of Mineworkers nke South Africa ebe ọ nọrọ afọ iri na atọ na-ahazi ngalaba dị iche iche nke ọrụ ndị otu ahụ

Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ nnukwu bu MTN in nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta kachasị ukwuu n'AfricaN'okpuru idu ndú ya, ọtụtụ mba Afrịka na Middle East (gụnyere Naịjirịa na Iran) jikọtara n'okpuru ikukunetwọk MTN
Charnley bụ onye guzobere National Empowerment Consortium nke mejupụtara 50% ndị nwe ụlọ ọrụ ojii na 50% ndị ọrụ ojii Africa
Ha mechara nwee 35% nke Johnnic Holdings (nke a na-akpọ Johnnic Communications ugbu a)
Charnley hapụrụ MTN na ọnọdụ esemokwu mana O nweruru ṅdè dọla otu narị na iri ise mgbe ọ n'apụ

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2000, e nyere ya nturu ugo onye ọchụnta ego nke Afọ ahụ maka enyemaka dị ịrịba ama o nyere iji wegota Johnnic site n'obere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe gaa n'òtù mgbasa ozi nkwukọrịta nke dị n'ụdị mgbe ahụ
N'oge ọ nọ na Johnnic (site na 1996 ruo na ngwụcha afọ 2000) ndị mba South Africa dị puku iri atọ na abụọ n'ọnụ ọgụ na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla zụụrụ òkè(shares) na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Òtútó ego ndi a ka afọ atọ gasịrị meziri ka ha bụrụ ndị nwetakwara ego ha òkpùkpù anọ karịa ka ha si tinye ya
Ihe nturu ugo ọzọ mere ka Charnley bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego iri ise mbụ kachasị elu ma apụọ na mba America

Charnley bụ onye isi oche nke Smile Telecoms Holdings Ltd ugbu a, otu ụlọ ọrụ zuru mba Afrika ọnụ nke isi ụlọ ọrụ ha dị na Mauritius, ma ha nọ ọrụ na Naijiria, Tanzania, Uganda, Democratic Republic of the Congo na South Africa
Forbes debara aha ya n'etiti 'Ndị inyom iri ise kachasị ike n'Africa' n'afọ 2020
Irene Greenwood AM (9 Disemba 1898 14 Eprel 1992) bụ onye mgbasa ozi redio Australia na onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na'ahụ maka udo
Amụrụ Greenwood na Albany, Western Australia n'ụbọchị 9 Disemba 1898
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ nke Henry Driver na Mary Ann Driver née Hicken
Greenwood gara Albany State School n'etiti afo1905 ruo afo 1912 na Perth Modern School n'agbata 1913 na 1917
Ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ nka na Mahadum nke Western Australia
Ọkwọ ụgbọala rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na Ngalaba Ọrụ Ugbo n'etiti afọ 1918 ruo afọ
1920 ebe ọ zutere di ya, Albert Ernest Greenwood, onye na-ahụ maka ego
Ha lụrụ na 18 June 1920 na Anglican Church of the Annunciation na Broome, Western Australia
N'agbata afọ 1931 na 1935, Greenwood rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye mgbasa ozi na Sydney tupu ọ kwaga Perth iji mee ihe omume redio mgbe niile, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị
Greenwood lara ezumike nká na mgbasa ozi redio na 1953
Greenwood sonyere n'ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị na udo site n'aka nne ya bụ onye sonyere na Women's Christian Temperance Union na Australian Federation of Women Voters
O sonyere na ọgbaghara mbụ nke ndị ọrụ gọọmentị na Perth na 1920
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye mgbasa ozi, ọtụtụ n'ime mmemme ya na-elekwasị anya na nkwenkwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke ụmụ nwanyị
Mmekọrịta ya na ụmụ nwanyị na udo mụbara mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na redio
N'ime afọ 1960 na 1970, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchiteanya na nzukọ na nzukọ mba ma soro Women's International League for Peace and Freedom rụọ ọrụ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa
O sokwa na ntọala nke Family Planning Association na Western Australia na Abortion Law Repeal Association

Tupu ọnwụ ya na 14 Eprel 1992, Greenwood nyere ọtụtụ n'ime ihe odide redio ya, akwụkwọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ, akwụkwọ ozi onwe ya na akwụkwọ ya site na òtù ndị ọ na-etinye aka na ya na ọbá akwụkwọ Mahadum Murdoch
Greenwood nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye site na ọrụ ya na ụmụ nwanyị na udo
E nyere ya ihe nrite Silver Peace Medal nke United Nations Association of Australia; Queen's Silver Jubilee Medal; nwere ụgbọ mmiri, MV
Irene Greenwood, aha ya; na 1974 a họpụtara ya na National Advisory Committee on Women's Affairs
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ natara nzere nsọpụrụ na Mahadum Murdoch
N'afọ 1975, e mere ya onye otu Order of Australia maka 'ọrụ ya maka ọdịmma ụmụ nwanyị'
Matodzi Irene Mawela (a mụrụ n'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1940) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu nke nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike kemgbe ngwụsị afọ 1950
A maara ya nke ọma maka onyinye ya na egwu mbaqanga na abụ ndị e mere n'asụsụ Tshivenda, ma nye aka na ihe ndekọ studio otu narị na ndeharị redio
A mụrụ Mawela ma zụlite ya n'ezinụlọ Venda na Soweto, South Africa, mana n'ihi mkparị nke ebo Venda n'oge ọchịchị apartheid, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ asụsụ Sesotho
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ sonyeere otu ụmụ agbọghọ aha ya bụ The Sweet Voices, nke onye na-enyocha talent Rupert Bopape hụrụ na agbamakwụkwọ

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nke Bopape, mgbe ahụ ọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nke EMI South Africa, wee malite ịdee ma dekọọ gbasara usoro mmeghe nke Dark City Sisters na Simon Nkabinde na-etolite etolite, nke a na-amaghị ama dị ka Mahlathini
N'afọ 1962, ọ kwagara Troubadour Records wee sonye na otu ụmụ nwanyị a ma ama The Sweet Sixteens, yana ịkwado ndị na-eme ihe omume gụnyere Dixie Kwankwa na Mabel Mafuya
Mawela bụ onye ndekọ egwu mbụ dekorọ egwu ama ama n'asụsụ Tshivenda
Na mbụ, a machibidoro ndị na-eti egwu ide egwu na Tshivenda na Xitsonga, nke ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ egwu na-ewere dị ka asụsụ na-adịghị eji ere ahịa
E mere ọtụtụ ọrụ mbụ nke Mawela na isiZulu na Sesotho
N'etiti afọ 1960, Mawela mechara mee ka ndị isi ndekọ kwe ka o jiri otu egwu Tshivenda tụọ ahịa ahụ, nke nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na azụmahịa
E wepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ihe orụ ya na ndekọ iri asa na asatọ na Rom iri anọ na ise, emesịa chịkọta ya na mbipụta LP rpm iri atọ na atọ
Ná mmalite afọ ndị 1970, Mawela sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ Mavuthela nke Gallo Africa

O mere ndekọ na ntinye aka ndị dị ka Mahotella Queens, Izintombi Zomoya, Mgababa Queens, Abafana Baseqhudeni, Jacob 'Mpharanyana' Radebe, Patience Africa, Ray Phiri, Stimela na Ladysmith Black Mambazo N'oge ahụ, Mawela bụ onye na-enye aka na mmepe nke egwu mbaqanga, tinyere mkpụrụ obi, disko, maskandi na ndekọ ozioma
E nyere ya ihe nrite Nambi ya Dzinambi (Best Artist) nke SABC / Radio Venda n'afọ 1982, 1983 na 1984, na mgbakwunye 2nd Best Song maka egwu ya 'Abakhulu' n'afọ 1974 na 'Hao Nkarabe' n'afọ 1984
Mawela sokwa na SABC rụọ ọrụ n'efu, na-eme ihe karịrị ndeharị iri abụọ na anọ na-ewepụtaghị ndekọ n'ikuku
Mawela belatara itinye aka ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu na ngwụsị afọ 1980 na afọ 1990 ka ọ lekwasịrị anya n'ịlekọta ezinụlọ ya na Limpopo

Ọ laghachiri na ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ ihe na centuri iri abụọ na otu, na nweta ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ gụnyere National Heritage Council's National Living Treasure award, ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ sitere na Ngalaba nka na ọdịbendị nke South Africa, 2012 TSHIMA Awards Lifetime Achievement Award na nzere doctorate na Mahadum Pretoria
Irene Nafuna Muloni bụ onye injinia eletrik nke Uganda, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nakwa onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala nke onye isi ala Uganda Yoweri Kaguta Museveni
Ọ bụbu Minista na-ahụ maka ike na mineral na Minerals na Mineral Cabinet nke Uganda ruo na Disemba 2019, na-eje ozi site na 27 Mee 2011
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ya na kansụl ọhụrụ mgbe ntuli aka mba 2016 gasịrị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Bulambuli District, site na 2011 ruo 2016 mgbe ọ tụfuru oche ya n'aka onye na-azọ onwe ya; Sarah Wekomba
Ọ nwetaghachiri oche ya ọzọ mgbe ntuli aka nke 2021 gasịrị
A mụrụ ya na 18 Nọvemba 1960, n'ihe a maara taa, dị ka Bulambuli District
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ụmụ nwanyị Budadiri tupu ọ banye ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Gayaza
N'afọ otu puku narị itoolu, iri asatọ na abụọ , ọ banyere Mahadum Makerere, mahadum kachasị ochie n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka, iji mụọ injinia
N'afọ 1986, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science na Electrical Engineering (BScEEng) nzere
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Master of Business Administration (MBA), na Mahadum Capella dị na Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States
Ọ bụkwa onye ọkachamara na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze, nke ụlọ ọrụ Institute for Public-Private Partnerships, Inc kwadoro
(IP3) na Water, Engineering and Development Centre (WEDC) nke Mahadum Loughborough

Kemgbe afọ 1986, Irene na-arụ ọrụ na Uganda Electricity Distribution Company Limited (UEDCL), ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị nke Uganda, nke na-ahụ maka nkesa ike eletrik nye ndị ahịa na ndị ahịa na-ere ahịa na mba niile na Uganda Posts & Telecommunications Corporation mbụ Pupil Engineer na 1986 maka (UPTC), dị ka onye isi injinia maka otu ahụ, dị ka onye injinia nkwukọrịta na 1991 mgbe ahụ dị ka onye njikwa njikwa nke Uganda Electricity distribution Company Limited
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu , ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, site n'ịgba ọsọ maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Bulambuli District na 9th Ugandan Parliament (2011 - 2016)
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu , Onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Energy & Minerals
Ọ nọchiri Hilary Onek, onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị n'ime obodo
Na mgbanwe ndị e mere na 6 June 2016, ọ nọgidere na-ahọpụta ndị ọrụ ya
Irene Pancras Uwoya (a mụrụ na Disemba 18, 1988), bụ onye Tanzania na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye ọchụnta ego a maara ya nke ọma maka aha ya Irene Uwoya na maka ọrụ ihe nkiri ya Oprah
Malite ọrụ ọkachamara ya n'afọ 2007 ya na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri bongo dịka Vincent Kigosi, Steven Kanumba na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

A mụrụ Uwoya na Disemba 18, 1988 na Dodoma, Tanzania, Ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Mlimwa School ma mesịa kwaga Bunge School na Dar-es-salaam, o mechara gaa Greenville, na Kampala Uganda maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị
N'afọ 2008, Irene lụrụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke Rwanda na onye isi nke otu mba Rwanda bụ Hamad Ndikumana onye mechara nwụọ
N'afọ 2011, di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ otu nwa aha ya bụ Krish ma afọ olenaole ka e mesịrị, di na nwunye abụọ ahụ kewara
N'afọ 2017 ọ lụrụ di ọzọ, n'oge a ọ lụrụ onye egwu bongo flava bụ Abdulaziz Chande nke a maara dịka Dogo Janja
N'afọ 2006, o sonyere na Miss Tanzania Beauty Pageant wee bụrụ onye nke ise; Wema Sepetu bụ onye e chiri okpueze Miss Tanzania afọ 2006/07
Irene Uwoya malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Bongo Movies n'afọ2007
E gosipụtara ya na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri abụọ n'ime na n'èzí Tanzania
Irene van Dyk MNZM (née Viljoen; amụrụ na 21 June 1972) bụ onye South Africa a mụrụ na New Zealand netball player
Onye na-agba goolu, van Dyk bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agba bọọlụ net a ma ama n'ụwa ma bụrụkwa onye na-agba chaa chaa mba ụwa kachasị mma n'oge niile n'egwuregwu ọ bụla ọ na-enweta ihe karịrị 90%
A maara ya dị ka onye na-agba goolu kachasị ukwuu n'oge niile

Van Dyk enweela mmetụta dị ukwuu na Netball, na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu aka na-agbanwe ụzọ a na-egwu ya, ma na New Zealand ma gburugburu ụwa, ka ọ na-enye aka nke ukwuu na ewu ewu ya na-arịwanye elu
N'ịmalite na 1994, ọ nọchitere anya South Africa ugboro 72 ma bụrụ onyeisi ndị otu ahụ
N'afọ 2000, ọ kwagara Wellington, New Zealand ma họrọ ya ngwa ngwa maka otu mba, Silver Ferns
Nke a kpatara obere esemokwu, dịka naanị iwu na netball n'oge ahụ maka ndị egwuregwu na-agbanwe n'etiti mba bụ mmachibido iwu igwu egwu maka ihe karịrị otu mba n'ime afọ kalenda
Ọ bụ 2003 New Zealand Sportswoman of the Year na onye a họpụtara na 2005
Ọ ghọrọ nwa amaala New Zealand n'afọ 2005, wee nọchite anya New Zealand ruo afọ iri na anọ tupu ọ laa ezumike nká na netball mba ụwa na June 2014
Van Dyk gbara bọọlụ maka Central Pulse na ANZ Championship site na 2014, na-arụ ọrụ nkuzi n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya
N'ihe ka ukwuu n'ọrụ ya n'ụlọ na New Zealand ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Waikato / Bay of Plenty Magic (2003[[2013)
A mụrụ Irene van Dyk dị ka Irene Viljoen na Vereeniging, Gauteng, South Africa
Nne ya, nke a na-akpọkwa Irene, nwụrụ na Julaị 2012 mgbe ọ lụchara ọgụ ogologo oge na ọrịa kansa
Nna ya Herman Viljoen nwụrụ n'oge a na-awa ya ahụ na 1992
N'afọ 1994, ọ lụrụ Christie van Dyk ma ha abụọ nwere otu nwa, nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Bianca
Bianca sooro nne ya na netball
Irene van Dyk bụ onye nkuzi, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke etiti
Onye Kraịst, van Dyk kwadoro ihe omume 'Lifeathon' maka nchịkọta ego maka netwọk redio egwu Ndị Kraịst Life FM
Ọ na-agba goolu 300 kwa ụbọchị maka ntụrụndụ
Di ya Christie na-enyocha egwuregwu ya
A maara ya nke ọma maka olu ịgba égbè ya na izi ezi ya, na pasentị ịgba égbè nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe na netball
Ogologo ya dị sentimita 191 n'ogologo, egwuregwu na aka siri ike na-enyere ya aka ịchịkwa ndị iro
O mere nke mbụ ya maka mba South Africa n'afọ 1994 wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ onyeisi ndị otu ahụ ma nọchite anya ha ugboro iri asaa na abụọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu South Africa meriri ọlaọcha nke meriri New Zealand 5957- na agba nke mbụ nke 1995 Netball World Championships ma merie Australia 688-48 na nke ikpeazụ
Van Dyk kwagara New Zealand n'afọ 2000
Kemgbe ọ kwagara na NZ, egwuregwu Van Dyk toro, na mmelite na njikwa bọọlụ ya / nchekwa, mmegharị, mmata na ike
Van Dyk ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha dị ka akụkụ nke ndị otu New Zealand nke meriri Australia na 57-155 ikpeazụ na 2002 Commonwealth Games na Manchester, England mgbe oge mgbakwunye okpukpu abụọ gasịrị
Silver Ferns meriri Netball World Championships na Kingston, Jamaica na-emeri Australia 49o47 na ngwụcha
Van Dyk gbara goolu iri anọ na otu site na mbọ iri anọ na atọ na 95%
Silver Ferns enwetabeghị nnukwu ihe omume kemgbe 1987 World Netball Championships na Glasgow, Scotland
N'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2004, ọ bịara na mbido nkeji nke atọ nke egwuregwu ule nke atọ n'usoro megide Australia wee gbaa 24 site na agba 24 iji gbanwee egwuregwu ahụ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2004, ọ gara Australia ebe Australia meriri Silver Ferns 2-1

Akụkụ nke usoro ahụ bụ ọnwụ nke Australian Captain na onye na-edebe goolu Liz Ellis site na akụkụ nke 1st Test na niile nke 2nd Test mgbe ọ merụrụ ahụ n'oge esemokwu ya na van Dyk, yana mmụba dị ịrịba ama nke oku na-aga megide van Dyk na-ata ya ahụhụ maka ịzọ ụkwụ na ịkpọtụrụ ndị egwuregwu ndị ọzọ
N'oge oyi nke afọ 2005, e mere ule otu ugboro na Sydney ebe Silver Ferns meriri Australia 50o43

Van Dyk bụ ihe dị mkpa na mmeri ahụ ma mee ka ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye na-agba goolu kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa karịsịa megide ngwá agha ịgba goolu dị egwu nke Australia bụ Catherine Cox nke ọdịdị nke ya dara mgbe onye na-edebe goolu nke New Zealand bụ Vilimaina Davu mebiri ya
Site na 2003 ruo 2013 van Dyk gbara netball nke mba maka Waikato Magic ma na 2005 duziri aha mbụ ha nke National Bank Cup
Mmeri ahụ mechiri afọ isii nke Southern Sting
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2005, van Dyk nyere aka merie Australia n'afọ 610

N'egwuregwu a ma ama maka ọnwụ nke Australian Captain Liz Ellis maka ụzọ atọ n'ụzọ anọ nke egwuregwu ahụ, New Zealand dị mma maka Australia na ọsọ ha, njikwa bọọlụ, nchebe na-enweghị nkwụsị na ịgba égbè ziri ezi
N'ịbụ onye jikọtara ya na mwakpo Jodi Te Huna, ịdị jụụ na egwuregwu van Dyk pụtara ìhè ma Australia yiri ka ọ nweghị nzaghachi nye nke a na mgbalị zuru oke nke New Zealand
New Zealand nwere afọ a na-emeribeghị na 2005 gụnyere njem njem nke afọ na Caribbean ebe ha meriri Barbados na Jamaica
New Zealand zutere Australia, ndị na-agbachitere ndị mmeri, na ngwụcha nke 2006 Commonwealth Games na Melbourne
Van Dyk ji nkà na mkpebi siri ike rụọ ọrụ n'ọgụ na-adọrọ mmasị megide onye na-edebe goolu Australia na nwa agbọghọ obodo Bianca Chatfield onye nyere ya arụmọrụ siri ike
(Liz Ellis anọghị n'ihi mmerụ ahụ) New Zealand meriri n'asọmpi ikpeazụ nke 60-155
Van Dyk gbara goolu 300 n'asọmpi site na 324 maka pasent 93 n'oge egwuregwu ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2009, van Dyk gbara ule nke 100 ya maka New Zealand, mmeri 5236 meriri Australia
New Zealand meriri n'usoro nke 3 na 2
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara van Dyk iduzi ndị otu New Zealand na Ememe mmeghe nke 2010 Commonwealth Games na Delhi
Van Dyk gbara 32 site na 32 na ọkara ikpeazụ na 25 site na 29 (86%) na nke ikpeazụ mgbe New Zealand meriri Australia 66X64
Na June van Dyk mere emume ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ 40 ma kwuo na o nweghị atụmatụ ịla ezumike nká
Na ANZ Championship ọ gbara goolu 501 n'asọmpi site na 527 na 951%
N'afọ 2012 ANZ Championship, ọ duuru ndị otu ya gaa Grand Final, ebe Magic meriri Vixens 41z38, iji bụrụ nke mbụ New Zealand Franchise meriri ANZ Championship
Van Dyk gbara 25/26 n'egwuregwu ahụ
Van Dyk gafere na Central Pulse mgbe onye nkuzi Noeline Taurua gbara arụkwaghịm site na ndị otu ya gara aga, Waikato / Bay of Plenty Magic
Ọ na-agba goolu iri abụọ na asaa n'egwuregwu ọ bụla, dị ala karịa oge ndị gara aga

Na 5 June 2014, Irene Van Dyk kwupụtara ezumike nká ya na netball mba ụwa, na-ekwu 'Enwere m nnukwu atụmanya nke onwe m na ọnụ ọgụgụ egwuregwu m n'ime ọnwa ole na ole gara aga na ANZ Championship adịghị mma iji kwado iwere egwuregwu m gaa na ọkwa mba ụwa'
Ọrụ mba ụwa ya nke afọ 20 nyeere ya aka ime ka ọ bụrụ onye egwuregwu kachasị mma n'oge niile, na 217 caps (72 maka South Africa na 145 maka New Zealand)
Ọrụ mba ụwa ya ji goolu 5917 site na 6572 shots, 90% shooting record
Maka Silver Ferns ọ gbara goolu 4796 site na mgbalị 5288 na 91%

Ireti Osayemi bụ onye Naijiria nke so n'ime ihe nkiri nke asụsụ Yoruba
Iretiola Doyle (nke a makwaara dị ka Iretiola Olusola Ayinke ) bụ onye Naijiria na- eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-egosi ihe TV, onye edemede na onye na-ekwu okwu ọha
A mụrụ Doyle na 3rd nke Mee, 1967 na Ondo Steeti mana ọ nọrọ na mmalite ya na ezinụlọ ya na Boston, United States
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Naijiria, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Christ's Ado Ekiti wee nweta diploma na Mass Communication ma gụchaakwa na mahadum Jos na nzere na Theatre Arts
N'ime ọrụ gbagoro afọ iri abụọ na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Naịjirịa, kredit ya kwụsịrị n'okirikiri na ngosi ihe onyonyo, ịse foto na ibipụta
Iretiola Doyle bụ odee, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye ngosi

O weputara ma gosi ihe ngosi ejiji na ụdị ndụ nke ya akpọrọ 'Oge With Iretiola' ruo afọ iri na n'oge dị iche iche kwadoro ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onyonyo, dị ka 'Morning Ride', 'Taa On STV' na 'Nimasa This Week na Channels TV'
Ọ bụ onye odee ma nwee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ihuenyo n'ihi na Amaka Igwe Tempest (Oge 1) bụ otu n'ime ha

Iretiola Doyle bụ onye na-akọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ onye dere ogidi dị iche iche n'oge dị iche iche; Shooting Breeze in city People, na n'ime ụlọ nkata dị na Gliteratti wepụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ụbọchị a na Tiola's Take na Satọdee Vanguard

A họpụtara ya otu ugboro na ngalaba ihe nkiri kacha mma na Reel Awards na 1998 maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri All About Ere na ugboro abụọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ngalaba nkwado na AMAA Awards na 2007 na 2009 maka ọrụ ya na Sitanda na 2009

N'ofe Niger n'otu n'otu wee kpọpụta onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na onye ndu na GIAMA Awards na Houston Texas na 2013, yana onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na onye ndu na 2014 Nollywood Movie Awards maka ihe ngosi ya nke Ovo, na ihe egwu mmụọ Torn
Ihe omume a nyekwara ya onyinye nhọpụta ihe nrite nke Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2015

Iri atọ nwere ike ịpụta
Iri Ji ọhụrụ nke ndị Igbo (nke a maara dịka Orureshi na Idoma, maọbụ Iwa
Iwa Ji, Iri Ji, Ike Ji, maọbụ dị Otute dabere na olumba) bụ emume ọdịbendị kwa afọ nke ndị Igbo na-eme na njedebe nke oge mmiri ozuzo na mbido Ọgọst
A na-eme emume Iri Ji(nke pụtara 'iri nri ọhụrụ') n'ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka (karịsịa na Naịjirịa na Ghana) na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka na karịa
Ọ na-anọchi anya ngwụcha nke owuwe ihe ubi na mmalite nke usoro ọrụ ọzọ
Emume a bụ oge ọdịnala na-ejikọta obodo ndị Igbo n'otu n'otu dịka ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-adabere na Ji
Ji so n'ime ihe ọkụkụ mbụ a ga-akụ na mmalite oge ịkụ osisi
N'agbata Eprel na Ọgọstụ, a na-ewe ọkụkụ ndị dịka ọka, Ede, na ugu ma rie ha n'enweghị ụda olu
Emume Iri Ji ọhụrụ bụ emume na-egosi ịdị mkpa nke Ji dị na ndụ ọha na eze nke ndị Igbo

N'ime obodo ụfọdụ nke Igbo, a ghaghị iri ma ọ bụ tụfuo Ji ochie niile (site na ihe ọkụkụ nke afọ gara aga) na mgbede emume IriJi ọhụrụN'echi ya, ọ bụ naanị efere ji ka a na-eri n'emume ahụ, ebe emume ahụ bụ ihe nnọchianya nke ọtụtụ ihe a na-emepụta
Ọ bụ ezie na ụdị na usoro nwere ike ịdị iche site n'otu obodo gaa na nke ọzọ, ihe ndị dị mkpa mejupụtara emume ahụ ka bụ otu
N'obodo ụfọdụ, emume ahụ na-ewe otu ụbọchị dum, ebe n'ọtụtụ ebe ọ nwere ike iwe otu izu maọbụ karịa
Emume ndị a na-agụnyekarị ntụrụndụ na emume dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere Igwe (King), maọbụ nwoke nke okenye, na ịgba egwú ọdịnala nke ndị ikom, ndị inyom, na ụmụ ha
Emume a na-egosipụta ihe omume ọdịnala Igbo n'ụdị ihe ngosi nke oge a, ịgba egwú mmawụ na ngosi ejiji
Dịka ọ na-adịkarị, na mbido emume ahụ, a na-ebu ụzọ nye chi na ndị nna nna ya tupu ha ekesa ha ndị obodo ahụ
Ọ bụ nwoke kacha okenye n'obodo maọbụ Eze maọbụ onye a ma ama na-eme emume ahụ

Nwoke a ga ewerekwa Ji ahụ nye chi na ndị nna nna site n'igosi ekele nye chi kachasị elu maka nchebe na obiọma ya n'ịdu ha site n'oge na-adịghị mma ruo n'oge owuwe ihe ubi buru ibu na-enweghị ọnwụ sitere na agụụ
Mgbe ha kpesịrị ekpere ekele nye chi ha, ha riri Ji mbụ n'ihi na ekwere na ọnọdụ ha na-enye ihe ùgwù nke ịbụ ndị ogbugbo n'etiti obodo ha na chi nke ala ahụ

Ebumnuche nke emume ndị a bụ igosipụta ekele nke obodo ahụ nye chi maka ime ka owuwe ihe ubi nwee ike, a na-agbaso ha n'ọtụtụ ebe n'agbanyeghị mgbanwe ndị ọzọ nke oge a n'ihi mmetụta nke Iso Ụzọ Christi n'ógbè ahụ
Ya mere, nke a na-akọwa akụkụ atọ nke echiche ụwa nke Igbo, na ha bụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ, okpukpe, na ekele
Ụbọchị ahụ bụ ihe nnọchianya nke obi ụtọ mgbe oge ọrụ ugbo gasịrị, a na-esokwa ndị enyi na ndị na-atụ anya ihe ọma kerịta ọtụtụ ihe
Emeume dịgasị iche iche na-egosi iri Ji ọhụrụ
Egwú ọdịnala, Egwú Mmawụ, Egwú ime ibara , na oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-emepụta ahụmịhe nke ụfọdụ ndị sonyere na-akọwa dịka 'nkà'; emume mara mma bụ ihe ngosi nke ọṅụ, ekele, na ngosipụta obodo
A na-esikarị na - ana eji j
Ji eme emume n'emume ahụ ma jiri mmanụ nkwụ (mmanụ nri) mee ya
Iwa ji nwekwara ihe yiri ya na Emume Mid-Autumn nke Eshia, ebe ọ bụ na ha abụọ dabere na okirikiri nke ọnwa ma bụrụ emume owuwe ihe ubi obodo
Ihe omume a dị mkpa na kalenda nke ndị Igbo n'ụwa niile
Owuwe ihe ubi nke Ji na emume nke chi nke ala site na emume Iri Ji ọhụrụ bụ ihe atụ nke nkwenye okpukpe ndị mmadụ na chi kachasị elu
Ọbịbịa nke ọnwa ọhụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ na-egosi nkwadebe maka nnukwu emume 'Iri Ji Ohu', mana oge na ụzọ nkwadebe dị iche site na obodo gaa na obodo
Emume Iri Ji ọhụrụ bụ ihe omume nka na-adọrọ mmasị nke ukwuu

Emume a mara mma bụ ihe ngosi nke ịdị n'otu, ịgba egwu, ọṅụ na oriri, ihe ngosi kwa afọ maka ndị obodo, iji mee ka njedebe nke oge ọrụ ugbo pụta ìhè, emume ebe ndị mmadụ na-egosipụta ekele ha nye ndị nyeere ha aka ịghọrọ ihe ubi buru ibu

Iriama Rose (amụrụ na 5 Jenụwarị 1967) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu na nke asatọ na nke itoolu nke Uganda na-anọchite anya Nakapiripirit District dị ka onye na-azọ onwe ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke asatọ na nke itoolu nke Uganda dị ka onye Nakapiripirit District Member of Parliament

Mgbe ọ na-eje ozi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke itoolu, a họpụtara ya n'etiti ndị omeiwu kwuru ihe na-erughị ugboro ise na nzuko omeiwu dị ka nnyocha Daily Monitor nke Hansard mere na ndekọ gọọmentị nke Nzukọ Ndị Isi

Nnyocha ahụ chọpụtara na ndị omeiwu iri atọ na anọ ekwuola ihe na-erughị ugboro ise n'ala ụlọ omeiwu n'ime afọ abụọ gara aga ebe ndị omeiwu ọzọ otu narị na iri ise nyere aka ihe na-irughị ugboro iri na ise na arụmụka
N'oge ọ nọ n'ọchịchị ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ puku abụọ na asaa, ọ dụrụ ndị agha Karimojong ọdụ ka ha gbasoo usoro gọọmentị na-aga n'ihu na-ewepụ ngwá agha iji kwado mmepe na mpaghara ahụ
Ọ na-emegidekwa igbu ndị aka ha dị ọcha, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị site n'aka ndị òtù ndị agha na mpaghara ahụ nke metụtara mmepe na Karamoja

Iriama so n'ime ndị omeiwu kpebiri izute onye bụbu praịm minista, Amama Mbabazi onye nyere ha oge mgbe nwanyị mbụ na minista na-ahụ maka Karamoja Affairs, Janet Museveni, jụrụ izute ndị omeiwu si Karamoja sub-region maka mkparịta ụka banyere mpaghara ha nke bụ mpaghara kacha daa ogbenye na Uganda
Ndị omeiwu zutere onye bụbu praịm minista gụnyere Rose Akello (Kaabong), Modest Juliana Auma (Abim), Rose Iriama (Nakapiripirit) na Margaret Iriama (Moroto)

Mgbe ọ nọsịrị n'ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke itoolu, o ji egwuregwu yie egwu ịwakpo ehi nke Onye isi ala Museveni ma ọ bụrụ na akwụghị ndị na-akwado ya ụgwọ maka anụ ụlọ ha furu efu n'oge a na-ewepụ ngwá agha
N'afọ puku abụọ na itoolu , Iriama gwara The East African banyere echiche ya nke iche na Janet Museveni ga-abụ nnukwu mmepe na mpaghara dịka ụka n'oge gara aga
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu nke tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa ntuli aka 118 ka a nụ ya n'ụlọ ikpe dị iche iche gafee mba ahụ mgbe ntuli aka nke February 18 gasịrị
Iris Cabral (1906 - June 1936) bụ onye Afro-Uruguayan na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-arụ ọrụ
Cabral haziri otu ndị ọrụ ụlọ mbụ na Uruguay
N'afọ 1930 ya na Clementina Silva tọrọ ntọala kọmitii Anti-Fascist mbụ nke Uruguay
Ya na Maruja Pereyra bụ ndị 'ndị a na-ahụ anya, ndị agha na ndị nkwuwa okwu' nyere aka na akwụkwọ Afro-Uruguayan Nuestra Raza mgbe ọ maliteghachiri na 1933
Ma Cabral na Pereyra sonyere na April 1936 National Congress of Women
Otú ọ dị, Cabral nwụrụ na June 1936
Pereyra chetara Cabral n'ụzọ dị mma
N'afọ 2016, ndị omeiwu nke Montevideo kwanyeere ncheta Cabral ùgwù
Iris LaVerne Davis-Hicks (April 30, n'afọ 1950 na September 18, n'afọ 2021) bụ onye America na-agba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ na n'ọhịa bụ onye ọkachamara na 100-meter dash
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke 1971 Pan American Games na ihe omume ahụ ma nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo na 4 × 100-meter relay

Ọ nọchitere anya United States na 1972 Munich Olympics ma jiri ihe nrite ghara inweta ihe nrite ugboro abụọ nke mbụ na 100m, na-etinye nke anọ n'azụ Silvia Chivás nke Cuba, mgbe ahụ na relay, ebe Chivás ọzọ meriri ya na ọla nchara na ụkwụ ikpeazụ
A mụrụ Davis na ezinụlọ ndị Africa America na Pompano Beach, Florida
Na mba ahụ, ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro anọ ugboro abụọ na 100m (1971, 1973) na ugboro abụọ na 60m dash (1972, 1973)
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na 100-yard dash na afọ 1969 na afọ 1970, ma nwee ọkwa atọ kachasị elu na 100 m na 1972 Olympic trials na 1972 outdoor championships
Ọ bụ onye otu Tigerbelles collegiate team maka Mahadum Tennessee State, nke nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme siri ike nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ gụnyere onye mmeri Olympic abụọ Wyomia Tyus
Jessie Iris Martin MBE (19 Disemba 1898 - 19 Julaị 1982) bụ onye nọọsụ New Zealand, onye nlekọta ụlọ ọgwụ, onye nkuzi na onye isi otu ndị nọọsụ
A mụrụ ya na Wellington, New Zealand, na 19 Disemba 1898
Nna ya bụ Lee Martin
Na 1955 Queen's Birthday Honours, a họpụtara Martin ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Order of the British Empire, maka ọrụ ndị nọọsụ, na karịsịa dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọgwụ Cook na Gisborne
Ọ chọrọ nhọpụta nke Labour Party maka ntuli aka Hamilton nke afọ 1959, mana enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Iris planifolia bụ ụdị osisi na-agbasa okooko na subgenus nke ụdị Iris, ezinụlọ Iridaceae

Osisi a na-adịgide adịgide sitere na mpaghara ndida Europe na mpaghara ugwu nke Africa nwere ogologo, akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na-egbuke egbuke, ogwe osisi dị mkpirikpi, na nnukwu okooko osisi na-esi ísì ụtọ na agba dị iche iche nke anụnụ anụnụ
Iris planifolia nwere nnukwu okooko osisi na-acha nchara nchara (ihe dị ka 2 in (51 mm) n'obosara), nwere mgbọrọgwụ na-acha ọcha
Akwụkwọ osisi ndị -acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na-eto ruo 10X 30 cm (39 -118 in) n'ogologo na 1 - 3 cm n'obosara nwere ike izochi ogwe osisi dị mkpụmkpụ n'oge okooko osisi
Akwụkwọ ya bụ lanceolate, na-amalite dị warara n'ala ma na-eto ruo n'otu ebe
A na-ewere ya dị ka nke nwere otu n'ime okooko osisi kachasị ukwuu na subgenus Scorpiris
Ọ nwere ike ịmalite ifuru na Disemba, na Jenụwarị ma ọ bụ Febụwarị
N'ọhịa, a maara ya ka ọ na-agbasa okooko ruo n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ
Okooko osisi ndị ahụ nwere ísì dị nro, nke a pụrụ ịkọwa dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ọ bụ osisi dị mkpụmkpụ, siri ike nke nwere nnukwu okooko osisi atọ n'otu ogwe, nke na-adịkarị 6-7 cm n'obosara, yana tube perianth nke 8-18 cm n'ogologo
Nsụda mmiri ahụ dị sentimita ise n'ogologo na ụkpụrụ ahụ dị sentimita abụọ n'oghere
Osisi ahụ nwere ike iru ogo kachasị elu nke 10 - 15 cm (39 - 59 in) n'ogologo

Osisi ahụ nwere okooko osisi dị iche iche na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, site na violet na-acha odo odo, na-acha ọcha na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, na lilac na-acha ọbara ọbara, dị ka iris ndị ọzọ, ọ nwere abụọ abụọ abụọ nke petals, nnukwu sepals atọ (petals mpụga), nke a maara dị ka 'ọdịda' na atọ dị n'ime, obere petals (ma ọ bụ tepals), nke a kpọrọ 'ụkpụrụ'
Nsụda mmiri ahụ nwere eriri na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na akara odo odo n'elu ugwu ahụ
O nweghị afụ ọnụ
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-ahụ ụdị okooko osisi na-acha ọcha n'ọhịa
Osisi ahụ nwere obere pollen dị ka bọọlụ nwere obere ogwu
Capsule ahụ bụ oblong, sessile, dị ka nke Colchicum n'elu ala n'etiti akwụkwọ
Ọ nwere mkpụrụ na-acha nchara nchara nke nwere ike ịdị ukwuu dị ka pea
A na-enweta aha a kapịrị ọnụ nke 'planifolia' site na okwu Grik nke pụtara 'nke nwere akwụkwọ dị larịị'
Ọ bụ TDurand na Schinz bipụtara ya na 'Conspectus Floræ Africæ' No5
Mana n'okpuru aha Iris alata
Fiori na Paoletti na 'Flora Analytica d'Italia', ghọtara ụdị a dị ka ụdị Iris site na ntinye mbụ nke Millers nke Xiphium planifolium
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, a maara nke a n'okpuru otu aha
Iris alata nke Poir dere ma dekọọ na ndepụta nnyocha nke afọ 1939
Nnyocha ndị ọzọ weghachiri mmalite osisi ahụ laa azụ na 1894
Iris planifolia bụ ugbu a aha RHS nabatara, Ngalaba Ọrụ Ugbo na Ọrụ Nnyocha Ọrụ Ugbo nke United States kwadoro ya na 4 Eprel 2003 na mmelite ya na 3 Disemba 2004
Rịba ama; Iris planifolia nwere ihe karịrị 20 dị iche iche synonyms
Lee ndepụta na infobox n'aka nri
Iris alata (nke a makwaara dị ka 'Scorpion Iris') bụ otu okwu a na-ahụkarị
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Mediterenian nke Europe na North Africa
Nke a bụ naanị ụdị dị na Juno subgenus nke a pụrụ ịchọta na-eto eto na Europe
A na-ahụ ya na Krit, Gris, Sicily, Spain, Portugal, Sardinia, (n'ime North Africa) na Algeria, Libya, Tunisia, na Morocco
Enwere ike ịchọta ụdị iris na-acha ọcha na Andalucia
A na-ahụ Iris planifolia n'akụkụ ugwu nkume, nke na-adịkarị mmiri n'oge oyi ma kpọọ nkụ n'oge ọkọchị
Ọ na-eguzogide USDA Zone 3
Mkpụrụ osisi ahụ bụ osisi na-adị mkpụmkpụ
A na-eto ya nke ọma na UK, na etiti bulb
N'ime ite ma ọ bụ ọkacha mma n'ala
A pụkwara ịzụlite ya n'ime ite
Mana ite ndị ahụ kwesịrị ịdịkarịa ala sentimita ịrị atọ n'ogologo (ma ọ bụ 1 ft), iji nye ohere kachasị elu
Ọ chọrọ ezigbo ikuku iji gbochie ọrịa, mana ọ nwere ike ibute nje virus
Na-akpata mmebi nke uto, ma na-akpata akwụkwọ osisi na-acha odo odo ma ọ bụ na-acha uhie uhie
A ga-ebibi osisi ndị butere ọrịa iji kwụsị mmetọ nke osisi ndị ọzọ
Maka ezigbo uto n'afọ na-abịa, ọ na-ahọrọ oge okpomọkụ na-ekpo ọkụ n'oge ọkọchị, n'ala na-agbanye mmiri nke ukwuu
Enwere ike ịgbasa ya n'ụzọ okike ka ọ na-emepụta ụyọkọ bulbs, nke enwere ike kewaa, site na iji nlezianya kewaa ya na ngwụcha oge okpomọkụ
Kpachara anya ka ọ ghara imebi mgbọrọgwụ anụ ahụ

Irma Joubert bụ onye odee South Afrika na nnata ATKV Prize for Romance Novels
Amara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya Anderkant Pontenilo na South Afrika dị ka otu n'ime akwụkwọ iri abụọ kacha mma e bipụtara na mba ahụ kemgbe ọbịbịa ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na afo 1994
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Pretoria, Joubert bụ onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị maka afọ 35 tupu ọ laa azụ na afo 2004 iji lekwasị anya na ederede ya
N'afọ sochirinụ, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ nweere onwe ya, ọ bụ onye nnata ihe nrite Media24 maka Specialist Journalist of the Year ma bụrụ onye ikpeazụ na onyinye nta akụkọ Mondi
Akwụkwọ edemede Joubert na-elekwasị anya ugbu a na akwụkwọ akụkọ mere eme
Ya Tussen stasies trilogy, esịnede Ver wink die Suiderkruis, Tussen stasies en Tolbos, ya na ya Pontenilo trilogy Anderkant Pontenilo, Pérsomi, na Kronkelpad, nwere
sụgharịa ha niile n'asụsụ Dutch, ma gosipụtala ha niile n'etiti ndị kacha ere iri kacha mma na mbipụta
Asụgharịla Tussen stasies n'asụsụ German na na 2015 bụ onye bipụtara US Harper Collins bipụtara n'asụsụ Bekee n'okpuru aha The Girl from the Train
Ọ dechara akwụkwọ nke abụọ na trilogy ya nke atọ
Na 2008, Joubert gosipụtara dị ka otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ ikpeazụ na ATKV akwụkwọ edemede maka Tussen Stasies, na 2010 ọ meriri ihe nrite ATKV maka Anderkant Pontenilo

Na 2014, ọ bụ onye nnata nke Netherlands 'BCB Publieksprijs maka Kronkelpad, ebe Anderkant Pontenilo ka amatala na South Africa dịka otu n'ime akwụkwọ 20 kacha mma South Africa kemgbe ọbịbịa ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na 1994
Enyere Joubert onyinye nturu ugo Mahadum Pretoria's Tuks Laureate na 2014, nnabata kachasị elu enyere ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum

Irma Dolores Player Hall bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri nke pụtara na ihe nkiri na ihe ngosi onyonyo kemgbe mmalite afọ 1970
Hall na-emekarị ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri gụnyere A Family Thing, The Ladykillers na Soul Food, ebe ọ gosipụtara Josephine 'Big Mama Joe' Joseph, ọrụ ọ rụgharịrị na usoro ihe nkiri nke otu aha ahụ
Ọ pụtakwara na Collateral na ihe nkiri abụọ nke onye nduzi Werner Herzog
Maka arụmọrụ ya na The Ladykillers, ọ meriri Ihe nrite nke Jury n'afọ 2004 Cannes Film Festival
A mụrụ Hall Irma Dolores Player Hall na Beaumont, Texas, nwa nwanyị Josephine Hall
A zụlitere Hall na Chicago, n'akụkụ ndịda Illinois
Hall gara Briar Cliff College na Sioux City, Iowa
Ọrụ mbụ Hall rụrụ bụ na ihe nkiri onwe ya, Book of Numbers, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na ise
Ọ kụziri asụsụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ na Dallas, Texas, mgbe onye na-eme ihe nkiri / onye nduzi Raymond St
Jacques were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye mgbasa ozi nwa oge maka Book of Numbers
Ọ hụrụ ya ka ọ na-eme ihe nkiri n'agụ uri ma nwee mmasị n'ebe ọ nọ nke ukwuu nke na o nyere ya ọrụ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ chọpụtara ịhụnanya maka ime ihe nkiri, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ya na ndị ọzọ guzobere ụlọ ihe nkiri na Dallas
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na TV n'afọ ndị afọ 1980
Mana ọ bụghị ruo mgbe ọrụ ya dị ka Aunt T
na-ahụ n'anya n'afọ 1996's A Family Thing ka ndị nkatọ na ndị na-ege ntị malitere ịchọpụta nkà ya

O meriri Chicago Film Critics Association Award na Kansas City Film Critics Circle Award maka Best Supporting Actress maka ọrụ ya, [citation needed] na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe nkiri ahụ nyeere ya aka iguzobe ya dị ka onye isi na-akwado ihe nkiri na ngwụcha afọ 1990 na mmalite afọ 2000
Ọrụ dị mma na nnukwu ihe nkiri dịka Nothing to Lose na Steel sochiri
Hall wee nweta ọrụ dị ka Big Mama Joseph na ihe nkiri Soul Food
N'afọ 1997, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Clint Eastwood nke akwụkwọ akụkọ John Berendt bụ Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
Omume ya, dọkịta mgbọrọgwụ Minerva, dabeere na Valerie Boles
Soul Food bụ ihe nkiri a ma ama na ụlọ ọrụ ịkụ nzọ, na-akpali onyonyo, Soul Food The Series, nke Hall gosipụtara ọrụ ya
Ọ nwetara ọrụ ọzọ a ma ama n'afọ 2004 remake nke The Ladykillers
O meriri ihe nrite pụrụ iche nke ndị ọka ikpe n'afọ 2004 mmemme nke ihe nkiri nke Cannes na ihe nrite Image maka arụmọrụ ya
Obere oge tupu ewepụta ihe nkiri nke The Ladykillers, Hall merụrụ ahụ nke ukwuu n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala na Chicago
N'etiti oké ifufe, ọ kwụsịrị ịchịkwa ụgbọala ya, gafee okporo ụzọ n'ime okporo ụzọ na-abịanụ, wee kụọ ụgbọ ala ọzọ
A wara ya ahụ ngwa ngwa n'obi maka ọnyá aorta ya nke ọgịrịga gbajiri agbaji kpatara
Na mgbakwunye, Hall nwekwara nkwonkwo ụkwụ gbajiri agbaji na aka gbajiri agbajọrọ
A kpọrọ Hall aha maka ịkwọ ụgbọala na ikikere a kwụsịtụrụ, na ịghara ịnọ n'okporo ụzọ ya
Ọ gbakere kpamkpam, ma nwee ike ịga n'ihu n'ọrụ ya
Hall bi na Dallas, Texas, ya na ezinụlọ ya; ọ bụ nne nke ụmụ abụọ na nne nne nke ụmụ anọ (dị ka nke afọ 2001)
Irma Stern (ubochí abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1894 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na àtó n'ọnwa Ọgọst 1966) bụ ónyé isi na-ese ihe na South Africa nke nwetara nkwado mba na nke mba ụwa n'oge ndụ ya
A mụrụ Stern na Schweizer-Reneke, obéré ọbọdọ dị na Transvaal, nke nné na nnà German-Jewish
Ndị Britain tinyere nna ya n'ogige ịta ahụhụ n'oge Agha Boer Mbụ n'ihi na ọ na-akwado ndị Boer
Ya mèrè, nné ha kpọgara Irma na nwanne ya nwoke nke obéré, Rudi, na Cape Town
N'afọ 1901, ezinụlọ ahụ laghachiri Germany ma mesịa na-eme njem mgbè niile n'etiti South Africa na Germany
Njem a mekwara ka Irma nwee mmetụta na mmepe dị ka onye na-ese ihe
N'afọ 1926, Stern lụrụ Johannes Prinz, onye bụbu onye nkuzi ya, onye mechara bụrụ prọfesọ German na Mahadum Cape Town
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 1934
Irma Stern gara ọtụtụ njem na Europe ma nyochaa ndịda Africa, Zanzibar na mpaghara Congo
Njem ndị a nyere ọtụtụ isiokwu màkà ihe osise ya ma nye ya ohere inweta ma chịkọta nchịkọta ihe ochie

Ebumnuche Stern bụ ime njem nke ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya na 1931 gaa Madeira, na 1937 na 1938 gaa Dakar, Senegal, 1939 na 1945 Zanzibar, mpaghara Congo na 1942, 1946 na 1955, 1952 Madeira, 1952 Israel, 1955 Turkey, 1960 Spain na 1963 France
Stern mekwara njem nke ukwuu na South Africa, dịka ọmụmaatụ na 1926 gaa Swaziland na Pondoland, na 1933 gaa Namaqualand, na 1936 n'ozuzu, na 1941 gaa Eastern Cape
Stern jụrụ ịga njem ma ọ bụ gosipụta na Germany n'oge ọchịchị ndị Nazi site na 1933 ruo 1945
Njem ndị a méré ka e nwee ọgaranya nke nkà na ume yana mbipụta nke akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ nwèrè ihe osise Congo, nke e bipụtara na 1943 na Zanzibar na 1948
E mèrè ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu narị ihe ngosi n'onwe ya n'oge ndụ ya na South Africa na Europe, gụnyere Germany, France, Italy na England
Ọ bụ ezie na a nabatara ya na Europe, a maghị ọrụ ya na mbụ na South Africa, ebe ndị nkatọ kwara ngosi mbụ ya n'afọ 1920 site na nyocha akpọrọ 'Art of Miss Irma Stern - Ugliness as a cult'
[citation needed]
E guzobere Irma Stern Museum na 1971 ma bụrụkwa ụlọ ónyé na-ese ihe biri na ya rụo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri anọ
Ọ kwagara na The Firs na Rondebosch na 1927 ma biri ebe ahụ ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ
A na-etinye ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ ndị ahụ ka ọ na-ahazi ha ebe n'elu ụlọ ahụ nwèrè ụlọ ahịa nke ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa nke ógè a na-eji
Foto nke nwanyị India, Private Collection 1936 -->
Ndụ nwụrụ anwụ na ite Africa, Johans Borman Fine Art Gallery, Cape Town 1936
Anemones, Private Collection 1938 -->
Ndị na-agba egwú, Irma Stern Museum, Cape Town 1943 -->

Akpụkpọ ụkwụ ọla edoMmanụ n'elu ákwà
mkpịsị aka ukwu na-ere grenade na Zanzibar, Mmanụ n'elu ákwà, na etiti Zanzibari a tụrụ atụ, Norval Foundation, Cape Town
Iroro Tanshi (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1984 n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na onye na-echekwa ihe nke na-amụ banyere gburugburu ebe obibi da ụdị dị iche iche nke ụmụ oke Afrịka
Ọ bụ onye guzobere, Small Mammal Conservation Organisation (SMACON), otu NGO nke Naijiria,ebe ọ bụ onye isi mmemme nyocha ma na-eduzi ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị ọgbọ na nchekwa ụdị
Tanshi nwetara akara ugo mmụta na sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi na nzere masta na Environmental Quality Management na Mahadum Benin na Benin City, Nigeria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Leeds na England, ebe ọ nwetara Masters na Biodiversity Conservation tupu ya emee nyocha na Tigga Kingston na Mahadụ Texas Tech na US, ebe enyere ya PhD n'afọ 2021
Tanshi chọpụtara naanị ọnụ ọgụgụ nke obere ọdụdụ (Hipposideros curtus) na Naịjirịa, nso Afi Mountain Wildlife Sanctuary, ma zọpụta ya ka ọ ghara ịla n'iyi
Tanshi chekwakwara nnukwu ụsụ mkpụrụ osisi na-acha ahịhịa ndụ (Eidolon helvum) na Naịjirịa site n'atụmatụ gọọmentị ibibi osisi roost ha
A matara Tanshi maka ịchọpụta ụdị ụmụ oke na Naịjirịa nke a hụrụ n'ikpeazụ afọ 45 gara aga
'Zero Wildfire Campaign' ya, na-etinye ndị obodo ahụ aka ichebe ebe obibi dị oke egwu maka ụdị ụkpara a na-amịpụta nsonaazụ ma na-enyere aka iweghachi ụdị a site na njedebe nke mkpochapụ
N'otu oge ahụ ọ na-arụ ọrụ na SMACON, Tanshi na-arụkọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Mahadum Benin
N'afọ 2020, Tanshi ritere ihe nrite Future for Nature site na Future for Nature Foundation, iji kwado ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ ya na-achọpụta ụdị ụkpara
Ọ bụ nwanyị Afrịka mbụ meriri ihe nrite ahụ
Na 2021, Tanshi meriri ihe nrite Whitley nke Whitley Fund for Nature nyere

N'afọ 1946, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ ghọrọ onye isi na-ese foto na akwụkwọ akụkọ Baltimore Afro-American
Phillips Sr
kọrọ akụkọ obodo na nke mba dịka ihe emume afọ 1963 bu March on Washington, ntuli aka onye isi ala ise, na olili ozu Martin Luther King, Jr

Ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya Ọ̀ ga-ekwe omume? Ihe ọzọ e si eji eme ihe maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ akwụkwọ nke onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Australia bụ John Burnheim nke na-akọwa ihe ọzọ na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
N'ịbụ nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1985, e mechara bipụta ọrụ ahụ na mmeghe ọhụrụ n'afọ 2006, na ọzọ dị ka akwụkwọ e-akwụkwọ n'afọ 2014

E nwere ihe atọ dị mkpa na ọnọdụ ahụ akọwapụtara n'akwụkwọ ahụ, nke ọ bụla n'ime ha na-egosi ọpụpụ dị egwu site na nyocha ọdịnala na nke oge a nke nsogbu ndị na'ihu anyị [onye?[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji]
Akụkụ abụọ nke mbụ gụnyere mgbochi steeti na mgbochi ọchịchị nke ọnọdụ a ga-etolite
Burnheim megidere inye ndị otu ọ bụla nwere mpaghara mpaghara ma ọ bụ agbụrụ ikike ọchịchị, ọnọdụ nke megidere ọdịnala bụ isi nke nkà ihe ọmụma ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na usoro akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na ọchịchị Burnheim ga-ahụ onwe ha dị ka akụkụ nke ọtụtụ mmemme mmekọrịta ọha na eze dị iche iche na obodo na-arụ ọrụ karịa obodo ọ bụla na-ejikọta ọnụN'echiche a, n'agbanyeghị ntụgharị site na nghọta nke obodo nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, njirimara otu na-anọgide na dị mkpa na Burnheim
Akụkụ nke atọ metụtara iwebata echiche Burnheim banyere ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ọkachasị ịjụ ọchịchị aka ike maka nkwado ọnụ ọgụgụ
Nke mbụ, Burnheim jụrụ ịdị n'etiti steeti ahụ, ma na echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma mmeri nke ọnọdụ anyị [onye?] ugbu a
Ụlọ ọrụ na-achịkwa ọtụtụ ọrụ dị n'etiti na'enye ihe nlereanya dị ugbu a maka iji ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nchịkwa, site na steeti mba ruo na gọọmentị ime obodo
Ihe nlereanya a na-emebi ikike nke ndị na-eme mkpebi iji dozie nsogbu na ọkwa nke enwere ike idozi ha nke ọma
Enwere ike ịme mkpebi ndị a na-eme ugbu a n'ime ụlọ ọrụ multifunction dị otú ahụ kama site n'aka ndị nwere onwe ha, ụlọ ọrụ pụrụ iche nke a na-ahazi site na mkparita uka n'etiti onwe ha
N'ụwa nke oge a, ọ ga-adị mkpa ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọchịchị ndị a nwee ikike zuru ụwa ọnụ
Nke abuo, omume ochichi onye kwuo uche ya achọghị itinye aka na ndị mmadụ n'ozuzu ya
Ihe a chọrọ bụ ka ndị niile mkpebi a metụtara n'ụzọ ihe onwunwe kwesịrị ịnọchite anya nakwa na ha nwere ohere isonye na mkpebi ndị ahụ
Nke a na-ebute nsogbu nke ihe mmasị n'ọnọdụ ọ bụla a ga-anabata dị ka nke ziri ezi
Nke a na-ewelite nsogbu nke ihe ọdịmma n'ọnọdụ ọ bụla a ga-anabata dị ka ihe ziri ezi
Burnheim na-ekwu na nsogbu a anaghị edozi ya site n'aka ndị na'echiche ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya

Na onye ọ bụla kwesịrị inwe ohere imetụta mkpebi ọkpụkpọ ọchụchọ ọkpụkpụ ha ziri ezi yiri ihe doro anya, mana Burnheim na-ekwusi ike na nkwurịta okwu ahụ na'ozuzu ya na mkparịta ụka nke omume ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya ọ dịghị onye kwesịrị itinye aka na mkpebi ebe ha enweghị mmasị ihe onwunwe ziri aga
Ọ bụrụ na echekwa ihe a chọrọ, nsonaazụ ya bụ ọchịchị aka ike, 'n'echiche siri ike'
Burnheim na-agbakwụnye na ụdị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya niile dị ugbu a, yana ụdị niile a tụrụ aro, ọ bụghị naanị na ọ na - na ọ bụ naanị ikike ka ọ dị na ya
Omume nke ndị ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-azụ ahịa na vootu bụ nsonaazụ - na na a na - m na'azụ voolu m n'okwu m enweghị mmasị na ya maka vooli ọzọ n'okwu na ọ na
Akụkụ nke atọ nwere ikewapụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na nhọpụta ntuli aka
A na-ewere ịhọpụta ndị okenye zuru ụwa ọnụ ugbu a dị ka nke enyere mana akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mmezu ya bụ akụkọ mgba
Maka Burnheim kpọmkwem usoro nnochite anya ntuli aka na-eduga na mkpebi ndị na-adịghị mma nke ike-azụmahịa kpebisiri ike karịa mkpa nke ndị kacha emetụta
Ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya ga-ekwe omume naanị ma ọ bụrụ na ndị na-eme mkpebi bụ ihe nnọchianya nke ndị ọ metụtara
Nke a ga-apụta ịhapụ ntuli aka iji kwado ụkpụrụ oge ochie nke ịhọrọ site na ịtụ vootu ka ndị na-eme mkpebi ga na'ụzọ ọnụ ọgụgụ na ọ gafere ndị mkpebi ha metụtara
Nhazi n'etiti ndị ọchịchị dị iche iche ga-abụ site na mkparịta ụka, ma ọ bụ, ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa, nkwekọrịta, kama site n'ikpebi a manyere n 'etiti'

Ihe a na-atụ anya ya bụ na dịka ahịa na'inye mkpa anyị maka ihe oriri onwe onye site na usoro decentralised, a pụkwara inye mkpa anyi maka ngwaahịa ọha na eze n'ụzọ dị mfe na nke na na -emeghachi omume
Na mbido ọchịchị dị otú ahụ nwere ike ịmalite ịpụta site na omume hiwere nke ọma nke ịtọlite ndị juri ụmụ amaala ka ha nye ndụmọdụ gbasara amụma n'okwu ụfọdụ

N'ime ogologo oge nhazi nke kọmitii na usoro ha ga-emeghe ịgba aka site n'aka ndị chere na ọdịmma ha adịghị anọchite anya ya, na esemokwu ndị dị otú ahụ ga-ekpebi site na ụlọ ikpe nke nza họpụtara site na ọdọ mmiri nke ndị ọgbọ ha họpụtara na kọmitii na-arụ ọrụ dị ka
inwe àgwà ndị dị mkpa iji rụọ ọrụ ikpe

Isaac Chukwu Udeh (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịrị abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1997) onye a maara dịka Chukwu onye na-ese ihe bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe
A maara ya maka eserese azụ ya ma gosipụta ya na Ghana Banking Awards na 2016 na 2017
E kpughere ihe ngosi nka ya na MTN Heroes of Change 2019
A maara ya maka eserese ụtụ ya maka onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu UN Kofi Annan, Kobe Bryant na Gianna Bryant
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Wesley Grammar School na Accra
Ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Alpha Beta Educational Center
Maka agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Takoradi Technical University ebe ọ gụrụ eserese azụmahịa
A nabatara ya na EMY Awards Africa, Ghana Edition
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na GUBA Awards 2019
O nwetara ihe nrite na ihe nrite ego site na MTN Heroes of Change 2019 mgbe ekpughere onye mmeri maka ihe omume ahụ
Isaac Emokpae (amụrụ Isaac Iken Ismahil Ọláminíyì Erhabor Ogieva Emokpae na Nọvemba 5, 1977) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe, onye na-ese ihe, na onye na-ese foto
A na-akọwa ọrụ ya site n'ụdị abụọ ebe a maara ya maka njirimara nke nkwupụta ya

Emokpae nwere BA na Creative Arts na Mahadum nke Lagos (2005), na-agụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru nduzi nke Prọfesọ Abayomi Barber mana o mere akara ya na ihe okike nke Naijiria na mbụ, ọkachasị, dị ka onye na-ese foto
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo oge ụfọdụ na foto ejiji na foto akụkọ, na-eme akara dị ịrịba ama n'ọrụ ebe a na-elebu ya anya dị ka 'veteran'
Ejirila foto ya mee ihe na magazin Forbes nakwa ebe ndị ọzọ
Ihe osise ya na nka ọhụụ bụ ihe pụrụ iche n'ilekwasị anya na ụdị abụọ na mgbọrọgwụ ha bụ ụdị nke Abstract Expressionism
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya na Naịjirịa na gburugburu ụwa
Emokpae bụ nwa nwoke nke atọ nke Erhabor Emokpae, ọ bụ onye ama ama na Naijiria, onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe a na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke nka ọgbara ọhụrụ na Naịjirịa
Dị ka nna ya, Emokpae siri ike 'na-ejikọta omimi uri ya na nkà nka'
E kwuru na nkà ihe ọmụma nke Leibniz, Descartes na Santayana kpaliri ya
Isaac Fanous (Coptic *; December 19, 1919 – January 14, 2007) bụ onye Ijipt Copt artist na ọkà mmụta, onye ọkachamara na Coptic nka na tọrọ ntọala ya oge a ụlọ akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Fanous na Al-Minya wee kwaga Cairo iji nweta akara ugo mmụta ya na ngalaba nke Applied arts ugbu a bụ akụkụ nke Mahadum Helwan na Egypt na 1941 wee nweta diplọma na nkuzi na 1943
Fanous bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ mbụ nke Institute of Coptic Studies hiwere na 1954 wee nweta doctorate ya na 1958
Onyinye ọmụmụ afọ abụọ ya na Louvre n'etiti afọ 1960 bụ oge mgbanwe na ọrụ ya
O ji ohere ahụ, mgbe ọ nọ na France, mụọ eserese ihe oyiyi n'okpuru Léonid Ouspensky, n'okpuru nkwado ya, ọ zụlitere mmasị dịka onye na-ese ihe na ọkà mmụta okpukpe
Nke a ga - eduga, n'ikpeazụ, n'ịzụlite ụdị nke ga - abụ ihu ọhụrụ nke ihe osise Coptic n'etiti narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Fanous bụ onye isi ngalaba Coptic Art na Institute of Coptic Studies na Cairo, ọ zụtala ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na Coptic si na mpụga Ijipt
Ka ndị ọgaranya na-akwado nka na-apụ n'anya n'ụwa nka nke Ijipt ruo ugbu a na-esote mgbanwe 1952, steeti nọchiri ha, ọrụ Fanous wee pụọ na mgba na ahụmịhe nke oge ya
Nke ahụ bụ ịsị, ọ bịara mara nke ọma ihe nketa Ijipt ya
O nwere obi ụtọ maka ihe niile sitere na Al-Minya kemgbe oge Akhnaten, onye wuru obodo ya na mpaghara a
Ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ tupu ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Isaac Fanous, ụka Ọtọdọks nke Coptic nwere ụdị nke ya nke a ghọtara dị ka ụdị Coptic
N'okpuru mmetụta nke nka Europe gbasaa n'Ijipt na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu enwere ọtụtụ Chọọchị dị n'Ijipt nke nwere Icons nke yiri ọtụtụ ụdị European (Western) Christianity Iconography
Ụlọ akwụkwọ Fanous nke oge a nke eserese ihe oyiyi bịara dị ka akụkụ nke mmegharị nke ọdịbendị Coptic nke malitere n'oge patriarchate nke Pope Cyril VI (1959–1971)
O jiri ụdị Coptic guzosiri ike nke a pụrụ ịhụ na Chọọchị Coptic akụkọ ihe mere eme, mana n'ụdị nke ya nke o mepụtara kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
A na-akpọ ụdị eserese ya Modern Coptic style na dịka ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ n'ọhịa a, a na-ewere Fanous dị ka nna nke eserese ihe oyiyi Coptic nke oge a na onye malitere mmegharị nke oge a na nka Coptic
Fanous sere foto na ihe oyiyi niile na St
Takla Haymanot's Church na Alexandria, nke e doro nsọ na 1969
N'agbata afọ 1977 na 1978, ọ nọrọ ọnwa isii na UK iji see ihe oyiyi na St Mark's Coptic Orthodox church na Allen Street, Kensington, London
Ihe oyiyi Coptic nke Saint Anthony the Great
Ihe oyiyi Coptic nke Saint Demiana -->
Ihe oyiyi Coptic nke Saint Maurice
Ihe oyiyi Coptic nke Saint Menas -->
Ihe oyiyi Coptic nke Saint Pishoy -->
Ihe oyiyi Coptic nke Saint Verena -->
Chief Isaac Folayan Alade, FNIA, DSc, OFR (24 Nọvemba 1933 - 19 Juun 2021) bụ onye ala Naijiria na-arụ ụlọ
Isaac gụrụ akwụkwọ na St Phillips Elementary School na Aramoko, Ekiti na Christ's School, Ado Ekiti maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
N'afọ 1961, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Nigerian College of Arts & Sciences and Technology Zaria (nke bụzi Ahmadu Bello University) dịka otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ anọ mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba Architecture
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Architectural Association School of Tropical Studies, London na 1965, na Commonwealth Scholarship
Mgbe ọ nwetachara ọzụzụ ọkachamara, ọ ghọrọ onye mmekọ nke Royal Institute of British Architects (RIBA) na Architects' Registration Council of the United Kingdom (ARCUK) na 1963
Ọ sonyeere Federal Ministry of Works and Housing dị ka onye na-arụ ụlọ na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ ochie na mgbe e mesịrị Lagos City Council
N'afọ 1969, ọ bụụrụ onye mbụ na-edebanye aha na Architects Registration Council of Nigeria (ARCON)
O mechara sonye na Federal Civil Service
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Royal Society of Health of the UK (FRSH) na 1965
Ọ ghọrọ Chief Project Architect na 1972, na Director of Public Buildings na 1975
Ọ bụ onye mbụ Architect ghọrọ Federal Permanent Secretary na 1976, ọkwa ọ nọrọ ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1979 mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o guzobere ọrụ onwe ya Fola Alade Associates na 1979
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ddka odeakwụkwọ ukwu na Nigerian Institute of Architects
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Pro-Chancellor na Chairman Governing Council nke Federal University of Port Harcourt n'afọ 1990
E nyere Fola Alade OFR wee bụrụ onye otu Nigerian Institute of Architects
O nwekwara ọtụtụ aha otutu ọdịnala gụnyere Maiyegun nke Aramoko
Fola Alade lụrụ Yemi n'afọ 1961
Ha mụtara ụmụ ise
Fola Alade gafere na June 19 th 2021 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asaa
Isaac Musekiwa (ihe dị ka afọ 1930 - 1991) bụ onye na-edekọ egwu na saxophonist, na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
Ọ bụbu onye otu soukous band TPOK Jazz, nke François Luambo Makiadi duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu Congo site n'afọ 1950s ruo 1980s
A mụrụ Musekiwa ma tolite na Southern Rhodesia (nke bụzi Zimbabwe), tupu ọ kwaga Congo-Kinshasa
Ya na Franco ghọrọ ezigbo enyi ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị ya na ya na-egwuri egwu mgbe niile n'afọ ndị ahụ niile
Isaac Sesi bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana, injinia, na onye guzobere Sesi Technologies, ụlọ ọrụ Ghana nke na-edozi nsogbu ọrụ ugbo na nri
A maara ya maka mmepe nke mita mmiri iji nyere ndị ọrụ ugbo Afrịka na-achị ndịda Sahara aka belata mfu mgbe owuwe ihe ubi gasịrị
Sesi bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na KWAME NKRUMAH UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (KNUST) ebe ọ gụrụ injinia ọkụỌ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na MFANTSIPIM SCHOOL, ebe ọ gụrụ sayensị izugbe
A maara Sesi maka ịmepụta mita mmiri a maara dị ka GrainMate
Ngwaọrụ a na-enye ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-ere ọka ohere ịlele oke mmiri nke ọka, ọka wit, ọka, na ihe ndị ọzọ
A makwaara ya dị ka onye mepụtara FarmSense, ihe ngwọta na-ahụ ala maka ndị ọrụ ugbo nke mere ka ọ banye na Global Innovation site na sayensị na teknụzụ (GIST) Tech-I Global Pitch asọmpi semifinals
Ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ya bụ Invent Electronic Company Limited, nke malitere na 2014, nke na-ere ihe electronic n'ịntanetị
N'afọ 2015, ọ gbagwojuru Wires na Bytes na mmekorita ya na ndị enyi ya atọ iji mepụta ngwa weebụ na ngwa-dị ka ọrụNa 2016 ha mepụtara PASCO, ngwa agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ mahadum
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ kwadoro 2eweboys, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na-emepụta ihe
na 2017, Sesi, mgbe ahụ, onye ọrụ nyocha na Ngalaba Agriculture na Biosystems Engineering

nke KWAME NKRUMAH UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY na Dr Paul Armstrong, onye nyocha na Ngalaba Agriculture nke United States, rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ na nri ọdịnihu Innovation Labmaka Mbelata oru ngo mfu owuwe ihe ubi n'oge na mmekorita ya na Kansas Mahadum steeti iji mepụta mita mmiri dị ọnụ ala Emebere igwe mmiri a na emume na KNUST

Kemgbe 2018, ya na òtù dị iche iche na-arụkọ ọrụ gụnyere World Food Programme Ghana na-enyere ndị na-ahụ maka anụ ọkụkọ na Layer Industries na Feed Improvement na Strategies(AMPLIFIES) Ghana Project nke bụ nri maka agamnihu mmemme nke US Department of Agriculture (USDA) iji na-agba ọsọ ọzụzụ mfu ihe ubi maka ndị ọrụ ugbo n'ofe Ghana
Isaac Nortey (amụrụ n'afọ 1999) bụ onye na-egwu tenis na Ghana na US
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agba bọọlụ tenis kachasị elu n'Afrika mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
A mụrụ Nortey na Accra na Ghana
Ọ na-amụ Mmepe mmadụ na ọmụmụ ezinụlọ
Ọ bi na United States
Nortey malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ tupu ọ gbanwee gaa tenis mgbe ọ dị afọ 7
Ọ malitere igwu egwu na Lakeland's Galindo Tennis
O meriri asọmpi isii
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na asọmpi Intercollegiate Njikọ Tenis nke e mere na Mexico
Na Juunu 2019 Nortey so n'òtù egwuregwu tennis nke Ghana iji sonye na Davis Otu iko IV na Brazzaville, Congo

Isaac Nortey Tenis Profaịlụ ọkpụkpọ | ITF (itftenniscom)
Isaac Uche (amuru 10 Eprel 1981) bu onye oso na Naijiria
O jiri ndị otu egwuregwu agbagharị 4 x 100 mita Naijiria nweta ihe nrite ọla edo na 2007 All-Africa Games
Na 60 mita ọ gụchara nke isii na asọmpi ime ụlọ nke ụwa nke 2008
Oge kacha mma nke onwe ya karịa 60 m bụ 662 sekọnd, ọ nwetara na February 2008 na Chemnitz
Àtụ Footer All-Africa Champions 4 × 100 m relay Men
Isaac Witkin
Isaac Witkin (10 Mee 1936 - 23 Eprel 2006) bụ onye na-ese ihe n'oge a a ma ama n'ụwa niile nke amụrụ na Johannesburg, South Africa
Witkin banyere Saint Martin's School of Art na London na 1957 wee mụọ n'okpuru Sir Anthony Caro na ndị na-ese ihe nke gụnyere Phillip King, William G
Tucker, David Annesley, na Michael Bolus
Witkin nyere aka mepụta ụdị ihe ọkpụkpụ ọhụrụ nke dugara na Ọgbọ Ọhụrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe na ụdị ihe ọchụkpụ nke oge a na-eru ma na-agbanwe ụwa nka
A maara ọrụ ndị na-adịghị ahụkebe nke Witkin nke fiberglass ma ọ bụ osisi na-enwekarị ụcha na-egbuke egbuke maka 'ọdịdị dị nkọ, Pop-Art'
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Saint Martin na 1960, Witkin bụ nwa ọrụ Henry Moore ruo afọ 1963

A nabatara ọrụ Witkin nke ọma na ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Rowan Gallery, London na ihe ngosi dị mkpa nke 1964 na Whitechapel Gallery, kwa na London, ebe Witkin na ndị na-ese ihe 'Ọgbọ Ọhụrụ' nke Saint Martin mere nnukwu ntinye ha n'ime ụwa nka Bekee
N'afọ 1965, ọrụ ya nwetara ihe nrite mbụ na Paris Biennale
Akụkụ ya, Nagas, gụnyere na ihe ngosi nke 1966, 'Primary Structures' na Jewish Museum na New York na-anọchite anya mmetụta Britain na 'New Art' nke Anthony Caro kwadoro
Witkin si n'ụlọ akwụkwọ gaa n'ụlọ nkụzi, na-akụzi na Saint Martin ruo afọ abụọ
Ọ kwagara na United States

Na Bennington College, Bennington, Vermont, Witkin so otu ndị na-ese ihe a maara dị ka 'ụmụ nwoke Green Mountain' rụọ ọrụ, ndị na-akụzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ma ọ bụ sonye n'otu nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'ógbè ahụ, nke gụnyere ndị ama ama dị ka onye na-ese Kenneth Noland, Helen Frankenthaler, Larry Poons, Paul Feeley na Jules Olitski na onye na-enyocha nka Clement Greenberg
Ọrụ Witkin n'oge a dị n'ụdị abstractions formalist, na-esi na fiberglass na osisi nke ọrụ mbụ ya gaa na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe siri ike nke nwere ihe dị mgbagwoju anya nke Cubist
A nabatara ndị a nke ọma na America, ọkachasị n'oge ngosi afọ 1966 na Jewish Museum, na New York City, na ngosipụta ndị ọzọ dị iche iche n'obodo ahụ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
N'afọ 1976, Witkin bụ isiokwu nke ihe ngosi PBS, Sculpture by Isaac Witkin, nke Neal Marshad duziri
N'afọ 1978, Witkin kwagara New Jersey, na-ejikọta ya na Johnson Atelier, Princeton, New Jersey, ebe ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ebi
N'oge a, Witkin mepụtara ụdị nke ga-eme ka ọrụ ya fọdụrụ
N'ebe a, ọ chọpụtara usoro nke ịwụsa ọla nchara a gbazere agbaze n'ime ájá mmiri n'ala iji mepụta ụdị ọdịdị

Site n'ịchịkọta ụdị ndị a, ọ na-etinye aka na 'mmepụta asụsụ site na omume nke ígwè, na-egbochi usoro site na ọgba aghara' dịka e kwuru ya ka ọ na-akọwa usoro ahụ na obituary ya na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ The Times Online
Ihe ndị fọdụrụ n'ọrụ ya bụ ọla nchara, ma a wụsara ma tụgharịa ya, jiri kemịkal na-acha ya iji nwee patinas dịgasị iche iche
Otú ọ dị, a rụkwara ọrụ ụfọdụ mgbe e mesịrị na nkume, ọ bụ ezie na n'otu ụdị ahụ dị ka ọla nchara a wụsara
Witkin mechara kụzie na Parsons School of Design, New York, New York
A kwanyeere ya ugwu dị ka onye otu National Academy, New York, NY na dị ka onye òtù, Royal Society of British Sculptors

N'oge ọrụ ya, Witkin nwetakwara onyinye ndị a State of New Jersey Art Achievement Award, Burlington County College Foundation; Adolph and Esther Gottlieb Foundation Grant; New Jersey State Council on the Arts Grant na 1981 Guggenheim Fellowship
Site n'ọrụ ya, Witkin matara onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akwado nka J
Seward Johnson, Jr, nke Johnson na Johnsons

Ọbụbụenyi a nyere Witkin ohere ime ka Johnson zụta ma gbanwee New Jersey Fairgrounds a gbahapụrụ agbahapụ ka ọ bụrụ Grounds for Sculpture Park, ihe ngosi 35 acres (140,000 m2) nke ihe ọkpụkpụ na Hamilton Township, New Jersey
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Witkin so na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Grounds

A na-agụnyekwa ọrụ Witkins na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Smithsonian American Art Museum, Washington DC, Centre for Modern Art, Calouste Gulbenkian Foundation, Lisbon, Portugal; Fine Arts Museum, Mahadum Sydney, Australia; Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden, Washington, DC; Laumier Sculptura Park, St
Louis, MO; Tate Gallery, London; na The Israel Museum, Jerusalem
A na-egosikwa ọrụ ya na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ezinụlọ ya, wwwisaacwitkincom
Isaac Witkin nwụrụ na 23 Eprel 2006 site na ọrịa nkụchi obi n'ụlọ ya na Pemberton, New Jersey
Ụmụ ya nwanyị abụọ, nnukwu ọrụ ya, na ndị na-ese ihe ọ kpaliri bụ ndị ọ hapụrụ
Isaac Wright Jr
(amụrụ na Jenụwarị 23, 1962) bụ ónyé ọka iwu America, onye ndụmọdụ, onye ọchụnta ego, na ónyé ọrụ ebere
A maara ya nke ọma maka ebubo ụgha ma maa ya ikpe dị ka onye na-ere ọgwụ ọjọọ ma maa ya mkpọrọ ndụ ya niile na 1991 na-eche ebubo iri metụtara ire cocaine ihu
A tụgharịrị ikpe ya n'afọ 1997 mgbè ikpe ọ wetara n'ihi nrụrụ aka ndị uwe ojii n'oge nyocha ya na ónyé ọkàiwu maara na ọ na-agba akaebe ụgha na ikpe ya
A na-egosi akụkọ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn / usoro ihe nkírí 'For Life', nke gosipụtara na 2020 na American Broadcasting Company
Ọ bụ ónyé na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ọbọdọ nke New York City na ntuli aka ónyé isi ọbọdọ New York City nke 2021
A mụrụ Wright na Jenụwarị 23, 1962, na Orlando, Florida, nke Isaac Wright Sr
na Sandra B
Wright
Nna Wright bụ ónyé agha na-arụ ọrụ ma Wright biri n'ọtụtụ ọbọdọ dị na US na mbà ofesi
Ọ gàrà Berkeley High School na Moncks Corner, South Carolina
Na mbido afọ 1980, Wright, mgbè ya na nwunye ya na nwa ya nwanyị bi na New York City, pụtara na ihe ngosi talent Star Search ruo ọtụtụ izu dị ka Ónyé otu egwu egwu atọ Uptown Express

Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ 1980 ọ bụ ónyé njikwa nkà ma nwee akara ndekọ onwé ya a na-akpọ X-Press Records mgbe nwunye ya, Sunshine, bụ ónyé otu na-ere platinum nke ọ kwadoro nke a na- bingaka The Cover Girls, otu egwu pop na nke ọbọdọ
N'afọ 1989, e jidere Isaac Wright Jr
ma boo ya ebubo ụgha na ọ bụ ónyé isi n'azụ otu n'ime nnukwu netwọk nkesa ọgwụ na mpaghara New York / New Jersey
Mgbè e jidere ya ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ abụọ, e kpere ya ikpe na 1991 ma maa ya ikpe n'okpuru iwu ọgwụ ọjọọ nke New Jersey
E mechara maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ ndụ ya niile n'ihi ikpe a mara ya na ngụkọta afọ 72 màkà ebubo ndị ọzọ
Zachari Bankolé (a mụrụ na 12 Ọgọst 1957), nke a maara dịka Isaach ma ọ bụ Isaac de Bankolé, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ivorian-French-American
A mụrụ De Bankolé n'obodo Abidjan, Ivory Coast, nne na nna Yoruba si Benin
Nne na nna nna ya si Naijiria
Ọ kwagara Paris n'afọ 1975 maka afọ ikpeazụ ya na lycée, wee nweta nzere masta na physics na mgbakọ na mwepụ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ụgbọ elu wee nweta ikikere onye na-anya ụgbọelu onwe ya, tupu ya na onye nduzi French Gérard Vergez ezute ya mere ka ọ banye na Cours Simon, ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri Paris

De Bankolé apụtala na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri ise, gụnyere Jim Jarmusch's Night on Earth, Ghost Dog The Way of the Samurai, Coffee and Cigarettes na The Limits of Control Ọ nọ na United States kemgbe afọ 1997
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Machetero, n'ọrụ onye nta akụkọ na-agba onye na-eme mgbanwe na Puerto Rican a tụrụ mkpọrọ ajụjụ ọnụ, ya na ndị otu Ricanstruction nke dị na New York City
De Bankolé apụtawokwa na Lars von Trier's Manderlay

O gosipụtara Steven Obanno, onye na-eyi ọha egwu, na ihe nkiri James Bond nke afọ 2006 Casino Royale, nakwa 'The Lone Man', onye na-egbu mmadụ na ihe nkiri Jim Jarmusch, The Limits of Control (afọ 2009)
N'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara dịka Ayodele Balogun na Andrew Dosunmu's Mother of George, nke gosipụtara n'afọ 2013 Sundance Film Festival ma bụrụ nhọrọ abalị mmechi maka Maryland Film Festival afọ 2013
O nweela ọrụ na Calvary, The Last Witch Hunter, na Black Panther
De Bankolé na-asụ Yoruba, Bambara, Bekee, French, German nke ọma, ma na-asukwa ụfọdụ Italian
Ọ lụrụ onye egwu Cassandra Wilson site n'afọ 2000 ruo afọ 2003
Isabel Jean Jones bụ onye nta akụkọ South Africa nke a mụrụ na Bekee, nke a kacha mara amara maka mmemme ikike ndị ahịa ya Fair Deal
Ọ nwụrụ na Johannesburg na 11 Maachị 2008, mgbe a nabatara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ na 7 Maachị 2008
A nabatabu ya n'ụlọọgwụ na Disemba 2007, bụ ebe a wara ya ịwa obi
A mụrụ Jones na London, mana o biri na South Africa afọ iri abụo
N'afọ 2007, ọ meriri dti Award for Consumer Champions
Jones nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ na 11 Maachị 2008, mgbe a nabatara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ na 7 Maachị 2008
Emere olili ya na International Consumer Day, na 15 Maachị 2008

Isabel Jeans (16 Septemba 1891 -4 Septemba 1985) bụ onye England na-eme ihe nkiri a maara maka ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Alfred Hitchcock na ngosipụta ya nke Aunt Alicia na ihe nkiri egwu nke 1958 Gigi
A mụrụ na London, Jeans bụ nwa nwaanyị nke onye na-enyocha nka
O mere atụmatụ ịghọ onye na-agụ egwu mana ọ malitere ọrụ ya na London na 1908 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, na oku nke Herbert Beerbohm Tree
Ọ pụtara na mbụ na Broadway na The Man Who Married a Dumb Wife na Jenụwarị 1915 na dị ka Titania na A Midsummer Night's Dream na Febụwarị 1915
O mere Lady Mercia Merivale na egwu nke London Kissing Time (1919)
Ọ pụtara na mmepụta nke James Elroy Flecker's Hassan na His Majesty's Theatre na London na 1923
Egwú mberede maka egwuregwu ahụ bụ nke Frederick Delius, Fokine mepụtara ballet na House-of-the-Moving Walls
N'afọ 1924, ọ pụtara na ihe egwuregwu Ivor Novello The Rat na Prince of Wales's Theatre na London
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ nọ na egwuregwu Richard Brinsley Sheridan The Rivals na Lyric Theatre, Hammersmith, ya na di mbụ ya Claude Rains, nwunye mbụ ya Marie Hemingway, na nwunye ya ugbu a Beatrix Thomson

Ọ pụtara na nnukwu ọrụ na ihe nkiri abụọ Alfred Hitchcock, Downhill (1927) na Easy Virtue (1928) na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ nke ndi Britain, wee mee ọtụtụ nnukwu nwanyị na ihe nkiri Hollywood, dị ka Suspicion (1941), Banana Ridge (1942), (1958) na A Breath of Scandal (1960)
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ e mere n'elu ihe nkiri gụnyere The Beggar's Opera na Comedy Theatre, London na 1935, mweghachi nke The Happy Hypocrite na 1936
Ọrụ Broadway mechara bụrụ Crystal Wetherby na The Man in Possession na 1930 na Mrs
Emmeline Lucas na Make Way for Lucia na 1948
James's Theatre), ihe nkiri Jean Anouilh, 'Ardele' (1951 na Vaudeville Theatre), ihe egwuregwu Noël Coward, The Vortex (1952 na Lyric Theater na Hammersmith), ihe nkiri T
Eliot bụ The Confidential Clerk (1953 na Lyric Drama), ihe nkiri William Congreve bụ The Double Dealer (1959 na Old Vic Theatre, ma na-eme n'ebe ahụ n'oge ahụ

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na West End nke Oscar Wilde, gụnyere Lady Windermere's Fan (1945 na Haymarket Theatre, nke John Gielgud duziri na 1966 na Phoenix Theatre (London)), A Woman of No Importance (1953 na Savoy Theatre) na dị ka Lady Bracknell na The Importance of Being Earnest (1968 na Haymarket Theater)
Nwanne nwoke Jeans bụ Desmond bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-akụ ọkpọ, nwanne ya nwaanyị bụ Ursula bikes Onye na- eme ihe onyonyo a na - akwanyere ugwu

Ọ lụrụ di ugboro abụọ nke mbụ ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Claude Rains, site na 1913 ruo 1915, emechaa o luo onye ọka iwu na odee bu Gilbert Edward 'Gilley' Wakefield site na 1920 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1963
Isabel Frances Longworth (1 June 1881 - 13 Jenụwarị 1961) bụ dọkịta ezé na onye na-ahụ maka udo n'Australia
A mụrụ Isabel Frances Swann na 1 Juun n'afọ 1881 na Temora, ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ a mụrụ n'England William Swann na Elizabeth, née Devlin
Isabel debara aha ya dị ka dọkịta ezé na 20 Juun afọ 1902 wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Parramatta; ka ọ na-erule afọ 1912 o nwere adreesị na Liverpool Street
A zụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ na-eme udo, ndị ọrịa ya gụnyere Miles Franklin, Jennie Scott Griffiths, na ndị ọzọ, ọ sonyeere Australian Freedom League n'afọ 1912
Ọ bụ onye na-emegide ịdebanye aha nke nwere nkụda mmụọ n'àgwà Rose Scott na ndị na-akwado ya, bụ ndị Swann hụrụ dị ka ndị na-akwalite agha n'aha nchebe
Na ngwụcha afọ 1910 Swann bụ ọkà okwu na Socialist Sunday Schools ma tinye aka n'ọtụtụ ihe na-ese okwu, gụnyere mmegide megide ikele ọkọlọtọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Howard Prison Reform League
Onye na-ede akwụkwọ nke Henry Holland, o kwuru na ọ bụ ya kpatara ịkwụsị ọrụ na Fiji dị ka akụkụ nke kọmitii Anglo-Indian
Ọ zoro ụmụ amaala New Guinea na Sydney ruo mgbe ọnọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ha ka mma ma nọchite anya Women's International League for Peace and Freedom na nzukọ Australian Peace Alliance n'afọ 1921
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1924, ọ lụrụ William Longworth, onye na-egwe ihe, na Randwick; ha nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Isabel Jean
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Wyong n'afọ 1932 ebe ha nwara ịzụlite passionfruit n'ahịa, wee gaa Newcastle na 1936
O nyere aka ịhazi nzukọ udo na Christian Socialist Movement, ebe ọ rụrụ ụka megide ọchịchị aka ike
Onye na-akwado Soviet Union, Longworth enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'asọmpi oche ndị nnọchiteanya nke Newcastle (1946) na Shortland (1949) dị ka onye Socialist sayensị Independent
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 78, a matara ya dị ka dọkịta ezé na-arụ ọrụ ogologo oge na Australia
Longworth nwụrụ na 13 Jenụwarị n'afọ 1961 na Newcastle ma kpọọ ozu ya ọkụ na ụdị Congregational
Isabel Manuel Nkavadeka bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba Mozambik
Ọ bụ onye otu FRELIMO nke ahọpụtara ka O soro na Nzukọ ndị omeiwu nke mba Mozambique n'afọ 1999 ịnọchite anya mpaghara Cabo Delgado
N'afọ 2004, ọ bụkwa onye otu Pan-African Parliament nke si Mozambique
N'afọ 2005, ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ndị omeiwu

Isabel dos Santos (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 20 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1973) bụ nwanyị na-azụ ahịa nke Angola na Russia, nwa mbụ nke onye isi ala Angola bụbu José Eduardo dos Santos, onye chịrị mba ahụ dị ka onye ọchịchị aka ike site n'afọ 1979 ruo n'afọ 2017

[nkọwa dị mkpa] Ozugbo e lere ya anya dị ka nwanyị kasị baa ọgaranya n'Africa dị ka magazin Forbes si kwuo, na ọnụ ahịa ya karịrị ijeri US $ 2, e wepụrụ ya na ndepụta magazin ahụ na Jenụwarị 2021 mgbe a kpọchiri akụ ya na Angola, Portugal na Netherlands
O ji ụlọ ọrụ PT Ventures ụgwọ nde $ 340
N'afọ 2013 Forbes kọwara otú dos Santos si nweta akụ na ụba ya site n'itinye aka na ụlọ ọrụ na-azụ ahịa na Angola, na-atụ aro na akụ na ụba ya sitere na ike na njikọ ezinụlọ ya
Gọọmentị Angola, kemgbe afọ 2018, na-anwa ikpe Isabel dos Santos ikpe na nrụrụ aka gara aga nke nwere ike ibute ọdịda Angola na-aga n'ihu
Na 30 Disemba 2019, Ụlọikpe mpaghara Luanda nyere iwu ka a kpọchie akaụntụ ụlọ akụ nke dos Santos nke Angola ma weghara osisi ya na ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara, gụnyere Unitel na Banco de Fomento Angola
A na-enyocha ya na Portugal ma kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-ewere United Arab Emirates dị ka mba obibi ya

Izu abụọ ka e mesịrị, Gọọmentị Angola kwupụtara na ọ na-akwadebe agha iwu maka ịnara akụ dos Santos na Portugal, usoro nke na-arụ ọrụ n'ụdị akwụkwọ ozi rogatory zigara Portugal iji kwụsị ịnyefe ego site na Portuguese Commercial Bank gaa na ụlọ akụ Russia
[nke?] Na Disemba 2021 amachibidoro Dos Santos ịbanye na United States maka 'Nnukwu Nrụ Aka'

A mụrụ Isabel dos Santos na Baku, Azerbaijan SSR, ọkpara nke onye isi ala Angola bụbu José Eduardo dos Santos na nwunye mbụ ya, Tatiana Kukanova, onye amụrụ na Russia, onye ọ zutere mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na mba Soviet nke Azerbaijan
Nne na nna nna ya si São Tomé na Príncipe
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị niile na Kent, Cobham Hall School, na St Paul's Girls' School na London
Ọ gụrụ injinia eletriki na King's College na London
N'ebe ahụ, ọ zutere di ya si Zaire (nke bụzi Democratic Republic of the Congo), Sindika Dokolo, nwa nke otu nde mmadụ si Kinshasa na nwunye ya Danish
Isabel dos Santos bụ nwa amaala Russia na Angola
Malite n'afọ 1997, Isabel dos Santos banyere n'ụwa azụmahịa, na-eke ụlọ ọrụ na njide na Angola na ọtụtụ mba ofesi, na-etinye nnukwu ego na ụlọ ọrụ dị elu, ọkachasị na Portugal
Na mbido afọ 90 Isabel dos Santos malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ injinia maka Urbana 2000, onye enyemaka nke Jembas Group, nke meriri nkwekọrịta iji mee ka obodo ahụ dị ọcha ma kpochapụ ya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o guzobere azụmahịa ụgbọ oloko
Ojiji zuru oke nke teknụzụ walkie-talkie meghere ụzọ maka ịbanye na telecoms
N'afọ 1997, ọ malitere azụmahịa mbụ ya, na-emeghe Miami Beach Club, otu n'ime klọb abalị mbụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị n'ụsọ osimiri na Luanda Island
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2016, nna ya họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Sonangol, ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ steeti Angola
Nhọpụta a na-ese okwu n'ihi nhọpụta yiri nke ụmụ onye isi ala na ọkwa ndị dị mkpa adịteghị aka, dịka João Lourenço, onye isi ala Angola ọhụrụ, chụrụ ya n'ọrụ naanị ọnwa abụọ ka ọ ṅụsịrị iyi ọrụ
Na 30 Disemba 2019, Ụlọikpe mpaghara Luanda nyere iwu ka e weghara akaụntụ akụ nke dos Santos, di ya, Sindika Dokolo, na Mário Filipe Moreira Leite da Silva
Dị ka ụlọ ọrụ Attorney General si kwuo, ndị ọchụnta ego atọ ahụ banyere nkwekọrịta na steeti Angola site na ụlọ ọrụ Sodiam, ụlọ ọrụ na-ere diamond ọha na eze, na Sonangol, ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ steeti
Site na nkwekọrịta ndị a, steeti Angola furu efu nke ijeri $ 114
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ mepụtara akwụkwọ na-egosi na akụ na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ nke dos Santos nwere nwetara site na iji ego sitere na ụlọ ọrụ steeti abụọ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ụlọ ọrụ onye ọka iwu nke Portugal ekpughere na e mepere nyocha banyere ọtụtụ ọrụ nke Isabel dos Santos, na-esote ebubo nke Ana Gomes, onye otu Portuguese nke nzuko omeiwu Europe
Mgbe njide ahụ gasịrị, ọ weere UAE dị ka mba obibi ya
Ihe onwunwe nke dos Santos n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya
Na 19 Jenụwarị 2020 International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ) bipụtara akụkọ zuru ezu banyere otú dos Santos si chịkọta akụ na ụba ya kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, ụbọchị atọ ka ihe ahụ gbapụtara, a hụrụ onye njikwa akụ na ụba ya na onye isi ụlọ akụ nke onwe ya bụ Nuno Ribeiro da Cunha nwụrụ n'ime ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala nke ụlọ ya
Isabella Agbor Ayuk bụ onye nlere anya na Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka
Ọ bụ nwanyị mara mma na mbụ na onye mmeri nke Most Beautiful Girl in Nigeria Universe 2012
Amụrụ ya na ezinụlọ ọtụtụ nwanyị, Ayuk bụ nke iri abụọ n'ime ụmụaka iri abụọ na anọ
Ọ mụrụ Nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Calabar, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na 2011, ma na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye youth corper
Tupu o nwee mmeri MBGN, ọ bụbu onye amaala aka na asọmpi nke 2009 na 2010, yana Miss Nigeria 2004, Miss South South 2007, na Miss Global Nigeria 2009
Dị ka otu n'ime ndị asọmpi ole na ole na-anọchite anya steeti ha si
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole na-abụghị South East nwetere aha ahụ kemgbe Celia Bissong na 2003 na Agbani Darego 2001 ndi niile si South-South
Ayuk okpueze Onye kacha mara mma na Nigeria na emume emere na Best Western Hotel na Benin City na Mee 2012 Ihe gbadoro ụkwụ ya n’ebe a bụ Ọgwụ Typhoid maka ncheta nwanne ya nwaanyị nwụrụ n’ọrịa ahụ

Ka ọ na-erule na njedebe nke Mee 2012, a kọọrọ na Ayuk ghaghaara afọ ya iji nwee ike ịsọ mpi na asọmpi ahụ (ekwuru na ọ dị afọ iri atọ mgbe o mechara merie aha ahụ mgbe ọ sonyere na mbipụta ndị gara aga), o si otú a na-ewebata nnukwu mpaghara ihere na-ebelata kemgbe 2001 ka achupuru Valerie Peterside dika Miss Nigeria maka ụdị ihe ahụ Ọ bụ ezie na Ayuk n'onwe ya ka na-ekwu okwu, ndị na-ahazi Silverbird abịawo na-agbachitere ya site n'ikwu na n'adịghị ka nkwenkwe ndị mmadụ na-ewu ewu, Ayuk apụtaghị n'ọchịchị ma ga-aga n'ihu na-achị dị ka MBGN 2012
Ọ nọchiteghi anya Naịjirịa na Miss World, mana onye nọchiri anya MBGN 2012 bụ Damiete Charles-Granville nọchiri ya
