Isabella Ormston Ford (23 Mee 1855 - 14 Julaị 1924) bụ onye England na-eme mgbanwe na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na onye edemede
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha ma dee akwụkwọ nta banyere okwu ndị metụtara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ụmụ nwanyị na ikike ndị ọrụ
Mgbe ọ malitere ichegbu onwe ya banyere ikike nke ndị ọrụ igwe nwanyị n'oge ha dị obere, Ford sonyeere òtù ndị ọrụ na 1880s
Onye otu National Administrative Council nke Independent Labour Party, ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ kwuru okwu na Kọmitii Na-anọchite anya Labour (nke ghọrọ British Labour Party)
A mụrụ Isabella Ford na 23 Mee 1855 na Headingley, Leeds, n'ebe ugwu England
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ asatọ nke Quakers Robert Lawson Ford na Hannah (née Pease)
Nne ya bụ nwa nwanne nne nke abụọ nke abolitionist Elizabeth Pease Nichol na nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu na onye nwe ala
Ndị na-elekọta ụlọ kụziiri Ford na ụmụnne ya nwanyị n'ụlọ, na-amụta ihe dịgasị iche iche ma na-asụ French na German nke ọma
Nne na nna ya kwadoro ụlọ akwụkwọ abalị maka ụmụ agbọghọ na East End nke Leeds, ebe ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Mmekọrịta ya na ụmụ agbọghọ ndị a nyere Ford na ụmụnne ya nwanyị nghọta banyere ọdịiche dị iche iche na mmasị na ọnọdụ ọrụ
Mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ iri na abụọ, ọ ṅụrụ iyi n'ihu enyi ya na ọ ga-eme ka ọnọdụ ụwa dị mma
N'ịgbaso ihe nlereanya nke ndị mụrụ ya siri ike, Isabella mere mkpọsa maka ọtụtụ ihe n'oge ndụ ya
N'afọ 1880, Ford sonyeere òtù ndị ọrụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị na-akwa ákwà na-eme mkpọsa maka ọnọdụ ọrụ ka mma; o nyeere ha aka ịmepụta òtù ọrụ aka ma tinye aka mgbe ha mere ngagharị iwe na 1889
N'afọ 1890-91, ya na ndị ọrụ si Manningham Mills na Bradford gara njem
N'ihi itinye aka ya, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Leeds Trades and Labour Council
O nyere aka chọta Leeds Independent Labour Party (ILP) ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke Leeds Tailoresses' Union
Nchegbu ya bụ nzukọ ndị ọrụ, ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na ikike ụmụ nwanyị
O meriri ihere sitere n'okike ịghọ onye ọkà okwu ihu ọha nwere ahụmahụ, na-ekwu okwu n'ọtụtụ nzukọ metụtara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ikike ndị ọrụ na nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị
O dere ọtụtụ mpempe akwụkwọ, yana otu kọlụm na Leeds Forward
N'afọ 1895, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl parish maka Adel cum Eccup na Leeds
N'afọ 1900, Ford lekwasịrị anya n'ọrụ ya maka ILP, a họpụtakwara ya na National Administrative Council ruo afọ anọ
Ọ malitere itinye aka na mmegharị nke ụmụ nwanyị, mana o chere na ụmụ nwanyị na mmegharị ọrụ dị oke mkpa
N'afọ 1903, o kwuru okwu na nnọkọ kwa afọ nke Kọmitii Na-anọchite anya Ndị Ọrụ (mgbe e mesịrị British Labour Party), ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ mere ya
Amamihe asụsụ Ford mere ka o nwee ike ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ntụgharị na nzukọ ndị ọrụ mba ụwa
A gwakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu ma tụọ aro ka ọ bụrụ Lady Lord Mayor of Leeds, mana ọ jụrụ ime ya
Ford kwadoro ikike ụmụ anụmanụ ma bụrụ onye na-eri akwụkwọ nri
Ọ bụ onye na-emegide vivisectionist ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Leeds RSPCA
N'afọ 1896, Ford bịanyere aka na mkpesa nke Humanitarian League megide vivisection

Mgbe arụmụka ya na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ọdịnihu bụ Margaret Bondfield gasịrị n'afọ 1904, Sylvia Pankhurst kọwara Ford dị ka 'nwaanyị dị ọcha, nke dị n'agbata afọ iri na ụma, nke ihu ya na okpu na-acha ọbara ọbara gburu n'elu ntutu isi ya kwụ ọtọ, nke ọdịdị ya yiri m
dị obiọma ma dị omimi karịa nke onye iro ya na-eto eto'
Ntiwapụ nke Agha Ụwa Mbụ hụrụ ka Ford lekwasịrị anya na mkpọsa maka udo
O nyere aka ịhazi nzukọ udo ụmụ nwanyị na 4 Ọgọstụ, 1914 (ụbọchị Britain banyere n'agha) na Kingsway Hall, na Leeds o guzobere alaka nke Women's International League na nke Women'S Peace Crusade

Ford na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Labour Philip Snowden, onye edemede Ethel Snowden, Onye edemede Socialist Edward Carpenter, onye na-ede uri Walt Whitman, Josephine Butler, Millicent Fawcett na Olive Schreiner ghọrọ enyi
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ nọ na kọmitii mbụ nke Leeds Arts Club
Isabella nwere nchegbu maka ọdịmma anụmanụ ma bụrụ onye na-eri akwụkwọ nri
Ọ bụkwa onye na-akpọ piano nke ọma ma nyere nwanne ya nwanyị Bessie aka ịme kọntaktị egwu oge ochie n'efu maka ndị na-arụ ọrụ na Leeds
Ya na ụmụnne ya nwanyị Bessie na Emily biri na Adel Grange, ụlọ Leeds nke ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara mgbe ọ dị afọ 10
Isabella na Bessie nwekwara ụlọ na London ebe ha ga-anọ mgbe ha nọ n'obodo ahụ
Bessie Ford nwụrụ na 1919 ma ụmụnne ya nwanyị kwagara n'ụlọ nta a na-akpọ Adel Willows na 1922
Isabella Ford nwụrụ na 14 Julaị 1924 mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ọtụtụ ọnwa ma lie ya n'ebe a na-eli ozu Quaker dị nso n'ụlọ ya na Adel
Aha Ford na onyinyo ya, na nke ụmụ nwanyị 58 ndị ọzọ na-akwado ikike nhọpụta, ka edere na ntọala nke ihe oyiyi nke Millicent Fawcett na Parliament Square, London nke a kpughere na 2018
Isabella Motadinyane (afo 1963 - 2003) bụ onye South Africa na -ede uri, onye na-agụ uri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na Soweto ma bụrụ onye guzobere òtù uri Botsotso Jesters, ma nọrọkwa na bọọdụ nchịkọta akụkọ nke Botsotso Publishing, aha ha abụọ n'ahịrị sitere na otu n'ime uri ya ' die is mos bosotsos'
O dere ma mee ihe n'ọtụtụ asụsụ, gụnyere Bekee, Sotho, Camtho na Afrikaans

N'afọ 1997, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ gara asọmpi na France maka agbụrụ mba ofesi mbụ ya
A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Kenya na 2001 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships, ebe ọ mechara nke asatọ
O sonyere na IAAF World Cross Country Championships n'etiti afọ 2002 na 2006, nsonaazụ kachasị mma bụ ọla nchara dị mkpirikpi na 2002 na 2005
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2006, ọ meriri otu ebe ahụ na Commonwealth Games
N'ọnwa Eprel n'otu afọ ahụ, o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na asọmpi otu na World Cross Country Championships, ebe ọ mechara nke iri na ọsọ dị mkpirikpi, ebe ọ ritere ọla nchara na 2002 na 2005
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke ọrụ ya, Ochichi kwụsịrị ịgba ọsọ ọkachamara na 2006
Ọ laghachiri na asọmpi afọ asaa ka e mesịrị na 2013
N'ọsọ nlọghachi ya na Prague Half Marathon ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke atọ na oge 1 09 21 awa (otu n'ime oge kachasị ọsọ ya)

Atụrụ m anya na m ga-agba ọsọ nke ọma, mana echeghị m na m ga ga-enweta ọnọdụ nke atọ'

Isabelle Djibgodi Améganvi Manavi (amụrụ na ọnwa Septemba 3 nke afọ 1961) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Togolese
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Togo n'afọ 2007
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịhazi ọgbaghara mmekọahụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2012, na-eme mkpesa maka mgbanwe ntuli aka nke kwadoro pati na-achị
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke mba ahụ nke ugboro abụọ
A mụrụ Améganvi na 3 Septemba 1961 n'obodo Kpalimé, mba Togo, nwa nke isii n'ime ụmụ asatọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Evangelical School Hanoukopé
Ọ debara aha ya na kọleji Notre Dame des Apôtre na Tokoin Lycée na Lomé, isi obodo Togo
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Lycée Jean-Baptiste Say na Paris, France, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta ya na afọ 1983
Améganvi nwetara akara ugo mmụta n'iwu na Mahadum Paris I na afọ 1989 na nzere masta nke iwu na Mahadụ Benin n'afọ sochirinụ
Améganvi bụ onye ọka iwu na-enweta ọzụzụ n'okpuru Ahlin K
Komlan na Lomé site na afọ 1994 ruo na afọ 1996
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1997, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa n'ụlọikpe dị na mba Togo
Dị ka onye ọka iwu, ọ na-anọchite anya ụmụ akwụkwọ, ndị mkpọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndị nta akụkọ, ndị otu ọrụ na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ
N'afọ ndị 1990, ọ sonyeere Njikọ Togolese nke Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ na Collective of Associations of Women
Ameganvi mechara rụọ ọrụ na kọmitii iwu nke Evangelical Presbyterian Church of Togo
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke mba Togo na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2007, na-anọchite anya Union of Forces for Change (UFC)
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 2010, a chụpụrụ ya n'òtù ahụ ma tụfuo oche ya na mgbakọ ahụ
Ọ bụ onye ndú nke ngalaba ikike ụmụ nwanyị nke otu Let's Save Togo, njikọ nke otu ndị otu obodo itoolu na òtù na-emegide ya asaa

N'otu nnọkọ e mere n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, nke ọtụtụ puku mmadụ bịara, ọ kpọrọ ụmụ nwanyị Togo ka ha mee ngagharị iwe maka mmekọahụ ruo otu izu megide mgbanwe ntuli aka ndị na-adịbeghị anya, nke ga-eme ka ọ dịrị ndị otu onye isi ala na-achị Faure Gnassingbe mfe imeri ntuli aka ọzọ na ntuli aka omebe iwu a haziri maka Ọktoba n'afọ 2012
Ezinụlọ Gnassingbe achịla Togo ruo afọ 45
Ọ bụ mwakpo mmekọahụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Liberia nke Ellen Johnson Sirleaf duziri kpaliri ya, bụ ndị jiri usoro ahụ mee ihe n'afọ 2003 iji mee ka udo dị n'oge agha
Na mgbakwunye, Ameganvi gbara ụmụ nwanyị ume ka ha na-eyi naanị uwe uhie iji guzogide ịtụ mkpọrọ nke ndị na-akwado mmegide 120
'Anyị nwere ike ịgbanwe ihe
Anyị achọghị ịnọ na kichin, mana anyị nwere ike ikwu okwu anyị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, 'Ameganvi kwuru
'Anyị enweghị ike ịnọgide na-ejide onwe anyị, ebe a na-edebe ụmụ anyị na di anyị n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
' O mere mkpesa na ụmụ nwanyị na-ebu nsogbu akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Togo ma ha adịghịzi njikere ịnagide ya
Amenganvi duziri ngagharị iwe ọzọ na 20 Disemba 2012 ebe ọ gbara ụmụ nwanyị ume ka ha na-eyi uwe uhie
Ngagharị iwe a bụ megide ọnọdụ akụ na ụba dị egwu nke ụmụ nwanyị na Togo
A họọrọ ụcha uhie n'ihi na ụmụ nwanyị Togolese na-eme ma na-ere uwe uhie n'ahịa
Ameganvi bụ onye otu nke National Alliance for Change (ANC)
Na June 2013, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na ANC
Ameganvi kwuru ọtụtụ nkụda mmụọ na mmechuihu sitere na ịmepụta ndepụta nke ndị na-azọ ọkwa maka ntuli aka ndị omeiwu na-abịanụ

Isadora Verwey, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-egosi ihe ngosi na onye na-ekwuputa okwu dika ihe nkiri na-eme
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri, Atlantis End of a World, Birth of a Legend, Kantlyn na ihe nkiri telivishọn, Getroud zutere rugby na 7de Laan
Nna ya Louw Verwey bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na Febụwarị 17, 1930
Ọrụ ya a ma ama sitere na ihe nkiri; The Gods Must Be Crazy na My Naam is Dingetjie
Isadora gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ngalaba Drama, Mahadum Stellenbosch
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta Diplọma ndị omee na Mahadum nke Cape Town
Site na 1982 ruo 1986 n'oge ndụ ya na mahadum, ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka; Equus (1982), Oidipus (1982)
Die Keiser (1983), The Crucible (1983), Die Van Aardes van Grootoor (1984), The Trojan Women (1984), Liefdeskringloop (1985), Spring Awakening (1984), na The Caucasian Chalk Circle (1986)

Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri dị ka Blue Moon, Shoestring, na Hecate ma rụọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ndị dị ka El Grande de Coca-Cola, Is die Muis Baas, Kombuis Blues, The Adventures of Gilgamesh, n Brommer in die Boord (1989), Liewe Heksie (1990), Oedipus (1990), Die Nag van Legio (1990), Kloue (1991), Groot Wit Roos (1991), Gelf, Generaal (1991), Flikie (1991), Macbeth (1991), Hospitaal op Horings (1992), 'n Lam vir die Pase (1993), Die Kwinkslaers (1994), Die Pakkamer (1996), Griet Skryf 'n Sprokie (1997), Twelfth Night, or What You Will (1998), Vlerkdans (1999), Jack and the Beanstalk (1999), Adamas (2000), Skroot (2000), Pendoring (Edms) Beperk (2002), and Fringe Benefits (2006)
N'afọ 1988, o ritere ihe nrite maka Best Young Actress na Cobus Roussouw Bursary
Mgbe ahụ na 1992, ọ meriri IGI Life Vita Award maka Best Actress maka ọrụ ya na egwuregwu Lady Macbeth
N'afọ 1993, ọ meriri Piers Nicholson Award maka itinye aka na ihe nkiri na Orange Free State
Ọzọkwa na 1996, e nyere ya onyinye FNB Vita Best Supporting Actress Award maka ọrụ ya na usoro Die Pak Kamer
N'afọ 2000, ọ natara Vita Award Nomination maka egwuregwu El Grande de Coca-Cola
N'afọ 2009, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Miem' na egwuregwu Mis
N'afọ 2012, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Ma Let' na egwuregwu Mooi Maria Maka ọrụ ya na 2010 Afrikaans play Mooi Maria, ọ natara nhọpụta Aardklop maka Best Actress
N'afọ 2000, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Ragel' na ihe nkiri nke kykNET a kpọrọ Villa Rosa
Ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo afọ 00
Mgbe ahụ na 2009, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ nke 'Saartjie', odeakwụkwọ Patrick, na SABC2 mini-series Hopeville, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe site na Machị ruo Eprel
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri SABC2 Erfsondes, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Dankie Hek' maka oge nke abụọ ya
N'afọ 2011, o mere ihe nkiri Atlantis End of a World, Birth of a Legend nke nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ụzọ akụ na ụba, mana ọ nwetara nnyocha ọjọọ site n'aka ndị nkatọ
Isaiah Ogedegbe (amuru na 14 June 1991), makwaara dika Isaiah Oghenevwegba Ogedegbe, bu onye okpukpere chi Naigeria na onye na-ede blooga
O nwere bloog na Intanet akporo 'Warri Times'
Isaiah Ogedegbe na-eji website ya dee akoko na abe gbasara ndu Naigeria ama ama
O dere otu abe gbasara Nelson Mandela na 29 Septemba, 2022
Da ka isi mmalite si kwuo, Isaiah Ogedegbe buru amuma ziri ezi gbasara Synagogue Church building collapse tupu ya emee
A maara ya nke ama na Warri maka amuma ziri ezi o buru banyere Naigeria
Da ka isi mmalite si kwuo, Isaiah Ogedegbe kporo onwu T
Joshua 'nnukwu mfu nye ndi mmadu' ke ini enye akakpade ke 2021
Na 13 June, 2023, ka ndi mmadu mechara T
Joshua afo 60, akwukwo Nation kwuru na Isaiah Ogedegbe ji okwu ndi a too ndi T
Joshua, mgbe onwuro
'N'ime ihe oma, o nweghi nwa klas m na ekwere m na amara nke Chineke n'elu ndu ya
O kpaliri mba da iche iche, ndi bishop na ndi akachukwu
N'idi umeala n'obi ya, o metotara mba da iche iche
O bu nwoke na-ekpe ekpere ka Devid'
Aha Isaiah Ogedegbe agbasala n'ihi oru mgbasa ozi ya duka onye na-ede blooga
Afo ole na ole gara aga, o weghachiri akuko otu Baba Abiye nke Ede bu onye kwuru banyere etu Joseph Ayo Babalola si nwu na akuko aho gbasara n' intanet na aha ya
Na 11 Jula 2014, aha ya mere isi oku mgbe o dere abu iji too ndu Kefee
Na 16 February 2018, aha ya mere isi okwu mgbe o gwara Kemi Omololu-Olunloyo ka o dee akuko nke oma iji gbanaro nsogbu
Na 9 June 2020, aha ya mere isi okwu mgbe iwe were ya maka ogbugbu George Floyd na Amerika
O kporo ya 'mkpughe nke ikpa oke agbaro na nso nso a'
Isaiah Ogedegbe bu onye a ma ama maka amuma ya gbasara onye isi ala Naijiria, echewo izu ohi amuma ya ihu
Na 27 February 2017, akuko sitere na Warri Times mere ka oha na eze kwuo okwu plagiarism metotora onye okpukpere chi Naijiria
Isaiah Ogedegbe katoro plagiarism na o na-eme ka ndi ozo ghara obu ndi okike
Da ka Isaiah Ogedegbe si kwuo, n'oge a, ndi mmadu ka na-eji akuko ndi ozo da ka o bu akuko mpu ha
Isaiah Rice (1917), bụ onye America na-ese foto nke foto ya na-egosi ndị mmadụ na mpaghara Asheville na ọdịda anyanwụ North Carolina
A na-ekwu na Rice na-enye ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi ole na ole a maara nke obodo Ojiị Appalachian site na ohere Appalachia Ojiị
A mụrụ Rice na Asheville, North Carolina, ma gaa Stephens-Lee High School
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Works Progress Administration (WPA) n'oge Great Depression
Rice jere ozi na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ ma bụrụ onye otu St
Paul's Missionary Baptist Church na West Asheville
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1980 site na nkụchi obi
Foto Rice gụnyere ezinụlọ na ndị enyi ya, ụka ya, ụmụ akwụkwọ, anụ ụlọ, ihe ndị nwụrụ anwụ, foto, paradaịs, ndụ n'okporo ámá, na ndị ikom na ndị inyom na-arụ ọrụ
A kọwawo Rice dị ka 'onye na-ese foto obodo' n'ihi na ọ na-edekọ ihe omume na ndị mmadụ na obodo ya kwa ụbọchị
N'afọ 2015, nwa nwanyị Rice, Mrs
Marian Rice Waters, na nwa nwa ya, Darin Waters, PhD
nyere nchịkọta foto Rice na UNC Asheville's Special Collections ka a digitized, chekwaa, ma họrọ gosipụta
A na-enweta nchịkọta n'ịntanetị site na UNC Asheville's Special Collections 'Isaiah Rice Photograph Collection'
Nchịkọta ahụ gosipụtara obodo Asheville, NC, dị ka Burton Street na Shiloh
Dị ka Waters si kwuo, 'nchịkọta ahụ na-egosi ahụmịhe ndị Afrịka-Amerịka site n'anya nke 'ezinụlọ dị n'etiti,' nke na-eche echiche n'ihu'
Isaiah T
Hatton (1883 ruo 1921) bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na United States nke a maara maka atụmatụ ụlọ ya maka ndị Afrịka Amerịka ibe ya

N'afọ 2006, Bangura sonyeere ndị otu People's Movement for Democratic Change (PMDC) nke e guzobere n'ihi nkewa dị n'etiti Charles Margai na ndị na-akwado ya na Sierra Leone People's Party

N'afọ 2002, ọ malitere ọzụzụ ya na ndị na-eme egwuregwu nwoke n'abalị na-egwu basketball na ịgba ọsọ
N'afọ 2004, ọ meriri n'ọsọ oche nkwagharị nke kilomita 10
O nwere ụmụ ma n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme egwuregwu n'oche nkwagharị kacha mma na Gambia, ọ nweghị ụzọ ọ ga-esi kwado ya
Ọ ga-azụ onwe ya ugboro anọ n'izu ma na 2011 a nabatara ya dị ka 'Gambia Paralympics Player of 2010' site na Sports Journalists Association of Gambia
N'afọ 2012 ọ bụ onye na-eburu ọkọlọtọ maka Gambia mgbe ọ na-asọmpi na 2012 Summer Paralympics na London
Enweghị ọrụ ụkwụ ya mere ka ọ nọrọ na ụdị T54 ma gbaa ọsọ na okpomọkụ nke Women's T54 100 mita na Women's 800 mita T54
Oge 100m ya nke 2032 bụ oge kachasị mma

Ya na Damba Jarju bụ ndị egwuregwu Paralympians mbụ nke Gambia na 2015 Sulayman Colley, onye bụ onye isi oche nke Gambia National Paralympic Committee na-atụ anya iziga ndị egwuregwu isii na 2016 Summer Paralympics, mana nke a emeghị
E zigara Damba Jarju ọzọ dị ka naanị onye nnọchi anya Gambia na Rio
N'afọ 2019, Nyang na-arịọ arịrịọ na Gambia n'ihi na ego ọ chọrọ iji nye ezinụlọ ya nri
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke ịsọ mpi na 2012 Paralympics emeghị ka ọ nweta nchekwa ego
N'ezie, o nwetara naanị £ 200 site na Paralympics
Ọtụtụ ndị nwere nkwarụ na Gambia na-arịọ arịrịọ kwa ụbọchị ma njem siri ike dịka ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala tagzi na ndị na-anya ụgbọala rickshaw na-ewere oche nkwagharị dị ka nnukwu nsogbu
Ọnọdụ maka ndị nwere nkwarụ siri ike karịsịa n'oge mgbochi ọrịa COVID-19, ebe ọ bụ na ha enweghị ike ịrịọ arịrịọ mgbe ha nọ n'ụlọ
Nyang mere atụmatụ ịsọ mpi ọzọ na 2020, mana e zigara naanị ndị egwuregwu abụọ ka ha nọchite anya Gambia na Paralympics
Otú ọ dị, a ka na-ekwu maka nsonaazụ Nyang na 100m na 2021 dị ka nsonaazụ kachasị mma nke mba ya na Paralympics
Nyang gbara di ya alụkwaghịm na 2011 ma na 2019 ọ na-akwado onwe ya, nne ya, na ụmụ atọ
Adebayo Ridwan Abidemi (Isbae U, Bae U Barbie) bụ onye ọchị, onye egwu, onye na-eme ihe site na Naịjirịa
O mere egwu na Instagram
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nollywood
Na Jenụwarị 2020, ọ bipụtara abu kembu 'Aye'
A mụrụ Adebayo na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria wee zụlite ya na Ebute Meta, Yaba
Nna ya, Kamal Adebayo bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na Lawanson
Isbae U malitere ọrụ ya site na ime ihe nkiri Nollywood Aiye ka Ye na Óba Ara wee na-eme rap na Instagram tupu ọ malite iduzi skits dị mkpụmkpụ na Nọvemba 2017
Na 2019, ọ pụtara dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala na vidiyo ihe nkiri Mr
Macaroni
Mgbe ahụ ọ malitere usoro Bae_U Barbie na Catapult Thief
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Isbae U na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ dị ka Craze Clown, Sydney Talker, MC Lively, Broda Shaggi, Nasty Blaq, Pankeeroy wdg
Isbae U na-eme vidiyo n'asụsụ bekee ma na-eji Yoruba mgbe ụfọdụ ma na-egosi ụdị ndụ dị mma
A na-eche na ọnụ ahịa ya ruru ihe ruru $100,000
Ise (5) bu otu onu agugu
O no n'etiti anọ na isii
Iseoluwa Abidemi (amụrụ n'ọnwa Disemba 18, 2004) bụ onye n'abụ abụ ozioma na Naijiria, onye n'ede egwu nakwa onye nkpọkọta ihe nkiri nke Iseoluwa
Nne ya chọpụtara nkà egwu ya mgbe ọ dị afọ ise ma tinye ya n'òtù ukwe ụlọ akwụkwọ ya n'enye nkwado ma n'eduzi ọrụ
O weputara egwu izizi ya akpọrọ Iseoluwa n'afọ 2017 n'afere egwu izizi ya Yes I Can n'afọ 2019
A kpọrọ ya onye egwu Africa nke Afọ (2019) site na Continental Child Summit and Awards dị na Africa
A mụrụ Abidemi na Shimawa, Ogun Steeti, Nigeria dị ka nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ atọ
Ọ gara Emerald Primary School tupu ọ gaa Chrisland High School
Ọ malitere igosi nkà egwu ya n'ụlọ site n'isonye n'ịbụ abụ ozioma n'igwe oyonyo mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Nne ya, onye na-agụ egwú na ụka ya chọpụtara nkà ahụ ma tinye ya n'òtù ukwe ụlọ akwụkwọ ya n'eduzi n'ọrụ nkwado
N'afọ 2017, ọ wepụtara egwu izizi ya bụ Iseoluwa ma mee ihe ngosi egwu mbụ ya n'afọ 2017 nke akpọrọ The Iseoluwa Concert, nke ọ rụkwara ọzọ n'afọ 2018
O weputara afere egwu izizi ya Yes I Can n'afọ 2019 ya na egwu egwu dịka Mo ti Giao nakwa Just Praise nke Wole Oni Music Production mepụtara
O duziri egwu ọzọ n'afọ 2019 na Lagos nke akpọrọ Iseoluwa Live In Concert iji kwalite afere egwu ọhụrụ ya
Abidemi kọwara na ebumnuche nke afere egwu Yes I Can bụ ịgwa ndị n'eto eto na ha kwesịrị 'ikwere n'onwe ha ma ghara ịda mbà n'oge ọ bụla'
Abidemi ekwuola na ọ bụ ezie na 'egwú bụ ihe na-atọ m ụtọ', ọ ga-achọkwa ịmụ iwu na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ na-ewere ndị na-agụ egwú dị ka Aṣa na Nathaniel Bassey dị ka ndị n'akpali egwu ya
Iseyin bụ obodo dị na steeti Oyo nke Naijiria
Ọ dị ihe dịka kilomita otu narị (62 ) n'ebe ugwu Ibadan
Atụmatụ e mèrè na obodo ahụ gosiri na e nwere ihe dika mmadụ 236,000, dịka atụmatụ United Nations nke afọ 2005, nke mụbara ruo 302,990 na 2011, ma nwee ngụkọta ala nke 1,419 km2 ( )
Iseyin dị n'etiti ma nwee ike ịnweta site na netwọk okporo ụzọ site na Ibadan, Oyo, Abeokuta, na Ogbomoso
E nwere ala sara mbara nke enwere ike iji maka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, ọrụ ugbo na ebumnuche ụlọ ọrụ na gburugburu obodo ahụ
Aha eze Iseyin bụ 'Aseyin nke Iseyin'
E nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ na Iseyin nke gụnyere Polytechnic dị ka SAF Polytechnic, Secondary Institutions dị ka Kelani College Iseyin, Greater Love Model wdg
nke kemgbe ahụ dekọrọ nnukwu ọdịiche na nsonaazụ WASSCE & SSCE

Obodo a nwere Polytechnic nke onwe ya na-akpọ SAF Polytechnic, Iseyin, Gọọmentị Technical College na ogige ntụziaka na-adịgide adịgide nke steeti Oyo NYSC (National Youth Service Corps), nwekwara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị ka Kelani College Iseyin, Saint Thomas, Greater Love Model
Kelani College Iseyin bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị kachasị mma na Iseyin na Oke Ogun n'ihi ihe ịga nke ọma agụmakwụkwọ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ ha na ule dị iche iche dị ka WASSCE & NECO na asọmpi mba dị iche iche

Iseyin nwekwara ọbá akwụkwọ dijitalụ nke onwe ya nke oge a nke akpọrọ Raji Oke-Esa Memorial Library, ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ bụ onye bụbu onye isi ala Naịjirịa, General (Rtd) Olusegun Obasanjo, na Ebedi Writersī Ebe obibi dị n'akụkụ ugwu nke ebe obibi nke obodo ahụ
International Residency a eweputala ndị nnukwu ndị edemede, ndị nta akụkọ na ndị edemede n'ụwa niile gụnyere onye mbụ Nobel Laurel, Prọfesọ
Wole Soyinka, Jumoke Verissiomo, Funmi Aluko, Richard Ali, Paul Liam na ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe bụ isi na mpaghara ahụ bụ akwa owuwe ihe ubi
Iseyin bụ obodo nke anọ kachasị ukwuu na steeti Oyo, mgbe Ibadan, Ogbomoso na Oyo gasịrị
A makwaara Iseyin dị ka ebe obibi Aso Òkè
Aso Òkè ma ọ bụ Ò Òng bụ ákwà ọdịnala a ma ama nke a na-ejikarị eme ememe n'etiti ndị Yoruba nke Naijiria
Friesland Campina (Wamco) nwere ebe nhazi mmiri ara ehi n'obodo ahụ
A na-akụ ụtaba na Iseyin, n'etiti nri ndị ọzọ na ihe ọkụkụ ego, ọ bụ n'ihi nke a ka nnnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ụtaba - British American Tobacco - nwere 'ọfịs na-ahapụ' n'obodo ahụ
Iseyin só n'akụkụ nke obodo Oke-Ogun a na-akpọ 'nkata nri' nkeNaịjirịa
N'ihi mmiri ozuzo na-adịgide adịgide kwa afọ n'ógbè ahụ, ọrụ ugbo ndị bụ isi bụ ọrụ ugbo, ịchụ nta, ịkụ azụ, na nhazi nri, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Iseyin na-emepụta ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe niile a na-emepụta n'ugbo dịka ji, ọka, akpu, ojoko n'ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ikere Gorge Dam dị n'obodo ahụ, a sịrị na ọ bụ mmiri nke abụọ kachasị ukwuu mgbe a chọpụtara ya n'akụkụ mmiri Kanji, n'oge ọchịchị Onye isi ala Obasanjo (Ndị agha)
Ihe mgbochi mmiri Ikere gorge bụ mmiri mmadụ mere, Ọ bụ isi iyi mmiri maka obodo dị na okpúrù ọchịchị Iseyin
N'oge mmiri ozuzo, mmiri ahụ na-ebu ibu ruo n'ókè zuru ezu

Ụlọ ọrụ isi imeputa ihe nke Iseyin bụ akwa owuwe ihe ubi, Iseyin bụkwa ebe a maara dị ka ụlọ Aso Ofi ma ọ bụ Aso Oke, akwa ọdịnala a ma ama nke ndị Yoruba na-eyi n'oge pụrụ iche maka okpueze, ịbụ onyeisi, nkwa agbamakwụkwọ, ememme aha na ihe omume ndị ọzọ dị mkpa
Emere emume Aso-Ofi na Septemba 27, 2016, n'oge Ụbọchị Njem Ụwa
Emere emume a iji gosipụta ma mee emume akwa e mere n'ógbè ahụ na steeti Oyo
Isha Tejan-Cole Johansen (amụrụ 25 Disemba 1965 ) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Sierra Leone na onye bụbu onye isi oche otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Sierra Leone

Johansen bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole n'ụwa nke chịburu otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba, ya na Lydia Nsekera, onye bụbu onye isi oche otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Burundi, Izetta Sombo Wesley, onye bụbu onye isi otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Liberia na Sonia
Bien-Aime nke ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Turks na Caicos Islands
Isha Johansen bụ onye nwe na CEO nke Sierra Leone National Premier League club FC Johansen
A mụrụ Isha Johansen dị ka Isha Tejan-Cole na Freetown, Sierra Leone, n'ime ezinụlọ Tejan-Cole, ndị sitere na Aku Mohammedan
A mikpuru ya na bọọlụ site na mmalite, dịka nna ya hibere East End Lions FC na Freetown
Nna ya kpọọrọ ya gaa hụ egwuregwu bọọlụ, ya na ụmụnne ya na ndị enyi ya na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe obibi ndị nọn na Freeport na ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na Yeovil, England
Isha Johansen tọrọ ntọala bọọlụ nke ya, FC Johansen, na 2004
A malitere klọb ahụ na ebumnobi nke inye nduzi na ohere nye ụmụaka ndị agha obodo Sierra Leone mebiri ndụ ha na nso nso a (1991–2002)
Ọ malitere igwu egwu na Nkeji Mbụ na 2011 wee bulite ya na Premier League n'afọ sochirinụ

A họpụtara Johansen ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Sierra Leone (SLFA) na-enweghị mmegide na 3 August 2013, mgbe onye kacha na mmegide ya, onye bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Sierra Leone Mohamed Kallon kwụsịrị site na kọmitii Executiv egwuregwu boolu nke Sierra Leone n'ihi na ọ gaghị emezu ihe achọrọ obibi SLFA
na obodo
Kallon rịọrọ mgbaghara ya, mana ndị nnọchi anya FIFA na Freetown kwadoro nkwenye nke Kallon na ndị ọzọ na-aga ime abụọ (maka njikọ ịgba chaa chaa), ya mere Johansen enweghị mmegide
Mgbe a manyere Sepp Blatter ka ọ rituo dị ka onye isi FIFA, Johansen chere na ọ ga-anọchi anya ndị nta akụkọ
Ishaqbini Hirola Conservancy bụ mpaghara nchekwa dabere na mpaghara Garissa, Kenya
Ebe nchekwa ahụ na-ekpuchi ihe dịka 72 km2
Ọ dị n'akụkụ akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Osimiri Tana, yana oke ebe nchekwa Primate Reserve mbụ nke Tana River (1976-2007)
N'agbanyeghị nha ya dị ntakịrị, nchekwa ahụ bụ ebe mgbaba na ebe a na-amụ nwa maka antelope Hirola dị oke egwu
Ya na Arawale National Reserve, nchekwa ahụ bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ebe obibi Hirola
Ndị bi na Hirola, nke dị n'ebe ugwu-ọwụwa anyanwụ Kenya, anọwo n'etiti nhazi nke nchekwa
N'agbanyeghị na e bu n'obi nke ọma, ndị obodo megidere nsụgharị ahụ nke ukwuu
Esemokwu na-arị elu na Somalia na 1990s na mbelata ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Hirola na-aga n'ihu, mere ka ndị ọrụ anụ ọhịa Kenya gbanwee nke abụọ na 1996
Mmegide ọhụrụ megide atụmatụ ahụ butere nguzobe nke ọtụtụ otu nchekwa nchekwa obodo
, otu n'ime ha na-ede akwụkwọ nke ọma n'Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu Kenya megide nsụgharị ọ bụla n'ọdịnihu
Ka o sina dị, ntụgharịgharị ndị ahụ ebutelarị ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nọpụrụ adịpụ na ndị nwere ike ịdị ndụ nwere ike 120 Hirola antelopes na Tsavo East National Park
N'afọ 2005, obodo anọ (Kotile, Korisa, Hara na Abaratilo) mepụtara ma nyefee gọọmentị Kenya ndụmọdụ iji guzobe Ishaqbini Hirola Conservancy
A na-eme atụmatụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ụdị nnụnụ dị na nchekwa ahụ dị 350
60% nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ezinụlọ nnụnụ e dekọrọ na Kenya nọ na nchekwa
Edepụtara ụdị iri na atọ na ndepụta data mpaghara East Africa, gụnyere udele nwere mkpuchi na akwa Clarke
Ndị ọzọ, ụdị ndị a na-ahụkarị na-ebi n'ụlọ nchekwa ahụ bụ ụgbala na-agba n'elu, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ violet na-akwado, onye na-eri aṅụ na-acha ọcha na francolin crested
Nchekwa ahụ pụrụ iche n'ihi na o nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ụdị dị iche iche nke East Africa Coast na Somali-Masai biomes, ụdị ndị ruru eru mpaghara dịka mpaghara nnụnụ dị mkpa
Onye President of Naigeria bu onye ishi ya

IsiNgqumo, mà ọ bụ IsiGqumo, (nke pụtara 'mkpebi' n'asụsụ ahụ n'onwe ya) bụ okwu mkparị nkè ndị na-edina ụdị onwe ha ná South Africa ná Zimbabwe na-asụ asụsụ Bantu, n'adịghị kà Gayle, asụsụ nkè ndị na'edina ụdị ibe há ná South Afrika na-asụrụ asụsụ German
IsiNgqumo mepụtara n'afọ ndị 1980
N'adịghị kà Gayle, á chọpụtabeghị IsiNgqumo nkè ọma mà ọ bụ dee yá, yá mèrè ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ná ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-ekwu ókwú adịghị

IsiNgqumo na-elekarị ányá dị kà ìhè ndị si n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Ụwa site n'aka ụmụ amaala Zimbabwe mànà ọ bụ n'ezie ìhè ndị ụmụ amaala na-edina ụdị onwé há mepụtara, otú na-ahụ onwé há n'oge na-adịbeghị anyat

Ọ bụ ezie ná mkparịta ụka na-esonụ nwèrè ike ịbụ obere ìhè rụrụ arụ, ọ bụ ezigbo ónyé nnọchi ányá iji IsiNgqumo eme ìhè dịka ọtụtụ n'ime ókwú yá nweret njikọ ụfọdụ ná mmekọahụ ma ọ bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke

Isi Uzo bụ Obodo Gọọmentị nke Enugu Steeti, Naịjirịa nke dị n'ókè Benue Steeti na Ebonyi Steeti
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na-obodo akpọrọ IkemObodo ndị ọzọ bụ Eha Amufu (ebe Federal College of Education dị), Neke, Mbu, na Umualor
Isi-Uzo bụ onye otu Enugu East Senatorial Zone
O nwere mpaghara ebe nke 877 km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 148,415 na ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006
Ndị obodo ahụ bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-ere ahịa
E nwekwara nkwupụta na mpaghara ahụ dị n'elu nnukwu mmanụ na gas
Ndị obodo ahụ bụ ọtụtụ Ndị Kraịst mana a ka nwere ndị na-eme okpukpe ọdịnala
Obodo IsiUzo nke Ikem, Neke na Eha Amufu nwere omenala ofufe Odo
Na obodo Igbo Etiti nke Ohodo, Ukehe na Aku, ha mejupụtara omenala Igbo-Odo nke Nsukka
Odo bụ ihe masquerade, n'ụzọ anụ ahụ mana ọ na-anọchite anya chi nke na-enye ndị dị ndụ ohere iso ndị nwụrụ anwụ kwurịta okwu n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na nkwenkwe ọdịnala Igbo na reincarnation

Dr Ralph Ede Okwor dere n'akwụkwọ ya, Ikem Diaspora na 'a na-ejikarị ihe mkpuchi Odo eme ihe ma na-eto ya dị ka 'Odomangala', ya bụ, 'Odo, Muo Ngala', 'mmụọ mpako', 'mmadụ mpako', ma ọ bụ 'mmụọ nke na-etinye mpako n'ime ndị ọ na-echebe' na-egosi na ọ bụrụhaala na ọ (Odo) dị, ndị mmadụ ga-enwe obi ụtọ, ma nwee obi ike na nchekwa ha'
Odo na-apụta otu ugboro n'ime afọ abụọ, ma nwee òtù nzuzo nke a na-amalite ndị okenye na-eto eto
Ọzọkwa, Odo nwere ike ịga ije n'obodo ahụ n'enweghị uwe, a machibidoro ndị na-amaghị aha ha ka ha ghara ịnọ n'èzí n'abalị ndị dị otú ahụ
Omenala ndị dị otú ahụ na-akpatakarị nghọtahie n'etiti Ndị Kraịst na ndị na-agbaso okpukpe ọdịnala
Ndị obodo ahụ bụ ọtụtụ Ndị Christian mana a ka nwere ndị na-eme okpukpe ọdịnala
Obodo IsiUzo nke Ikem, Neke na Eha Amufu nwere omenala ofufe Odo
Na obodo Igbo Etiti nke Ohodo, Ukehe na Aku, ha mejupụtara omenala Igbo-Odo nke Nsukka
Odo bụ ihe masquerade, n'ụzọ anụ ahụ mana ọ na-anọchite anya chi nke na-enye ndị dị ndụ ohere iso ndị nwụrụ anwụ kwurịta okwu n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na nkwenkwe ọdịnala Igbo na reincarnation

Dr Ralph Ede Okwor dere n'akwụkwọ ya, Ikem Diaspora na 'a na-ejikarị ihe mkpuchi Odo eme ihe ma na-eto ya dị ka 'Odomangala', ya bụ, 'Odo, Muo Ngala', 'mmụọ mpako', 'mmadụ mpako', ma ọ bụ 'mmụọ nke na-etinye mpako n'ime ndị ọ na-echebe' na-egosi na ọ bụrụhaala na ọ (Odo) dị, ndị mmadụ ga-enwe obi ụtọ, ma nwee obi ike na nchekwa ha'
Odo na-apụta otu ugboro n'ime afọ abụọ, ma nwee òtù nzuzo nke a na-amalite ndị okenye na-eto eto
Ọzọkwa, Odo nwere ike ịga ije n'obodo ahụ n'enweghị uwe, a machibidoro ndị na-amaghị aha ha ka ha ghara ịnọ n'èzí n'abalị ndị dị otú ahụ

Ọ bụkwa onye edemede na onye nyocha nke okwu ọha na eze
A na-ekwusi ike na akụkụ nke Community Based Organizations nwere ike igwu egwu iji hụ na ezi mmepe na-adịgide adịgide na mpaghara a na ọdịmma nke ndị mmadụ n'ozuzu

Ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta atụwo aro ka a gbanwee uche site na gọọmentị gaa na àgwà onye ọ bụla n'ịhụ nsogbu mmepe - gaa n'ala elu atụmatụ nke Community Based Organizations dị ka ụzọ dị irè maka mmepe ime obodo
Nke a ga-agba mbọ nke ndị bi n'ime ime obodo bụ ndị otu Community Based Organizations, yana igosi atụmatụ ndị ahụ dị irè dị ka ụzọ isi nweta ezigbo nsonaazụ na mmepe ime obodo
Gọọmentị na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-etinye aka na ọrụ mmepe gbasara atụmatụ ndị enwere ike ịnakwere mgbe ha na-enyere obodo aka n'ógbè ha
Ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ bu mgbasa nke ọrịa na-efe efe nke gafere oke ala mba na mba wee rue ụwa niile gburugburu
Ọrịa nke na-agbasa ngwa ngwa n'ime ọnụ ọgụgụ ọtụtụ ndi mmadu ma ọ bụ mpaghara ndi mmadu na obere oge ka a na-akpọ ọrịa ozuru mba ọnụ [i]
Oke mgbasa ọria na-efe efe ya na nke nwere onu ogugu mmadu kwusiri ike na aria oria ahu bu oria juputara ejupụta adịghị oke njọ

A na-agupukari oke mgbasa oria juputara ejuputa adịghị njọ nke nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadu kwusiri ike na aria ya dika influenza na aria n'oge n'oge maka ha na-eme otu mgbe oge n'ime mpaghara ụwa buru ibu karia igbasa ụwa nile

Ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ bụ orịa ozuru mba ọnụ na -efe efe nke na-agafe oke mba uwa [ii] Ọrịa ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ abụghị ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ naanị n'ihi na o nwere oke mgbasa ma ọ bụ na-egbu ọtụtụ mmadụ, O ga na-efe efe
Ọmụma atụ, a gaghi akpọ ọrịa kansa nke na-ebute ọtụtụ ọnwụ ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ n'ihi na odighi efe efe ma anaghịkwa ebute ya ebute site na mmekọrita mmadu
[iii]

Ọnu ọgụgụ ọrịa n'efe efe di na ọrịa ozuru mba ọnụ (nke pụtara oria ozuru ụwa ọnụ) nke n'egosi ka o si efesa na-adika mgbirigba kovu ma esee ya n'ihe eserese igosi ọnụ ọgụgụ ndi butere oria a bu nke na-efe efe na oge e jiri bute ya
Kọv eserese ọrịa ozuru mba ọnụ na-aputakarị otutu ugboro ma o buru na oria njuputa ojoo ahu n'akpaghari
Oria n'efe efe na-agbasakari na uzo ato dika na eserese di na okpuru
bidoro n'ebe ihe eserese kọv bidoro
E were ka COVID-19 were ma atu, nke a ga-egosi mmalite mgbasa nke ọrịa ebe e nwere nani mmadụ olemole a chọpụtara n'aria ọrịa ahu
nke ihe eserese kọv a na-egosi ka o si agbasa n'obodo [v]
Nke a n'egosi mgbe otutu mmadu butere ọrịa ahu n'ihi na ndi mmadu ebutela oria ahu ọhụrụ
nke ihe eserese kọv na-esogi na-enweela ike ikwusi ya ife ọtụtụ mmadu dika na mbu ma ọ bụrụ na onweghi ndi butere ọrịa ahụ ọhụrụ
E nwere otutu usoro mba ụwa nwere ike I ji belata mgbasa ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ

N'afo 2005, ndi Ụlọ Ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba Ụwa (World Health Organization) nabatara iwu banyere ahụ ike uwa nile, nke bu usoro iwu iji gbochie, ichikwa na ikowa ihe egwu dina mgbasa ọrịa ahu n'etiti mba na mba
[vi]
Na mgbakwunye, ndi Ụlọ Ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba Ụwa (World Health Organization) ewepụtala akwukwo ntuzi aka zuru ezu maka iluso oria ozuru ụwa n'efe efe
E biputara akwukwo ntuzi aka nke mbu n'afo 1999
Megharikwa ma gbakwunyekwa ihe n'ime ya n'afo 2005 na 2009

[vii] E nwetara otu usoro e si ebuso oria ozuru ụwa Covid-19 agha site n'iwu banyere ahuike ụwa nile na 2005 na akwukwo nkwadebe ntuzi aka nke ndi Ụlọ Ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba Ụwa (World Health Organization) dere maka ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ na-efe efe

E nwere ọtụtụ mkparita ụka banyere usoro a kporo 3T na-asusu bekee ya bu (nnyocha - testing, ọgwugwọ - treatment na ọchịchọ - tracing) nke na-enye mba nile ohere iji mata ndi butere ọrịa ahu tupu ekewapụ ha na ịgwọ ha [viii]
Usoro ahu gunyere inyopụta mmadu nile ha na onye ahụ bu oria nwegoro nmekorita ya na ikewapụta ha
Usoro ahu aburula ihe n'ewu ewu site n'oru nmejuputa ya na mba dika South korea na Singapore n'agbanyeghi na mba ndi ahu kwadosiri ike mgbe ihe ọghọm SARS mechara ha
Abịaghị mmadụ nso bụ usoro I kwalite ahuike nke ebum n'obi ya bu iji nwayọ wee kwusi ibufe oria site n'ikwusi ohere ibufe ọrịa na-efe efe na oria a na-ebute ebute
Onye isi oche Dokita Micheal J

Ryan nke ndi Ụlọ Ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba Ụwa (World Health Organization) na nkenke akuko ya n' ọnwa Mach 2019, kwuru na abịaghị mmadụ nso 'bụ usoro agaghị adigide a ga-eji kwusilata mgbasa nje ahu na ibelata oke ọrụ dị n'ụlọ ọgwụ
Ọbughi ikwusi nje ahụ n'onwe ya
Uzo nke a di oke ọnụ ya mere a ga-eji were jikọọ ya n'uzo mgbochi ndi ozo iji were kwusi nsogbu a' [ix]
Dokita Ryan mere ka a ghota na mmadụ inoro onwe ya agaghi ehichapu ọrịa ahu
Isi ederede Ọmụmụ banyere mbufe na mgbochi HIV/AIDS
N'agbanyeghi na ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahụike Mba ụwa (World Health Organization) ji okwu ahụ bu ọrịa ozuru uwa ọnụ were kowaa nje HIV [x], O bu oria ozuru ụwa ọnụ dịka kowa okwu ahu si kọwa
Ihe ruru nde mmadu iri ato na asaa bu nje HIV n'uwa nile ka afọ ruru 2018 [xi]
Mmadu puku nari asaa na iri asaa anwuọla site na oria obiri n'aja ocha n'afo 2018 [xii], mpaghara sub-saharan Afrika bu ebe ọrịa ahu ji si aka ike ugbu a
Na 2018, ihe dika percent isi isii na otu nke oria nje HIV ohuru ka e nwere na mpaghara [xiii]
ọrịa nke gụnyere oyi ọmụọrịa okuku ume ndị bekee kpọrọ Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS-CoV) ma oria okuku ume nke nnukwu nke ndi bekee na-akpo SARS-CoV
Ụdị agba nje korona ọhụrụ (SARS-CoV-2) bụ ya na-ebute nje korona 2019 ma obu COVID-19 [xiv]
Ufodu n'ime ọrịa nje korona bụ ọrịa a na-esi n'anụmanụ ebute
Ihe nnyocha gosiri na ọrịa SARS-CoV bụ ọrịa sitere na mmekorita nwa onogbo na mmadu ebe MERS-CoV bu oria bu oria sitere na mmekorita inyinya ibu (kameelu) na mmadu
Ọtụtụ ọria nje korona ndi na-efebeghi ndi mmadu bi n'ime ụmụ anụmanụ
Ụdị agba nje korona ọhụrụ nke bidoro n'afo 2019 na obodo Wuhan, na ngalaba Hubei na mba Chaina [xiv] emeela ka ọtụtụ ndị mmadu bute oria okuku ume ahu a na-akpo nje korona 2019 (COVID-19)
Dika ihe ngosi ndi Mahadum John Hopkins [xvi], ihe ruru obodo nari abuo enwetala ọria COVID-19 ebe e nwere nnukwu mgbasa oria n'obodo Amerika, Chaina, Westan Yurop na Iran
Ọrịa ịba juputara n'obodo nwere okpomoku gunyere ụfọdụ ala Amerika, Esia ma Afrika
N'afo obula a na-enwe ndị mmadụ nde puku nari ato na iri ise rue na nde puku nari ise nwere oria iba [xxi]
Ahụ mmadụ anabataghị ọgwụ abụrụla nsogbu nyere i gwọ oria iba na senchuri iri abuo na otu, ebe ahụ mmadụ anaghị anaghị anabata ọtụtụ ọgwụ ma e wepụ artemisinim [xxii]
Ọrịa ịba bụ ihe a na-ahukari na mba Yurop na mpaghara Not Amerika, mana ugbu a odizighi n'ebe ndi a [xxxiii]
O nwere ike buru na ọrịa ịba so na ihe kpatara odida Rome [xxiv]
A biara mara oria ahu dika 'ahu oku Rome'[xxv]Ihe a na-akpọ plasmodium falciparum ghọrọ ezigbo ihe iyi egwu nye ndi na-achi ala na ndi obodo mgbe ya na ahia ohu batara mba Amerika [xxvi]

Oria Spanish flu (bidoro n'afo 1918 rue n'afo 1920) rịara mmadu nde puku nari ise na gburugburu uwa nile [xxvii] tinyere ndi nọ n'ime ime agwa etiti pacific na Arctic were gbuo ihe bidoro na mmadụ nde iri abuo rue nde nari [xxviii] [xxix]
Otụtụ mgbasa ọria na-efe efe na-egbu aka ghara aka ndi okenye na umuaka ebe ndi na-ariaghi ọrịa ahụ bụ ndi nọ n'etiti
Mana oria Spanish flu bu oria gbukarichara ndi ntorobịa karia oria ndi nke ozo [xxx]
Oria Spanish flu gburu otutu mmadu karia agha mbu mba nile lụrụ, ma gbukwa otutu mmadu n'ime izu iri abuo na ise karia ndi ọrịa AIDS gburu n'afo iri abuo n'ise mbu o noro [xxxi] [xxxii]

igwe ndiagha na akuku di iche iche n'oge agha ụwa nke mbu mere ka o gbasaa ma mubaa ngwa ngwa, oria spanish flu nwere ikike itu ndi agha nke ukwu n'ihi ike ogwugwu, ndi agha erighi nri di mma ya na ngwa ogwu kemikalu [xxxiii]
Ndozi na kwalite uzo esi eme njem mere ka odiri ndi agha, ndi okwo ugbo mmiri na ndi nkiti na ndi njem ibusa oria [xxxiv]
Isi ederede Udi nje ọria adighi anwụ anwụ
Ufodu mgbe a na-akpo nje ọrịa n'adighi anwụ anwụ 'nje oria oka ibe'
Ha nwere ike iso n'ihe kpatara ọrịa ndi e gbochigoro jiri chighata [xxxv], Ima atụ, ọrịa ukwara nta nke karigoro uzo mgbochi oria nke odinala bu ihe n'enye oke echiche ugbu a nyere ndi oru ahuike
Ihe foro ntakiri ka o ruo okara nde ndi mmadu n'aria oria nyiri otutu ọgwụ mgbochi ukwara nta [MDR-TB] kwa afo n' uwa nile [xxxvi]
Mba Chaina na India bu ndi nwekarichara oria nyiri otutu ogwu mgbochi ukwara nta [xxxvii]

Ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba ụwa (World Health Organization) kwuru na ihe ruru mmadu nde iri ise n'uwa nile nwere ọrịa nyiri ọtụtụ ọgwụ mgbochi ukwara nta, ebe ihe dika percenti iri asaa na itolu bu ndi na-aria ọrịa nyiri ọgwụ mgbochi abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ
N'afo 2005, ndị mmadu dị otu nari na iri abụọ na anọ bu oria nyịrị otụtụ ọgwụ mgbochi ukwara nta si na Amerika

N'afo 2006, orịa nke ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahu ike mba ụwa karichara otutu ogwu mgbochi ukwaranta (XDR TB) ka a chọpụtara n'Afrika, nke emesikwara chọputa na o di na mba iri ano na itolu tinyekwara mba Amerika
E nwere ihe dika mmadu puku iri ano nwere XDR-TB kwa afo, nke ndo ndi ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahu ike mba ụwan'eme atumatu [xxxviii]

N'afo iri abuo gara aga, bakteria ndi na ma ama gunyere Stafilokokus, Srita marcescene na enterokokus amalitela igbochi ọtụtụ ọgwu mgbochi dika vanocimin ya na ọgwu mgbochi nile dika aminoglicocide na cefalosoporins
Nje oria n'adighi anwu anwu aburula ihe di mkpa na nlekota ahuike jikotara oria na-efe efe
Na ngbakwunye, ọria na-efe efe nke e sitere na ime obodo enweta site n'ụdị agba metilin stafilokokus aurieus (MRSA) n'ahụ onye ahụ dị bụ nke dị ọtụtụ ugbu a
Nje ọrịa ọgba ọbara bụ ọria na-efe efe nke ukwuu ma na-egbukwa ọtụtụ ndi mmadụ
I ma atụ, nje oria Ebola, ọrịa lasa, oria rift vali, nje marbọg na oria igba obara nke bolivia
Nje orịa ọgba ọbara nwere ike ibukwa oọrịa ozuru wa [xxxix]

Ihe mere na orịa a igbasa ka ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ di nkenke bu na o kwesiri ka mmadu na onye bu ya bụ oria nwe mmekorita ahu ya na onye ahu bu ọrịa ahụ nwere nwa obere oge tupu ọ nwụọ ma ọ bụ na ọ na-aria oria nke ukwuu
Obere oge onye ahụ mmadu ga-eji wee bute ọrịa ahu na mmalite ngosi njiri mara ọrịa ahụ na -enyere ndi oru ahuike aka ikewaputa onye butere ọrịa ahu ma gbochie ha ibughari nje ndi ahu
Isi ederede 2015-16 Nje ozuru mba ọnụ Zika na-efe efe na ahu oku Zika
Mgbasa nje Zika malitere na afọ 2015 ma biasie ike na isi mbido afọ 2016 site na inwe ihe kariri mmadu otu nde na puku nari ise I bute ọrịa ahụ na mpaghara mba kariri iri na abuo na mba Amerika
Ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahu ike mba ụwa (World Health Organization) adọọla aka na ntị na oria Zika nwere ike i bụ ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ ma o bụrụ na ejikwataghị mgbasa ya bu ọrịa

Ọrịa ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ abụghị ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ naanị n'ihi na o nwere oke mgbasa ma ọ bụ na-egbu ọtụtụ mmadụ, O ga na-efe efe
Ọmụma atụ, a gaghi akpọ ọrịa kansa nke na-ebute ọtụtụ ọnwụ ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ n'ihi na odighi efe efe ma anaghịkwa ebute ya ebute site na mmekọrita mmadu

Ọnu ọgụgụ ọrịa n'efe efe di na ọrịa ozuru mba ọnụ (nke pụtara oria ozuru ụwa ọnụ) nke n'egosi ka o si efesa na-adika mgbirigba kovu ma esee ya n'ihe eserese igosi ọnụ ọgụgụ ndi butere oria a bu nke na-efe efe na oge e jiri bute ya
Kọv eserese ọrịa ozuru mba ọnụ na-aputakarị otutu ugboro ma o buru na oria njuputa ojoo ahu n'akpaghari
Oria n'efe efe na-agbasakari na uzo ato dika na eserese di na okpuru
Agba nke mbu bidoro n'ebe ihe eserese kọv bidoro
E were ka COVID-19 were ma atu, nke a ga-egosi mmalite mgbasa nke ọrịa ebe e nwere nani mmadụ olemole a chọpụtara n'aria ọrịa ahu
Agba nke abụọ, nke ihe eserese kọv a na-egosi ka o si agbasa n'obodo
Nke a n'egosi mgbe otutu mmadu butere ọrịa ahu n'ihi na ndi mmadu ebutela oria ahu ọhụrụ
Agba nke atọ nke ihe eserese kọv na-esogi na-enweela ike ikwusi ya ife ọtụtụ mmadu dika na mbu ma ọ bụrụ na onweghi ndi butere ọrịa ahụ ọhụrụ
E nwere otutu usoro mba ụwa nwere ike I ji belata mgbasa ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ

N'afo 2005, ndi Ụlọ Ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba Ụwa (World Health Organization) nabatara iwu banyere ahụ ike uwa nile, nke bu usoro iwu iji gbochie, ichikwa na ikowa ihe egwu dina mgbasa ọrịa ahu n'etiti mba na mba
Na mgbakwunye, ndi Ụlọ Ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba Ụwa (World Health Organization) ewepụtala akwukwo ntuzi aka zuru ezu maka iluso oria ozuru ụwa n'efe efe
E biputara akwukwo ntuzi aka nke mbu n'afo 1999
Megharikwa ma gbakwunyekwa ihe n'ime ya n'afo 2005 na 2009

E nwetara otu usoro e si ebuso oria ozuru ụwa Covid-19 agha site n'iwu banyere ahuike ụwa nile na 2005 na akwukwo nkwadebe ntuzi aka nke ndi Ụlọ Ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba Ụwa (World Health Organization) dere maka ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ na-efe efe

E nwere ọtụtụ mkparita ụka banyere usoro a kporo 3T na-asusu bekee ya bu (nnyocha - testing, ọgwugwọ - treatment na ọchịchọ - tracing) nke na-enye mba nile ohere iji mata ndi butere ọrịa ahu tupu ekewapụ ha na ịgwọ ha
Usoro ahu gunyere inyopụta mmadu nile ha na onye ahụ bu oria nwegoro nmekorita ya na ikewapụta ha
Usoro ahu aburula ihe n'ewu ewu site n'oru nmejuputa ya na mba dika South korea na Singapore n'agbanyeghi na mba ndi ahu kwadosiri ike mgbe ihe ọghọm SARS mechara ha
Abịaghị mmadụ nso bụ usoro I kwalite ahuike nke ebum n'obi ya bu iji nwayọ wee kwusi ibufe oria site n'ikwusi ohere ibufe ọrịa na-efe efe na oria a na-ebute ebute
Onye isi oche Dokita Micheal J

Ryan nke ndi Ụlọ Ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba Ụwa (World Health Organization) na nkenke akuko ya n' ọnwa Mach 2019, kwuru na abịaghị mmadụ nso 'bụ usoro agaghị adigide a ga-eji kwusilata mgbasa nje ahu na ibelata oke ọrụ dị n'ụlọ ọgwụ
Ọbughi ikwusi nje ahụ n'onwe ya
Uzo nke a di oke ọnụ ya mere a ga-eji were jikọọ ya n'uzo mgbochi ndi ozo iji were kwusi nsogbu a'
Dokita Ryan mere ka a ghota na mmadụ inoro onwe ya agaghi ehichapu ọrịa ahu
N'agbanyeghi na ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahụike Mba ụwa (World Health Organization) ji okwu ahụ bu ọrịa ozuru uwa ọnụ were kowaa nje HIV, O bu oria ozuru ụwa ọnụ dịka kowa okwu ahu si kọwa
Ihe ruru nde mmadu iri ato na asaa bu nje HIV n'uwa nile ka afọ ruru 2018
Mmadu puku nari asaa na iri asaa anwuọla site na oria obiri n'aja ocha n'afo 2018 , mpaghara sub-saharan Afrika bu ebe ọrịa ahu ji si aka ike ugbu a
Na 2018, ihe dika percent isi isii na otu nke oria nje HIV ohuru ka e nwere na mpaghara

Nje korona bu nnukwu aha jikotara ọtụtụ nje na-ebute ọrịa nke gụnyere oyi ọmụma ruo n'ọrịa ndi ọzọ siri ike dika ọrịa okuku ume ndị bekee kpọrọ Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS-CoV) ma oria okuku ume nke nnukwu nke ndi bekee na-akpo SARS-CoV
Ụdị agba nje korona ọhụrụ (SARS-CoV-2) bụ ya na-ebute nje korona 2019 ma obu COVID-19
Ufodu n'ime ọrịa nje korona bụ ọrịa a na-esi n'anụmanụ ebute
Ihe nnyocha gosiri na ọrịa SARS-CoV bụ ọrịa sitere na mmekorita nwa onogbo na mmadu ebe MERS-CoV bu oria bu oria sitere na mmekorita inyinya ibu (kameelu) na mmadu
Ọtụtụ ọria nje korona ndi na-efebeghi ndi mmadu bi n'ime ụmụ anụmanụ
Ụdị agba nje korona ọhụrụ nke bidoro n'afo 2019 na obodo Wuhan, na ngalaba Hubei na mba Chaina emeela ka ọtụtụ ndị mmadu bute oria okuku ume ahu a na-akpo nje korona 2019 (COVID-19)
Dika ihe ngosi ndi Mahadum John Hopkins , ihe ruru obodo nari abuo enwetala ọria COVID-19 ebe e nwere nnukwu mgbasa oria n'obodo Amerika, Chaina, Westan Yurop na Iran
N'ọnwa Mach n'ubochi iri na otu n'afo 2020, ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba ụwa (World Health Organization) kewaputara ma kpokwa mgbasa ọrịa COVID-19 ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ

Ihe dika mkpuru ubochi iri abuo na ato n'ime ọnwa Eprel n'afo 2020, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndi mmadu butere COVID-19 eruela nde abuo, puku nari isii na iri ato na uwa nile, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndi nwụrụ anwụ eruola puku narị iri asatọ na anọ, nari abụọ na iri anọ na itolu, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndi a gwotara eruola puku nari asaa na iri abụọ na abụọ, iri ise na se
Ọrịa ịba juputara n'obodo nwere okpomoku gunyere ụfọdụ ala Amerika, Esia ma Afrika
N'afo obula a na-enwe ndị mmadụ nde puku nari ato na iri ise rue na nde puku nari ise nwere oria iba
Ahụ mmadụ anabataghị ọgwụ abụrụla nsogbu nyere i gwọ oria iba na senchuri iri abuo na otu, ebe ahụ mmadụ anaghị anaghị anabata ọtụtụ ọgwụ ma e wepụ artemisinim
Ọrịa ịba bụ ihe a na-ahukari na mba Yurop na mpaghara Not Amerika, mana ugbu a odizighi n'ebe ndi a
O nwere ike buru na ọrịa ịba so na ihe kpatara odida Rome
A biara mara oria ahu dika 'ahu oku Rome'Ihe a na-akpọ plasmodium falciparum ghọrọ ezigbo ihe iyi egwu nye ndi na-achi ala na ndi obodo mgbe ya na ahia ohu batara mba Amerika

Oria Spanish flu (bidoro n'afo 1918 rue n'afo 1920) rịara mmadu nde puku nari ise na gburugburu uwa nile tinyere ndi nọ n'ime ime agwa etiti pacific na Arctic were gbuo ihe bidoro na mmadụ nde iri abuo rue nde nari
Otụtụ mgbasa ọria na-efe efe na-egbu aka ghara aka ndi okenye na umuaka ebe ndi na-ariaghi ọrịa ahụ bụ ndi nọ n'etiti
Mana oria Spanish flu bu oria gbukarichara ndi ntorobịa karia oria ndi nke ozo
Oria Spanish flu gburu otutu mmadu karia agha mbu mba nile lụrụ, ma gbukwa otutu mmadu n'ime izu iri abuo na ise karia ndi ọrịa AIDS gburu n'afo iri abuo n'ise mbu o noro

igwe ndiagha na akuku di iche iche n'oge agha ụwa nke mbu mere ka o gbasaa ma mubaa ngwa ngwa, oria spanish flu nwere ikike itu ndi agha nke ukwu n'ihi ike ogwugwu, ndi agha erighi nri di mma ya na ngwa ogwu kemikalu
Ndozi na kwalite uzo esi eme njem mere ka odiri ndi agha, ndi okwo ugbo mmiri na ndi nkiti na ndi njem ibusa oria
Isi ederede Udi nje ọria adighi anwụ anwụ
Ufodu mgbe a na-akpo nje ọrịa n'adighi anwụ anwụ 'nje oria oka ibe'
Ha nwere ike iso n'ihe kpatara ọrịa ndi e gbochigoro jiri chighata, Ima atụ, ọrịa ukwara nta nke karigoro uzo mgbochi oria nke odinala bu ihe n'enye oke echiche ugbu a nyere ndi oru ahuike
Ihe foro ntakiri ka o ruo okara nde ndi mmadu n'aria oria nyiri otutu ọgwụ mgbochi ukwara nta [MDR-TB] kwa afo n' uwa nile
Mba Chaina na India bu ndi nwekarichara oria nyiri otutu ogwu mgbochi ukwara nta

Ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahuike mba ụwa (World Health Organization) kwuru na ihe ruru mmadu nde iri ise n'uwa nile nwere ọrịa nyiri ọtụtụ ọgwụ mgbochi ukwara nta, ebe ihe dika percenti iri asaa na itolu bu ndi na-aria ọrịa nyiri ọgwụ mgbochi abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ
N'afo 2005, ndị mmadu dị otu nari na iri abụọ na anọ bu oria nyịrị otụtụ ọgwụ mgbochi ukwara nta si na Amerika

N'afo 2006, orịa nke ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahu ike mba ụwa karichara otutu ogwu mgbochi ukwaranta (XDR TB) ka a chọpụtara n'Afrika, nke emesikwara chọputa na o di na mba iri ano na itolu tinyekwara mba Amerika
E nwere ihe dika mmadu puku iri ano nwere XDR-TB kwa afo, nke ndo ndi ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahu ike mba ụwan'eme atumatu

N'afo iri abuo gara aga, bakteria ndi na ma ama gunyere Stafilokokus, Srita marcescene na enterokokus amalitela igbochi ọtụtụ ọgwu mgbochi dika vanocimin ya na ọgwu mgbochi nile dika aminoglicocide na cefalosoporins
Nje oria n'adighi anwu anwu aburula ihe di mkpa na nlekota ahuike jikotara oria na-efe efe
Na ngbakwunye, ọria na-efe efe nke e sitere na ime obodo enweta site n'ụdị agba metilin stafilokokus aurieus (MRSA) n'ahụ onye ahụ dị bụ nke dị ọtụtụ ugbu a
Nje ọrịa ọgba ọbara bụ ọria na-efe efe nke ukwuu ma na-egbukwa ọtụtụ ndi mmadụ
I ma atụ, nje oria Ebola, ọrịa lasa, oria rift vali, nje marbọg na oria igba obara nke bolivia
Nje orịa ọgba ọbara nwere ike ibukwa oọrịa ozuru wa

Ihe mere na orịa a igbasa ka ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ di nkenke bu na o kwesiri ka mmadu na onye bu ya bụ oria nwe mmekorita ahu ya na onye ahu bu ọrịa ahụ nwere nwa obere oge tupu ọ nwụọ ma ọ bụ na ọ na-aria oria nke ukwuu
Obere oge onye ahụ mmadu ga-eji wee bute ọrịa ahu na mmalite ngosi njiri mara ọrịa ahụ na -enyere ndi oru ahuike aka ikewaputa onye butere ọrịa ahu ma gbochie ha ibughari nje ndi ahu
Isi ederede 2015-16 Nje ozuru mba ọnụ Zika na-efe efe na ahu oku Zika
Mgbasa nje Zika malitere na afọ 2015 ma biasie ike na isi mbido afọ 2016 site na inwe ihe kariri mmadu otu nde na puku nari ise I bute ọrịa ahụ na mpaghara mba kariri iri na abuo na mba Amerika
Ndi Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ahu ike mba ụwa (World Health Organization) adọọla aka na ntị na oria Zika nwere ike i bụ ọrịa ozuru ụwa ọnụ ma o bụrụ na ejikwataghị mgbasa ya bu ọrịa
Isi Ewu (English Goat's head) bụ nri ọdịnala Igbo nke e ji isi ewu mee
Ọ bụ nri Igbo bụ Nkwobi ma e wezụga na Isi Ewu bụ isi ewu ebe nke ikpeazụ bụ ụkwụ ehi
Ụfọdụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-ahọrọ isi ahụ dum n'otu oge mana iji belata mmiri achọrọ iji sie ofe ahụ, a na-ebipụ isi ewu ahụ n'ime iberibe ezi uche dị na ya
Isi ewu, Calabash nutmeg nke a makwaara dị ka mkpụrụ Ehu, Onion, Potash, mmanụ nkwụ, akwụkwọ Utazi, Ugba chọrọ isi Isi Ewu soup
A na-esi anụ ahụ n'ọkụ ruo mgbe ọ dị nro n'ime ite; a na-ejikarị ihe na-esi nri n'ihi ike nke anụ ewu
A na-agbakwunye yabasị, ihe na-atọ ụtọ, ose na nnu na mmanụ nkwụ siri ike nke e ji ngwakọta potash ọzọ mee kpamkpam site na ịgbakwunye ngwakọta potashi site na itinye mmiri na ya
A na-agbakwunye isi ewu, ụbụrụ kewara (nke e ji ụrọ mee), Calabash nutmeg,ugba na mmanụ nkwụ siri ike mgbe nkeji ole na ole gasịrị
Isi Ewu na-enye yabasị e bepụrụ na akwụkwọ Utazi mgbe emechara ya
Ebe a na-ere ahịa (POS) ma ọ bụ ebe a na-azụ ahịa (POP) bụ oge na ebe a na-emecha azụmahịa azụmaahịa

N'ebe a na-ere ere, onye na-ere ahịa na-agbakọ ego ole onye ahịa na-akwụ, na-egosi ego ahụ, nwere ike ịkwadebe akwụkwọ ọnụahịa maka onye ahịa (nke nwere ike ịbụ akwụkwọ ndekọ ego), ma gosipụta nhọrọ maka onye ahịa iji kwụọ ụgwọ
Ọ bụkwa ebe onye ahịa na-akwụ onye na-ere ahịa ego maka ngwaahịa ma ọ bụ mgbe enyechara ọrụ
Mgbe ọ nwetachara ụgwọ, onye ahịa ahụ nwere ike ịnye nnata maka azụmahịa ahụ, nke a na-ebipụtakarị mana enwere ike ịnye ya ma ọ bụ ziga ya na kọmputa

Iji gbakọọ ego onye ahịa ji, onye ahịa ahụ nwere ike iji ngwaọrụ dị iche iche dị ka ihe ọ̀tụ̀tụ̀ atụ̀ ihe, ihe nleba anya koodu, na akwụkwọ ndekọ ego (ma ọ bụ “akwụkwọ ndekọ ego POS” nke dị elu karị, bụ́ nke a na-akpọkwa mgbe ụfọdụ “Sistemụ POS”)
Iji kwụọ ụgwọ, ọnụ ahịa ịkwụ ụgwọ, ihuenyo mmetụ, yana ngwaike na ngwa ngwanrọ ndị ọzọ dị
Ndị na-ere ahịa na ndị na-ere ahịa ga na-ezokarị aka na mpaghara dị n'akụkụ ndenye ọpụpụ kama dị ka ebe ịzụrụ (POP) mgbe ha na-ekwurịta ya site n'aka onye na-ere ahịa
Nke a bụ ọkachasị mgbe ị na-eme atụmatụ na imepụta mpaghara yana mgbe ị na-atụle atụmatụ azụmaahịa na onyinye
Eji sọftụwia nwe ụlọ chịkwaa akwụkwọ ndekọ ego eletrọnịkị nke mbụ (ECR) ma nwee oke ọrụ yana ike nzikọrịta ozi
N'August 1973, IBM weputara sistemu ụlọ ahịa IBM 3650 na 3660 bụ, n'ezie, kọmpụta mainframe ejiri dị ka njikwa ụlọ ahịa nwere ike ijikwa ihe ruru 128 IBM 3653/3663 ndebanye aha ire ere
Usoro a bụ ojiji azụmaahịa mbụ nke teknụzụ sava ndị ahịa, nkwukọrịta ndị ọgbọ na ndị ọgbọ, nkwado ndabere na mpaghara mpaghara (LAN) n'otu oge, yana mmalite dịpụrụ adịpụ
Ka ọ na-erule etiti afọ 1974, etinyere ya na ụlọ ahịa Patmark dị na New Jersey na ụlọ ahịa ngalaba Dillard
Otu n'ime usoro ndebanye aha ego nke microprocessor na-achịkwa bụ nke William Brobeck na Associates wuru na 1974, maka ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ McDonald
Ọ na-eji Intel 8008, microprocessor nke mbụ (na onye bu ụzọ na Intel 8088 processor ejiri na mbụ IBM Personal Computer)

Ebe ọ bụla n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ahụ nwere ngwaọrụ nke ya nke gosipụtara usoro niile maka onye ahịa - dịka ọmụmaatụ, Vanilla Shake, Large Fries, BigMac - iji igodo ọnụọgụ na bọtịnụ maka ihe nchịkọta nhọrọ ọ bụla
Site na ịpị bọtịnụ [Grill], enwere ike ịrụ ọrụ nke abụọ ma ọ bụ nke atọ mgbe azụmahịa mbụ na-aga n'ihu
Mgbe onye ahịa dị njikere ịkwụ ụgwọ, bọtịnụ [Total] ga-agbakọ ụgwọ ahụ, gụnyere ụtụ isi ahịa maka ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ikike ọ bụla na United States
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe ziri ezi maka McDonald na ọ dabara nke ọma maka sava ma nye onye nwe ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ego nlele nke kwesịrị ịdị na drawer ego
Ejikọtara ihe ruru ngwaọrụ asatọ na otu n'ime kọmputa abụọ jikọrọ ọnụ ka enwere ike ijikwa akụkọ, ọnụahịa, na ụtụ isi ebipụta site na ngwaọrụ ọ bụla achọrọ site na itinye ya na ọnọdụ njikwa
Na mgbakwunye na ebe nchekwa na-edozi njehie, a kwalitere izi ezi site n'inwe mbipụta atọ nke data niile dị mkpa nwere ọtụtụ ọnụọgụ echekwara naanị dị ka ọnụọgụ 3
Ọ bụrụ na otu kọmputa daa, nke ọzọ nwere ike ijikwa ụlọ ahịa ahụ dum
E mepụtala ọtụtụ ngwa POS na nyiwe dị ka Windows na Unix
Ịnweta ikike nhazi mpaghara, nchekwa data mpaghara, ịkparịta ụka n'Ịntaneti, na ihe osise eserese mere ka o kwe omume ịmepụta usoro POS na-agbanwe ma na-arụ ọrụ nke ukwuu
Ọnụ ego nke sistemu ndị dị otú ahụ agbadala, n'ihi na enwere ike ịzụta ihe niile mejupụtara ya na shelf
OPOS (OLE maka POS) bụ ụkpụrụ mbụ a na-anabatakarị ma Microsoft, NCR Corporation, Epson na Fujitsu-ICL kere ya
OPOS bụ interface dabeere na COM nke kwekọrọ na asụsụ mmemme niile nwere COM maka Microsoft Windows
E wepụtara OPOS na 1996
Sun Microsystems, IBM, na NCR Corporation mepụtara JavaPOS na 1997 ma wepụta ya na 1999
JavaPOS bụ maka Java ihe OPOS bụ maka Windows, ma si otú a nwee onwe ya n'elu ikpo okwu
Ọdịdị nke windo ire ere bụ nke kachasị mkpa maka onye ọrụ
Onye ọrụ interface a dị oke egwu ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndị dị na nchịkọta ngwanrọ ndị ọzọ dịka ndị editọ okwu ma ọ bụ mmemme spreadsheet ebe ọsọ nke njem abụghị ihe dị oke mkpa maka arụmọrụ azụmahịa
Ọbịbịa nke igwe ojii emeela ka enwere ike itinye usoro elektrọnik ebe ire ere (EPOS) dị ka ngwanrọ dị ka ọrụ, nke enwere ike ịnweta kpọmkwem site na Ịntanetị site na iji ihe nchọgharị ịntanetị ọ bụla
N'iji ọganihu gara aga na usoro nkwukọrịta maka njikwa POS nke ngwaike, usoro POS dabeere na igwe ojii nweere onwe ha site na ikpo okwu na oke sistemụ arụmọrụ
Usoro EPOS dabere na ígwé ojii (ọtụtụ obere azụmahịa POS taa) na-adabere na ndenye aha, nke gụnyere nkwado ndị ahịa na-aga n'ihu
The retail industry is one of the predominant users of POS terminals

A retail point of sale system typically includes a cash register (which in recent times comprises a computer, monitor, cash drawer, receipt printer, customer display and a barcode scanner) and the majority of retail POS systems also include a debit/credit card reader
It can also include a conveyor belt, checkout divider, weight scale, integrated credit card processing system, a signature capture device and a customer pin pad device

While the system may include a keyboard and mouse, more and more POS monitors use touch-screen technology for ease of use, and a computer is built into the monitor chassis for what is referred to as an all-in-one unit
All-in-one POS units liberate counter space for the retailer

The POS system software can typically handle a myriad of customer based functions such as sales, returns, exchanges, layaways, gift cards, gift registries, customer loyalty programs, promotions, discounts and much more
POS software can also allow for functions such as pre-planned promotional sales, manufacturer coupon validation, foreign currency handling and multiple payment types
Ụlọ ahịa ndị mbụ na-echekwa ahịa n'azụ ụlọ ahịa
Ndị ọrụ ga-ebute ihe maka ndị ahịa iji gbochie ohere maka izu ohi na ire ere ga-eme n'otu kọmpụta
Ụlọ ahịa nri onwe onye dị ka Piggly Wiggly, malite na 1916, nyere ndị ahịa ohere iweta ihe nke ha ma gafere ebe a na-ere ahịa n'ụzọ ọpụpụ
Usoro ebe a na-ere ahịa bụ usoro kọmputa na-agụnye ndekọ, kọmputa na ngwá ọrụ dị n'akụkụ, na-abụkarị na netwọk kọmputa iji mee ihe na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, salons ntutu ma ọ bụ ụlọ nkwari akụ
Dị ka usoro ire ere ndị ọzọ, usoro ndị a na-edekọ ahịa, ọrụ na ụgwọ ọrụ, ma nwee ike ịmepụta ndekọ eji eme ihe na ndekọ na idebe akwụkwọ
Enwere ike ịnweta ha n'ebe dị anya site na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ndị na-ahụ maka nsogbu na ndị ọzọ nwere ikike
Nhọrọ nke usoro POS ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị oke mkpa maka ọrụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ kwa ụbọchị ma bụrụ nnukwu ego nke ndị njikwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ndị ọrụ ga-ebi na ya ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Usoro POS ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-ejikọta ya na oge niile nke ọrụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na onye ọ bụla metụtara ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ gụnyere ndị ọbịa, ndị na-eweta ya, ndị ọrụ, ndị njikwa na ndị nwe ya
Nhọrọ nke usoro POS ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ bụ usoro dị mgbagwoju anya nke onye nwe ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ kwesịrị ime ma ghara inye ya onye ọrụ
Enwere ike ichikota usoro ịzụta n'ime nzọụkwụ atọ Design, Compare na Negotiate
Nzọụkwụ Design chọrọ nnyocha iji chọpụta atụmatụ POS ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị mkpa maka ọrụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Site na ozi a, onye nwe ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ma ọ bụ onye njikwa nwere ike iji ngwọta POS ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị iche iche tụnyere iji chọpụta usoro POS na-egbo mkpa ha
Nzọụkwụ ikpeazụ bụ ịkparịta ụka ọnụahịa, usoro ịkwụ ụgwọ, gụnyere ọzụzụ, akwụkwọ ikike mbụ na ụgwọ nkwado na-aga n'ihu
Ọ bụrụ na azụmahịa ahụ enweghị ike inye ndị isi ụtụ isi asambodo a, enwere ike ịkwụ ha ụgwọ
Na, ọ bụrụ na ndị isi ụtụ isi nwere ike igosi iji usoro ahụ eme ihe n'ụzọ aghụghọ, ma azụmahịa ma onye na-ahụ maka ngwanrọ nwere ike ihu ntaramahụhụ ụtụ isi, ụgwọ, na ntaramahụhụ mpụ
Enwere ike inweta asambodo ma ọ bụ site na otu ụlọ ọrụ nke Kọmitii Nkwenye French (Comité français d’accréditation ma ọ bụ COFRAC) ma ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ngwanrọ nke usoro ndekọ ego

Site na mmalite nke ịkwụ ụgwọ ekwentị karịsịa Android Pay na Apple Pay ma na 2015, a na-atụ anya na n'ihi ịdị mma ya na atụmatụ nchekwa dị mma, nke a ga-emesị kpuchie ụdị ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ ndị ọzọ - gụnyere iji ọdụ ịkwụ ụgwọ
Otú ọ dị, maka ịkwụ ụgwọ ekwentị iji gaa n'ụzọ zuru oke, ngwaọrụ mkpanaka dị ka smartphones ndị nwere NFC ga-ebu ụzọ bụrụ ụwa niile
Nke a ga-abụ ihe gbasara ọtụtụ afọ site n'oge edemede a (2017) ka a na-atụ anya na ọtụtụ ụdị smartphones ọhụrụ ga-abụ NFC-enyere maka nzube dị otú ahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, iPhone 6 nwere NFC zuru oke maka ịkwụ ụgwọ ekwentị mgbe iPhone 5 na ụdị ndị okenye adịghị
Ihe ize ndụ nchebe ọdachi ndị a kpọtụrụ aha na mbụ jikọtara ya na nhazi kaadị ịkwụ ụgwọ site na usoro POS ga-ebelata nke ukwuu

Isiaka Adetunji Adeleke (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri n'abụọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1955 ruo ụbọchị iri n'abụọ nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2017) bụ onye omebe iwu nke nọ na Naịjirịa ugboro abụọ onye nọchitere anya People's Democratic Party (PDP) na steeti Osun site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2011 a họpụtara ya ọzọ n'okpuru otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke All Progressive Congress na-afo 2015
Ọ bụrụ onye otu Sineti Naịjirịa n'afọ 2007
Ọ zọrọ ntuli aka ọzọ n'ọnwa Eprel nke afọ 2011 na n'elu otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị PDP, ọ bịara onye nke abụọ site na vootu Nari iri asa n'asaa na iri itoolu
Onye meriri bụ Mudasiru Oyetunde Hussein nke otu Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) ọ nwere vootu puku otu narị na iri abụọ n'otu, nari itoolu na iri asa n'otu
Isiaka Adetunji Adeleke a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke iri n'ise nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1955 n'ime ezi na ụlọ nke sinetọ Ayoola Adeleke na Esther Adeleke
Amuru ya na Steeti Enugu ma noo oge mbu nwata na obodo ahu rue mbido agha obodo Naijiria
Ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Christ Church, Enugu, tupu ọ kwaga Ibadan
Ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Ogbomoso Grammar School
Adeleke nwere nzere bachelọ nke nka, na nzere masters na ochichi ndi mmadu
Ọ bụ onye isi oche, kansụl ọchịchị, Kansụl nkwalite mbupụ nke Naịjirịa, onye isi na onye isi oche, Kansụl ọchịchị nke Mahadum Calabar, Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ nwanne nna onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwu, Davido
N’oge obodo Naịjirịa nke atọ, Adeleke zọrọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke Osun Steeti emere ọhụụ bụ nke e mepụtara site n’Oyo Steeti
Ọ bụ onye otu SDP nke bụ pati kachasị na steeti ahụ
Onye nọ n’ihu ya bụ onye ọkaiwu, Oladipo Oladosu mana mgbe ọ gbasịrị isi na nke Adeleke gbara nke abụọ, Adeleke nwere ike merie n’agba nke abụọ
A hoputara ya dịka onye ochichi mbụ nke Osun State n'afọ 1992
Mkpebi ndị pụtara ìhè Adeleke mere bụ nguzobe nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị dị na Iree, kọleji nke teknụzụ na Esa-Oke na mmecha nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Mgbasa Ozi nke Ọchịchị Osun

Agbanyeghị, n'afọ 1994, mgbe mgbasa nke Obodo Naịjirịa ahụ gasịrị, Adeleke rutere n'ụlọikwuu ya na ndị otu mgbagha, bụ Afenifere mana ọ mechara banye na otu Ndị ọchịchị Patị nke Naịjirịa otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọhụrụ nke nkwado ya sitere n'aka ndị ha na Abacha nọ nso
N’afọ 2007, a họpụtara Adeleke dị ka onye omebe iwu maka ọdịda anyanwụ Osun Onye ọ bụ ya na ya n'asọmpi a bụ Mudasiru Oyetunde Hussein, na-eguzo maka otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Action Congress
Hussein nọrọ oge abụọ n'ụlọ omebe iwu (1999 ruo 2007) dịka onye otu pati Alliance for Democracy na mpaghara Lagos Steeti, mana o sitere na steeti Osun
Hussein rịọrọ ka ntuli aka a hapụ inwe isi
A họpụtara Isiaka Adetunji Adeleke na komittii n'ahụ maka mwekọka akụrụngwa mmanụ ala elu ugwu na ụlọ ọrụ, Ụlọ na ndị agha ụgbọ ala
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2008, o guzobere akara ugo mmụta maka ihe dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ otu narị na-enweghị ike ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na mba ahụ
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2009, dịka onye isi oche kọmitii sineti na INEC, Sịnetọ Isiaka Adetunji Adeleke toro ọrụ nke Independent National Electoral Commission, si na 'rue ugbua INEC rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma'
Ọ kwadola ikike ndị Naịjirịa bi na mba ofesi ịtụ vootu na Naịjirịa
Adeleke, tupu ọnwụ ya, e kwuru na ọ na-ele oche gọvanọ na Osun n'ihu ntuli aka nke steeti ahụ n'afọ 2018
Sịnetọ Isiaka Adeleke nwere ọrịa obi
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ nke ọnwa Eprel, afọ 2017 na Biket Hospital na Osogbo, isi obodo Osun steeti
